request.description:
### Detailed Description of Each Field in the Endpoint

- **name**: The name of the API request, which identifies its purpose. In this case, it relates to creating a video connection for the AfreecaTV platform.

- **request**: Contains details about the request being made.
  - **method**: The HTTP method used for the request, which is POST in this instance, indicating that data will be sent to the server.
  - **url**: The endpoint URL to which the request is sent. Here, it points to the local server's API for video connection creation.
  - **headers**: An array of headers to be sent with the request.
    - **key**: The name of the header, which in this case is "Content-Type".
    - **value**: The value associated with the header, indicating that the request body will be in JSON format.
  - **body**: The actual content sent in the request.
    - **mode**: Indicates the format of the body; "raw" means the body is sent as plain text.
    - **raw**: The JSON object that encapsulates all the necessary data for creating a video connection.

#### Inside the Body

- **options**: An object containing various options for the video connection.
  - **providerName**: The name of the streaming provider, specified as "afreecatv".
  - **providerId**: An identifier for the provider, currently left blank.
  - **apiKey**: The API key for authentication, currently set to null.
  - **apiSecret**: The API secret for additional security, currently set to null.
  - **apiClientId**: The client ID for the API, currently set to null.
  - **authToken**: A token for authentication, currently set to null.
  - **server**: Specifies the server being used, currently set to null.
  - **rtmpUrl**: RTMP URL for streaming, currently set to null.
  - **streamKey**: Key used for streaming, currently set to null.
  - **channelUrl**: URL of the channel, currently set to null.
  - **authUsername**: Username for authentication, currently set to null.
  - **authPassword**: Password for authentication, currently set to null.
  - **uniqueKey**: A unique identifier for the video connection.
  - **videoId**: Identifier for the video.
  - **accountId**: ID associated with the user's account.
  - **channelId**: ID of the channel for the video.
  - **sessionId**: Identifier for the current session.
  - **streamId**: Identifier for the stream.
  - **ipAddress**: The IP address of the user, currently set to null.
  - **country**: The country from which the request is made.
  - **state**: The state related to the user's location.
  - **title**: The title of the video being created.
  - **description**: A short description of the video content.
  - **tags**: Tags associated with the video for categorization.

- **stream**: An object that contains information specifically related to the stream being created.
  - **streamId**: Unique identifier for the stream.
  - **streamName**: The name assigned to the live video stream.
  - **videoStatus**: The current status of the video; "notready" indicates that it is not yet ready for streaming.
  - **providerName**: Name of the streaming provider, here specified as "cloudflare".
  - **providerUniqueId**: A unique ID generated by the provider for this stream.
  - **providerPlaybackUrl**: URL for playback through the provider, currently empty.
  - **providerStreamId**: Identifier for the stream provided by the provider.
  - **providerStreamKey**: Key required for the providerâ€™s streaming.
  - **providerStreamUrl**: URL where the stream will be available.
  - **providerStreamData**: An object containing various stream-related parameters like URLs for different streaming methods, creation timestamps, and metadata.
    - **result**: Contains result information about the stream.
    - **created**: Timestamp when the stream was created.
    - **modified**: Last modified timestamp for the stream.
    - **meta**: Metadata about the stream that includes account ID, audio input name, channel ID, cover photo URL, and video details.
    - **defaultCreator**: The ID of the default creator of the stream.
    - **status**: Current status of the stream, currently null.
    - **recording**: Configuration for recording options.
      - **mode**: Indicates if recording is automatic.
      - **requireSignedURLs**: Indicates if signed URLs are required.
      - **allowedOrigins**: Specifies any origins allowed for requests.

- **success**: A boolean indicating whether the operation was successful.
- **errors**: An array to capture any errors that occurred during the request.
- **messages**: An array for any messages related to the request.

- **details**: An object that provides detailed information about the video being created.
  - **accountId**: Identifier for the user's account associated with the video.
  - **sessionId**: Current session identifier.
  - **channelId**: Identifier for the channel related to the video.
  - **videoId**: Identifier of the video.
  - **title**: Title of the video.
  - **description**: Description of the video content.
  - **tags**: Tags associated with the video.
  - **streamType**: The type of stream, indicated as "Live".
  - **searchType**: Type related to search functionality, specified as "Game".
  - **started**: Boolean indicating if the stream has started.
  - **startedOn**: Timestamp indicating when the stream started.
  - **paused**: Boolean indicating whether the stream has been paused.
  - **pausedOn**: Timestamp indicating when the stream was paused, if applicable.
  - **stopped**: Boolean indicating if the stream has been stopped.
  - **stoppedOn**: Timestamp indicating when the stream was stopped, if applicable.
  - **streamId**: Unique identifier for the stream.
  - **channel**: Name of the channel hosting the stream.
  - **category**: Category of the content.
  - **categoryId**: Identifier for the content category.
  - **subCategory**: Further classification within the main category.
  - **subCategoryId**: Identifier for the sub-category.
  - **scheduleDate**: Date when the stream is scheduled.
  - **scheduleTime**: Time when the stream is scheduled.
  - **streamHours**: Duration of the stream in hours.
  - **coverPhotoUrl**: URL of the cover image for the video.
  - **providerPlaybackUrl**: Playback URL through the provider, currently empty.
  - **voteTokenQuantity**: Amount of tokens available for voting during the stream.
  - **votingTimeReset**: Duration in seconds for resetting voting time.
  - **voteButtonQuantity**: Number of voting buttons available.
  - **voteButtonText1**: Text displayed on the first voting button.
  - **voteButtonText2**: Text displayed on the second voting button.
  - **isRewardsEnabled**: Boolean indicating if rewards are enabled for viewers.
  - **isTournamentEnabled**: Boolean indicating if tournaments are enabled for this stream.
  - **tournamentButtonText1**: Text displayed on the first button related to the tournament.
  - **tournamentButtonText2**: Text displayed on the second button related to the tournament.
  - **streamLocatorName**: Name assigned to the stream locator.
  - **streamAssetName**: Name of the stream asset.
  - **platformVideoIds**: An object containing IDs for the video across various platforms, all currently set to false.
  - **platformEventIds**: An object containing event IDs for various platforms, all currently set to false.
  - **primaryCameraName**: Name of the primary camera used for the stream.
  - **primaryMicrophoneName**: Name of the primary microphone used for the stream.
  - **primarySpeakerName**: Name of the primary speaker used for the stream.
  - **additionalCameras**: An array of additional cameras used for the stream, each with its own properties for camera and microphone names.
  - **createdDate**: Date when the video details were created.
  - **createdTime**: Time when the video details were created.
  - **updatedDate**: Date when the video details were last updated.
  - **updatedTime**: Time when the video details were last updated.
  - **deletedDate**: Date when the video was deleted, if applicable, currently set to null.
  - **deletedTime**: Time when the video was deleted, if applicable, currently set to null.

request.description:
### Detailed Description of Data in Endpoint: Video - Connect - Update - AfreecaTV

#### Request Parameters
- **Method**: PUT
  - This indicates that the request is intended to update existing resources on the server.
  
- **URL**: http://localhost:3000/api/video/connect/update
  - This is the endpoint to which the request is made. It suggests the operation pertains to updating video connections.

- **Headers**:
  - **Content-Type**: application/json
    - This specifies that the request body is formatted as JSON.

#### Request Body
- **options**: 
  - This object contains configuration options for the video connection.
  
  - **providerName**: "afreecatv"
    - Indicates the name of the video streaming provider.

  - **providerId**: ""
    - An identifier for the provider, currently not set.

  - **apiKey**: null
    - Placeholder for an API key required for authentication; currently not provided.

  - **apiSecret**: null
    - Placeholder for an API secret; currently not provided.

  - **apiClientId**: null
    - Placeholder for a client ID for API calls; currently not provided.

  - **authToken**: null
    - Placeholder for an authentication token; currently not provided.

  - **server**: null
    - A field for specifying server details, currently not set.

  - **rtmpUrl**: null
    - A placeholder for the Real-Time Messaging Protocol (RTMP) URL; currently not provided.

  - **streamKey**: null
    - A placeholder for the stream key; currently not provided.

  - **channelUrl**: null
    - A placeholder for the URL of the channel; currently not provided.

  - **authUsername**: null
    - Placeholder for the username for authentication; currently not provided.

  - **authPassword**: null
    - Placeholder for the password for authentication; currently not provided.

  - **uniqueKey**: "uniqueKey"
    - A unique identifier for the video stream.

  - **videoId**: "videoId"
    - Represents the identifier for the video being updated.

  - **accountId**: "accountId"
    - An identifier for the account associated with the video.

  - **channelId**: "channelId"
    - Represents the identifier for the channel the video is streamed from.

  - **sessionId**: "sessionId"
    - An identifier for the session related to the video stream.

  - **streamId**: "streamId"
    - Represents the identifier for the stream itself.

  - **ipAddress**: null
    - Placeholder for the IP address; currently not provided.

  - **country**: "United States"
    - The country related to the video stream.

  - **state**: "California"
    - The state associated with the video stream.

  - **title**: "Fortune's Basketball Challenge"
    - The title of the video stream.

  - **description**: "Basketball game featuring amazing plays and challenges."
    - A brief outline of what the video is about.

  - **tags**: "basketball,game,challenge"
    - Keywords associated with the video to help in categorization and searchability. 

- **stream**:
  - This object includes details relevant to the active video stream.

  - **streamId**: "streamId"
    - Identifier for the current stream.

  - **streamName**: "live-video-stream-7164b12d-1708817130231"
    - A unique name for the stream.

  - **uniqueKey**: "uniqueKey"
    - Unique identifier for the stream, consistent with options.

  - **videoId**: "videoId"
    - Identifier of the video, consistent with options.

  - **accountId**: "accountId"
    - Identifier for the account, consistent with options.

  - **channelId**: "channelId"
    - Identifier for the channel, consistent with options.

  - **sessionId**: "sessionId"
    - Identifier for the session, consistent with options.

  - **videoStatus**: "notready"
    - Current status of the video indicating it is not ready for streaming.

  - **providerName**: "cloudflare"
    - Indicates that Cloudflare is being used as the streaming provider.

  - **providerUniqueId**: "c3b3f93b0a7594f3db917d5f9a671351"
    - Unique identifier for the provider's system.

  - **providerPlaybackUrl**: ""
    - Placeholder for playback URL; currently not set.

  - **providerStreamId**: "c3b3f93b0a7594f3db917d5f9a671351"
    - Stream identifier within the provider's system.

  - **providerStreamKey**: "e0bb5fa14f7059bccfcef40d5dbe2283kc3b3f93b0a7594f3db917d5f9a671351"
    - Key used for stream access.

  - **providerStreamUrl**: "srt://live.cloudflare.com:778"

request.description:
### Description of Endpoint Data: Video - Connect - Delete - AfreecaTV

#### General Information
- **Name**: The name of this API request is "Video - Connect - Delete - AfreecaTV".
- **Request Method**: This request uses the POST method to communicate with the server.
- **URL**: The request is sent to the local server at `http://localhost:3000/api/video/connect/delete`.
- **Headers**: The request requires a header to specify the content type, which is set to `application/json`.

#### Request Body
The body of the request is structured in JSON format and is divided into two main sections: `options` and `stream`, along with `details`.

##### Options
- **providerName**: Indicates the video streaming provider being used, which in this case is "afreecatv".
- **providerId**: An identifier for the provider; currently left empty.
- **apiKey**: The API key used for authentication; currently set as null.
- **apiSecret**: The secret key for API access; currently set as null.
- **apiClientId**: The client identifier for the API; currently set as null.
- **authToken**: The authentication token for securing the connection; currently set as null.
- **server**: Specifies the server information; currently set as null.
- **rtmpUrl**: The RTMP server URL for streaming; currently set as null.
- **streamKey**: The key used to identify the stream; currently set as null.
- **channelUrl**: The URL of the stream channel; currently set as null.
- **authUsername**: The username for authentication; currently set as null.
- **authPassword**: The password for authentication; currently set as null.
- **uniqueKey**: A user-defined unique identifier for the request.
- **videoId**: The identifier for the video being processed.
- **accountId**: The identifier for the user's account.
- **channelId**: The identifier for the channel.
- **sessionId**: The session identifier for this particular streaming instance.
- **streamId**: Similar to sessionId, but specifically tied to the stream.
- **ipAddress**: The IP address associated with the request; currently set as null.
- **country**: The country associated with the request, defaulting to "United States".
- **state**: The state related to the request, defaulting to "California".
- **title**: The title of the stream, which is "Fortune's Basketball Challenge".
- **description**: A brief description of the content being streamed, stating that it's a "Basketball game featuring amazing plays and challenges."
- **tags**: Keywords associated with the video for categorization, which are "basketball, game, challenge".

##### Stream
- **streamId**: The unique identifier for the stream.
- **streamName**: The name of the stream, including a unique identifier.
- **uniqueKey**: A unique identifier for the stream.
- **videoId**: The identifier for the video.
- **accountId**: The account ID associated with the stream.
- **channelId**: The channel ID linked to the stream.
- **sessionId**: The session ID affiliated with the stream.
- **videoStatus**: Indicates the current status of the video; set to "notready".
- **providerName**: The name of the streaming provider, specified as "cloudflare".
- **providerUniqueId**: A unique ID assigned by the provider.
- **providerPlaybackUrl**: The URL for playback provided by the streaming provider, currently set to empty.
- **providerStreamId**: The ID assigned to the stream by the provider.
- **providerStreamKey**: The key provided by the streaming provider.
- **providerStreamUrl**: The URL for the stream provided by the streaming provider.
- **providerStreamData**: A nested object containing additional data about the stream including URLs for different protocols (RTMPS, SRT) and information about the stream's metadata and settings.
- **success**: A boolean indicating whether the request was successful.
- **errors**: Contains any errors that occurred during the request, currently an empty array.
- **messages**: Contains messages regarding the request, currently an empty array.
- **createdDate**: The date on which the stream was created.
- **createdTime**: The time at which the stream was created.
- **updatedDate**: The date on which the stream was last updated.
- **updatedTime**: The time at which the stream was last updated.
- **deletedDate**: The date on which the stream was deleted, currently set to null.
- **deletedTime**: The time at which the stream was deleted, currently set to null.

##### Details
- **accountId**: Same as previously defined, representing the account associated with the stream.
- **sessionId**: Repeated from before, representing the session ID.
- **channelId**: Repeated to keep the information handy.
- **videoId**: Repeated for convenience.
- **title**: The title of the stream.
- **description**: The description of the stream.
- **tags**: Keywords associated with the video.
- **streamType**: The type of stream; specified as "Live".
- **searchType**: The category under which the stream is searchable; currently defined as "Game".
- **started**: A boolean value indicating whether the stream has started; set to true.
- **startedOn**: The timestamp indicating when the stream started.
- **paused**: A boolean indicating if the stream is currently paused; set to false.
- **pausedOn**: The timestamp indicating when the stream was paused, currently repeating the started timestamp.
- **stopped**: A boolean indicating if the stream has stopped; set to false.
- **stoppedOn**: The timestamp for when the stream was stopped, currently set to null.
- **streamId**: Repeated for clarity on the stream's unique identifier.
- **channel**: The name of the channel associated with the stream.
- **category**: The general category for the stream, which is "Board".
- **categoryId**: The identifier for the category.
- **subCategory**: A more specific classification, which is "Outdoor Party".
- **subCategoryId**: The identifier for the subcategory.
- **scheduleDate**: The planned date for the stream; currently set to "2024-02-01".
- **scheduleTime**: The planned time for the stream; currently set to "18:00:00".
- **streamHours**: Duration of the stream set to 1 hour.
- **coverPhotoUrl**: The URL for the cover photo associated with the stream.
- **providerPlaybackUrl**: Repeated for playback URL information.
- **voteTokenQuantity**: The quantity of tokens available for voting.
- **votingTimeReset**: The time period in which voting can be reset, currently set at 5.
- **voteButtonQuantity**: The number of voting buttons available; set to 4.
- **voteButtonText1**: The text displayed on the first voting button.
- **voteButtonText2**: The text displayed on the second voting button.
- **isRewardsEnabled**: A boolean indicating if rewards are enabled; set to false.
- **isTournamentEnabled**: A boolean indicating if tournament mode is enabled; set to true.
- **tournamentButtonText1**: Text for the first button in tournament mode.
- **tournamentButtonText2**: Text for the second button in tournament mode.
- **streamLocatorName**: The name assigned for locating the stream.
- **streamAssetName**: The asset name associated with the stream.
- **platformVideoIds**: An object mapping various platforms to their specific video IDs; currently all set to false indicating no IDs are available.
- **platformEventIds**: An object mapping various platforms to their respective event IDs; currently all set to false indicating no event IDs are available.
- **primaryCameraName**: The name of the primary camera used for the stream.
- **primaryMicrophoneName**: The name of the primary microphone used for audio capture.
- **primarySpeakerName**: The name of the primary speaker used during the stream.
- **additionalCameras**: An array of objects detailing additional cameras and microphones, if utilized.
- **createdDate**: The date the stream details were created.
- **createdTime**: The time at which the stream details were created.
- **updatedDate**: The date when the stream details were last updated.
- **updatedTime**: The time when the stream details were last updated.
- **deletedDate**: The date on which the stream details were deleted, currently set to null.
- **deletedTime**: The time at which the stream details were deleted, currently set to null.

This API endpoint allows users to manage and delete video streams on the AfreecaTV platform, providing comprehensive controls through its various parameters.

request.description:
### Description of Each Data in the Endpoint

- **name**: This is the title of the API request, indicating the purpose of the operation, which is to create a video connection using Amazon Live.

- **request**: This section details the parameters for the API request.
  - **method**: Specifies the HTTP method being used for the request, which is POST, indicating data is being sent to the server to create a resource.
  - **url**: The endpoint URL where the request is sent, in this case, a local server for creating video connections.
  - **headers**: Contains metadata about the request.
    - **key**: This is the identifier for the header, which is Content-Type in this case.
    - **value**: The value of the header, specifying that the request body format is JSON.
  - **body**: This is the main part of the request containing information needed to create the video connection.
    - **mode**: Indicates the type of body content being sent, set to 'raw'.
    - **raw**: This is the actual JSON object sent in the body, which contains various options and stream details.

- **options**: Contains configuration settings for the video connection.
  - **providerName**: The name of the video service provider, set to 'amazonlive' for this connection.
  - **providerId**: An identifier for the provider, currently left blank.
  - **apiKey**: The API key for authenticating with the service, currently null.
  - **apiSecret**: The API secret used for authentication, currently null.
  - **apiClientId**: A client ID for API access, currently null.
  - **authToken**: An authentication token for user validation, currently null.
  - **server**: The server address, currently null.
  - **rtmpUrl**: The Real-Time Messaging Protocol URL, currently null.
  - **streamKey**: A key required to stream, currently null.
  - **channelUrl**: The URL for the channel, currently null.
  - **authUsername**: Username for authentication, currently null.
  - **authPassword**: Password for authentication, currently null.
  - **uniqueKey**: A unique key assigned to this video stream.
  - **videoId**: The identifier for the video being streamed.
  - **accountId**: The identifier for the user account associated with the stream.
  - **channelId**: The identifier for the channel on which the video is streamed.
  - **sessionId**: The identifier for the session during streaming.
  - **streamId**: The identifier for the stream.
  - **ipAddress**: The IP address from which the request is made, currently null.
  - **country**: The country where the stream is being set, in this case, the United States.
  - **state**: The state within the country, California in this case.
  - **title**: The title of the video stream, "Fortune's Basketball Challenge."
  - **description**: A brief description of the video content, mentioning it features basketball plays and challenges.
  - **tags**: Keywords related to the stream that can help categorize it, such as basketball, game, challenge.

- **stream**: Information about the video stream itself.
  - **streamId**: The unique identifier for the stream.
  - **streamName**: The name of the live video stream, which is automatically generated.
  - **videoId**: The ID of the associated video.
  - **accountId**: The account ID related to the stream.
  - **channelId**: The channel ID on which the stream is broadcasted.
  - **sessionId**: The session ID for the video stream.
  - **videoStatus**: The current status of the video, set to 'notready' at the time of the request.
  - **providerName**: Again references the video provider, which is 'cloudflare' here.
  - **providerUniqueId**: A unique identifier generated by the provider.
  - **providerPlaybackUrl**: A URL for playback provided by the service, currently left empty.
  - **providerStreamId**: The stream ID as recognized by the provider.
  - **providerStreamKey**: The stream key as per the provider's requirements.
  - **providerStreamUrl**: The URL for streaming video to the provider, indicating the protocol and address.
  - **providerStreamData**: Contains details returned by the provider regarding streaming settings and URLs.
    - **result**: Contains the details of the streaming result including unique IDs and URLs for different streaming types.
  - **createdDate**: The date the stream was created.
  - **createdTime**: The time the stream was created.
  - **updatedDate**: The date the stream details were last updated.
  - **updatedTime**: The time the stream details were last updated.
  - **deletedDate**: Indicates if the stream has been deleted, currently null.
  - **deletedTime**: Time at which the stream was deleted, if applicable.

- **details**: Further specific information about the current video and streaming session.
  - **accountId**: Reference to the user account.
  - **sessionId**: Reference to the current session.
  - **channelId**: Reference to the channel being used.
  - **videoId**: Identifier for the video.
  - **title**: Title of the video stream.
  - **description**: Description highlighting the main features of the stream.
  - **tags**: List of relevant keywords for the stream.
  - **streamType**: Indicates that this is a live stream.
  - **searchType**: Type of content, which in this example is categorized as a game.
  - **started**: Boolean indicating if the stream has started.
  - **startedOn**: Timestamp for when the stream started.
  - **paused**: Boolean indicating if the stream is currently paused.
  - **pausedOn**: Timestamp for when the stream was paused.
  - **stopped**: Boolean indicating if the stream is stopped.
  - **stoppedOn**: Timestamp for when the stream was stopped, currently null.
  - **streamId**: Unique identifier for the stream.
  - **channel**: Name of the channel hosting the stream.
  - **category**: Category under which the stream is classified, here it's 'Board'.
  - **categoryId**: Identifier for the category.
  - **subCategory**: Specific sub-category for finer classification.
  - **subCategoryId**: Identifier for the sub-category.
  - **scheduleDate**: Planned date for the stream.
  - **scheduleTime**: Planned time for the stream.
  - **streamHours**: Duration in hours for the stream.
  - **coverPhotoUrl**: URL to the cover photo representing the stream.
  - **providerPlaybackUrl**: URL for playback provided by the provider, currently empty.
  - **voteTokenQuantity**: Number of voting tokens for interactive features.
  - **votingTimeReset**: Time reset duration for votes.
  - **voteButtonQuantity**: Number of voting buttons available.
  - **voteButtonText1**: Text for the first voting button.
  - **voteButtonText2**: Text for the second voting button.
  - **isRewardsEnabled**: Indicates if a rewards system is active for viewers.
  - **isTournamentEnabled**: Indicates if the tournament mode is active.
  - **tournamentButtonText1**: Text for the tournament's first button.
  - **tournamentButtonText2**: Text for the tournament's second button.
  - **streamLocatorName**: Name used for locating the stream.
  - **streamAssetName**: Name for the asset related to the stream.
  - **platformVideoIds**: Object containing output IDs for different platforms (YouTube, Twitch, etc.), all currently set to false indicating no output IDs are provided yet.
  - **platformEventIds**: Object containing event IDs for integration with various platforms, also all set to false.
  - **primaryCameraName**: Name of the primary camera being used.
  - **primaryMicrophoneName**: Name of the primary microphone being used.
  - **primarySpeakerName**: Name of the primary speaker being used.
  - **additionalCameras**: Array containing additional camera and microphone configurations.
  - **createdDate**: The date when the stream details were initially created.
  - **createdTime**: The time when the stream details were created.
  - **updatedDate**: The most recent date when any updates were made to the stream.
  - **updatedTime**: The last time when updates were made to the stream. 
  - **deletedDate**: Indicates if the stream is deleted, currently null.
  - **deletedTime**: Indicates the time at which deletion occurred, also null.

request.description:
### API Endpoint Description: Video - Connect - Update - Amazon Live

**Name**: This represents the name of the API request, indicating that it is related to updating video connections for Amazon Live.

**Request**: This section details the properties of the API request being made.

- **Method**: This indicates that the HTTP method used for the request is `PUT`, which is typically used to update existing resources.

- **URL**: The endpoint where this request is sent, which is `http://localhost:3000/api/video/connect/update`. This implies the request is made to a local server.

- **Headers**: 
  - **Content-Type**: Specifies the type of content being sent in the request body; in this case, it is `application/json`, indicating that the body is formatted in JSON.

- **Body**: This part contains the details being updated or sent in the request. It has two primary components: `options` and `stream`.

  - **Options**: This section contains settings and parameters relevant to the video connection.
    - **providerName**: Specifies the name of the streaming provider, which is set to "amazonlive".
    - **providerId**: An identifier for the provider, currently not set.
    - **apiKey**: An optional key for authentication with the API, currently null.
    - **apiSecret**: An optional secret key for accessing the API, currently null.
    - **apiClientId**: An optional client ID for identifying the API client, currently null.
    - **authToken**: An optional token for authorization, currently null.
    - **server**: An optional field for specifying the server, currently null.
    - **rtmpUrl**: The RTMP URL for streaming, currently null.
    - **streamKey**: A key used to authenticate the stream, currently null.
    - **channelUrl**: The URL of the video channel, currently null.
    - **authUsername**: Username for authentication, currently null.
    - **authPassword**: Password for authentication, currently null.
    - **uniqueKey**: A unique identifier for this video connection.
    - **videoId**: The identifier for the specific video being updated.
    - **accountId**: An identifier for the account associated with the video.
    - **channelId**: The identifier for the specific channel.
    - **sessionId**: An identifier for the session of the live video.
    - **streamId**: An identifier for the stream.
    - **ipAddress**: The IP address associated with the connection, currently null.
    - **country**: The country where the connection is made, in this case, "United States".
    - **state**: The state where the connection is made, specifically "California".
    - **title**: The title of the video stream, which is "Fortune's Basketball Challenge".
    - **description**: Description of the video, noting that it features basketball games and challenges.
    - **tags**: Keywords related to the video, listed as "basketball,game,challenge".

  - **Stream**: This section provides details about the live stream.
    - **streamId**: Unique identifier for the stream.
    - **streamName**: The name given to the stream, which includes a random identifier.
    - **uniqueKey**: Repeated unique identifier for the video stream.
    - **videoId**: ID of the video being streamed.
    - **accountId**: Account identifier associated with the stream.
    - **channelId**: Identifier for the channel associated with the stream.
    - **sessionId**: Session identifier for the live stream.
    - **videoStatus**: Current status of the video, indicated here as "notready".
    - **providerName**: Indicates the provider for this video, set to "cloudflare".
    - **providerUniqueId**: Unique identifier for the streaming provider.
    - **providerPlaybackUrl**: URL for video playback, currently empty.
    - **providerStreamId**: Streaming ID provided by the provider.
    - **providerStreamKey**: Key used to securely stream the video via the provider.
    - **providerStreamUrl**: URL for live streaming, given as an SRT URL.
    - **providerStreamData**: Additional data received from the provider that includes:
      - Various streaming URLs (RTMP and SRT) for different types of connection.
      - Timestamps for when the stream was created and modified.
      - Metadata about the stream, including account info, audio/video input, and cover photo URL.
      - Recording details, including mode and whether signed URLs are required.
      - Indicators of whether recordings should be deleted after a period of days.
    - **success**: A boolean indicating if the request was processed successfully.
    - **errors**: An array to capture any errors that occurred during the request, which is currently empty.
    - **messages**: Additional messages returned from the API, which is also currently empty.

    - **createdDate**: Date when the stream was created.
    - **createdTime**: Time of creation for the stream.
    - **updatedDate**: Date when the stream details were last updated.
    - **updatedTime**: Time of the last update.
    - **deletedDate**: If the stream were deleted, this would indicate when, currently null.
    - **deletedTime**: Time of deletion if applicable, currently null.
  
  - **Details**: This portion provides metadata about the video stream.
    - **accountId**: Unique identifier for the account associated with the stream.
    - **sessionId**: Current session identifier for the live video.
    - **channelId**: Channel associated with the stream.
    - **videoId**: The identifier of the video.
    - **title**: Title of the stream.
    - **description**: Description of the stream.
    - **tags**: Tags associated with the stream.
    - **streamType**: Describes the type of stream, in this case, it's "Live".
    - **searchType**: Type of the content, here itâ€™s categorized as "Game".
    - **started**: A boolean indicating if the stream has started.
    - **startedOn**: Date and time when the stream started.
    - **paused**: Indicates if the stream is currently paused.
    - **pausedOn**: Date and time when the stream was paused.
    - **stopped**: Indicates if the stream has been stopped.
    - **stoppedOn**: Date and time when the stream was stopped, which is currently null as it is ongoing.
    - **streamId**: Unique identifier for the stream.
    - **channel**: Name of the channel hosting the stream.
    - **category**: Category to which the stream belongs.
    - **categoryId**: Identifier for the category.
    - **subCategory**: A more specific category for the stream.
    - **subCategoryId**: Identifier for the subcategory.
    - **scheduleDate**: Date scheduled for the stream.
    - **scheduleTime**: Time scheduled for the stream.
    - **streamHours**: Duration of the stream in hours, here itâ€™s set to 1.
    - **coverPhotoUrl**: URL link to the cover photo of the stream.
    - **providerPlaybackUrl**: URL link for playback through the provider.
    - **voteTokenQuantity**: Number of voting tokens associated with the stream.
    - **votingTimeReset**: Time in minutes to reset the voting.
    - **voteButtonQuantity**: Number of different vote buttons available.
    - **voteButtonText1**: Text for the first vote button.
    - **voteButtonText2**: Text for the second vote button.
    - **isRewardsEnabled**: Boolean indicating whether rewards are enabled, currently false.
    - **isTournamentEnabled**: Boolean indicating if tournaments are enabled, currently true.
    - **tournamentButtonText1**: Text for the first tournament button.
    - **tournamentButtonText2**: Text for the second tournament button.
    - **streamLocatorName**: Name used to locate the stream.
    - **streamAssetName**: Name of the asset for the stream.
    - **platformVideoIds**: Object containing platform-specific video identifiers, all set to false.
    - **platformEventIds**: Object containing platform-specific event identifiers, all set to false.
    - **primaryCameraName**: Name of the primary camera being used.
    - **primaryMicrophoneName**: Name of the primary microphone being utilized.
    - **primarySpeakerName**: Name of the primary speaker being used.
    - **additionalCameras**: Array detailing any additional cameras and microphones, with their identifiers.
    - **createdDate**: Date when this video stream was created.
    - **createdTime**: Time of creation for the video stream.
    - **updatedDate**: Date when the video stream was last updated.
    - **updatedTime**: Time of the last update.
    - **deletedDate**: Date of deletion if the stream were to be deleted, currently null.
    - **deletedTime**: Time of deletion if applicable, currently null.

request.description:
### Endpoint Description

#### Name
**Video - Connect - Delete - Amazon Live**  
This endpoint is used for deleting a video connection associated with an Amazon Live stream.

#### Request
- **Method:** POST  
  This indicates that data will be sent to the server to perform the deletion action.

- **URL:** `http://localhost:3000/api/video/connect/delete`  
  The endpoint URL where the request is sent.

- **Headers:**
  - **Content-Type:** `application/json`  
    This header tells the server that the request body is formatted in JSON.

- **Body:**  
  The request body includes two main sections: `options` and `stream`.

#### Body - Options
This section contains various configuration options related to the video connection being deleted.

- **providerName:** `amazonlive`  
  Specifies the name of the service provider for the live stream.

- **providerId:** `""`  
  An optional unique identifier for the provider, left empty.

- **apiKey, apiSecret, apiClientId, authToken, server, rtmpUrl, streamKey, channelUrl, authUsername, authPassword:** `null`  
  These parameters are placeholders for various authentication and connection settings which are currently not provided.

- **uniqueKey:** `uniqueKey`  
  A unique identifier for the connection or stream.

- **videoId:** `videoId`  
  The identifier for the video that is associated with the connection.

- **accountId:** `accountId`  
  The identifier for the account associated with the service provider.

- **channelId:** `channelId`  
  The identifier of the channel where the video is hosted.

- **sessionId:** `sessionId`  
  A unique identifier for the session in which the video is being streamed.

- **streamId:** `streamId`  
  The identifier for the specific stream instance.

- **ipAddress:** `null`  
  Placeholder for the IP address of the user or service.

- **country:** `United States`  
  The country where the streaming is happening.

- **state:** `California`  
  The state where the streaming is happening.

- **title:** `Fortune's Basketball Challenge`  
  The title of the video stream.

- **description:** `Basketball game featuring amazing plays and challenges.`  
  A brief description of the content of the video stream.

- **tags:** `basketball,game,challenge`  
  Tags associated with the video to facilitate searchability.

#### Body - Stream
This section provides detailed information regarding the specific stream being deleted.

- **streamId:** `streamId`  
  The identifier for the stream associated with the video connection.

- **streamName:** `live-video-stream-7164b12d-1708817130231`  
  The name assigned to the live video stream.

- **uniqueKey:** `uniqueKey`  
  A key that uniquely identifies the stream.

- **videoId, accountId, channelId, sessionId:** `videoId` | `accountId` | `channelId` | `sessionId`  
  The identifiers for the video, account, channel, and session respectively, same as in options.

- **videoStatus:** `notready`  
  Indicates the current status of the video (not yet ready for streaming).

- **providerName:** `cloudflare`  
  The streaming service provider being used for this stream.

- **providerUniqueId:** `c3b3f93b0a7594f3db917d5f9a671351`  
  A unique identifier for the provider on the platform.

- **providerPlaybackUrl:** `""`  
  Placeholder for the URL that would be used for playback, currently not provided.

- **providerStreamId:** `c3b3f93b0a7594f3db917d5f9a671351`  
  Unique identifier for the stream on the provider's side.

- **providerStreamKey:** `e0bb5fa14f7059bccfcef40d5dbe2283kc3b3f93b0a7594f3db917d5f9a671351`  
  The key used to authenticate the stream on the provider.

- **providerStreamUrl:** `srt://live.cloudflare.com:778`  
  The URL endpoint for streaming via the provider.

- **providerStreamData:**  
  Contains additional data from the provider including URLs for different protocols (RTMPS, SRT, WebRTC) and meta-information such as timestamps, account ID, description, etc.

- **success:** `true`  
  Indicates whether the deletion operation was successful.

- **errors:** `[]`  
  An array that contains error messages if any occurred during the process; currently empty.

- **messages:** `[]`  
  An array that can contain informational messages; currently empty.

#### Body - Additional Stream Information
- **createdDate:** `2024-02-24`  
  The date the stream was created.

- **createdTime:** `23:25:30`  
  The time the stream was created.

- **updatedDate:** `2024-02-25`  
  The date the stream was last updated.

- **updatedTime:** `01:14:26`  
  The time the stream was last updated.

- **deletedDate & deletedTime:** `null`  
  These fields indicate that the stream has not been deleted yet.

#### Body - Details
This section contains more information regarding the streaming event and its attributes.

- **accountId, sessionId, channelId, videoId:** `accountId` | `sessionId` | `channelId` | `videoId`  
  Identifiers related to the account, session, channel, and video.

- **title:** `Fortune's Basketball Challenge`  
  Title of the stream.

- **description:** `Basketball game featuring amazing plays and challenges.`  
  Description of the stream.

- **tags:** `basketball,game,challenge`  
  Tags associated with the stream.

- **streamType:** `Live`  
  Indicates that this is a live stream.

- **searchType:** `Game`  
  Category type for search functionality.

- **started:** `true`  
  Indicates that the stream has started.

- **startedOn:** `2024-02-24T22:41:42.483Z`  
  Timestamp of when the stream started.

- **paused, pausedOn, stopped, stoppedOn:** `false`, `null`, `false`, `null`  
  Indicators of the stream's current play state; the stream has not been paused or stopped.

- **streamId:** `streamId`  
  Stream identifier.

- **channel:** `Fortune's Basketball Channel`  
  The name of the channel broadcasting the stream.

- **category:** `Board`  
  The category of the video content.

- **categoryId, subCategory, subCategoryId:** `categoryId` | `Outdoor Party` | `subCategoryId`  
  Identifiers for the category and sub-category.

- **scheduleDate & scheduleTime:** `2024-02-01` | `18:00:00`  
  Scheduled date and time for when the stream is set to occur.

- **streamHours:** `1`  
  Duration of the stream in hours.

- **coverPhotoUrl:** `basketball-cover-url.jpg`  
  URL for the cover photo of the stream.

- **providerPlaybackUrl:** `""`  
  Placeholder for the playback URL, currently not provided.

- **voteTokenQuantity, votingTimeReset, voteButtonQuantity:** `100`, `5`, `4`  
  Information about voting mechanics related to the stream setup.

- **voteButtonText1 & voteButtonText2:** `Layup`, `Dunk`  
  Labels for the vote buttons present in the interface.

- **isRewardsEnabled, isTournamentEnabled:** `false`, `true`  
  Flags indicating whether rewards and tournaments are enabled.

- **tournamentButtonText1 & tournamentButtonText2:** `Hit`, `Miss`  
  Labels for tournament voting buttons.

- **streamLocatorName, streamAssetName:** `basketball-locator-name`, `basketball-asset-name`  
  Naming identifiers for the stream locator and asset.

- **platformVideoIds:**  
  Key-value pairs indicating platform-specific video identifiers for various social media and streaming services, all currently set to `false`.

- **platformEventIds:**  
  A similar structure holds platform-specific event identifiers, also currently set to `false`.

- **primaryCameraName:** `Sony 4K Ultra HD WebCam`  
  The main camera being used for the stream.

- **primaryMicrophoneName:** `WirelessAudioTek Device`  
  The main microphone being used for audio capture.

- **primarySpeakerName:** `Bose-Mega-Speaker 2.0`  
  Primary speaker device connected for playback.

- **additionalCameras:**  
  An array detailing additional camera and microphone setups being used.

- **createdDate, createdTime, updatedDate, updatedTime:**  
  Timestamps indicating creation and last update times for this detailed information. Dates and times are provided in respective formats. 

- **deletedDate & deletedTime:** `null`  
  Indicators that suggest the stream details have not been deleted.

request.description:
### Endpoint Description: Video - Connect - Create - Bili Bili

This endpoint allows users to create a new connection for a video stream on the Bili Bili platform.

#### Request Information
- **Method**: POST
  - This indicates that data is being sent to create a new resource on the server.

- **URL**: `http://localhost:3000/api/video/connect/create`
  - The endpoint where the POST request is sent.

- **Headers**:
  - **Content-Type**: `application/json`
    - Specifies that the body of the request contains JSON formatted data.

#### Request Body Structure

1. **Options**: Contains various settings and credentials related to the video stream.
   - **providerName**: The name of the video service provider (e.g., "bilibili").
   - **providerId**: An identifier for the provider, typically left empty.
   - **apiKey**: API key for accessing the provider's services.
   - **apiSecret**: Secret for API authentication.
   - **apiClientId**: Client ID for API requests.
   - **authToken**: Token used for authentication.
   - **server**: Server address for streaming, not specified here.
   - **rtmpUrl**: URL for Real-Time Messaging Protocol (RTMP), currently not specified.
   - **streamKey**: Key used to identify the stream.
   - **channelUrl**: URL of the video channel.
   - **authUsername**: Username for authentication purposes.
   - **authPassword**: Password for authentication purposes.
   - **uniqueKey**: A unique identifier for the video connection.
   - **videoId**: Unique identifier for the video.
   - **accountId**: ID of the user's account.
   - **channelId**: ID of the channel broadcasting the stream.
   - **sessionId**: Session identifier for the stream.
   - **streamId**: Identifier for the specific stream.
   - **ipAddress**: IP address of the user, currently not specified.
   - **country**: The country where the stream is being accessed (e.g., "United States").
   - **state**: The state where the stream is being accessed (e.g., "California").
   - **title**: Title of the video stream (e.g., "Fortune's Basketball Challenge").
   - **description**: Description of the stream content (e.g., "Basketball game featuring amazing plays and challenges.").
   - **tags**: Comma-separated keywords related to the stream (e.g., "basketball, game, challenge").

2. **Stream**: Information specific to the streaming details.
   - **streamId**: Unique identifier for the stream.
   - **streamName**: A generated name for the live video stream.
   - **uniqueKey**: Repeating the unique key information.
   - **videoId**: Repeating the video ID.
   - **accountId**: Repeating the account ID.
   - **channelId**: Repeating the channel ID.
   - **sessionId**: Repeating the session ID.
   - **videoStatus**: Status of the video, indicating that it is not ready yet.
   - **providerName**: Name of the provider service (e.g., "cloudflare").
   - **providerUniqueId**: Unique identifier for the provider instance.
   - **providerPlaybackUrl**: URL for playback, currently not specified.
   - **providerStreamId**: Identifier generated by the streaming provider.
   - **providerStreamKey**: Key generated for stream access.
   - **providerStreamUrl**: URL for the providerâ€™s stream.
   - **providerStreamData**: Contains detailed streaming data and URL for different protocols (RTMPS, SRT, WebRTC) along with necessary keys and passphrases.
   - **createdDate**: Date when the stream was created.
   - **createdTime**: Time when the stream was created.
   - **updatedDate**: Date when the stream details were last updated.
   - **updatedTime**: Time when the stream details were last updated.
   - **deletedDate**: Date when the stream was deleted, currently not specified.
   - **deletedTime**: Time when the stream was deleted, currently not specified.

3. **Details**: A comprehensive set of details about the video connection and stream.
   - **accountId**: Repeating the account ID.
   - **sessionId**: Repeating the session ID.
   - **channelId**: Repeating the channel ID.
   - **videoId**: Repeating the video ID.
   - **title**: Repeating the stream title.
   - **description**: Repeating the stream description.
   - **tags**: Repeating the tags.
   - **streamType**: Type of stream, here marked as "Live".
   - **searchType**: Type of content being streamed, marked as "Game".
   - **started**: A boolean indicating whether the stream has started.
   - **startedOn**: Timestamp indicating when the stream started.
   - **paused**: A boolean indicating whether the stream is paused.
   - **pausedOn**: Timestamp indicating when the stream was paused.
   - **stopped**: A boolean indicating whether the stream has been stopped.
   - **stoppedOn**: Timestamp for when the stream was stopped, currently not specified.
   - **streamId**: Repeating the stream ID.
   - **channel**: Name assigned to the channel (e.g., "Fortune's Basketball Channel").
   - **category**: Category of the streamed content (e.g., "Board").
   - **categoryId**: ID corresponding to the category.
   - **subCategory**: Sub-category of the streamed content (e.g., "Outdoor Party").
   - **subCategoryId**: ID corresponding to the sub-category.
   - **scheduleDate**: Date for when the stream is scheduled.
   - **scheduleTime**: Scheduled time for the stream to air.
   - **streamHours**: Duration of the stream in hours.
   - **coverPhotoUrl**: URL for the cover photo associated with the stream.
   - **providerPlaybackUrl**: URL for playback from the provider, currently not specified.
   - **voteTokenQuantity**: Amount of tokens available for voting related to the stream.
   - **votingTimeReset**: Duration for which the voting time resets.
   - **voteButtonQuantity**: Number of voting options available.
   - **voteButtonText1**: Text for the first voting button (e.g., "Layup").
   - **voteButtonText2**: Text for the second voting button (e.g., "Dunk").
   - **isRewardsEnabled**: Boolean indicating if rewards are enabled for interaction.
   - **isTournamentEnabled**: Boolean indicating if tournament features are enabled.
   - **tournamentButtonText1**: Text for the first button related to tournaments.
   - **tournamentButtonText2**: Text for the second button related to tournaments.
   - **streamLocatorName**: Name for the locator associated with the stream.
   - **streamAssetName**: Name for the asset associated with the stream.
   - **platformVideoIds**: Object containing various output IDs for different platforms, currently all marked as false, indicating they might not be set or used.
   - **platformEventIds**: Object containing various event IDs for different platforms, currently all marked as false.
   - **primaryCameraName**: Name of the primary camera used for streaming.
   - **primaryMicrophoneName**: Name of the primary microphone used for audio input.
   - **primarySpeakerName**: Name of the primary speaker used for audio output.
   - **additionalCameras**: Array holding additional camera and microphone combinations.
   - **createdDate**: Date when the connection details were created.
   - **createdTime**: Time when the connection details were created.
   - **updatedDate**: Date for the last update on the connection details.
   - **updatedTime**: Time for the last update on the connection details.
   - **deletedDate**: Date for when the connection details were deleted, currently not specified.
   - **deletedTime**: Time for when the connection details were deleted, currently not specified.

This structure outlines the configurations and metadata necessary for establishing a video connection on the Bili Bili platform, allowing users to set up live streams with associated properties and manage their video content effectively.

request.description:
### Endpoint: Video - Connect - Update - Bili Bili

**Request Method:** PUT  
**URL:** `http://localhost:3000/api/video/connect/update`  

#### Headers
- **Content-Type**: Specifies the media type of the resource. In this case, it's set to `application/json`, indicating that the request body is formatted as JSON.

#### Body

- **options**: A JSON object containing various configuration options for the video provider.
  - **providerName**: The name of the video provider, which is set to "bilibili".
  - **providerId**: A unique identifier for the provider; currently empty.
  - **apiKey**: The API key used for authentication with the provider; currently not provided (null).
  - **apiSecret**: The secret key for API authentication; currently not provided (null).
  - **apiClientId**: Client identifier for the API; currently not provided (null).
  - **authToken**: Token used for authentication; currently not provided (null).
  - **server**: The server address; currently not provided (null).
  - **rtmpUrl**: URL for the RTMP stream; currently not provided (null).
  - **streamKey**: Key for streaming; currently not provided (null).
  - **channelUrl**: URL of the channel; currently not provided (null).
  - **authUsername**: Username for authentication; currently not provided (null).
  - **authPassword**: Password for authentication; currently not provided (null).
  - **uniqueKey**: A unique identifier for the video; set to "uniqueKey".
  - **videoId**: Identifier for the video; set to "videoId".
  - **accountId**: Identifier for the account; set to "accountId".
  - **channelId**: Identifier for the channel; set to "channelId".
  - **sessionId**: Identifier for the session; set to "sessionId".
  - **streamId**: Identifier for the stream; set to "streamId".
  - **ipAddress**: The IP address associated with the video upload; currently not provided (null).
  - **country**: Country of the user; set to "United States".
  - **state**: State of the user; set to "California".
  - **title**: Title of the video; set to "Fortune's Basketball Challenge".
  - **description**: Description of the video; describes the content of the video featuring basketball challenges.
  - **tags**: Keywords associated with the video, formatted as a comma-separated string; set to "basketball,game,challenge".

- **stream**: Information regarding the live stream associated with the video.
  - **streamId**: Identifier for the stream; set to "streamId".
  - **streamName**: The name of the stream; set to "live-video-stream-7164b12d-1708817130231".
  - **uniqueKey**: A unique identifier for the stream; set to "uniqueKey".
  - **videoId**: Identifier for the video being streamed; set to "videoId".
  - **accountId**: Identifier for the user account; set to "accountId".
  - **channelId**: Identifier for the channel; set to "channelId".
  - **sessionId**: Identifier for the session; set to "sessionId".
  - **videoStatus**: The current status of the video; set to "notready".
  - **providerName**: The name of the stream provider; set to "cloudflare".
  - **providerUniqueId**: Unique identifier for the provider; set to "c3b3f93b0a7594f3db917d5f9a671351".
  - **providerPlaybackUrl**: URL for playback with the provider; currently not provided (empty).
  - **providerStreamId**: Unique identifier for the provider's stream; set to "c3b3f93b0a7594f3db917d5f9a671351".
  - **providerStreamKey**: Key for accessing the stream; set to "e0bb5fa14f7059bccfcef40d5dbe2283kc3b3f93b0a7594f3db917d5f9a671351".
  - **providerStreamUrl**: URL for the provider stream; set to "srt://live.cloudflare.com:778".
  - **providerStreamData**: Additional data related to the stream and its URL.
    - **result**: Details returned from the provider after a successful connection.
      - **uid**: A unique identifier for the stream; set to "c3b3f93b0a7594f3db917d5f9a671351".
      - **rtmps**: Configuration for RTMPS stream.
        - **url**: RTMPS stream URL; set to "rtmps://live.cloudflare.com:443/live/".
        - **streamKey**: RTMPS key; set to "e0bb5fa14f7059bccfcef40d5dbe2283kc3b3f93b0a7594f3db917d5f9a671351".
      - **rtmpsPlayback**: Playback settings for RTMPS stream.
      - **srt**: Configuration for the SRT protocol.
      - **webRTC**: URL for WebRTC publishing; set to "https://customer-q9gw1dgorkl8h10h.cloudflarestream.com/...".
      - **created**: The timestamp when the stream was created; set to "2024-02-24T23:25:30.935251Z".
      - **modified**: The timestamp when the stream was last modified; set to "2024-02-24T23:25:30.935251Z".
      - **meta**: Metadata associated with the stream.
        - **accountId**: Account identifier; set to "de449412-4732-490f-a1d0-19ac7e96e7e6".
        - **audioInputName**: Name of the audio input device; set to "My macBook Microphone".
        - **channelId**: Identifier for the channel; set to "ee435434-e90f-4484-a3b3-63819dc539ef".
        - **coverPhotoUrl**: URL of the cover photo; set to "basketball-cover-url.jpg".
        - **description**: Description of the video content; same as before.
        - **streamId**: The stream identifier; set to "c4d36b16-e5f3-4bb2-a1d5-334fcad9f08f".
        - **title**: Title of the video; same as before.
        - **videoId**: Identifier for the video; set to "133c4f1f-a914-4956-9f79-bc82a890361d".
        - **videoInputName**: Name of the video input device; set to "My MacBook Camera".
      - **defaultCreator**: Default creator identifier; set to "7164b12d".
      - **status**: Current status of the stream; currently set to null.
      - **recording**: Settings related to video recording.
        - **mode**: The recording mode; set to "automatic".
        - **requireSignedURLs**: Indicates if signed URLs are required; currently set to false.
      - **deleteRecordingAfterDays**: Indicates how many days after recording to delete; currently set to null.
  
  - **createdDate**: The date when the stream was created; set to "2024-02-24".
  - **createdTime**: The time when the stream was created; set to "23:25:30".
  - **updatedDate**: The date when the stream was last updated; set to "2024-02-25".
  - **updatedTime**: The time when the stream was last updated; set to "01:14:26".
  - **deletedDate**: The date when the stream was marked as deleted; currently set to null.
  - **deletedTime**: The time when the stream was marked as deleted; currently set to null.

- **details**: Information about the video stream's content and configuration.
  - **accountId**: Identifier for the account; set to "accountId".
  - **sessionId**: Identifier for the session; set to "sessionId".
  - **channelId**: Identifier for the channel; set to "channelId".
  - **videoId**: Identifier for the video; set to "videoId".
  - **title**: Title of the stream; set to "Fortune's Basketball Challenge".
  - **description**: Description of the video; same as before.
  - **tags**: Tags associated with the video; same as before.
  - **streamType**: Type of stream, set to "Live".
  - **searchType**: Type of search related to the content; set to "Game".
  - **started**: Indicates whether the stream has started; set to true.
  - **startedOn**: Timestamp of when the stream started; set to "2024-02-24T22:41:42.483Z".
  - **paused**: Indicates whether the stream is paused; currently set to false.
  - **pausedOn**: Timestamp of when the stream was paused; currently set to the same as started.
  - **stopped**: Indicates whether the stream has stopped; currently set to false.
  - **stoppedOn**: Timestamp of when the stream was stopped; currently set to null.
  - **streamId**: Identifier for the stream; set to "streamId".
  - **channel**: Name of the channel associated with the stream; set to "Fortune's Basketball Channel".
  - **category**: Category of the content; set to "Board".
  - **categoryId**: Identifier for the category; set to "categoryId".
  - **subCategory**: Subcategory of the content; set to "Outdoor Party".
  - **subCategoryId**: Identifier for the subcategory; set to "subCategoryId".
  - **scheduleDate**: Date the stream is scheduled for; set to "2024-02-01".
  - **scheduleTime**: Time the stream is scheduled for; set to "18:00:00".
  - **streamHours**: Duration in hours for the streaming session; set to 1.
  - **coverPhotoUrl**: URL for the cover photo of the stream; set to "basketball-cover-url.jpg".
  - **providerPlaybackUrl**: URL for playback from the provider; currently not provided (empty).
  - **voteTokenQuantity**: Number of voting tokens available; set to 100.
  - **votingTimeReset**: Time reset for voting; set to "5".
  - **voteButtonQuantity**: Number of voting buttons available; set to 4.
  - **voteButtonText1**: Label for the first voting button; set to "Layup".
  - **voteButtonText2**: Label for the second voting button; set to "Dunk".
  - **isRewardsEnabled**: Indicates whether rewards are enabled; currently set to false.
  - **isTournamentEnabled**: Indicates whether tournaments are enabled; currently set to true.
  - **tournamentButtonText1**: Text for the first tournament button; set to "Hit".
  - **tournamentButtonText2**: Text for the second tournament button; set to "Miss".
  - **streamLocatorName**: Name used to identify the stream location; set to "basketball-locator-name".
  - **streamAssetName**: Name for the related asset; set to "basketball-asset-name".
  - **platformVideoIds**: Object containing identifiers for the video on various platforms; all currently set to false, indicating no output IDs.
  - **platformEventIds**: Object containing identifiers for events on various platforms; all currently set to false.
  - **primaryCameraName**: Name of the primary camera used for streaming; set to "Sony 4K Ultra HD WebCam".
  - **primaryMicrophoneName**: Name of the primary microphone used for streaming; set to "WirelessAudioTek Device".
  - **primarySpeakerName**: Name of the primary speaker used for audio output; set to "Bose-Mega-Speaker 2.0".
  - **additionalCameras**: Array of additional cameras and microphones configured for streaming.
    - Each object in the array specifies a camera and a microphone.
  - **createdDate**: The date when the details were created; set to "2024-02-18".
  - **createdTime**: The time when the details were created; set to "14:54:25".
  - **updatedDate**: The date when the details were last updated; set to "2024-02-24".
  - **updatedTime**: The time when the details were last updated; set to "23:29:19".
  - **deletedDate**: Date when these details were marked as deleted; currently set to null.
  - **deletedTime**: Time when these details were marked as deleted; currently set to null.

request.description:
### Endpoint Description: Video - Connect - Delete - Bili Bili

**Request Method**:  
- **POST**: This endpoint is used to delete a video connection with Bili Bili.

**Request URL**:  
- `http://localhost:3000/api/video/connect/delete`: This is the URL endpoint where the request is sent.

**Request Headers**:  
- **Content-Type**: Specifies the media type of the resource. In this case, it is set to `application/json`, indicating that the request body is in JSON format.

**Request Body**:  
- The body of the request contains two main sections: `options` and `stream`.

#### Options:
- **providerName**: The name of the video service provider, in this instance, it is set to "bilibili".
- **providerId**: The unique identifier for the provider, which is currently an empty string.
- **apiKey**: The API key for authentication; set to null.
- **apiSecret**: The API secret for authentication; set to null.
- **apiClientId**: The client ID for the API, currently set to null.
- **authToken**: The authentication token, which is set to null.
- **server**: The server information; set to null.
- **rtmpUrl**: The Real-Time Messaging Protocol URL for streaming; set to null.
- **streamKey**: The key for the streaming; set to null.
- **channelUrl**: URL to the channel; set to null.
- **authUsername**: Username for authentication; set to null.
- **authPassword**: Password for authentication; set to null.
- **uniqueKey**: A unique key for identifying the video connection, currently set to "uniqueKey".
- **videoId**: The unique identifier for the video being interacted with, currently set to "videoId".
- **accountId**: The identifier for the user account, currently set to "accountId".
- **channelId**: Identifier for the channel, currently set to "channelId".
- **sessionId**: The unique identifier for the session, currently set to "sessionId".
- **streamId**: Identifier for the stream, currently set to "streamId".
- **ipAddress**: The IP address from which this request is made; currently set to null.
- **country**: The country of the user; currently set to "United States".
- **state**: The state of the user; currently set to "California".
- **title**: Title of the video; currently set to "Fortune's Basketball Challenge".
- **description**: Description of the video content; currently set to "Basketball game featuring amazing plays and challenges."
- **tags**: Tags related to the video; currently set to "basketball, game, challenge".

#### Stream:
- **streamId**: Unique identifier for the stream; currently set to "streamId".
- **streamName**: Name of the stream, dynamically generated as "live-video-stream-7164b12d-1708817130231".
- **uniqueKey**: Redundant unique key for identifying the stream, again set to "uniqueKey".
- **videoId**: Id associated with the video, redundant as it is also defined in options.
- **accountId**: User account identifier, redundant as it is also in options.
- **channelId**: Channel identifier, redundant as it is also in options.
- **sessionId**: Session identifier, redundant as it is also in options.
- **videoStatus**: Current status of the video, which is "notready".
- **providerName**: Name of the provider, which is set to "cloudflare" rather than "bilibili", indicating a change in the service provider.
- **providerUniqueId**: Unique identifier assigned by the provider, currently "c3b3f93b0a7594f3db917d5f9a671351".
- **providerPlaybackUrl**: URL for playback from the provider; currently set to an empty string.
- **providerStreamId**: The unique stream identifier given by the provider, currently set to "c3b3f93b0a7594f3db917d5f9a671351".
- **providerStreamKey**: The streaming key provided, currently set to "e0bb5fa14f7059bccfcef40d5dbe2283kc3b3f93b0a7594f3db917d5f9a671351".
- **providerStreamUrl**: The URL for streaming provided by the service provider, which is "srt://live.cloudflare.com:778".
- **providerStreamData**: Contains various additional streaming details like:
  - **result**: Information about the streaming result including unique IDs, stream URLs, and keys.
  - **created**: Timestamp indicating when the stream was created.
  - **modified**: Timestamp of the last update made to the stream.
  - **meta**: Provides additional metadata like channelId, audio/video input names, description, title, etc.
  - **defaultCreator**: Identifier for the creator of this stream.
  - **status**: Current status of the stream (null in this case).
  - **recording**: Indicates whether recording is on (automatic) and other settings.
  - **deleteRecordingAfterDays**: Indicates if recordings will be deleted after a certain period (currently null).

- **createdDate**: Date when the stream was created, set to "2024-02-24".
- **createdTime**: Time when the stream was created, set to "23:25:30".
- **updatedDate**: Last updated date, set to "2024-02-25".
- **updatedTime**: Time when last updated, set to "01:14:26".
- **deletedDate**: Date when the stream was deleted, currently null.
- **deletedTime**: Time when the stream was deleted, currently null.

#### Details:
- **accountId**: Identifies the user account associated with the video, currently set to "accountId".
- **sessionId**: The session identifier for the current interaction, set to "sessionId".
- **channelId**: The identifier for the channel related to the video, set to "channelId".
- **videoId**: The unique identifier for the video, consistently set to "videoId".
- **title**: The title of the video, replicating the same previously mentioned values.
- **description**: The description of the video content, repeating previous values.
- **tags**: Tags relevant to the video, replicating previous values.
- **streamType**: Indicates that the stream is "Live".
- **searchType**: Type of content categorized as "Game".
- **started**: A boolean indicating if the streaming has started or not (currently true).
- **startedOn**: Timestamp of when the streaming started, set to "2024-02-24T22:41:42.483Z".
- **paused**: Boolean indicating if the stream is paused (currently false).
- **pausedOn**: Timestamp for when the stream was paused, currently set to "2024-02-24T22:41:42.483Z".
- **stopped**: Boolean indicating if the streaming has been stopped (currently false).
- **stoppedOn**: Timestamp of when the stream was stopped, currently null.
- **streamId**: Unique identifier for the stream, currently set as "streamId".
- **channel**: Name of the channel where the stream is being broadcasted, set to "Fortune's Basketball Channel".
- **category**: General category of the video, set to "Board".
- **categoryId**: Identifier for the category, set to "categoryId".
- **subCategory**: More specific category of the video, listed as "Outdoor Party".
- **subCategoryId**: Identifier for the subcategory, currently set to "subCategoryId".
- **scheduleDate**: Date when the video stream is scheduled, set to "2024-02-01".
- **scheduleTime**: Scheduled time for the stream, set to "18:00:00".
- **streamHours**: Duration of the streaming event set to 1 hour.
- **coverPhotoUrl**: URL for the cover photo of the video, set to "basketball-cover-url.jpg".
- **providerPlaybackUrl**: URL for playback provided by the service provider, currently blank.
- **voteTokenQuantity**: The number of voting tokens available, set to 100.
- **votingTimeReset**: The period to reset the voting time, set to "5".
- **voteButtonQuantity**: Total number of voting buttons available in the UI, set to 4.
- **voteButtonText1**: Text displayed on the first voting button, currently "Layup".
- **voteButtonText2**: Text displayed on the second voting button, currently "Dunk".
- **isRewardsEnabled**: Indicates if rewards are enabled for participants (currently false).
- **isTournamentEnabled**: Indicates if a tournament mode for the stream is enabled (currently true).
- **tournamentButtonText1**: Text for the first button in tournament mode, currently "Hit".
- **tournamentButtonText2**: Text for the second button in tournament mode, currently "Miss".
- **streamLocatorName**: Name used for locating the stream, set to "basketball-locator-name".
- **streamAssetName**: Name associated with the stream asset, set to "basketball-asset-name".
- **platformVideoIds**: Contains identifiers for various platforms where this video could be shared (all set to false).
- **platformEventIds**: Contains identifiers related to events on various platforms (all set to false).
- **primaryCameraName**: The name of the main camera used for the streaming, set to "Sony 4K Ultra HD WebCam".
- **primaryMicrophoneName**: Name of the primary microphone used, currently "WirelessAudioTek Device".
- **primarySpeakerName**: Name of the main speakers used during the stream, currently "Bose-Mega-Speaker 2.0".
- **additionalCameras**: An array containing details of additional cameras and microphones used.
- **createdDate**: Date when the record was created, set to "2024-02-18".
- **createdTime**: Time when the record was created, set to "14:54:25".
- **updatedDate**: Last updated date of the record, set to "2024-02-24".
- **updatedTime**: Last updated time of the record, set to "23:29:19".
- **deletedDate**: Date when the stream was deleted, currently set to null.
- **deletedTime**: Time when the stream was deleted, currently set to null.
