request.description:
### API Endpoint: Video - Connect - Create - Breakers TV

**Description**: This endpoint is used to create a video stream connection for Breakers TV. 

#### Request Details

- **Method**: `POST`
  - Used to send data to the server to create a new stream.

- **URL**: `http://localhost:3000/api/video/connect/create`
  - This is the endpoint where the request is sent.

- **Headers**:
  - **Content-Type**: Indicates that the request body format is JSON.

- **Body**: Contains the data necessary to initiate the video stream.
  - **options**: Includes configuration options for the video stream.
    - **providerName**: Specifies the name of the streaming provider (e.g., "breakerstv").
    - **providerId**: Identifier for the streaming provider (can be left blank).
    - **apiKey**: Optional API key required for authentication.
    - **apiSecret**: Optional secret key for authentication.
    - **apiClientId**: Optional client ID for API usage.
    - **authToken**: Token for authenticating the request (optional).
    - **server**: Server address (optional).
    - **rtmpUrl**: URL for RTMP streams (optional).
    - **streamKey**: Key for identifying the stream (optional).
    - **channelUrl**: URL of the channel (optional).
    - **authUsername**: Username for authentication (optional).
    - **authPassword**: Password for authentication (optional).
    - **uniqueKey**: A unique identifier for the stream.
    - **videoId**: Unique identifier for the video.
    - **accountId**: Identifier for the account associated with the stream.
    - **channelId**: Identifier for the channel.
    - **sessionId**: Identifier for the session.
    - **streamId**: Identifier for the specific stream.
    - **ipAddress**: IP address of the user (can be left blank).
    - **country**: Country of the session, defaulted to "United States".
    - **state**: State of the session, defaulted to "California".
    - **title**: Title of the event (e.g., "Fortune's Basketball Challenge").
    - **description**: Description of the event (e.g., "Basketball game featuring amazing plays and challenges.").
    - **tags**: Tags related to the video (e.g., "basketball, game, challenge").

  - **stream**: Information about the streaming configuration.
    - **streamId**: Identifier for the stream.
    - **streamName**: Name assigned to the stream.
    - **uniqueKey**: A unique key associated with the stream.
    - **videoId**: Identifier for the video.
    - **accountId**: Identifier for the account associated with the stream.
    - **channelId**: Identifier for the channel associated with the stream.
    - **sessionId**: Identifier for the session associated with the stream.
    - **videoStatus**: Status of the video, initially set to "notready".
    - **providerName**: Name of the provider (e.g., "cloudflare").
    - **providerUniqueId**: Unique identifier for the provider stream.
    - **providerPlaybackUrl**: URL for playback from the provider (can be left blank).
    - **providerStreamId**: Unique identifier for the provider stream.
    - **providerStreamKey**: Key needed to access the provider's stream.
    - **providerStreamUrl**: URL for the provider's stream.
    - **providerStreamData**: Additional data about the provider's streaming settings.
      - **result**: A collection of results from the stream setup, including various URLs for different streaming protocols (RTMPS, SRT, WebRTC).
      - **created**: Timestamp when the stream was created.
      - **modified**: Timestamp of the last modification.
      - **meta**: Metadata regarding the stream, such as accountId, channel info, description, and video input/output details.
      - **defaultCreator**: Creator of the default stream.
      - **recording**: Configuration for recording settings (automatic, signed URLs).
      - **deleteRecordingAfterDays**: Duration before the recording will be deleted (if any).

    - **success**: Indicates whether the creation was successful (boolean).
    - **errors**: List of any errors that occurred during the request (if any).
    - **messages**: Any relevant messages returned with the response.

  - **createdDate**: Date when the stream was created.
  - **createdTime**: Time when the stream was created.
  - **updatedDate**: Date when the stream information was last updated.
  - **updatedTime**: Time when the stream information was last updated.
  - **deletedDate**: Date when the stream was deleted (if applicable).
  - **deletedTime**: Time when the stream was deleted (if applicable).

  - **details**: Comprehensive details about the stream.
    - **accountId**: Identifier for the account.
    - **sessionId**: Identifier for the session.
    - **channelId**: Identifier for the channel.
    - **videoId**: Identifier for the video.
    - **title**: Title of the stream.
    - **description**: Description of the stream.
    - **tags**: List of tags associated with the stream.
    - **streamType**: Type of the stream (e.g., "Live").
    - **searchType**: Type of event for search purposes (e.g., "Game").
    - **started**: Indicates if the stream has started (boolean).
    - **startedOn**: Timestamp of when the stream started.
    - **paused**: Indicates if the stream is paused (boolean).
    - **pausedOn**: Timestamp of when the stream was paused.
    - **stopped**: Indicates if the stream has stopped (boolean).
    - **stoppedOn**: Timestamp of when the stream was stopped (if applicable).
    - **streamId**: Identifier for the stream.
    - **channel**: Name of the channel associated with the stream.
    - **category**: Main category of the stream (e.g., "Board").
    - **categoryId**: Identifier for the main category.
    - **subCategory**: Subcategory of the stream (e.g., "Outdoor Party").
    - **subCategoryId**: Identifier for the subcategory.
    - **scheduleDate**: Date when the stream is scheduled.
    - **scheduleTime**: Time when the stream is scheduled.
    - **streamHours**: Duration of the stream in hours.
    - **coverPhotoUrl**: URL for the cover photo of the stream.
    - **providerPlaybackUrl**: Playback URL from the provider.
    - **voteTokenQuantity**: Number of tokens available for voting (if applicable).
    - **votingTimeReset**: Time in seconds for resetting votes.
    - **voteButtonQuantity**: Number of voting buttons available.
    - **voteButtonText1**: Text for the first voting button.
    - **voteButtonText2**: Text for the second voting button.
    - **isRewardsEnabled**: Indicates if rewards are enabled (boolean).
    - **isTournamentEnabled**: Indicates if a tournament is enabled (boolean).
    - **tournamentButtonText1**: Text for the first tournament button.
    - **tournamentButtonText2**: Text for the second tournament button.
    - **streamLocatorName**: Name of the stream locator.
    - **streamAssetName**: Name of the stream asset.
    - **platformVideoIds**: Identifiers for various platforms related to the video.
    - **platformEventIds**: Identifiers for events on various social media platforms.
    - **primaryCameraName**: Name of the primary camera used for the stream.
    - **primaryMicrophoneName**: Name of the primary microphone used.
    - **primarySpeakerName**: Name of the primary speaker used.
    - **additionalCameras**: List of additional cameras and microphones used during the stream.
    - **createdDate**: Date when the stream details were created.
    - **createdTime**: Time when the stream details were created.
    - **updatedDate**: Date when the stream details were last updated.
    - **updatedTime**: Time when the stream details were last updated.
    - **deletedDate**: Date when the stream details were deleted (if applicable).
    - **deletedTime**: Time when the stream details were deleted (if applicable).

request.description:
### Endpoint Description: Video - Connect - Update - Breakers TV

#### Request Method:
- **PUT**: This indicates that the request will update existing resource data on the server.

#### Request URL:
- **http://localhost:3000/api/video/connect/update**: This is the endpoint where the request will be sent. It indicates a local server address that handles video connection updates.

#### Request Headers:
- **Content-Type**: This specifies the format of the data being sent. In this case, it is set to `application/json`, indicating that the body content is in JSON format.

### Request Body:
The request body specifies the details for the video update operation. It is divided into three main sections: `options`, `stream`, and `details`.

#### Options:
- **providerName**: The name of the video provider being used, in this case, "breakerstv".
- **providerId**: An optional identifier for the provider, currently left empty.
- **apiKey**: This key is used for authentication with the API and is currently not set (null).
- **apiSecret**: A secret key for API authentication, currently not provided (null).
- **apiClientId**: An optional ID for the API client, currently unset (null).
- **authToken**: Used for authentication, currently not provided (null).
- **server**: The server used for the video service, currently not specified (null).
- **rtmpUrl**: The RTMP URL used for streaming, currently not set (null).
- **streamKey**: A key required for accessing the stream, currently unset (null).
- **channelUrl**: The URL of the channel, currently unset (null).
- **authUsername**: Username for authentication, currently unset (null).
- **authPassword**: Password for authentication, currently not provided (null).
- **uniqueKey**: A unique identifier for the video stream.
- **videoId**: Identifier for the specific video being updated.
- **accountId**: The ID of the account associated with this video update.
- **channelId**: The ID of the channel to which this video belongs.
- **sessionId**: Identifier for the current session.
- **streamId**: Identifier for the stream being updated.
- **ipAddress**: The IP address from which the request is made, currently unset (null).
- **country**: The country where the content is relevant, set to "United States".
- **state**: The state where the content is relevant, set to "California".
- **title**: The title of the video, set here as "Fortune's Basketball Challenge".
- **description**: A brief description of the video content.
- **tags**: Tags associated with the video, useful for categorization and search.

#### Stream:
- **streamId**: Identifier for the stream being managed.
- **streamName**: A specific name for the stream, formatted uniquely.
- **uniqueKey**: Reiterated unique key for the video stream.
- **videoId**: Identifier for the video being associated with this stream.
- **accountId**: The account ID related to the stream.
- **channelId**: The channel ID linked with this stream.
- **sessionId**: Identifier for the current streaming session.
- **videoStatus**: The current status of the video, indicating it is "notready".
- **providerName**: The name of the content delivery network used.
- **providerUniqueId**: A unique identifier from the provider for this instance.
- **providerPlaybackUrl**: URL used for playback, currently unset.
- **providerStreamId**: Unique identifier for the stream on the provider's side.
- **providerStreamKey**: Key used by the provider for accessing the stream.
- **providerStreamUrl**: URL for the provider's streaming.
- **providerStreamData**: Additional data sent from the provider containing URLs for different streaming protocols.
- **success**: Boolean indicating the success of a prior operation.
- **errors**: An array for any error messages related to the operation.
- **messages**: An array for any informational messages related to the operation.
- **createdDate**: Date when the stream was created.
- **createdTime**: Time when the stream was created.
- **updatedDate**: Date when the stream was last updated.
- **updatedTime**: Time when the stream was last updated.
- **deletedDate**: Date of deletion if applicable, currently unset.
- **deletedTime**: Time of deletion if applicable, currently unset.

#### Details:
- **accountId**: The ID of the account linked to this video.
- **sessionId**: The ID of the session during which the content is created or modified.
- **channelId**: The channel ID for this content.
- **videoId**: The unique identifier for the video.
- **title**: The title of the video.
- **description**: A detailed description of the content.
- **tags**: Keywords related to the video for easier content discovery.
- **streamType**: Indicates that this is a Live stream.
- **searchType**: Specifies the type of content; in this case, it's related to a Game.
- **started**: Boolean indicating if the stream has started.
- **startedOn**: The timestamp of when the stream started.
- **paused**: Boolean indicating if the stream is currently paused.
- **pausedOn**: Timestamp of when the stream was paused.
- **stopped**: Boolean indicating if the stream has stopped.
- **stoppedOn**: Timestamp indicating when the stream stopped, currently unset.
- **streamId**: Unique identifier for the stream.
- **channel**: The name of the channel associated with the content.
- **category**: The main category of the video content, which is "Board".
- **categoryId**: Identifier for the category.
- **subCategory**: A more specific classification within the main category, which is "Outdoor Party".
- **subCategoryId**: Identifier for the sub-category.
- **scheduleDate**: Date when the stream is scheduled to take place.
- **scheduleTime**: Time when the stream is scheduled to happen.
- **streamHours**: Duration of the stream in hours.
- **coverPhotoUrl**: URL to the cover photo for the video.
- **providerPlaybackUrl**: URL for playback from the provider, currently unset.
- **voteTokenQuantity**: Number of tokens available for voting during the stream.
- **votingTimeReset**: Time in seconds before the voting mechanism resets.
- **voteButtonQuantity**: Number of voting options available.
- **voteButtonText1**: Text for the first voting button.
- **voteButtonText2**: Text for the second voting button.
- **isRewardsEnabled**: Indicates whether rewards are enabled for viewers.
- **isTournamentEnabled**: Indicates if tournament features are activated.
- **tournamentButtonText1**: Text for the first button in the tournament feature.
- **tournamentButtonText2**: Text for the second button in the tournament feature.
- **streamLocatorName**: Name used for locating the stream.
- **streamAssetName**: Name associated with the streamâ€™s assets.
- **platformVideoIds**: Object containing mappings for supporting platformsâ€™ identifiers like YouTube, Twitch, etc., currently all unset (false).
- **platformEventIds**: Object for platform events identifiers, currently all unset (false).
- **primaryCameraName**: Name of the primary camera used in the stream.
- **primaryMicrophoneName**: Name of the primary microphone used.
- **primarySpeakerName**: Name of the primary speaker setup used for the stream.
- **additionalCameras**: List of additional cameras with their corresponding microphones used in the stream.
- **createdDate**: The date when the video was initially created.
- **createdTime**: Time when the video was initially created.
- **updatedDate**: The date when the video was last updated.
- **updatedTime**: The time when the video was last updated.
- **deletedDate**: Date of deletion if applicable, currently unset.
- **deletedTime**: Time of deletion if applicable, currently unset.

request.description:
### Detailed Description of Data in the Endpoint

#### Name
- **Description**: This is the name of the API endpoint and describes the action being performed. In this case, it refers to a video connection deletion request specifically for "Breakers TV".

#### Request
- **Method**: 
  - **Description**: The type of HTTP request being made, which is "POST". This indicates the request is used to send data to the server.
  
- **URL**: 
  - **Description**: The endpoint URL to which the request is being sent. Here, it is "http://localhost:3000/api/video/connect/delete".
  
- **Headers**: 
  - **Content-Type**: 
    - **Description**: Specifies the media type of the resource being sent to the server. In this case, it is set to "application/json", indicating that the body of the request contains JSON data.

- **Body**: 
  - **Mode**: 
    - **Description**: Indicates the format of the body being sent; here it is "raw".
  
  - **Raw**: 
    - **Description**: This is the actual data being sent in JSON format. It includes multiple options and details for the video stream.

#### Options
- **providerName**: 
  - **Description**: The name of the provider for the video service. Here it is "breakerstv".

- **providerId**: 
  - **Description**: Unique identifier for the video provider, which is left blank in this request.

- **apiKey**: 
  - **Description**: This is a key used for API authentication, which is currently null.

- **apiSecret**: 
  - **Description**: This is a secret key used to authenticate the API requests, which is currently null.

- **apiClientId**: 
  - **Description**: Identifier for the API client making the request, which is currently null.

- **authToken**: 
  - **Description**: A token used for user authentication, which is currently null.

- **server**: 
  - **Description**: Details regarding the server, currently null.

- **rtmpUrl, streamKey, channelUrl, authUsername, authPassword**: 
  - **Description**: Various credentials and URLs needed for streaming, all of which are currently set to null.

- **uniqueKey**: 
  - **Description**: A unique identifier for the session or stream.

- **videoId, accountId, channelId, sessionId, streamId**: 
  - **Description**: Identifiers for the video, account, channel, session, and stream respectively.

- **ipAddress**: 
  - **Description**: The IP address connected to the stream, which is currently null.

- **country**: 
  - **Description**: The country for the streaming service. Here it is set to "United States".

- **state**: 
  - **Description**: The state associated with the streaming service; in this case, it is "California".

- **title**: 
  - **Description**: The title of the video being streamed, which is "Fortune's Basketball Challenge".

- **description**: 
  - **Description**: A brief summary of the content of the video; here it mentions that it is "Basketball game featuring amazing plays and challenges."

- **tags**: 
  - **Description**: Keywords associated with the video content for search optimization, consisting of "basketball, game, challenge".

#### Stream
- **streamId**: 
  - **Description**: A unique identifier for the stream.

- **streamName**: 
  - **Description**: A human-readable name assigned to the stream.

- **videoStatus**: 
  - **Description**: Represents the current status of the video; here it indicates "notready".

- **providerName**: 
  - **Description**: The name of the streaming provider; in this case, it is "cloudflare".

- **providerUniqueId**: 
  - **Description**: A unique identifier assigned by the provider.

- **providerPlaybackUrl**: 
  - **Description**: A URL for playback provided by the streaming service, which is currently left blank.

- **providerStreamId**: 
  - **Description**: Unique identifier for the stream provided by the streaming service.

- **providerStreamKey**: 
  - **Description**: A key provided by the streaming service necessary to initiate the stream.

- **providerStreamUrl**: 
  - **Description**: The URL for initiating the stream, noted as "srt://live.cloudflare.com:778".

- **providerStreamData**: 
  - **Description**: Contains more detailed information from the streaming provider, including URLs and keys for multiple streaming protocols, as well as timestamps for creation and modification.

- **success**: 
  - **Description**: Indicates whether the stream connection was successful, set to true.

- **errors**: 
  - **Description**: An array to hold any errors that occurred during the operation; this is currently empty.

- **messages**: 
  - **Description**: An array to hold any informational messages related to the operation; this is currently empty.

#### Created and Updated Dates and Times
- **createdDate, createdTime, updatedDate, updatedTime**: 
  - **Description**: Timestamps indicating when the stream was created and last updated.

#### Details
- **accountId, sessionId, channelId, videoId**: 
  - **Description**: Identifiers similar to those previously defined, used for tracking the video across different services.

- **title, description, tags**: 
  - **Description**: Similar to those defined in the options, these provide essential metadata about the video stream.

- **streamType**: 
  - **Description**: Indicates the type of stream; in this case, it is labeled as "Live".

- **started, paused, stopped**: 
  - **Description**: Boolean values indicating the state of the stream (whether it has started, paused, or stopped).

- **streamId**: 
  - **Description**: Repeat of the unique identifier for the stream.

- **channel**: 
  - **Description**: The name of the channel providing the stream, which is "Fortune's Basketball Channel".

- **category, categoryId, subCategory, subCategoryId**: 
  - **Description**: Classifications for the video content, providing context about its genre.

- **scheduleDate, scheduleTime**: 
  - **Description**: The date and time when the stream is scheduled to occur.

- **streamHours**: 
  - **Description**: Duration of the stream in hours.

- **coverPhotoUrl**: 
  - **Description**: A link to the thumbnail or cover photo for the stream.

- **voteTokenQuantity, votingTimeReset, voteButtonQuantity, voteButtonText**: 
  - **Description**: Indicates details about voting functionality for the stream, including token counts and button texts.

- **isRewardsEnabled, isTournamentEnabled**: 
  - **Description**: Flags indicating if rewards or tournaments are enabled for this stream.

- **tournamentButtonText**: 
  - **Description**: Text shown on buttons related to the tournament features.

- **streamLocatorName, streamAssetName**: 
  - **Description**: Identifiers used for tracking and managing the stream and its assets.

- **platformVideoIds**: 
  - **Description**: A collection of potential output IDs for different social media and streaming platforms, all currently set to false.

- **platformEventIds**: 
  - **Description**: A collection of potential event IDs for various platforms, also set to false.

- **primaryCameraName, primaryMicrophoneName, primarySpeakerName**: 
  - **Description**: The names of the equipment being used for video and audio input/output.

- **additionalCameras**: 
  - **Description**: An array detailing other cameras and microphones being used.

- **createdDate, createdTime, updatedDate, updatedTime**: 
  - **Description**: Timestamps for the creation and last update of the details section.

- **deletedDate, deletedTime**: 
  - **Description**: Fields left null indicating that the stream has not been deleted.

{
    "options":{

request.description:
### Video - Connect - Create - Brightcove Live

#### Request Method
- **POST**: This request will create a new video connection in the Brightcove live streaming service.

#### URL
- **http://localhost:3000/api/video/connect/create**: This is the endpoint to which the request is sent.

#### Headers
- **Content-Type**: Specifies the type of data being sent, which is `application/json` indicating that the request body contains JSON data.

#### Request Body
- **options**: This field contains a set of configuration options for connecting to the video service.
  - **providerName**: Name of the video provider, set to `brightcovelive`.
  - **providerId**: ID of the video provider (currently not set).
  - **apiKey**: Key for accessing the API (currently not provided).
  - **apiSecret**: Secret for accessing the API (currently not provided).
  - **apiClientId**: Client ID for API (currently not provided).
  - **authToken**: An optional token for authentication (currently not provided).
  - **server**: Server information (currently not provided).
  - **rtmpUrl**: Real-Time Messaging Protocol URL (currently not provided).
  - **streamKey**: A key for the stream (currently not provided).
  - **channelUrl**: URL of the channel (currently not provided).
  - **authUsername**: Username for authentication (currently not provided).
  - **authPassword**: Password for authentication (currently not provided).
  - **uniqueKey**: A unique key for identifying the video stream.
  - **videoId**: ID of the video being created.
  - **accountId**: Account ID for the user or business.
  - **channelId**: Channel ID where the video is streamed.
  - **sessionId**: A unique identifier for the streaming session.
  - **streamId**: ID for the particular stream.
  - **ipAddress**: IP address of the user (currently not provided).
  - **country**: Country where the stream is initiated, defaulted to `United States`.
  - **state**: State where the stream is initiated, defaulted to `California`.
  - **title**: Title of the video, e.g., `Fortune's Basketball Challenge`.
  - **description**: Description of the video content, e.g., `Basketball game featuring amazing plays and challenges.`.
  - **tags**: Keywords related to the video, e.g., `basketball, game, challenge`.

- **stream**: Contains information about the video stream being created.
  - **streamId**: ID of the stream.
  - **streamName**: Name assigned to the stream.
  - **uniqueKey**: A key that uniquely identifies this stream.
  - **videoId**: ID for the video being associated with this stream.
  - **accountId**: Corresponding account ID.
  - **channelId**: Channel ID where the stream occurs.
  - **sessionId**: Session identifier.
  - **videoStatus**: Status of the video, indicating it is `notready`.
  - **providerName**: Name of the provider, set to `cloudflare`.
  - **providerUniqueId**: Unique ID provided by the video provider.
  - **providerPlaybackUrl**: URL for playback (currently not set).
  - **providerStreamId**: ID associated with the provider's stream.
  - **providerStreamKey**: Key for accessing the provider's stream.
  - **providerStreamUrl**: URL for the provider's stream.
  - **providerStreamData**: Additional data from the provider including URLs, stream keys, and timestamps.
    - Various URLs for RTMP and SRT streaming and playback, created and modified timestamps, and metadata like account ID, stream ID, video ID, and more.
  - **success**: Indicates whether the stream creation was successful, set to `true`.
  - **errors**: Array containing any errors encountered during the process; currently empty.
  - **messages**: Array for additional messages; currently empty.
  - **createdDate**: Date when the stream was created.
  - **createdTime**: Time when the stream was created.
  - **updatedDate**: Date when the stream details were last updated.
  - **updatedTime**: Time when the stream details were last updated.
  - **deletedDate**: Date when the stream was deleted (currently not set).
  - **deletedTime**: Time when the stream was deleted (currently not set).

- **details**: Contains detailed metadata about the video.
  - **accountId**: Account ID associated with the video.
  - **sessionId**: Session ID for the stream.
  - **channelId**: Channel ID as above.
  - **videoId**: Video ID associated with the stream.
  - **title**: Title of the live event.
  - **description**: Description of the live event.
  - **tags**: Associated keywords for the event.
  - **streamType**: Indicates the type of stream, set to `Live`.
  - **searchType**: Type of content being searched, set to `Game`.
  - **started**: Boolean indicating if the stream has started.
  - **startedOn**: Timestamp indicating when the stream started.
  - **paused**: Boolean indicating if the stream is paused.
  - **pausedOn**: Timestamp indicating when the stream was paused.
  - **stopped**: Boolean indicating if the stream is stopped.
  - **stoppedOn**: Timestamp for when the stream was stopped (currently not set).
  - **streamId**: Stream identifier.
  - **channel**: Name of the channel broadcasting the event.
  - **category**: Category of the event, e.g., `Board`.
  - **categoryId**: ID associated with the category.
  - **subCategory**: Specific sub-category related to the content.
  - **subCategoryId**: ID associated with the sub-category.
  - **scheduleDate**: Date when the stream is scheduled.
  - **scheduleTime**: Time when the stream is scheduled.
  - **streamHours**: Duration for which the stream is scheduled.
  - **coverPhotoUrl**: URL for the cover photo of the event.
  - **providerPlaybackUrl**: Playback URL from the provider (currently not set).
  - **voteTokenQuantity**: Number of tokens available for voting during the stream.
  - **votingTimeReset**: Time period for resetting votes.
  - **voteButtonQuantity**: Number of voting options available.
  - **voteButtonText1**: Label for the first voting option.
  - **voteButtonText2**: Label for the second voting option.
  - **isRewardsEnabled**: Boolean indicating if rewards are enabled for viewers.
  - **isTournamentEnabled**: Boolean indicating if tournament mode is enabled.
  - **tournamentButtonText1**: Label for the first tournament option.
  - **tournamentButtonText2**: Label for the second tournament option.
  - **streamLocatorName**: Name for identifying the stream locator.
  - **streamAssetName**: Name for identifying the stream asset.
  - **platformVideoIds**: Object containing IDs for various social media platforms related to the stream (all currently set to `false`).
  - **platformEventIds**: Object containing IDs for events on various platforms (all currently set to `false`).
  - **primaryCameraName**: Name of the primary camera used for streaming.
  - **primaryMicrophoneName**: Name of the primary microphone used for audio.
  - **primarySpeakerName**: Name of the primary speaker used for output.
  - **additionalCameras**: Array containing additional camera and microphone setups.
  - **createdDate**: Date when the video details were created.
  - **createdTime**: Time when the video details were created.
  - **updatedDate**: Date when the video details were last updated.
  - **updatedTime**: Time when the video details were last updated.
  - **deletedDate**: Date when the video details were deleted (currently not set).
  - **deletedTime**: Time when the video details were deleted (currently not set).

request.description:
### Detailed Description of Endpoint Data: Video - Connect - Update - Brightcove Live

#### Request Information
- **Method**: This endpoint uses the `PUT` request method, which is typically used to update resources on the server.
- **URL**: The endpoint is located at `http://localhost:3000/api/video/connect/update`, indicating a local server environment used for handling the request.
- **Headers**:
  - **Content-Type**: The request header specifies `application/json`, indicating that the body of the request will contain data formatted as JSON.

#### Body Structure
The body of the request is divided into two main sections: `options` and `stream`, along with `details`.

##### Options
- **providerName**: The name of the video provider, here it is `brightcovelive`.
- **providerId**: An identifier for the specific video provider, which is currently left empty.
- **apiKey**: Expected API key required for authorization, currently set to `null`.
- **apiSecret**: Secret key for API access, currently set to `null`.
- **apiClientId**: ID for the client accessing the API, currently set to `null`.
- **authToken**: Token used for authorization, currently set to `null`.
- **server**: Information about the server to connect to, currently set to `null`.
- **rtmpUrl**: URL for connecting to the RTMP server, currently set to `null`.
- **streamKey**: Key used for streaming, currently set to `null`.
- **channelUrl**: URL for the channel being streamed to, currently set to `null`.
- **authUsername**: Username for authentication, currently set to `null`.
- **authPassword**: Password for authentication, currently set to `null`.
- **uniqueKey**: A unique identifier for the video stream.
- **videoId**: Identifier for the specific video being updated.
- **accountId**: Identifier for the account associated with the video.
- **channelId**: Identifier for the channel associated with the video.
- **sessionId**: Identifier for the current session.
- **streamId**: Identifier for the stream.
- **ipAddress**: The IP address from which the request originates, currently set to `null`.
- **country**: The country associated with the stream, set to `United States`.
- **state**: The state associated with the stream, set to `California`.
- **title**: The title of the video, here it is `Fortune's Basketball Challenge`.
- **description**: A brief explanation of the video content, which describes it as a basketball game featuring amazing plays and challenges.
- **tags**: Keywords associated with the video for easier searching, here they are `basketball`, `game`, and `challenge`.

##### Stream
- **streamId**: Unique identifier for the video stream.
- **streamName**: A descriptive name for the stream, which is `live-video-stream-7164b12d-1708817130231`.
- **uniqueKey**: Same unique identifier used in the options section.
- **videoId**: Same video identifier used in the options section.
- **accountId**: Same account identifier used in the options section.
- **channelId**: Same channel identifier used in the options section.
- **sessionId**: Same session identifier used in the options section.
- **videoStatus**: Current status of the video, marked as `notready`.
- **providerName**: Indicates the current provider, which is `cloudflare`.
- **providerUniqueId**: A unique identifier assigned by the provider.
- **providerPlaybackUrl**: URL for playback provided by the provider, currently empty.
- **providerStreamId**: Unique identifier for the stream assigned by the provider.
- **providerStreamKey**: Key used for accessing the stream, specific to the provider.
- **providerStreamUrl**: URL used for the stream connection.
- **providerStreamData**: Contains detailed information about the stream, including:
  - **result**: Object detailing the stream's parameters (such as URLs for various connection types).
  - **created**: Timestamp when the stream was created.
  - **modified**: Timestamp when the stream was last modified.
  - **meta**: Contains metadata about the stream, including account specifics, audio and video input names, and cover photo URL.
  - **defaultCreator**: Identifier for the default creator of the stream.
  - **status**: Current status of the stream, currently null.
  - **recording**: Object that specifies recording settings including mode and URL requirements.
  - **deleteRecordingAfterDays**: Indicates if recordings will be deleted after a certain number of days, currently null.
- **createdDate**: The date the stream was created, formatted as `YYYY-MM-DD`.
- **createdTime**: The time the stream was created.
- **updatedDate**: The date the stream was last updated.
- **updatedTime**: The time the stream was last updated.
- **deletedDate**: Date when the stream was deleted if applicable, currently null.
- **deletedTime**: Time when the stream was deleted if applicable, currently null.

##### Details
- **accountId**: Same account identifier as before.
- **sessionId**: Same session identifier as before.
- **channelId**: Same channel identifier as before.
- **videoId**: Same video identifier as before.
- **title**: Same title as before.
- **description**: Same description as before.
- **tags**: Same tags as before.
- **streamType**: Indicates the type of stream, specified as `Live`.
- **searchType**: Specifies the type of content being searched, set to `Game`.
- **started**: Flag indicating whether the stream has started, set to `true`.
- **startedOn**: Timestamp of when the stream started.
- **paused**: Flag indicating whether the stream has been paused, set to `false`.
- **pausedOn**: Timestamp of when the stream was paused if applicable.
- **stopped**: Flag indicating whether the stream has stopped, set to `false`.
- **stoppedOn**: Timestamp for when the stream stopped if applicable.
- **streamId**: The identifier for the stream.
- **channel**: Name of the channel broadcasting the stream, here it is `Fortune's Basketball Channel`.
- **category**: General category for the stream, set to `Board`.
- **categoryId**: Identifier for the category.
- **subCategory**: Sub-category of the stream, specified as `Outdoor Party`.
- **subCategoryId**: Identifier for the sub-category.
- **scheduleDate**: Date when the stream is scheduled, formatted as `YYYY-MM-DD`.
- **scheduleTime**: Time when the stream is scheduled.
- **streamHours**: Duration of the stream in hours.
- **coverPhotoUrl**: URL to the cover photo for the stream.
- **providerPlaybackUrl**: Same as before, currently set to an empty string.
- **voteTokenQuantity**: Number of tokens available for voting, set to `100`.
- **votingTimeReset**: Reset interval for voting time, set to `5`.
- **voteButtonQuantity**: Number of voting buttons visible, set to `4`.
- **voteButtonText1**: Text for the first voting button.
- **voteButtonText2**: Text for the second voting button.
- **isRewardsEnabled**: Flag indicating if rewards are enabled, set to `false`.
- **isTournamentEnabled**: Indicates if a tournament feature is enabled, set to `true`.
- **tournamentButtonText1**: Text for the first tournament button.
- **tournamentButtonText2**: Text for the second tournament button.
- **streamLocatorName**: Name assigned to the stream locator.
- **streamAssetName**: Name assigned to the stream asset.
- **platformVideoIds**: Object containing output IDs for various platforms, all currently set to `false`.
- **platformEventIds**: Object containing event IDs for various platforms, all currently set to `false`.
- **primaryCameraName**: Name of the primary camera used for the stream.
- **primaryMicrophoneName**: Name of the primary microphone used for audio input.
- **primarySpeakerName**: Name of the primary speaker used for output.
- **additionalCameras**: List of additional cameras and their corresponding microphones used in the stream.
- **createdDate**: Same creation date as before.
- **createdTime**: Same creation time as before.
- **updatedDate**: Same update date as before.
- **updatedTime**: Same update time as before.
- **deletedDate**: Same deleted date as before, currently null.
- **deletedTime**: Same deleted time as before, currently null.

This detailed breakdown is designed to provide a clear understanding of each component within the API request, ensuring users can effectively utilize the endpoint in their applications.

request.description:
### Name
- **Video - Connect - Create - DailyMotion Live**
  - This is the title of the API request that configures a live video streaming session on DailyMotion.

### Request
- **Method**
  - **POST**
    - This indicates that the API will create or update a resource on the server.

- **URL**
  - **http://localhost:3000/api/video/connect/create**
    - This is the endpoint where the request is sent. It targets the local server configured to handle video connection creation.

- **Headers**
  - **Content-Type**
    - **application/json**
      - This specifies that the request body will be in JSON format.

- **Body**
  - **Mode**
    - **raw**
      - The body content is sent as plain text without any formatting.

  - **Raw** 
    - Contains the JSON payload with the configuration data for the video stream.

#### Options
- **providerName**
  - **dailymotionlive**
    - The name of the video streaming provider being used.

- **providerId**
  - An identifier for the streaming provider, can be left empty for the API to generate one.

- **apiKey, apiSecret, apiClientId**
  - These fields are typically used for authentication with the streaming service. Set to null if not required or not provided.

- **authToken**
  - For any authorization needed, such as accessing protected resources.

- **server**
  - The server address, if not set it may default to the providerâ€™s main server.

- **rtmpUrl**
  - URL for Real-Time Messaging Protocol streaming; this is null if not set.

- **streamKey**
  - Key used to authenticate the stream with the provider.

- **channelUrl**
  - URL pointing to the streaming channel, if available.

- **authUsername, authPassword**
  - Credentials for any required authentication to access resources.

- **uniqueKey**
  - A unique identifier for this streaming session.

- **videoId**
  - Identifier for the video being streamed.

- **accountId**
  - Identifier for the user account managing the video stream.

- **channelId**
  - Channel identifier for where the video is being broadcasted.

- **sessionId**
  - Unique identifier for this live session.

- **streamId**
  - This identifies the specific stream being created.

- **ipAddress**
  - IP address from which the stream is initiated; can be null.

- **country**
  - The country where the stream is being initiated, such as "United States".

- **state**
  - The state where the stream is being initiated, such as "California".

- **title**
  - **Fortune's Basketball Challenge**
    - Title of the live stream.

- **description**
  - **Basketball game featuring amazing plays and challenges.**
    - A brief description of what the video is about.

- **tags**
  - **basketball, game, challenge**
    - Keywords used to describe the content of the stream for searchability.

#### Stream
- **streamId**
  - Identifier for the specific video stream instance.

- **streamName**
  - **live-video-stream-7164b12d-1708817130231**
    - A generated name for the video stream.

- **uniqueKey**
  - Same as above, a unique identifier for the streaming session.

- **videoId, accountId, channelId, sessionId**
  - Identifiers for their respective resources related to this stream.

- **videoStatus**
  - **notready**
    - Indicates the current status of the video stream.

- **providerName**
  - **cloudflare**
    - The provider handling the streaming delivery.

- **providerUniqueId**
  - A unique identifier given by the provider for this resource.

- **providerPlaybackUrl**
  - URL for playback once the stream concludes or is available for viewing.

- **providerStreamId**
  - Specific identifier created by the provider for the stream.

- **providerStreamKey**
  - A key intended for the provider's streaming service.

- **providerStreamUrl**
  - URL for the live stream connection.

- **providerStreamData**
  - Contains various details such as:
    - **uid**
    - **rtmps**
    - Details regarding RTMPS connection, including URLs.
    - **srt**
    - Credentials for SRT streaming, if applicable.
    - **webRTC**
    - URLs related to WebRTC connections for modern streaming.
    - **created, modified**
    - Timestamps indicating when the stream data was created and last updated.
    - **meta**
    - A collection of metadata information, including account ID, description, title, video ID, and names of input devices.

- **defaultCreator**
  - Identifier for the default creator of the stream.

- **status**
  - Current operational status of the stream; typically null unless specified.

- **recording**
  - Information about how the stream recording is handled:
    - **mode**
      - Defines recording settings.
    - **requireSignedURLs**
      - Indicates if signed URLs are needed to access the recordings.

- **deleteRecordingAfterDays**
  - Sets how many days after which recordings should be deleted; null if this is not enforced.

- **createdDate, createdTime, updatedDate, updatedTime**
  - Timestamps indicating when the stream was created and last updated.

- **deletedDate, deletedTime**
  - Timestamps for when the stream was deleted, if applicable.

#### Details
- **accountId, sessionId, channelId, videoId**
  - Same as above, identifiers related to the resources of the stream.

- **title, description, tags**
  - The title, a brief description, and tags related to the stream.

- **streamType**
  - **Live**
    - Indicates that this is a live stream.

- **searchType**
  - **Game**
    - Defines the content type for searching purposes.

- **started**
  - **true**
    - Indicates if the stream has started.

- **startedOn**
  - Timestamp of when the stream actually started.

- **paused**
  - **false**
    - Indicates if the stream is currently paused.

- **pausedOn**
  - Timestamp of when the stream was paused, if applicable.

- **stopped**
  - **false**
    - Indicates if the stream is currently stopped.

- **stoppedOn**
  - Timestamp of when the stream was stopped, if applicable.

- **streamId**
  - Identifier for the specific stream being created.

- **channel**
  - **Fortune's Basketball Channel**
    - Name of the channel where the stream is hosted.

- **category**
  - **Board**
    - Category of the video stream.

- **categoryId**
  - Identifier for the category of the video stream.

- **subCategory**
  - **Outdoor Party**
    - More specific breakdown of the category.

- **subCategoryId**
  - Identifier for the subcategory of the video stream.

- **scheduleDate, scheduleTime**
  - Date and time scheduled for the stream.

- **streamHours**
  - Duration of the stream in hours.

- **coverPhotoUrl**
  - URL for the cover photo of the stream.

- **providerPlaybackUrl**
  - URL for playback provided by the streaming service, if available.

- **voteTokenQuantity**
  - The quantity of tokens available for voting during the stream.

- **votingTimeReset**
  - Reset time for voting, potentially in minutes.

- **voteButtonQuantity**
  - Number of voting buttons available for audience interaction.

- **voteButtonText1, voteButtonText2**
  - Text for the first two voting buttons available for viewers.

- **isRewardsEnabled**
  - **false**
    - Indicates if rewards are available for viewers during the stream.

- **isTournamentEnabled**
  - **true**
    - Indicates if a tournament-style voting mechanism is enabled.

- **tournamentButtonText1, tournamentButtonText2**
  - Text for the two buttons available for tournament voting.

- **streamLocatorName**
  - **basketball-locator-name**
    - Identifier for the stream's locator in systems.

- **streamAssetName**
  - **basketball-asset-name**
    - Name of the asset associated with the stream.

- **platformVideoIds**
  - Contains boolean values indicating whether specific platform IDs have been created or not for various platforms (YouTube, Twitch, etc.)

- **platformEventIds**
  - Similar to platform video IDs but for event management across different platforms.

- **primaryCameraName, primaryMicrophoneName, primarySpeakerName**
  - Names of the primary devices being used for streaming.

- **additionalCameras**
  - An array of additional cameras and microphones being used in the stream setup.

- **createdDate, createdTime, updatedDate, updatedTime**
  - Timestamps for creation and last updates regarding the stream details.

- **deletedDate, deletedTime**
  - Timestamps for when the stream details were deleted, if applicable.

request.description:
### Endpoint: Video - Connect - Update - DailyMotion Live

#### Request Details
- **Method**: PUT
  - This indicates that we are updating existing video connection details.
  
- **URL**: `http://localhost:3000/api/video/connect/update`
  - The endpoint where the request is sent for updating the video connection.

#### Headers
- **Content-Type**: `application/json`
  - This specifies that the request body is in JSON format.

#### Body
The body of the request contains two main sections: `options` and `stream`.

##### Options
- **providerName**: 
  - Name of the video provider (e.g., DailyMotion Live).
  
- **providerId**: 
  - ID associated with the provider (left empty in this case).

- **apiKey**: 
  - API key for authenticating requests with the provider (left null here).
  
- **apiSecret**: 
  - Secret key used in conjunction with the API key (left null here).
  
- **apiClientId**: 
  - Client ID used for OAuth authentication (left null here).
  
- **authToken**: 
  - Token used for authentication (left null).

- **server**: 
  - The server endpoint for the video connection (left null).
  
- **rtmpUrl**: 
  - RTMP URL for streaming (left null).

- **streamKey**: 
  - Stream key used for authentication during a stream (left null).

- **channelUrl**: 
  - URL associated with the channel (left null).

- **authUsername**: 
  - Username for authentication (left null).
  
- **authPassword**: 
  - Password for authentication (left null).

- **uniqueKey**: 
  - Unique identifier for the video stream.

- **videoId**: 
  - Identifier for the video.

- **accountId**: 
  - Identifier for the user's account.

- **channelId**: 
  - Identifier for the channel.

- **sessionId**: 
  - Unique identifier for the session.

- **streamId**: 
  - Identifier for the streaming session.

- **ipAddress**: 
  - IP address associated with the connection (left null).

- **country**: 
  - Country of the connection, set to "United States".

- **state**: 
  - State of the connection, set to "California".

- **title**: 
  - Title of the video stream.

- **description**: 
  - Description of the video stream.

- **tags**: 
  - Tags associated with the video for easier search and categorization.


##### Stream
- **streamId**: 
  - Identifier for the stream.

- **streamName**: 
  - Name of the stream.

- **uniqueKey**: 
  - Unique identifier matching the options section.

- **videoId**: 
  - Video ID matching the options section.

- **accountId**: 
  - Account ID matching the options section.

- **channelId**: 
  - Channel ID matching the options section.

- **sessionId**: 
  - Session ID matching the options section.

- **videoStatus**: 
  - Current status of the video, e.g. "not ready".

- **providerName**: 
  - Name of the streaming provider (e.g., Cloudflare).

- **providerUniqueId**: 
  - Unique ID assigned by the provider.

- **providerPlaybackUrl**: 
  - URL for playback from the provider (left empty).

- **providerStreamId**: 
  - ID for the stream assigned by the provider.

- **providerStreamKey**: 
  - Stream key assigned by the provider.

- **providerStreamUrl**: 
  - URL for accessing the stream.

- **providerStreamData**: 
  - Contains additional details related to the stream, including URLs for playback via various methods, creation and modification timestamps, metadata, and default creator information.

- **success**: 
  - Indicates whether the request was successful.

- **errors**: 
  - Array for capturing any errors (empty in this case).

- **messages**: 
  - Array for capturing any messages (empty in this case).

- **createdDate**: 
  - Date the stream was created.

- **createdTime**: 
  - Time the stream was created.

- **updatedDate**: 
  - Date the stream was last updated.

- **updatedTime**: 
  - Time the stream was last updated.

- **deletedDate**: 
  - Date the stream was deleted (null if not deleted).

- **deletedTime**: 
  - Time the stream was deleted (null if not deleted).


##### Details
- **accountId**: 
  - Account identifier that relates to the video.

- **sessionId**: 
  - Session identifier for tracking the video session.

- **channelId**: 
  - Channel identifier to which the video belongs.

- **videoId**: 
  - Identifier for the video being played.

- **title**: 
  - Title of the video stream.

- **description**: 
  - Description of the video stream.

- **tags**: 
  - Tags associated with the video stream.

- **streamType**: 
  - Type of the stream (e.g., Live).

- **searchType**: 
  - Type of the content being searched.

- **started**: 
  - Indicates if the stream has started.

- **startedOn**: 
  - Timestamp of when the stream started.

- **paused**: 
  - Indicates if the stream is paused.

- **pausedOn**: 
  - Timestamp of when the stream was paused.

- **stopped**: 
  - Indicates if the stream has stopped.

- **stoppedOn**: 
  - Timestamp of when the stream was stopped (null if not stopped).

- **streamId**: 
  - Unique identifier for the stream.

- **channel**: 
  - Name of the channel.

- **category**: 
  - Category of the video content.

- **categoryId**: 
  - Identifier for the category.

- **subCategory**: 
  - Sub-category of the video content.

- **subCategoryId**: 
  - Identifier for the sub-category.

- **scheduleDate**: 
  - Date the stream is scheduled for.

- **scheduleTime**: 
  - Time the stream is scheduled for.

- **streamHours**: 
  - Duration of the stream in hours.

- **coverPhotoUrl**: 
  - URL for the cover photo of the stream.

- **providerPlaybackUrl**: 
  - Playback URL provided by the provider.

- **voteTokenQuantity**: 
  - The number of tokens available for voting.

- **votingTimeReset**: 
  - Time to reset the voting.

- **voteButtonQuantity**: 
  - The number of vote buttons available.

- **voteButtonText1**: 
  - Text for the first vote button.

- **voteButtonText2**: 
  - Text for the second vote button.

- **isRewardsEnabled**: 
  - Indicates if rewards are enabled for the stream.

- **isTournamentEnabled**: 
  - Indicates if tournaments are enabled for the stream.

- **tournamentButtonText1**: 
  - Text for the first tournament button.

- **tournamentButtonText2**: 
  - Text for the second tournament button.

- **streamLocatorName**: 
  - Name used for locating the stream.

- **streamAssetName**: 
  - Asset name associated with the stream.

- **platformVideoIds**: 
  - Contains identifiers for the video on various platforms.

- **platformEventIds**: 
  - Contains event identifiers on various platforms.

- **primaryCameraName**: 
  - Name of the primary camera used.

- **primaryMicrophoneName**: 
  - Name of the primary microphone used.

- **primarySpeakerName**: 
  - Name of the primary speaker used.

- **additionalCameras**: 
  - Array of additional cameras and their associated microphones.

- **createdDate**: 
  - Date the details were created.

- **createdTime**: 
  - Time the details were created.

- **updatedDate**: 
  - Date the details were last updated.

- **updatedTime**: 
  - Time the details were last updated.

- **deletedDate**: 
  - Date the details were deleted (null if not deleted).

- **deletedTime**: 
  - Time the details were deleted (null if not deleted).

request.description:
### Description of Data in the Endpoint: Video - Connect - Delete - DailyMotion Live

#### Endpoint Information
- **Name:** Video - Connect - Delete - DailyMotion Live
- **Method:** POST
- **URL:** http://localhost:3000/api/video/connect/delete
- **Headers:**
  - **Content-Type:** Specifies that the request body format is JSON.

#### Request Body
The request body contains two main sections: `options` and `stream`.

##### Options
- **providerName:** The name of the provider for video streaming, here it is set to "dailymotionlive".
- **providerId:** Identifier for the provider, currently left blank.
- **apiKey:** Key used for API access, currently set to `null`.
- **apiSecret:** Secret key for API authentication, currently set to `null`.
- **apiClientId:** ID for the API client, currently set to `null`.
- **authToken:** Token used for authorization, currently set to `null`.
- **server:** The server to connect to, currently set to `null`.
- **rtmpUrl:** Real-Time Messaging Protocol URL, currently set to `null`.
- **streamKey:** Key required to access the stream, currently set to `null`.
- **channelUrl:** URL of the video channel, currently set to `null`.
- **authUsername:** Username for authentication, currently set to `null`.
- **authPassword:** Password for authentication, currently set to `null`.
- **uniqueKey:** Unique key identifying the stream, here it is set to "uniqueKey".
- **videoId:** Identifier for the video, currently set to "videoId".
- **accountId:** Identifier for the user account, currently set to "accountId".
- **channelId:** Identifier for the video channel, currently set to "channelId".
- **sessionId:** Identifier for the session, currently set to "sessionId".
- **streamId:** Identifier for the stream, currently set to "streamId".
- **ipAddress:** The IP address of the user or server, currently set to `null`.
- **country:** The country of the user, specified as "United States".
- **state:** The state of the user, specified as "California".
- **title:** The title of the video stream, set to "Fortune's Basketball Challenge".
- **description:** A brief description of the video, detailing it as a "Basketball game featuring amazing plays and challenges.".
- **tags:** Comma-separated keywords related to the video, set as "basketball, game, challenge".

##### Stream
- **streamId:** Identifier for the stream, set to "streamId".
- **streamName:** Name of the live video stream, provided as "live-video-stream-7164b12d-1708817130231".
- **uniqueKey:** Repeats the unique key for identifying the stream, set to "uniqueKey".
- **videoId:** Matches the video ID from options, set to "videoId".
- **accountId:** Matches the account ID from options, set to "accountId".
- **channelId:** Matches the channel ID from options, set to "channelId".
- **sessionId:** Matches the session ID from options, set to "sessionId".
- **videoStatus:** Current status of the video, indicated as "notready".
- **providerName:** The name of the streaming provider specified as "cloudflare".
- **providerUniqueId:** Unique identifier provided by the stream provider, set to "c3b3f93b0a7594f3db917d5f9a671351".
- **providerPlaybackUrl:** URL for playback provided by the streaming service, currently left empty.
- **providerStreamId:** Identifier for the stream from the provider, set to "c3b3f93b0a7594f3db917d5f9a671351".
- **providerStreamKey:** Key required to access the provider's stream, set to "e0bb5fa14f7059bccfcef40d5dbe2283kc3b3f93b0a7594f3db917d5f9a671351".
- **providerStreamUrl:** URL for streaming from the provider, specified as "srt://live.cloudflare.com:778".
- **providerStreamData:** Contains detailed streaming data provided by the provider, including various URIs for different streaming protocols, creation and modification dates, and metadata about the stream, such as:
  - **created:** Timestamp for when the stream was created.
  - **modified:** Timestamp for the last modification of the stream.
  - **meta:** Additional metadata including account details, audio and video input names, and cover photo URL.
- **success:** Indicates whether the operation was successful, set to `true`.
- **errors:** An array for recording any errors that occurred during the operation, currently empty.
- **messages:** An array for recording any messages returned during the operation, currently empty.
- **createdDate:** Date when the stream was created, specified as "2024-02-24".
- **createdTime:** Time when the stream was created, specified as "23:25:30".
- **updatedDate:** Date when the stream was last updated, specified as "2024-02-25".
- **updatedTime:** Time when the stream was last updated, specified as "01:14:26".
- **deletedDate:** Date when the stream was deleted, currently set to `null`.
- **deletedTime:** Time when the stream was deleted, currently set to `null`.

##### Details
This section provides detailed information about the video stream.
- **accountId:** Matches account ID from options and stream, set to "accountId".
- **sessionId:** Matches session ID from options and stream, set to "sessionId".
- **channelId:** Matches channel ID from options and stream, set to "channelId".
- **videoId:** Matches video ID from options and stream, set to "videoId".
- **title:** Title of the video, reiterated as "Fortune's Basketball Challenge".
- **description:** Description reiterated, defining it as a basketball game with notable plays and challenges.
- **tags:** Reiterates the tags associated with the video.
- **streamType:** Type of stream indicated as "Live".
- **searchType:** Type of content specified for search, set to "Game".
- **started:** Indicates whether the stream has started, set to `true`.
- **startedOn:** Timestamp for when the stream started.
- **paused:** Indicates whether the stream has been paused, set to `false`.
- **pausedOn:** Timestamp for when the stream was paused, currently set to when it started.
- **stopped:** Indicates whether the stream has stopped, set to `false`.
- **stoppedOn:** Timestamp for when the stream was stopped, currently set to `null`.
- **streamId:** Matches the stream ID.
- **channel:** Name of the channel broadcasting the stream, specified as "Fortune's Basketball Channel".
- **category:** Category of the video content, set to "Board".
- **categoryId:** Identifier for the video category, specified as "categoryId".
- **subCategory:** Sub-category of the video content, set to "Outdoor Party".
- **subCategoryId:** Identifier for the sub-category, shown as "subCategoryId".
- **scheduleDate:** Date when the stream is scheduled, specified as "2024-02-01".
- **scheduleTime:** Time when the stream is scheduled to start, set to "18:00:00".
- **streamHours:** Duration of the stream in hours, specified as `1`.
- **coverPhotoUrl:** URL for the cover photo associated with the stream.
- **providerPlaybackUrl:** URL for playback from the provider, currently set to `null`.
- **voteTokenQuantity:** The quantity of vote tokens available, set to `100`.
- **votingTimeReset:** Time reset for voting, specified as "5" minutes.
- **voteButtonQuantity:** Number of voting buttons available, set to `4`.
- **voteButtonText1:** Text for the first vote button, specified as "Layup".
- **voteButtonText2:** Text for the second vote button, specified as "Dunk".
- **isRewardsEnabled:** Boolean indicating whether rewards are enabled, set to `false`.
- **isTournamentEnabled:** Boolean indicating if tournaments are enabled, set to `true`.
- **tournamentButtonText1:** Text for tournament button 1, specified as "Hit".
- **tournamentButtonText2:** Text for tournament button 2, specified as "Miss".
- **streamLocatorName:** Name for locating the stream, specified as "basketball-locator-name".
- **streamAssetName:** Name of the stream asset, specified as "basketball-asset-name".
- **platformVideoIds:** Contains IDs related to various platforms; currently all are set to `false` indicating no IDs assigned.
- **platformEventIds:** Contains IDs for platform events; currently all are set to `false`.
- **primaryCameraName:** Name of the primary camera used for streaming.
- **primaryMicrophoneName:** Name of the main microphone used for audio capture.
- **primarySpeakerName:** Name of the primary speaker used for audio output.
- **additionalCameras:** Array detailing any additional cameras and their associated microphones.
- **createdDate:** Date the stream detail was created, specified as "2024-02-18".
- **createdTime:** Time at which the stream detail was created.
- **updatedDate:** Date when the stream detail was last updated, specified as "2024-02-24".
- **updatedTime:** Time when the stream detail was last updated.
- **deletedDate:** Date when the stream detail was deleted, currently set to `null`.
- **deletedTime:** Time when the stream detail was deleted, currently set to `null`.

request.description:
# Detailed Description of Endpoint Data

## Name
- **Video - Connect - Create - DLive**: This represents the overall functionality of the API, which is to create a connection for streaming video on the DLive platform.

## Request
- **Method**: **POST**: This indicates that the request will create a resource on the server.
- **URL**: `http://localhost:3000/api/video/connect/create`: The endpoint where the POST request is sent.
- **Headers**:
  - **Content-Type**: `application/json`: This header specifies that the body of the request is in JSON format.

## Body
### Mode
- **mode**: **raw**: Indicates that the body content is sent as raw data in the request.

### Raw Data
The following fields are included in the raw JSON body:

#### Options Object
- **providerName**: `dlive`: The name of the video service provider (DLive).
- **providerId**: `""`: Unique identifier for the provider, currently empty.
- **apiKey**: **null**: API key for authentication, currently not provided.
- **apiSecret**: **null**: API secret for secure access, currently not provided.
- **apiClientId**: **null**: Client ID for API requests, currently not provided.
- **authToken**: **null**: Authentication token, currently not provided.
- **server**: **null**: Server information, currently not specified.
- **rtmpUrl**: **null**: Real-Time Messaging Protocol URL for streaming, currently not specified.
- **streamKey**: **null**: Key for the stream, currently not specified.
- **channelUrl**: **null**: URL for the channel, currently not specified.
- **authUsername**: **null**: Username for authentication, currently not provided.
- **authPassword**: **null**: Password for authentication, currently not provided.
- **uniqueKey**: `uniqueKey`: A unique identifier for the streaming session.
- **videoId**: `videoId`: Unique identifier for the video.
- **accountId**: `accountId`: Unique identifier for the account.
- **channelId**: `channelId`: Unique identifier for the channel.
- **sessionId**: `sessionId`: Unique identifier for the streaming session.
- **streamId**: `streamId`: Unique identifier for the stream.
- **ipAddress**: **null**: The IP address, currently not provided.
- **country**: `United States`: The country of the streaming session.
- **state**: `California`: The state of the streaming session.
- **title**: `Fortune's Basketball Challenge`: The title of the video stream.
- **description**: `Basketball game featuring amazing plays and challenges.`: A brief description of the video content.
- **tags**: `basketball,game,challenge`: Tags relevant to the video to aid in search and categorization.

#### Stream Object
- **streamId**: `streamId`: Unique identifier for the stream.
- **streamName**: `live-video-stream-7164b12d-1708817130231`: The name of the stream.
- **uniqueKey**: `uniqueKey`: Reiterates the unique identifier for the stream.
- **videoId**: `videoId`: Reiterates the unique identifier for the video.
- **accountId**: `accountId`: Reiterates the unique identifier for the account.
- **channelId**: `channelId`: Reiterates the unique identifier for the channel.
- **sessionId**: `sessionId`: Reiterates the unique identifier for the streaming session.
- **videoStatus**: `notready`: Current status of the video, indicating it is not yet ready to stream.
- **providerName**: `cloudflare`: The name of the service provider (Cloudflare).
- **providerUniqueId**: `c3b3f93b0a7594f3db917d5f9a671351`: Unique identifier for the provider instance.
- **providerPlaybackUrl**: `""`: Playback URL for the video, currently unspecified.
- **providerStreamId**: `c3b3f93b0a7594f3db917d5f9a671351`: Unique identifier for the streaming session handled by the provider.
- **providerStreamKey**: `e0bb5fa14f7059bccfcef40d5dbe2283kc3b3f93b0a7594f3db917d5f9a671351`: The key used to identify the stream with the provider.
- **providerStreamUrl**: `srt://live.cloudflare.com:778`: The stream URL provided by Cloudflare.
- **providerStreamData**: Object containing additional streaming data including:
    - **result**: Contains detailed results from the streaming service, including various URLs needed for streaming and playback.
    - **created**: Timestamp of when the stream was created.
    - **modified**: Timestamp of when the stream was last modified.
    - **meta**: Metadata about the video including:
        - **accountId**: Identifier for the account associated with the stream.
        - **audioInputName**: Name of the audio input device used.
        - **channelId**: Identifier for the channel.
        - **coverPhotoUrl**: URL for the cover photo of the stream.
        - **description**: Description of the stream.
        - **streamId**: Identifier for the stream.
        - **title**: Title of the stream.
        - **videoId**: Identifier for the video.
        - **videoInputName**: Name of the video input device used.
    - **defaultCreator**: `7164b12d`: Identifier of the default creator for the stream.
    - **status**: Current status of the stream, if applicable.
    - **recording**: Information about recording settings, including:
        - **mode**: `automatic`: Indicates that recording mode is automatic.
        - **requireSignedURLs**: `false`: Specifies if signed URLs are required for access.
    - **deleteRecordingAfterDays**: Duration after which recordings are deleted, currently unspecified.

#### Success and Error Messages
- **success**: `true`: Indicates whether the request was successful.
- **errors**: An array to hold any errors that occurred during the request processing, currently empty.
- **messages**: An array to hold any informational messages from the request processing, currently empty.

#### Created and Updated Dates
- **createdDate**: `2024-02-24`: Date when the stream was created.
- **createdTime**: `23:25:30`: Time when the stream was created.
- **updatedDate**: `2024-02-25`: Date when the stream was last updated.
- **updatedTime**: `01:14:26`: Time when the stream was last updated.
- **deletedDate**: **null**: The date when the stream was deleted, currently not applicable.
- **deletedTime**: **null**: The time when the stream was deleted, currently not applicable.

#### Details Object
- **accountId**: `accountId`: Reiterates the account identifier.
- **sessionId**: `sessionId`: Reiterates the session identifier.
- **channelId**: `channelId`: Reiterates the channel identifier.
- **videoId**: `videoId`: Reiterates the video identifier.
- **title**: `Fortune's Basketball Challenge`: The title of the stream.
- **description**: `Basketball game featuring amazing plays and challenges.`: Description of the stream.
- **tags**: `basketball,game,challenge`: Relevant tags for the stream.
- **streamType**: `Live`: Indicates that this is a live stream.
- **searchType**: `Game`: Type of content being streamed.
- **started**: `true`: Indicates that the stream has started.
- **startedOn**: `2024-02-24T22:41:42.483Z`: Timestamp of when the stream started.
- **paused**: `false`: Indicates that the stream is not paused.
- **pausedOn**: `2024-02-24T22:41:42.483Z`: Timestamp of when the stream was paused, if applicable.
- **stopped**: `false`: Indicates that the stream has not been stopped.
- **stoppedOn**: **null**: Timestamp of when the stream was stopped, currently not applicable.
- **streamId**: `streamId`: Identifier for the stream.
- **channel**: `Fortune's Basketball Channel`: Name of the channel for the video.
- **category**: `Board`: The primary category under which the video falls.
- **categoryId**: `categoryId`: Identifier for the category.
- **subCategory**: `Outdoor Party`: Sub-category of the video.
- **subCategoryId**: `subCategoryId`: Identifier for the sub-category.
- **scheduleDate**: `2024-02-01`: Date when the stream is scheduled.
- **scheduleTime**: `18:00:00`: Time when the stream is scheduled.
- **streamHours**: `1`: Duration of the stream in hours.
- **coverPhotoUrl**: `basketball-cover-url.jpg`: URL for the cover photo of the stream.
- **providerPlaybackUrl**: `""`: Playback URL for the provider, currently unspecified.
- **voteTokenQuantity**: `100`: Quantity of tokens available for voting.
- **votingTimeReset**: `5`: Duration in minutes for voting time reset.
- **voteButtonQuantity**: `4`: Number of vote buttons available.
- **voteButtonText1**: `Layup`: Text for the first vote button.
- **voteButtonText2**: `Dunk`: Text for the second vote button.
- **isRewardsEnabled**: `false`: Indicates if rewards for viewers are enabled.
- **isTournamentEnabled**: `true`: Indicates if a tournament is enabled for the stream.
- **tournamentButtonText1**: `Hit`: Text for the first tournament button.
- **tournamentButtonText2**: `Miss`: Text for the second tournament button.
- **streamLocatorName**: `basketball-locator-name`: Name for locating the stream.
- **streamAssetName**: `basketball-asset-name`: Asset name associated with the stream.
- **platformVideoIds**: An object containing various platform identifiers where the video can be shared, all currently set to `false` indicating none are available.
- **platformEventIds**: An object containing various event identifiers across platforms, all currently set to `false` indicating none are available.
- **primaryCameraName**: `Sony 4K Ultra HD WebCam`: Name of the primary camera used for streaming.
- **primaryMicrophoneName**: `WirelessAudioTek Device`: Name of the primary microphone used for audio.
- **primarySpeakerName**: `Bose-Mega-Speaker 2.0`: Name of the primary speaker used.
- **additionalCameras**: Array of additional camera and microphone setups:
  - **camera-2, mic-2**: Details of the second camera and its associated microphone.
  - **camera-3, mic-3**: Details of the third camera and its associated microphone.
- **createdDate**: `2024-02-18`: Date when the details were originally created.
- **createdTime**: `14:54:25`: Time when the details were created.
- **updatedDate**: `2024-02-24`: Date when the details were last updated.
- **updatedTime**: `23:29:19`: Time when the details were last updated.
- **deletedDate**: **null**: The date when the details were deleted, currently not applicable.
- **deletedTime**: **null**: The time when the details were deleted, currently not applicable.

This detailed description breaks down every field in the request payload for better understanding and usage by other developers.
