### Video - Connect - Delete - FC2 Live API Endpoint

#### Request Details
- **Method**: POST
  - This endpoint is accessed using the POST HTTP method.
  
- **URL**: `http://localhost:3000/api/video/connect/delete`
  - This is the endpoint where the request is sent to delete a video stream connection.

#### Headers
- **Content-Type**: `application/json`
  - Indicates that the request body is in JSON format.

#### Body
The request body is structured in JSON format containing two main sections: `options` and `stream`.

##### Options
- **providerName**: `fc2live`
  - The name of the video streaming provider.
  
- **providerId**: `""`
  - An identifier for the video provider, currently empty.
  
- **apiKey**: `null`
  - API key for authentication is currently not provided.
  
- **apiSecret**: `null`
  - Secret key for the API authentication is currently not provided.
  
- **apiClientId**: `null`
  - The client ID for accessing the API is currently not provided.
  
- **authToken**: `null`
  - The token used for authentication is currently not provided.
  
- **server**: `null`
  - Server specifications are currently not provided.
  
- **rtmpUrl**: `null`
  - URL for Real-Time Messaging Protocol is currently not provided.
  
- **streamKey**: `null`
  - The key for accessing the live stream is currently not provided.
  
- **channelUrl**: `null`
  - The URL of the video channel is currently not provided.
  
- **authUsername**: `null`
  - Username for authentication is currently not provided.
  
- **authPassword**: `null`
  - Password for authentication is currently not provided.
  
- **uniqueKey**: `uniqueKey`
  - This is a unique identifier for this particular stream.
  
- **videoId**: `videoId`
  - Identifier for the specific video.
  
- **accountId**: `accountId`
  - Identifier for the account associated with the video.
  
- **channelId**: `channelId`
  - Identifier for the channel broadcasting the video.
  
- **sessionId**: `sessionId`
  - Identifier for the session related to this streaming activity.
  
- **streamId**: `streamId`
  - Identifier for the stream.
  
- **ipAddress**: `null`
  - The IP address is currently not provided.
  
- **country**: `United States`
  - The country where the stream is being performed.
  
- **state**: `California`
  - The state where the stream is being performed.
  
- **title**: `Fortune's Basketball Challenge`
  - The title of the video stream.
  
- **description**: `Basketball game featuring amazing plays and challenges.`
  - A brief description of the content of the video stream.
  
- **tags**: `basketball,game,challenge`
  - Tags associated with the video stream to facilitate searching.

##### Stream
- **streamId**: `streamId`
  - Identifier for the stream, the same as in options.
  
- **streamName**: `live-video-stream-7164b12d-1708817130231`
  - The name given to the live video stream.
  
- **uniqueKey**: `uniqueKey`
  - Again, this is the unique identifier for the stream.
  
- **videoId**: `videoId`
  - Identifier for the specific video as in options.
  
- **accountId**: `accountId`
  - Identifier for the account associated with the video.
  
- **channelId**: `channelId`
  - Identifier for the channel broadcasting the video.
  
- **sessionId**: `sessionId`
  - Identifier for the session related to this streaming activity.
  
- **videoStatus**: `notready`
  - Indicates the current status of the video stream.
  
- **providerName**: `cloudflare`
  - The name of the service provider handling the video stream.
  
- **providerUniqueId**: `c3b3f93b0a7594f3db917d5f9a671351`
  - A unique identifier assigned by the provider.
  
- **providerPlaybackUrl**: `""`
  - URL for playback provided by the service provider, currently empty.
  
- **providerStreamId**: `c3b3f93b0a7594f3db917d5f9a671351`
  - Another identifier for the stream provided by the service provider.
  
- **providerStreamKey**: `e0bb5fa14f7059bccfcef40d5dbe2283kc3b3f93b0a7594f3db917d5f9a671351`
  - The stream key assigned by the provider.
  
- **providerStreamUrl**: `srt://live.cloudflare.com:778`
  - The URL for the video stream.
  
- **providerStreamData**: Detailed metadata about the stream, including URLs for different streaming formats (like RTMPS and SRT) and their credentials, as well as timestamps for creation and modification. It also includes audio/video input names, the cover photo URL, and more.
  
- **success**: `true`
  - Indicates the success of the operation, in this case, if the request was successful.
  
- **errors**: `[]`
  - An array that contains any errors that occurred during the request. Empty in this case.
  
- **messages**: `[]`
  - Any messages related to the request, empty in this case.
  
- **createdDate**: `2024-02-24`
  - The date when the stream was created.
  
- **createdTime**: `23:25:30`
  - The time when the stream was created.
  
- **updatedDate**: `2024-02-25`
  - The date when the stream was last updated.
  
- **updatedTime**: `01:14:26`
  - The time when the stream was last updated.
  
- **deletedDate**: `null`
  - The date when the stream was deleted, currently not applicable.
  
- **deletedTime**: `null`
  - The time when the stream was deleted, currently not applicable.

##### Details
- **accountId**: `accountId`
  - The same identifier for the account associated with the stream.
  
- **sessionId**: `sessionId`
  - The session identifier as in options.
  
- **channelId**: `channelId`
  - Identifier for the channel, as identified in the options.
  
- **videoId**: `videoId`
  - Identifier for the specific video.
  
- **title**: `Fortune's Basketball Challenge`
  - Title of the video stream.
  
- **description**: `Basketball game featuring amazing plays and challenges.`
  - Description of the video stream.
  
- **tags**: `basketball,game,challenge`
  - Tags related to the video.
  
- **streamType**: `Live`
  - The type of stream, indicating it's a live stream.
  
- **searchType**: `Game`
  - The category under which the live stream can be searched.
  
- **started**: `true`
  - Indicates whether streaming has started.
  
- **startedOn**: `2024-02-24T22:41:42.483Z`
  - Timestamp indicating when the streaming started.
  
- **paused**: `false`
  - Indicates whether the stream is currently paused.
  
- **pausedOn**: `2024-02-24T22:41:42.483Z`
  - Timestamp for when the stream was paused, if applicable.
  
- **stopped**: `false`
  - Indicates whether the stream has stopped.
  
- **stoppedOn**: `null`
  - Timestamp indicating when the stream stopped, if applicable.
  
- **streamId**: `streamId`
  - Identifier for the stream.
  
- **channel**: `Fortune's Basketball Channel`
  - The name of the channel hosting the stream.
  
- **category**: `Board`
  - The main category under which the video is classified.
  
- **categoryId**: `categoryId`
  - Identifier for the category.
  
- **subCategory**: `Outdoor Party`
  - The sub-category that provides a more specific classification of the video.
  
- **subCategoryId**: `subCategoryId`
  - Identifier for the sub-category.
  
- **scheduleDate**: `2024-02-01`
  - The date when the stream is scheduled.
  
- **scheduleTime**: `18:00:00`
  - Time when the stream is scheduled to start.
  
- **streamHours**: `1`
  - Indicates the duration of the stream in hours.
  
- **coverPhotoUrl**: `basketball-cover-url.jpg`
  - URL to the cover photo for the video stream.
  
- **providerPlaybackUrl**: `""`
  - The playback URL from the provider, currently empty.
  
- **voteTokenQuantity**: `100`
  - The number of voting tokens available for participation.
  
- **votingTimeReset**: `5`
  - Reset time in minutes for voting.
  
- **voteButtonQuantity**: `4`
  - The number of voting buttons available for users.
  
- **voteButtonText1**: `Layup`
  - Text for the first voting button.
  
- **voteButtonText2**: `Dunk`
  - Text for the second voting button.
  
- **isRewardsEnabled**: `false`
  - Indicates if rewards are enabled for this stream.
  
- **isTournamentEnabled**: `true`
  - Indicates if a tournament feature is enabled for this stream.
  
- **tournamentButtonText1**: `Hit`
  - Text for the first button in the tournament feature.
  
- **tournamentButtonText2**: `Miss`
  - Text for the second button in the tournament feature.
  
- **streamLocatorName**: `basketball-locator-name`
  - The name for the stream locator.
  
- **streamAssetName**: `basketball-asset-name`
  - The name of the stream asset for referencing.
  
- **platformVideoIds**: Object containing identifiers from multiple platforms showing whether identifiers for those platforms are available or not.
  
- **platformEventIds**: Object containing identifiers for events across various platforms indicating if any are available or not.
  
- **primaryCameraName**: `Sony 4K Ultra HD WebCam`
  - Name of the primary camera used for streaming.
  
- **primaryMicrophoneName**: `WirelessAudioTek Device`
  - Name of the primary microphone used for audio capture.
  
- **primarySpeakerName**: `Bose-Mega-Speaker 2.0`
  - Name of the primary speaker used during the stream.
  
- **additionalCameras**: Array of additional cameras and microphones used during the stream.
  
- **createdDate**: `2024-02-18`
  - The date when the stream details were created.
  
- **createdTime**: `14:54:25`
  - The time when the stream details were created.
  
- **updatedDate**: `2024-02-24`
  - The date when the stream details were last updated.
  
- **updatedTime**: `23:29:19`
  - The time when the stream details were last updated.
  
- **deletedDate**: `null`
  - There is no deletion date since the stream has not been deleted.
  
- **deletedTime**: `null`
  - There is no deletion time since the stream has not been deleted.

The above details provide comprehensive documentation of the API request data structure for the "Video - Connect - Delete - FC2 Live" endpoint.

request.description:
### Detailed Description of Endpoint Data

- **name**: The name of this specific API endpoint, which is "Video - Connect - Create - Huya."

- **request**: This section contains information about the HTTP request that is sent to this API.

  - **method**: The HTTP method used for this request, which is POST. This indicates that data is being sent to the server to create a new resource.
  
  - **url**: The endpoint URL for the API. In this case, it points to a local server at `http://localhost:3000/api/video/connect/create`.

  - **headers**: This section specifies the headers included in the request.
    
    - **key**: The name of the header. Here, it is "Content-Type."
    
    - **value**: The value associated with the header. For "Content-Type," it is set to "application/json," indicating that the payload is formatted as JSON.

  - **body**: This section contains the body of the request, which is sent in raw JSON format.

    - **mode**: It indicates that the body is sent in "raw" format rather than encoded or form data.
    
    - **raw**: The actual content of the body is a JSON string that contains various options and configuration data.

      - **options**: This nested object includes configuration options for the video connection.

        - **providerName**: The name of the service provider being used, set to "huya."
        
        - **providerId**: An optional ID for the provider, which is left empty in this case.
        
        - **apiKey**: The API key for authentication, currently set to null.
        
        - **apiSecret**: The secret associated with the API key, currently set to null.
        
        - **apiClientId**: An optional client ID for the API client, currently set to null.
        
        - **authToken**: An optional authentication token, currently set to null.
        
        - **server**: An optional server address, currently set to null.
        
        - **rtmpUrl**: The RTMP URL for streaming, currently set to null.
        
        - **streamKey**: The unique stream identifier, currently set to null.
        
        - **channelUrl**: The URL of the video channel, currently set to null.
        
        - **authUsername**: The username for authentication, currently set to null.
        
        - **authPassword**: The password for authentication, currently set to null.
        
        - **uniqueKey**: A unique identifier for the stream, set to "uniqueKey."
        
        - **videoId**: The identifier for the video being connected, set to "videoId."
        
        - **accountId**: The identifier for the user account, set to "accountId."
        
        - **channelId**: The identifier for the video channel, set to "channelId."
        
        - **sessionId**: The identifier for the session, set to "sessionId."
        
        - **streamId**: The identifier for the stream, set to "streamId."
        
        - **ipAddress**: The IP address from which the request originated, currently set to null.
        
        - **country**: The country of the user, set to "United States."
        
        - **state**: The state of the user, set to "California."
        
        - **title**: The title of the video, set to "Fortune's Basketball Challenge."
        
        - **description**: A brief description of the video, which states "Basketball game featuring amazing plays and challenges."
        
        - **tags**: A comma-separated list of tags associated with the video, in this case, "basketball,game,challenge."

      - **stream**: This nested object includes details about the video stream.

        - **streamId**: The identifier for the stream, set to "streamId."
        
        - **streamName**: The generated name for the stream, which is "live-video-stream-7164b12d-1708817130231."
        
        - **uniqueKey**: Repeated unique identifier for the stream, set to "uniqueKey."
        
        - **videoId**: Identifier for the video, repeated from the options section.
        
        - **accountId**: Identifier for the user account, repeated from the options section.
        
        - **channelId**: Identifier for the channel, repeated from the options section.
        
        - **sessionId**: Identifier for the session, repeated from the options section.
        
        - **videoStatus**: The current status of the video, set to "notready."
        
        - **providerName**: Name of the streaming provider, set to "cloudflare."
        
        - **providerUniqueId**: A unique ID issued by the provider, specified as "c3b3f93b0a7594f3db917d5f9a671351."
        
        - **providerPlaybackUrl**: URL for playback provided by the streaming service, currently empty.
        
        - **providerStreamId**: The unique stream ID assigned by the provider, set to "c3b3f93b0a7594f3db917d5f9a671351."
        
        - **providerStreamKey**: The stream key needed for broadcasting, specified as "e0bb5fa14f7059bccfcef40d5dbe2283kc3b3f93b0a7594f3db917d5f9a671351."
        
        - **providerStreamUrl**: The URL for the stream, which is formatted as "srt://live.cloudflare.com:778."
        
        - **providerStreamData**: An object containing additional stream details from the provider.

          - **result**: Contains the results from the provider's response.

            - **uid**: Unique identifier for the stream; repeated from before.
            
            - **rtmps**: RTMPS URL and stream key for secure streaming.
            
            - **rtmpsPlayback**: RTMPS URL and stream key for playback.
            
            - **srt**: Streaming URL, stream ID, and passphrase for SRT streaming.
            
            - **srtPlayback**: Playback URL, stream ID, and passphrase for SRT playback.
            
            - **webRTC**: URL for WebRTC streaming.
            
            - **webRTCPlayback**: URL for WebRTC playback.
            
            - **created**: Timestamp indicating when the stream was created.
            
            - **modified**: Timestamp indicating when the stream was last modified.
            
            - **meta**: Contains metadata regarding the stream.
              
              - **accountId**: Repeated account identifier.
              
              - **audioInputName**: The name of the audio input device, specified as "My macBook Microphone."
              
              - **channelId**: Repeated channel identifier.
              
              - **coverPhotoUrl**: URL for the cover photo, specified as "basketball-cover-url.jpg."
              
              - **description**: Repeated description of the video content.
              
              - **streamId**: Repeated identifier for the stream.
              
              - **title**: Repeated title of the video.
              
              - **videoId**: Repeated video identifier.
              
              - **videoInputName**: The name of the video input device, specified as "My MacBook Camera."

            - **defaultCreator**: The default stream creator's ID, set to "7164b12d."
            
            - **status**: Indicates the current status of the stream, currently set to null.
            
            - **recording**: Configuration regarding recording of the stream.

              - **mode**: Specifies the recording mode, set to "automatic."
              
              - **requireSignedURLs**: Indicates if signed URLs are required, currently set to false.
              
              - **allowedOrigins**: List of allowed origins, currently set to null.
            
            - **deleteRecordingAfterDays**: Indicates if and when to delete recordings, currently set to null.

        - **success**: Indicates whether the operation was successful, set to true.
        
        - **errors**: An array which captures any errors that occurred during the request; currently empty.
        
        - **messages**: An array to include any messages from the request; currently empty.

      - **createdDate**: The date when this stream was created, set to "2024-02-24."
      
      - **createdTime**: The time when this stream was created, set to "23:25:30."
      
      - **updatedDate**: The date when this stream was last updated, set to "2024-02-25."
      
      - **updatedTime**: The time when this stream was last updated, set to "01:14:26."
      
      - **deletedDate**: The date when this stream was deleted, currently set to null.
      
      - **deletedTime**: The time when this stream was deleted, currently set to null.

    - **details**: This nested object includes detailed information about the video and stream specifics.

      - **accountId**: Identifier for the user account, repeated from previous sections.
      
      - **sessionId**: Identifier for the session, repeated from previous sections.
      
      - **channelId**: Identifier for the channel, repeated from previous sections.
      
      - **videoId**: Identifier for the video, repeated from previous sections.
      
      - **title**: Title of the video, repeated from previous sections.
      
      - **description**: Description of the video, repeated from previous sections.
      
      - **tags**: Tags associated with the video, repeated from previous sections.
      
      - **streamType**: The type of stream, set to "Live."
      
      - **searchType**: The type for searching content, set to "Game."
      
      - **started**: Indicates if the stream has started, set to true.
      
      - **startedOn**: Timestamp indicating when the stream started.
      
      - **paused**: Indicates if the stream is currently paused, set to false.
      
      - **pausedOn**: Timestamp indicating when the stream was paused.
      
      - **stopped**: Indicates if the stream is currently stopped, set to false.
      
      - **stoppedOn**: Timestamp indicating when the stream was stopped; currently set to null.
      
      - **streamId**: Reiterated identifier for the stream.
      
      - **channel**: The name of the channel, specified as "Fortune's Basketball Channel."
      
      - **category**: Category classification for the video, specified as "Board."
      
      - **categoryId**: Identifier for the category, referred to as "categoryId."
      
      - **subCategory**: Sub-category classification, set to "Outdoor Party."
      
      - **subCategoryId**: Identifier for the sub-category, referred to as "subCategoryId."
      
      - **scheduleDate**: The date when the stream is scheduled, set to "2024-02-01."
      
      - **scheduleTime**: The time when the stream is scheduled, set to "18:00:00."
      
      - **streamHours**: Duration of the stream in hours, set to 1 hour.
      
      - **coverPhotoUrl**: URL for the cover photo, referenced as "basketball-cover-url.jpg."
      
      - **providerPlaybackUrl**: The playback URL provided by the streaming service, currently empty.
      
      - **voteTokenQuantity**: Number of tokens available for voting, set to 100.
      
      - **votingTimeReset**: Time duration for resetting votes, set to 5.
      
      - **voteButtonQuantity**: Number of voting options available, set to 4.
      
      - **voteButtonText1**: Text for the first vote button, set to "Layup."
      
      - **voteButtonText2**: Text for the second vote button, set to "Dunk."
      
      - **isRewardsEnabled**: Indicates whether rewards are enabled for the stream, set to false.
      
      - **isTournamentEnabled**: Indicates whether a tournament feature is enabled, set to true.
      
      - **tournamentButtonText1**: Text for the first tournament button, set to "Hit."
      
      - **tournamentButtonText2**: Text for the second tournament button, set to "Miss."
      
      - **streamLocatorName**: Name for locating the stream, specified as "basketball-locator-name."
      
      - **streamAssetName**: The name of the asset related to the stream, specified as "basketball-asset-name."
      
      - **platformVideoIds**: Provides the IDs for various social media and streaming platforms, all set to false, indicating no associated IDs.

      - **platformEventIds**: Provides event IDs related to social media and platforms, all set to false, indicating no associated IDs.

      - **primaryCameraName**: The name of the primary camera being used, set to "Sony 4K Ultra HD WebCam."
      
      - **primaryMicrophoneName**: The name of the primary microphone, set to "WirelessAudioTek Device."
      
      - **primarySpeakerName**: The name of the primary speaker, set to "Bose-Mega-Speaker 2.0."
      
      - **additionalCameras**: An array listing additional cameras and their corresponding microphones being used during the stream.

        - **camera**: Indicates the identifier for the additional camera.
        
        - **microphone**: Indicates the identifier for the additional microphone.

      - **createdDate**: The date when these details were first created, noted as "2024-02-18."
      
      - **createdTime**: The time when the details were first created, set to "14:54:25."
      
      - **updatedDate**: The date when these details were last updated, noted as "2024-02-24."
      
      - **updatedTime**: The time when these details were last updated, set to "23:29:19."
      
      - **deletedDate**: The date when this information was deleted, currently set to null.
      
      - **deletedTime**: The time when this information was deleted, currently set to null. 

This detailed description provides an overview of each attribute within the API request, offering insights into how to interact with the "Video - Connect - Create - Huya" endpoint effectively.

request.description:
### API Endpoint: Video - Connect - Update - Huya

This endpoint allows the user to update the video connection settings for a streaming session on the Huya platform.

#### Request Details:
- **Method**: PUT
- **URL**: `http://localhost:3000/api/video/connect/update`
- **Headers**: 
  - **Content-Type**: Specifies that the request body is formatted as JSON.

#### Request Body:
The request body contains two main sections: `options` and `stream`.

##### 1. Options
- **providerName**: The name of the streaming provider (e.g., "huya").
- **providerId**: The unique identifier for the provider; typically left empty.
- **apiKey**: The API key for authentication, can be `null` if not required.
- **apiSecret**: The secret key associated with the API key, can be `null`.
- **apiClientId**: The client ID for the API connection, can be `null`.
- **authToken**: A token for authenticating the session, can be `null`.
- **server**: The server URL for streaming; can be `null`.
- **rtmpUrl**: The RTMP URL for streaming; can be `null`.
- **streamKey**: The stream key used for authentication with the streaming service; can be `null`.
- **channelUrl**: The URL for the live channel; can be `null`.
- **authUsername**: Username for authentication; can be `null`.
- **authPassword**: Password for authentication; can be `null`.
- **uniqueKey**: A unique identifier for the video session (e.g., "uniqueKey").
- **videoId**: The identifier for the video being streamed (e.g., "videoId").
- **accountId**: The ID associated with the user's account (e.g., "accountId").
- **channelId**: The ID of the channel being used for streaming (e.g., "channelId").
- **sessionId**: The ID for the ongoing session (e.g., "sessionId").
- **streamId**: The ID for the specific stream (e.g., "streamId").
- **ipAddress**: The IP address of the streaming server; can be `null`.
- **country**: The country of the user, defaults to "United States".
- **state**: The state of the user, defaults to "California".
- **title**: The title of the video being streamed (e.g., "Fortune's Basketball Challenge").
- **description**: A short description of the video content (e.g., "Basketball game featuring amazing plays and challenges.").
- **tags**: Comma-separated tags describing the video content (e.g., "basketball,game,challenge").

##### 2. Stream
- **streamId**: The unique identifier for the current stream (e.g., "streamId").
- **streamName**: The name assigned to the stream (e.g., "live-video-stream-7164b12d-1708817130231").
- **uniqueKey**: A unique identifier for this video session (e.g., "uniqueKey").
- **videoId**: The ID for the video being streamed (e.g., "videoId").
- **accountId**: The ID associated with the user's account (e.g., "accountId").
- **channelId**: The ID of the channel being used for streaming (e.g., "channelId").
- **sessionId**: The ID of the ongoing session (e.g., "sessionId").
- **videoStatus**: The current status of the video stream (e.g., "notready").
- **providerName**: The name of the video service provider (e.g., "cloudflare").
- **providerUniqueId**: A unique ID assigned by the provider (e.g., "c3b3f93b0a7594f3db917d5f9a671351").
- **providerPlaybackUrl**: The URL for playback of the video by the provider; can be `null`.
- **providerStreamId**: The ID associated with the stream from the provider (e.g., "c3b3f93b0a7594f3db917d5f9a671351").
- **providerStreamKey**: The stream key used for authentication with the provider (e.g., "e0bb5fa14f7059bccfcef40d5dbe2283kc3b3f93b0a7594f3db917d5f9a671351").
- **providerStreamUrl**: The URL for the stream from the provider (e.g., "srt://live.cloudflare.com:778").
- **providerStreamData**: An object containing additional data about the stream, including:
  - **result**: Contains various URLs and keys needed for streaming and playback.
  - **created**: Timestamp indicating when the stream was created.
  - **modified**: Timestamp indicating the last modification time of the stream.
  - **meta**: Metadata about the stream like account ID, audio input, channel ID, cover photo, description, stream ID, title, etc.
- **success**: Indicates whether the operation was successful (`true` or `false`).
- **errors**: An array that contains any errors encountered during the request; usually empty if successful.
- **messages**: An array of messages related to the operation, usually empty if no messages are present.

##### Additional Stream Metadata:
- **createdDate**: Date when the stream was created (e.g., "2024-02-24").
- **createdTime**: Time when the stream was created (e.g., "23:25:30").
- **updatedDate**: Date when the stream details were last updated (e.g., "2024-02-25").
- **updatedTime**: Time when the stream details were last updated (e.g., "01:14:26").
- **deletedDate**: The date when the stream was deleted, if applicable; otherwise, `null`.
- **deletedTime**: The time when the stream was deleted, if applicable; otherwise, `null`.

##### 3. Details
- **accountId**: The ID associated with the user's account (e.g., "accountId").
- **sessionId**: The ID of the ongoing session (e.g., "sessionId").
- **channelId**: The ID of the channel being used for streaming (e.g., "channelId").
- **videoId**: The ID for the video being streamed (e.g., "videoId").
- **title**: The title of the video being streamed (e.g., "Fortune's Basketball Challenge").
- **description**: A description of the content being streamed.
- **tags**: Tags associated with the video (e.g., "basketball,game,challenge").
- **streamType**: The type of the stream, e.g., "Live".
- **searchType**: The type of content being searched; here it is "Game".
- **started**: Indicates if the stream has started (`true` or `false`).
- **startedOn**: Timestamp of when the stream started.
- **paused**: Indicates if the stream is paused (`true` or `false`).
- **pausedOn**: Timestamp of when the stream was paused.
- **stopped**: Indicates if the stream is stopped (`true` or `false`).
- **stoppedOn**: Timestamp of when the stream was stopped, if applicable; otherwise, `null`.
- **streamId**: Unique identifier for the stream.
- **channel**: The name of the channel associated with the stream.
- **category**: The category under which the stream is classified (e.g., "Board").
- **categoryId**: Unique identifier for the category.
- **subCategory**: The sub-category of the stream (e.g., "Outdoor Party").
- **subCategoryId**: Unique identifier for the sub-category.
- **scheduleDate**: Date scheduled for the stream (e.g., "2024-02-01").
- **scheduleTime**: Time scheduled for the stream (e.g., "18:00:00").
- **streamHours**: Duration of the stream in hours.
- **coverPhotoUrl**: URL for the cover photo of the stream.
- **providerPlaybackUrl**: Playback URL for the provider; can be `null`.
- **voteTokenQuantity**: Quantity of tokens available for voting.
- **votingTimeReset**: The time reset duration for voting.
- **voteButtonQuantity**: Number of vote buttons available.
- **voteButtonText1**: Text for the first vote button.
- **voteButtonText2**: Text for the second vote button.
- **isRewardsEnabled**: Flag indicating if rewards are enabled (`true` or `false`).
- **isTournamentEnabled**: Flag indicating if a tournament is enabled (`true` or `false`).
- **tournamentButtonText1**: Text for the first tournament button.
- **tournamentButtonText2**: Text for the second tournament button.
- **streamLocatorName**: Name of the stream locator.
- **streamAssetName**: Name of the stream asset.
- **platformVideoIds**: An object containing IDs for different social media platforms for output related to the video.
- **platformEventIds**: An object containing event IDs for various social platforms.
- **primaryCameraName**: The name of the primary camera being used.
- **primaryMicrophoneName**: The name of the primary microphone.
- **primarySpeakerName**: The name of the primary speaker system.
- **additionalCameras**: An array of additional camera configurations where each entry includes the camera and microphone used.
- **createdDate**: The creation date of the details.
- **createdTime**: The creation time of the details.
- **updatedDate**: The last updated date of the details.
- **updatedTime**: The last updated time of the details.
- **deletedDate**: Date of deletion, if applicable; otherwise, `null`.
- **deletedTime**: Time of deletion, if applicable; otherwise, `null`.

request.description:
### Detailed Description of Endpoint Data

- **name**: Identifies the call as "Video - Connect - Delete - Huya", indicating that this is an API request specifically for deleting a video connection on the Huya platform.

- **request**: This section contains the specifics of the HTTP request.
  - **method**: The HTTP method used for this request is POST, which is typically used for sending data to be processed to a specified resource.
  - **url**: Specifies the endpoint URL for the request, which is `http://localhost:3000/api/video/connect/delete`, indicating that the request is directed to a local server that handles video connection deletions.
  - **headers**: Contains metadata for the request.
    - **key**: "Content-Type" is specified, indicating the type of data being sent.
    - **value**: "application/json", indicating that the request body is in JSON format.
  - **body**: Contains the data being sent with the request.
    - **mode**: Indicates that the body is in "raw" format.
    - **raw**: Contains a JSON-formatted string representing the request payload for the video deletion.

      - **options**: Configuration options specific to the request.
        - **providerName**: The name of the video service provider, in this case, "huya".
        - **providerId**: An identifier for the video provider, which is left empty.
        - **apiKey**, **apiSecret**, **apiClientId**, **authToken**, **server**, **rtmpUrl**, **streamKey**, **channelUrl**, **authUsername**, **authPassword**: Credentials and identifiers needed for API authentication/authorization, most of which are set to null or empty.
        - **uniqueKey**: A unique identifier for the video request.
        - **videoId**: The ID of the video being deleted.
        - **accountId**: The account ID associated with the video.
        - **channelId**: The ID of the channel where the video is located.
        - **sessionId**: A unique identifier for the session associated with the video.
        - **streamId**: The ID of the stream linked to the video.
        - **ipAddress**: The IP address of the request, which is null.
        - **country**, **state**: Geographic details where the request is made, with "United States" and "California" specified.
        - **title**: Title of the video, "Fortune's Basketball Challenge".
        - **description**: A brief description of the video content.
        - **tags**: Keywords associated with the video for categorization purposes.

      - **stream**: Information pertaining to the video stream.
        - **streamId**: Identifier for the video stream.
        - **streamName**: A generated name for the stream, including a UUID.
        - **videoStatus**: Indicates the current status of the video, set to "notready".
        - **providerName**: Name of the provider, which is "cloudflare".
        - **providerUniqueId**: Unique identifier from the provider.
        - **providerPlaybackUrl**: URL for playback from the provider, currently empty.
        - **providerStreamId**, **providerStreamKey**, **providerStreamUrl**: Various identifiers and URLs related to the stream provided by the cloud provider.
        - **providerStreamData**: Detailed streaming information including URLs, unique identifiers, and settings related to real-time media streaming and recording capabilities.
        - **success**: Indicates whether the request was successful, which is set to true.
        - **errors**: An array for potential errors, currently empty.
        - **messages**: An array for informational messages, currently empty.
        - **createdDate**, **createdTime**, **updatedDate**, **updatedTime**: Timestamps for when the stream was created or last updated.
        - **deletedDate**, **deletedTime**: Timestamps for when the stream was deleted, currently null indicating the stream hasnâ€™t been deleted.

      - **details**: Contains detailed metadata about the video and streaming event.
        - **accountId**, **sessionId**, **channelId**, **videoId**: Identifiers linking back to the user account, session information, the channel where the video is hosted, and the specific video.
        - **title**, **description**, **tags**: Similar to those under options, reiterating the identity and theme of the video.
        - **streamType**: Specifies that this is a live stream.
        - **searchType**: Indicates the basis of searching for the video, labeled as a "Game".
        - **started**, **paused**, **stopped**: Boolean flags indicating the current state of the stream.
        - **startedOn**, **pausedOn**, **stoppedOn**: Timestamps for when the video started, was paused, and stopped respectively.
        - **streamId**, **channel**: Identifiers for the stream and the channel it is associated with, along with category and subcategory information.
        - **scheduleDate**, **scheduleTime**: Date and time when the stream is scheduled or commenced.
        - **streamHours**: Duration of the stream.
        - **coverPhotoUrl**: URL for the cover photo associated with the video stream.
        - **voteTokenQuantity**, **votingTimeReset**, **voteButtonQuantity**, **voteButtonText1**, **voteButtonText2**: Specific parameters for voting options during a live stream, including the number of buttons and their text.
        - **isRewardsEnabled**, **isTournamentEnabled**: Flags indicating if rewards and tournaments are active for the stream.
        - **tournamentButtonText1**, **tournamentButtonText2**: Custom text for tournament voting buttons.
        - **streamLocatorName**, **streamAssetName**: Names for identifying the stream locator and associated assets.
        - **platformVideoIds**: Collection of various output IDs associated with multiple platforms, indicating this streamâ€™s integration with those platforms.
        - **platformEventIds**: Similarly, this maps out event IDs for various social and video platforms.
        - **primaryCameraName**, **primaryMicrophoneName**, **primarySpeakerName**: Names for the main video capture and audio devices used in the stream.
        - **additionalCameras**: Lists any additional cameras and microphones linked to the stream.
        - **createdDate**, **createdTime**, **updatedDate**, **updatedTime**: Timestamps for the creation and update of the streaming details.
        - **deletedDate**, **deletedTime**: Timestamps for potential deletions, currently set to null.

request.description:
### Detailed Description of Each Data in Video - Connect - Create - Instagram Live Endpoint

#### Endpoint Overview
- **Name**: Video - Connect - Create - Instagram Live
- **Method**: POST
- **URL**: The endpoint to create a connection for live streaming to Instagram.
- **Headers**: 
  - **Content-Type**: Specifies that the body of the request is in JSON format.

#### Body Structure

##### Options
- **providerName**: The name of the streaming provider; set to "instagramlive" for Instagram Live.
- **providerId**: A unique identifier for the provider; currently left blank.
- **apiKey**: The API key for authentication; currently set to null.
- **apiSecret**: The API secret for authentication; currently set to null.
- **apiClientId**: The client ID for the application; currently set to null.
- **authToken**: The authentication token for accessing the service; currently set to null.
- **server**: The server details; currently set to null.
- **rtmpUrl**: The RTMP URL for streaming; currently set to null.
- **streamKey**: The key associated with the streaming session; currently set to null.
- **channelUrl**: The URL of the channel for streaming; currently set to null.
- **authUsername**: The username for authentication; currently set to null.
- **authPassword**: The password for authentication; currently set to null.
- **uniqueKey**: A unique key for the session; labeled as "uniqueKey".
- **videoId**: The ID for the video; labeled as "videoId".
- **accountId**: The ID of the user account; labeled as "accountId".
- **channelId**: The ID of the streaming channel; labeled as "channelId".
- **sessionId**: The ID of the session; labeled as "sessionId".
- **streamId**: The ID associated with the stream; labeled as "streamId".
- **ipAddress**: The IP address from which the request is made; currently set to null.
- **country**: The country of the server; set to "United States".
- **state**: The state associated with the server; set to "California".
- **title**: The title of the live stream; set to "Fortune's Basketball Challenge".
- **description**: A brief description of the live stream; describing it as "Basketball game featuring amazing plays and challenges".
- **tags**: A list of tags associated with the stream for content discovery; set to "basketball,game,challenge".

##### Stream
- **streamId**: The ID of the stream; labeled as "streamId".
- **streamName**: The name given to the live stream; unique identifier "live-video-stream-7164b12d-1708817130231".
- **uniqueKey**: The session's unique key; labeled as "uniqueKey".
- **videoId**: The ID for the video; labeled as "videoId".
- **accountId**: The ID of the account; labeled as "accountId".
- **channelId**: The ID of the channel; labeled as "channelId".
- **sessionId**: The ID for the session; labeled as "sessionId".
- **videoStatus**: The current status of the video; set to "notready".
- **providerName**: The name of the streaming provider being used; set to "cloudflare".
- **providerUniqueId**: A unique identifier for the provider; different from the providerId but related.
- **providerPlaybackUrl**: URL for playback provided by the provider; currently empty.
- **providerStreamId**: The unique stream ID provided by the streaming service.
- **providerStreamKey**: The key used to stream content; provided by the service.
- **providerStreamUrl**: URL for the actual stream; uses the SRT protocol.
- **providerStreamData**: Contains various stream data details, including:
  - **result**: An object that includes the unique identifier, RTMPS URL, stream key, SRT details, created and modified timestamps, and metadata.
- **createdDate**: Date the stream was created; set as "2024-02-24".
- **createdTime**: Time the stream was created; set as "23:25:30".
- **updatedDate**: Date the stream was last updated; set as "2024-02-25".
- **updatedTime**: Time the stream was last updated; set as "01:14:26".
- **deletedDate**: Date the stream was deleted, if applicable; currently null.
- **deletedTime**: Time the stream was deleted, if applicable; currently null.

##### Details
- **accountId**: The ID of the user account associated with the stream; labeled as "accountId".
- **sessionId**: The ID of the streaming session; labeled as "sessionId".
- **channelId**: The ID of the streaming channel; labeled as "channelId".
- **videoId**: The ID associated with the video; labeled as "videoId".
- **title**: The title of the live stream; titled "Fortune's Basketball Challenge".
- **description**: Description of the live stream; similar to options.
- **tags**: Tags associated with the live stream; similar to options.
- **streamType**: The type of stream; set to "Live".
- **searchType**: The type of content for search filtering; set to "Game".
- **started**: Boolean indicating if the stream has started; set to true.
- **startedOn**: Timestamp when the stream started; set to "2024-02-24T22:41:42.483Z".
- **paused**: Boolean indicating if the stream is currently paused; set to false.
- **pausedOn**: Timestamp when the stream was paused, if applicable; same as started time.
- **stopped**: Boolean indicating if the stream has stopped; set to false.
- **stoppedOn**: Timestamp when the stream was stopped; currently null.
- **streamId**: The ID of the stream; labeled as "streamId".
- **channel**: The name of the channel broadcasting the stream; labeled as "Fortune's Basketball Channel".
- **category**: The category under which the stream is classified; set to "Board".
- **categoryId**: The ID associated with the category; labeled as "categoryId".
- **subCategory**: The subcategory relevant to the stream; set to "Outdoor Party".
- **subCategoryId**: The ID for the subcategory; labeled as "subCategoryId".
- **scheduleDate**: Scheduled date for the event; set to "2024-02-01".
- **scheduleTime**: Scheduled time for the event; set to "18:00:00".
- **streamHours**: Duration of the scheduled stream in hours; set to 1 hour.
- **coverPhotoUrl**: URL for the cover photo of the stream; set as "basketball-cover-url.jpg".
- **providerPlaybackUrl**: Playback URL provided by the streaming provider; currently empty.
- **voteTokenQuantity**: The quantity of tokens available for voting; set to 100.
- **votingTimeReset**: The duration in which each vote is reset; set to 5 (minutes).
- **voteButtonQuantity**: The number of voting buttons available; set to 4.
- **voteButtonText1**: Text for the first voting button; set to "Layup".
- **voteButtonText2**: Text for the second voting button; set to "Dunk".
- **isRewardsEnabled**: Boolean indicating if rewards are enabled for the stream; set to false.
- **isTournamentEnabled**: Boolean indicating if tournament features are enabled; set to true.
- **tournamentButtonText1**: Text for the first button in the tournament; set to "Hit".
- **tournamentButtonText2**: Text for the second button in the tournament; set to "Miss".
- **streamLocatorName**: The name used to locate the stream; labeled as "basketball-locator-name".
- **streamAssetName**: The name of the asset related to the stream; labeled as "basketball-asset-name".
- **platformVideoIds**: A collection of video IDs associated with various platforms, all currently set to false (indicating no ID is used).
- **platformEventIds**: A collection of event IDs across various platforms, all currently set to false.
- **primaryCameraName**: The name of the primary camera used for the stream; set to "Sony 4K Ultra HD WebCam".
- **primaryMicrophoneName**: The name of the primary microphone used; set to "WirelessAudioTek Device".
- **primarySpeakerName**: The name of the primary speaker; set to "Bose-Mega-Speaker 2.0".
- **additionalCameras**: An array of additional camera and microphone setups used during the stream.
- **createdDate**: Date when the stream details were created; set to "2024-02-18".
- **createdTime**: Time when the stream details were created; set to "14:54:25".
- **updatedDate**: The last updated date of stream details; set to "2024-02-24".
- **updatedTime**: The last updated time of stream details; set to "23:29:19".
- **deletedDate**: Date when the stream details were deleted, if applicable; currently null.
- **deletedTime**: Time when the stream details were deleted, if applicable; currently null.

This endpoint allows for the creation of live streaming sessions with various configurations and details tailored for the Instagram platform and utilizes a structured JSON format for inputs and responses.

request.description:
### Endpoint Description: Video - Connect - Update - Instagram Live

#### General Information:
- **Name**: Video - Connect - Update - Instagram Live
- **Method**: PUT
- **URL**: http://localhost:3000/api/video/connect/update
- **Content-Type**: application/json

#### Request Body Structure:

#### 1. Options Object:
- **providerName**: The name of the service provider for the video stream (e.g., Instagram Live).
- **providerId**: Identifier for the video stream provider (can be left empty).
- **apiKey**: Key for accessing the provider's API (null if not applicable).
- **apiSecret**: Secret associated with the API key (null if not applicable).
- **apiClientId**: Client ID for authenticating with the API (null if not applicable).
- **authToken**: Token used for authorization (null if not provided).
- **server**: Details about the server for streaming (null if not specified).
- **rtmpUrl**: URL for Real-Time Messaging Protocol (null if not specified).
- **streamKey**: Key for accessing the specific stream (null if not specified).
- **channelUrl**: URL for the streaming channel (null if not specified).
- **authUsername**: Username for authentication (null if not specified).
- **authPassword**: Password for authentication (null if not specified).
- **uniqueKey**: A unique identifier for the video stream.
- **videoId**: Identifier for the video being streamed.
- **accountId**: Identifier for the account associated with the video.
- **channelId**: Identifier for the channel streaming the video.
- **sessionId**: Identifier for the current session of the stream.
- **streamId**: Identifier for the stream being conducted.
- **ipAddress**: IP address from which the stream originates (null if not specified).
- **country**: Country of the stream origin (default: United States).
- **state**: State of the stream origin (default: California).
- **title**: Title of the video stream (e.g., "Fortune's Basketball Challenge").
- **description**: Description of the video content (e.g., "Basketball game featuring amazing plays and challenges.").
- **tags**: Comma-separated tags relevant to the video (e.g., "basketball,game,challenge").

#### 2. Stream Object:
- **streamId**: Identifier of the streaming session.
- **streamName**: Name assigned to the live video stream.
- **uniqueKey**: Unique identifier for the video stream, mirroring the one in options.
- **videoId**: Identifier for the associated video.
- **accountId**: Identifier linked to the account managing the stream.
- **channelId**: ID for the channel to which the video is connected.
- **sessionId**: ID for the streaming session.
- **videoStatus**: Current status of the video (e.g., "notready").
- **providerName**: Name of the video service provider (e.g., "cloudflare").
- **providerUniqueId**: Unique ID assigned by the provider.
- **providerPlaybackUrl**: URL for playback provided by the service (empty if not specified).
- **providerStreamId**: Unique ID for the stream assigned by the service provider.
- **providerStreamKey**: Key used by the provider to access the stream.
- **providerStreamUrl**: URL for the stream provided by the service (e.g., streaming endpoint).
- **providerStreamData**: Additional data related to the stream, including URLs for playback, created date, modified date, and metadata like video title, description, etc.
- **createdDate**: The date the stream was created.
- **createdTime**: The time the stream was created.
- **updatedDate**: The latest date when the stream data was updated.
- **updatedTime**: The time the stream data was last updated.
- **deletedDate**: The date the stream was deleted (null if not deleted).
- **deletedTime**: The time the stream was deleted (null if not deleted).

#### 3. Details Object:
- **accountId**: Identifier for the account associated with the video.
- **sessionId**: Identifier for the session during which the stream occurs.
- **channelId**: Identifier for the streaming channel.
- **videoId**: Identifier for the streamed video.
- **title**: Title of the stream.
- **description**: Description of the stream.
- **tags**: Relevant tags for the stream.
- **streamType**: Type of the stream (e.g., Live).
- **searchType**: Type used for searching (e.g., Game).
- **started**: Indicates if the stream has started (true/false).
- **startedOn**: Timestamp of when the stream started.
- **paused**: Indicates if the stream is currently paused (true/false).
- **pausedOn**: Timestamp for when the stream was paused.
- **stopped**: Indicates if the stream has been stopped (true/false).
- **stoppedOn**: Timestamp for when the stream was stopped (null if not stopped).
- **streamId**: Identifier for the streaming action.
- **channel**: Name of the channel hosting the stream.
- **category**: Broad category assigned to the video content (e.g., "Board").
- **categoryId**: Identifier for the category.
- **subCategory**: Specific sub-category for the content.
- **subCategoryId**: Identifier for the sub-category.
- **scheduleDate**: Date when the stream is scheduled to be held.
- **scheduleTime**: Time of the scheduled stream.
- **streamHours**: Duration for which the stream is expected to run.
- **coverPhotoUrl**: URL for the cover photo of the stream.
- **providerPlaybackUrl**: URL for playback provided by the service (empty if not specified).
- **voteTokenQuantity**: Quantity of tokens allowed for voting during the stream.
- **votingTimeReset**: Duration for resetting voting time.
- **voteButtonQuantity**: Number of voting buttons available to viewers.
- **voteButtonText1-2**: Text labels for the voting buttons.
- **isRewardsEnabled**: Indicates if rewards are enabled during the stream (true/false).
- **isTournamentEnabled**: Indicates if a tournament feature is enabled during the stream (true/false).
- **tournamentButtonText1-2**: Button labels for tournament-related actions.
- **streamLocatorName**: Name for the stream locator feature.
- **streamAssetName**: Name for the asset associated with the stream.
- **platformVideoIds**: Object holding Boolean values indicating the existence of video IDs for various platforms (e.g., YouTube, Twitch, etc.).
- **platformEventIds**: Object holding Boolean values indicating the presence of event IDs on various platforms (e.g., Facebook, LinkedIn, etc.).
- **primaryCameraName**: Name of the primary camera used for streaming.
- **primaryMicrophoneName**: Name of the primary microphone employed during the stream.
- **primarySpeakerName**: Name of the primary speaker used for audio.
- **additionalCameras**: Array containing objects with additional cameras and their corresponding microphones.
- **createdDate**: Date when the details were recorded.
- **createdTime**: Time when the details were recorded.
- **updatedDate**: When the details were last modified.
- **updatedTime**: Time when the details were last updated.
- **deletedDate**: The date the details were marked for deletion (null if not applicable).
- **deletedTime**: The time the details were marked for deletion (null if applicable).

This detailed breakdown provides clarity on the structure and purpose of each part of the request payload for the Video - Connect - Update endpoint for Instagram Live streaming.

request.description:
### Endpoint Description: Video - Connect - Delete - Instagram Live

#### Request
- **Method**: POST
- **URL**: This endpoint is accessed via `http://localhost:3000/api/video/connect/delete`.
- **Headers**:
  - **Content-Type**: Specifies the media type of the resource. In this case, it is set to `application/json`, indicating that the request body is in JSON format.

#### Body
The request body is a JSON object containing two main parts: `options` and `stream`.

##### Options
- **providerName**: Specifies the source of the video, e.g., `instagramlive`.
- **providerId**: A unique identifier for the video provider; currently empty.
- **apiKey, apiSecret, apiClientId, authToken, server, rtmpUrl, streamKey, channelUrl**: All these fields are for authentication and connection setup with the video provider, but they are set to `null` or empty, implying they are not currently provided.
- **uniqueKey**: A unique identifier for the video session.
- **videoId**: The identifier specific to the video being handled.
- **accountId**: Represents the user account associated with this video.
- **channelId**: The identifier for the channel that is streaming the video.
- **sessionId**: Unique identifier for the current streaming session.
- **streamId**: Unique identifier for the stream.
- **ipAddress**: The IP address of the connecting device; currently `null`.
- **country**: Indicates the country of the user, defaulted to `United States`.
- **state**: Represents the state of the user, defaulted to `California`.
- **title**: The title of the video, e.g., "Fortune's Basketball Challenge".
- **description**: Brief description of the video content, e.g., "Basketball game featuring amazing plays and challenges."
- **tags**: Comma-separated keywords related to the video, e.g., "basketball,game,challenge".

##### Stream
- **streamId**: Identifier for the current stream session.
- **streamName**: A generated name for the live video stream.
- **uniqueKey, videoId, accountId, channelId, sessionId**: These replicate the identifiers from the options for easy access.
- **videoStatus**: Indicates the current state of the video. In this case, it is `notready`.
- **providerName**: Name of the video service provider, set to `cloudflare` here.
- **providerUniqueId**: A unique identifier for the provider's system, which helps in tracking the video on their platform.
- **providerPlaybackUrl**: The URL where the video can be played back; currently empty.
- **providerStreamId**: Unique stream identifier from the video provider.
- **providerStreamKey**: Key used for authenticating the stream with the provider.
- **providerStreamUrl**: URL for the stream provided by the service.
- **providerStreamData**: Contains detailed streaming data including various protocols (RTMP, SRT, WebRTC) with appropriate URLs and keys for streaming and playback.
- **success**: A boolean value indicating the success of the query, set to `true`.
- **errors**: An empty array indicating no errors occurred during the operation.
- **messages**: An empty array for any additional messages; none are present here.

##### Dates
- **createdDate & createdTime**: Timestamps for when the video was created.
- **updatedDate & updatedTime**: Timestamps for the last update of the stream details.
- **deletedDate & deletedTime**: Currently empty, indicating that the video has not been deleted.

##### Details
This section contains comprehensive details about the stream.
- **accountId, sessionId, channelId, videoId**: Replicate identifiers for easy access.
- **title & description**: Similar to options, provide quick reference information for the stream.
- **tags**: Keywords related to the stream.
- **streamType**: Specifies the type of stream, which is `Live`.
- **searchType**: Denotes the category of content, in this case, a `Game`.
- **started**: A boolean indicating whether the stream has started; set to `true`.
- **startedOn**: Timestamp of when the stream started.
- **paused & pausedOn**: Indicates if the stream is paused and the timestamp related to that status.
- **stopped & stoppedOn**: Indicates if the stream has stopped; currently not stopped.
- **streamId, channel**: Identifiers and channel name.
- **category & categoryId**: The main category of the stream and its identifier.
- **subCategory & subCategoryId**: Detailed categories for further classification.
- **scheduleDate & scheduleTime**: When the stream was scheduled to start.
- **streamHours**: Duration of the stream in hours.
- **coverPhotoUrl**: URL to the cover image of the stream.
- **providerPlaybackUrl**: URL for playback provided by the service, currently empty.
- **voteTokenQuantity**: Number of tokens for voting.
- **votingTimeReset**: Duration for resetting the voting time.
- **voteButtonQuantity & voteButtonText**: Specifies the number of voting buttons and their labels.
- **isRewardsEnabled**: Indicates if rewards are active for the stream.
- **isTournamentEnabled**: Indicates if a tournament is associated with the stream.
- **tournamentButtonText**: Labels for the tournament interaction.
- **streamLocatorName, streamAssetName**: Names for searchability or reference.
- **platformVideoIds**: A structure that holds various potential output platform IDs; all currently set to `false`, indicating no associations.
- **platformEventIds**: A similar structure for event IDs on different platforms, all set to `false`.
- **primaryCameraName, primaryMicrophoneName, primarySpeakerName**: Details of the primary equipment used for the stream.
- **additionalCameras**: A list of additional cameras and microphones that may be used during the stream.
- **createdDate, createdTime, updatedDate, updatedTime**: Timelines for creating and updating stream details, included for auditing purposes.

This endpoint handles the deletion of a live stream from Instagram Live, utilizing these various parameters to facilitate connection and management.

request.description:
### Description of Data for the Endpoint "Video - Connect - Create - Kakao TV"

#### Request
- **Method**: Specifies the type of request being made. In this case, it is a POST request, meaning data is being sent to the server to create a new resource.
  
- **URL**: This is the endpoint where the request is sent. It points to `http://localhost:3000/api/video/connect/create`.

- **Headers**: Contains meta-information about the request.
  - **Content-Type**: Indicates the media type of the resource being sent, which is set to `application/json` to specify that the request body contains JSON data.

#### Body
The body of the request contains two main sections: `options` and `stream`.

##### Options
- **providerName**: Name of the streaming provider, set to `kakaotv`.
- **providerId**: Identifier for the provider, currently left empty.
- **apiKey**: Key for API access, currently set to null.
- **apiSecret**: Secret for API access, currently set to null.
- **apiClientId**: Identifier for API client, currently set to null.
- **authToken**: Token for authentication, currently set to null.
- **server**: Server information, currently set to null.
- **rtmpUrl**: URL for RTMP streaming, currently set to null.
- **streamKey**: Unique key for the stream, currently set to null.
- **channelUrl**: URL for the channel, currently set to null.
- **authUsername**: Username for authentication, currently set to null.
- **authPassword**: Password for authentication, currently set to null.
- **uniqueKey**: A unique key for the video, set to `uniqueKey`.
- **videoId**: Identifier for the video, set to `videoId`.
- **accountId**: Identifier for the account, set to `accountId`.
- **channelId**: Identifier for the channel, set to `channelId`.
- **sessionId**: Identifier for the session, set to `sessionId`.
- **streamId**: Identifier for the stream, set to `streamId`.
- **ipAddress**: IP address of the user, currently set to null.
- **country**: Country of the user, set to "United States".
- **state**: State of the user, set to "California".
- **title**: Title of the video, set to "Fortune's Basketball Challenge".
- **description**: Description of the video, set to "Basketball game featuring amazing plays and challenges.".
- **tags**: Tags associated with the video, set to "basketball,game,challenge".

##### Stream
- **streamId**: Identifier for the stream, set to `streamId`.
- **streamName**: Name of the stream, set to "live-video-stream-7164b12d-1708817130231".
- **uniqueKey**: A unique key for the stream, set to `uniqueKey`.
- **videoId**: Identifier for the associated video, set to `videoId`.
- **accountId**: Identifier for the account, set to `accountId`.
- **channelId**: Identifier for the channel, set to `channelId`.
- **sessionId**: Identifier for the session, set to `sessionId`.
- **videoStatus**: Current status of the video, set to "notready".
- **providerName**: Name of the streaming provider, set to "cloudflare".
- **providerUniqueId**: Unique identifier from the provider, set to `c3b3f93b0a7594f3db917d5f9a671351`.
- **providerPlaybackUrl**: URL for playback from the provider, currently empty.
- **providerStreamId**: Unique identifier for the stream from the provider, set to `c3b3f93b0a7594f3db917d5f9a671351`.
- **providerStreamKey**: Stream key for the provider, set to `e0bb5fa14f7059bccfcef40d5dbe2283kc3b3f93b0a7594f3db917d5f9a671351`.
- **providerStreamUrl**: Stream URL from the provider, set to "srt://live.cloudflare.com:778".

##### Provider Stream Data
- **result**: Contains information related to the stream.
  - **uid**: Unique identifier for the user.
  - **rtmps**: RTMPS streaming details, including URL and stream key.
  - **rtmpsPlayback**: RTMPS playback details, including URL and stream key.
  - **srt**: SRT streaming details, including URL, stream ID, and passphrase.
  - **srtPlayback**: SRT playback details, including URL, stream ID, and passphrase.
  - **webRTC**: WebRTC streaming URL.
  - **webRTCPlayback**: WebRTC playback URL.
  - **created**: Timestamp of stream creation.
  - **modified**: Timestamp of the last modification.
  - **meta**: Metadata about the stream.
    - **accountId**: Identifier for the account.
    - **audioInputName**: Name of the audio input device.
    - **channelId**: Identifier for the channel.
    - **coverPhotoUrl**: URL for the cover photo.
    - **description**: Description of the stream.
    - **streamId**: Identifier of the stream.
    - **title**: Title of the stream.
    - **videoId**: Identifier for the video.
    - **videoInputName**: Name of the video input device.
  - **defaultCreator**: Identifier for the default creator of the stream.
  - **status**: Current status of the stream, currently null.
  - **recording**: Settings for recording the stream.
    - **mode**: Recording mode, set to "automatic".
    - **requireSignedURLs**: Indicates if signed URLs are needed, set to false.
    - **allowedOrigins**: Origins allowed for requests, currently null.
  - **deleteRecordingAfterDays**: Specifies if recordings are to be deleted after a certain period, currently null.

##### Stream Details
- **createdDate**: Date the stream was created, set to "2024-02-24".
- **createdTime**: Time the stream was created, set to "23:25:30".
- **updatedDate**: Date the stream was last updated, set to "2024-02-25".
- **updatedTime**: Time the stream was last updated, set to "01:14:26".
- **deletedDate**: Date the stream was deleted, currently null.
- **deletedTime**: Time the stream was deleted, currently null.
  
#### Details Section
This section provides further specifics about the stream.
- **accountId**: Identifier for the account, set to `accountId`.
- **sessionId**: Identifier for the session, set to `sessionId`.
- **channelId**: Identifier for the channel, set to `channelId`.
- **videoId**: Identifier for the video, set to `videoId`.
- **title**: Title of the stream, set to "Fortune's Basketball Challenge".
- **description**: Description of the stream, set to "Basketball game featuring amazing plays and challenges.".
- **tags**: Tags related to the stream, set to "basketball,game,challenge".
- **streamType**: Type of stream, set to "Live".
- **searchType**: Search category for the stream, set to "Game".
- **started**: Indicates if the stream has started, set to true.
- **startedOn**: Timestamp when the stream started.
- **paused**: Indicates if the stream is currently paused, set to false.
- **pausedOn**: Timestamp when the stream was paused.
- **stopped**: Indicates if the stream is stopped, set to false.
- **stoppedOn**: Timestamp when the stream was stopped, currently null.
- **streamId**: Identifier for the stream.
- **channel**: Name of the channel, set to "Fortune's Basketball Channel".
- **category**: Main category for the stream, set to "Board".
- **categoryId**: Identifier for the main category, set to `categoryId`.
- **subCategory**: Sub-category for the stream, set to "Outdoor Party".
- **subCategoryId**: Identifier for the sub-category, set to `subCategoryId`.
- **scheduleDate**: Date when the stream is scheduled, set to "2024-02-01".
- **scheduleTime**: Time when the stream is scheduled, set to "18:00:00".
- **streamHours**: Duration of the stream, set to 1 hour.
- **coverPhotoUrl**: URL for the cover photo of the stream.
- **providerPlaybackUrl**: Playback URL from the provider, currently empty.
- **voteTokenQuantity**: Number of tokens available for voting, set to 100.
- **votingTimeReset**: Time in seconds to reset voting, set to "5".
- **voteButtonQuantity**: Number of vote buttons available, set to 4.
- **voteButtonText1**: Text for the first vote button, set to "Layup".
- **voteButtonText2**: Text for the second vote button, set to "Dunk".
- **isRewardsEnabled**: Indicates if rewards are enabled, set to false.
- **isTournamentEnabled**: Indicates if tournaments are enabled, set to true.
- **tournamentButtonText1**: Text for the first tournament button, set to "Hit".
- **tournamentButtonText2**: Text for the second tournament button, set to "Miss".
- **streamLocatorName**: Name used to locate the stream, set to "basketball-locator-name".
- **streamAssetName**: Name of the asset associated with the stream, set to "basketball-asset-name".
- **platformVideoIds**: Object containing output IDs for various platforms, all currently set to false.
- **platformEventIds**: Object containing event IDs for various platforms, all currently set to false.
- **primaryCameraName**: Name of the primary camera being used, set to "Sony 4K Ultra HD WebCam".
- **primaryMicrophoneName**: Name of the primary microphone being used, set to "WirelessAudioTek Device".
- **primarySpeakerName**: Name of the primary speaker being used, set to "Bose-Mega-Speaker 2.0".
- **additionalCameras**: Array of additional cameras and microphones available.
- **createdDate**: Date the details were created, set to "2024-02-18".
- **createdTime**: Time the details were created, set to "14:54:25".
- **updatedDate**: Date the details were last updated, set to "2024-02-24".
- **updatedTime**: Time the details were last updated, set to "23:29:19".
- **deletedDate**: Date the details were deleted, currently null.
- **deletedTime**: Time the details were deleted, currently null.

request.description:
## Endpoint Description: Video - Connect - Delete - Kakao TV

### Request Method
- **Method**: POST  
  This indicates that this request will be sending data to the server to perform an action, specifically to delete a video connection.

### URL
- **URL**: `http://localhost:3000/api/video/connect/delete`  
  This is the endpoint where the API request will be sent to delete a video connection.

### Headers
- **Content-Type**: `application/json`  
  This specifies the format of the data being sent in the request body, which is JSON in this case.

### Request Body
The body of the request is divided into two main sections: `options` and `stream`, along with a `details` section.

#### Options
- **providerName**: `kakaotv`  
  The name of the video streaming provider being used.
  
- **providerId**: `""`  
  Identifier for the provider, typically used for API authentication or to identify the provider.

- **apiKey**: `null`  
  The API key used for authentication with the provider's services. Currently not provided.

- **apiSecret**: `null`  
  A secret key used alongside the API key for enhanced security. Currently not provided.

- **apiClientId**: `null`  
  Client identifier for the API, not provided in the request.

- **authToken**: `null`  
  The token used for user authentication with the provider, not provided currently.

- **server**: `null`  
  Server information is currently not provided.

- **rtmpUrl**: `null`  
  The Real-Time Messaging Protocol URL for streaming, not provided.

- **streamKey**: `null`  
  Key used for streaming data, currently not specified.

- **channelUrl**: `null`  
  URL of the channel associated with the video connection, currently not specified.

- **authUsername**: `null`  
  Username for authentication, currently not provided.

- **authPassword**: `null`  
  Password for authentication, currently not provided.

- **uniqueKey**: `uniqueKey`  
  A unique identifier for the stream or connection being deleted.

- **videoId**: `videoId`  
  The ID of the video that is being targeted for deletion.

- **accountId**: `accountId`  
  Identifier for the user account associated with the video.

- **channelId**: `channelId`  
  Identifier for the channel associated with the video.

- **sessionId**: `sessionId`  
  Identifier for the current session of the video.

- **streamId**: `streamId`  
  The ID of the stream associated with the video connection.

- **ipAddress**: `null`  
  IP address information is not provided.

- **country**: `United States`  
  The country associated with the video stream.

- **state**: `California`  
  The state associated with the video stream.

- **title**: `Fortune's Basketball Challenge`  
  Title of the video being deleted.

- **description**: `Basketball game featuring amazing plays and challenges.`  
  A brief description of the video content.

- **tags**: `basketball,game,challenge`  
  Tags associated with the video for categorization.

#### Stream
- **streamId**: `streamId`  
  The streaming ID associated with the video.

- **streamName**: `live-video-stream-7164b12d-1708817130231`  
  Name of the live video stream.

- **uniqueKey**: `uniqueKey`  
  Unique identifier for this streaming instance.

- **videoId**: `videoId`  
  The ID of the video associated with this stream.

- **accountId**: `accountId`  
  The account identifier of the user associated with the stream.

- **channelId**: `channelId`  
  The ID of the channel that the stream belongs to.

- **sessionId**: `sessionId`  
  The session identifier associated with the video stream.

- **videoStatus**: `notready`  
  Indicates the current status of the video (not ready to be viewed).

- **providerName**: `cloudflare`  
  The name of the service provider handling the video stream.

- **providerUniqueId**: `c3b3f93b0a7594f3db917d5f9a671351`  
  A unique identifier used by the provider for the stream.

- **providerPlaybackUrl**: `""`  
  URL for playback, currently not provided.

- **providerStreamId**: `c3b3f93b0a7594f3db917d5f9a671351`  
  Stream ID as recognized by the provider.

- **providerStreamKey**: `e0bb5fa14f7059bccfcef40d5dbe2283kc3b3f93b0a7594f3db917d5f9a671351`  
  Key used for accessing the stream on the provider's platform.

- **providerStreamUrl**: `srt://live.cloudflare.com:778`  
  URL for accessing the stream over SRT (Secure Reliable Transport).

- **providerStreamData**: Contains detailed information about the stream such as URLs for different streaming protocols (RTMPS, SRT, WebRTC) along with uid, created and modified timestamps, and other metadata.

- **createdDate**: `2024-02-24`  
  The date when the stream was created.

- **createdTime**: `23:25:30`  
  The time when the stream was created.

- **updatedDate**: `2024-02-25`  
  The date when the stream was last updated.

- **updatedTime**: `01:14:26`  
  The time when the stream was last updated.

- **deletedDate**: `null`  
  The date when the stream was deleted, currently not applicable.

- **deletedTime**: `null`  
  The time when the stream was deleted, currently not applicable.

#### Details
- **accountId**: `accountId`  
  The account identifier related to the video.

- **sessionId**: `sessionId`  
  The session identifier associated with this video.

- **channelId**: `channelId`  
  The channel identifier associated with this video.

- **videoId**: `videoId`  
  The ID of the video.

- **title**: `Fortune's Basketball Challenge`  
  Title of the video.

- **description**: `Basketball game featuring amazing plays and challenges.`  
  Description detailing the content of the video.

- **tags**: `basketball,game,challenge`  
  Tags associated with the video for better discoverability.

- **streamType**: `Live`  
  Type of the stream, indicating that it is live.

- **searchType**: `Game`  
  The type of content under which the video will be categorized.

- **started**: `true`  
  Indicates that the video stream has started.

- **startedOn**: `2024-02-24T22:41:42.483Z`  
  Timestamp indicating when the stream started.

- **paused**: `false`  
  Indicates that the stream is currently not paused.

- **pausedOn**: `2024-02-24T22:41:42.483Z`  
  Timestamp of when the stream was paused, if applicable.

- **stopped**: `false`  
  Indicates that the stream is currently not stopped.

- **stoppedOn**: `null`  
  Timestamp of when the stream was stopped, currently not applicable.

- **streamId**: `streamId`  
  ID of the stream.

- **channel**: `Fortune's Basketball Channel`  
  Name of the channel broadcasting the video.

- **category**: `Board`  
  Category under which the video falls.

- **categoryId**: `categoryId`  
  Identifier for the category of the video.

- **subCategory**: `Outdoor Party`  
  Sub-category under which the video is categorized.

- **subCategoryId**: `subCategoryId`  
  Identifier for the sub-category of the video.

- **scheduleDate**: `2024-02-01`  
  The date the stream is scheduled for, if applicable.

- **scheduleTime**: `18:00:00`  
  The time the stream is scheduled for, if applicable.

- **streamHours**: `1`  
  Duration for which the stream is expected to last (1 hour).

- **coverPhotoUrl**: `basketball-cover-url.jpg`  
  URL of the cover photo for the stream or video.

- **providerPlaybackUrl**: `""`  
  Playback URL provided by the streaming service, currently not available.

- **voteTokenQuantity**: `100`  
  Indicates the number of tokens available for voting during the stream.

- **votingTimeReset**: `5`  
  Reset time for voting in minutes.

- **voteButtonQuantity**: `4`  
  Total count of voting buttons available.

- **voteButtonText1**: `Layup`  
  Text displayed for the first voting button.

- **voteButtonText2**: `Dunk`  
  Text displayed for the second voting button.

- **isRewardsEnabled**: `false`  
  Indicates whether rewards are enabled for the stream.

- **isTournamentEnabled**: `true`  
  Indicates whether tournament features are enabled for the stream.

- **tournamentButtonText1**: `Hit`  
  Text for the first button in the tournament voting.

- **tournamentButtonText2**: `Miss`  
  Text for the second button in the tournament voting.

- **streamLocatorName**: `basketball-locator-name`  
  Name assigned to the stream locator.

- **streamAssetName**: `basketball-asset-name`  
  Name assigned to the stream asset.

- **platformVideoIds**: Contains IDs for various other platforms (e.g., YouTube, Twitch) for the video, all currently set to false indicating no IDs are assigned.

- **platformEventIds**: Contains identifiers for events on various platforms, all currently set to false indicating no IDs are assigned.

- **primaryCameraName**: `Sony 4K Ultra HD WebCam`  
  Name of the primary camera used for the video stream.

- **primaryMicrophoneName**: `WirelessAudioTek Device`  
  Name of the primary microphone used for audio capture.

- **primarySpeakerName**: `Bose-Mega-Speaker 2.0`  
  Name of the primary speaker being used for sound output.

- **additionalCameras**: List of additional cameras with their respective microphones that can be used for the stream.

- **createdDate**: `2024-02-18`  
  The date on which the video details were created.

- **createdTime**: `14:54:25`  
  The time at which the video details were created.

- **updatedDate**: `2024-02-24`  
  The date on which the video details were last updated.

- **updatedTime**: `23:29:19`  
  The time at which the video details were last updated.

- **deletedDate**: `null`  
  The date when the video details were deleted, currently not applicable.

- **deletedTime**: `null`  
  The time when the video details were deleted, currently not applicable.
