request.description:
### Endpoint Description: Video - Connect - Create - Kick Live

#### Request Method and URL
- **Method:** POST
- **URL:** `http://localhost:3000/api/video/connect/create`

#### Headers
- **Content-Type:** Specifies that the request body is in JSON format.

#### Request Body
The body of the request contains two main sections: `options` and `stream`, each consisting of various key-value pairs.

##### Options Section
- **providerName:** Name of the video provider (e.g., "kicklive").
- **providerId:** Unique identifier for the provider (can be left blank).
- **apiKey:** Key to authenticate requests to the provider API (can be null).
- **apiSecret:** Secret key for authenticating the provider (can be null).
- **apiClientId:** Client ID for the API (can be null).
- **authToken:** Token for authentication (can be null).
- **server:** Server details for connecting (can be null).
- **rtmpUrl:** RTMP URL for streaming (can be null).
- **streamKey:** Key used to identify the stream (can be null).
- **channelUrl:** URL of the channel (can be null).
- **authUsername:** Username for authentication (can be null).
- **authPassword:** Password for authentication (can be null).
- **uniqueKey:** A unique string for each stream/session.
- **videoId:** Identifier for the video being streamed.
- **accountId:** Account identifier associated with the video stream.
- **channelId:** Unique ID for the channel.
- **sessionId:** ID of the session for this stream.
- **streamId:** Unique ID for the stream.
- **ipAddress:** IP address of the user (can be null).
- **country:** The country from which the request is made (e.g., "United States").
- **state:** The state from which the request originates (e.g., "California").
- **title:** Title of the video stream (e.g., "Fortune's Basketball Challenge").
- **description:** Short description of the content (e.g., "Basketball game featuring amazing plays and challenges.").
- **tags:** Tags associated with the stream (e.g., "basketball,game,challenge").

##### Stream Section
- **streamId:** Unique identifier for the stream.
- **streamName:** Name used to identify the stream.
- **uniqueKey:** Same unique string as in options.
- **videoId:** Same as in options.
- **accountId:** Same as in options.
- **channelId:** Same as in options.
- **sessionId:** Same as in options.
- **videoStatus:** Current status of the video (e.g., "notready").
- **providerName:** Name of the video provider (e.g., "cloudflare").
- **providerUniqueId:** Unique ID assigned by the provider.
- **providerPlaybackUrl:** URL for playback (can be blank).
- **providerStreamId:** ID provided by the streaming provider.
- **providerStreamKey:** Key used to access the provider's stream.
- **providerStreamUrl:** URL for accessing the stream.
- **providerStreamData:** Object containing detailed data returned from the provider, including URLs for different streaming protocols, meta information, and recording settings.
- **success:** Indicates if the request was successful.
- **errors:** List of errors encountered during the request (if any).
- **messages:** Array of messages regarding the stream creation.

##### Created and Updated Information
- **createdDate:** Date when the stream was created (formatted as YYYY-MM-DD).
- **createdTime:** Time when the stream was created.
- **updatedDate:** Date when the stream was last updated.
- **updatedTime:** Time when the stream was last updated.
- **deletedDate:** Date of deletion (if applicable; otherwise null).
- **deletedTime:** Time of deletion (if applicable; otherwise null).

##### Details Section
- **accountId:** Same as above, providing the account reference.
- **sessionId:** Same as above for the session.
- **channelId:** Same as above for the channel.
- **videoId:** Same as above for the video.
- **title:** Same as above for the stream title.
- **description:** Same description as in options.
- **tags:** Same tags as in options.
- **streamType:** Type of stream (e.g., "Live").
- **searchType:** The type used for searching the stream (e.g., "Game").
- **started:** Boolean indicating if the stream has started.
- **startedOn:** Timestamp of when the stream started.
- **paused:** Indicates whether the stream is currently paused.
- **pausedOn:** Timestamp of when the stream was paused.
- **stopped:** Indicates whether the stream is currently stopped.
- **stoppedOn:** Timestamp of when the stream was stopped (if applicable; otherwise null).
- **streamId:** Same as above for the stream ID.
- **channel:** The name of the channel (e.g., "Fortune's Basketball Channel").
- **category:** General category of the stream (e.g., "Board").
- **categoryId:** Identifier for the category.
- **subCategory:** More specific category of the stream (e.g., "Outdoor Party").
- **subCategoryId:** Identifier for the subcategory.
- **scheduleDate:** Date when the stream is scheduled to take place.
- **scheduleTime:** Time when the stream is scheduled to begin.
- **streamHours:** Duration of the stream in hours.
- **coverPhotoUrl:** URL of the cover photo for the stream.
- **providerPlaybackUrl:** URL for playback provided by the provider (can be blank).
- **voteTokenQuantity:** Number of tokens allocated for voting (if applicable).
- **votingTimeReset:** Time reset for votes (if applicable).
- **voteButtonQuantity:** Number of buttons available for voting.
- **voteButtonText1:** Text for the first voting button.
- **voteButtonText2:** Text for the second voting button.
- **isRewardsEnabled:** Boolean indicating if rewards are enabled for the stream.
- **isTournamentEnabled:** Boolean indicating if a tournament is enabled for the stream.
- **tournamentButtonText1:** Text for the first tournament button.
- **tournamentButtonText2:** Text for the second tournament button.
- **streamLocatorName:** Name used for locating the stream.
- **streamAssetName:** Asset name related to the stream.
- **platformVideoIds:** Object with potential IDs for various streaming platforms (all set to false indicating no IDs are present).
- **platformEventIds:** Similar object for event IDs across various platforms (also set to false).
- **primaryCameraName:** Name of the primary camera used for the stream.
- **primaryMicrophoneName:** Name of the primary microphone used.
- **primarySpeakerName:** Name of the primary speaker used for audio output.
- **additionalCameras:** Array of objects listing additional cameras and microphones being used.
- **createdDate:** Date when the details were created.
- **createdTime:** Time when the details were created.
- **updatedDate:** Date when the details were last updated.
- **updatedTime:** Time when the details were last updated.
- **deletedDate:** Date of deletion for the details (if applicable; otherwise null).
- **deletedTime:** Time of deletion for the details (if applicable; otherwise null).

request.description:
### Description of Data for "Video - Connect - Update - Kick Live" Endpoint

1. **name**: 
   - This indicates the name of the API request. Here, it is labeled "Video - Connect - Update - Kick Live."

2. **request**:
   - **method**: Specifies the HTTP method used for the request. In this case, it is a `PUT` request, which typically updates existing resources.
   
   - **url**: The endpoint where the request is sent to. Here, it points to `http://localhost:3000/api/video/connect/update`, indicating a local server address.
   
   - **headers**:
     - Contains key-value pairs for request headers. Here, `Content-Type` is set to `application/json`, informing the server that the request body contains JSON data.

   - **body**:
     - **mode**: Specifies the format of the body. It is set to `raw`, indicating the body is in raw text format.
     
     - **raw**: Contains the actual data sent in the request body in JSON format. It includes:
       - **options**: 
         - **providerName**: Name of the video streaming provider, set to "kicklive."
         - **providerId**: Identifier for the provider, currently empty.
         - **apiKey**, **apiSecret**, **apiClientId**, **authToken**, **server**, **rtmpUrl**, **streamKey**, **channelUrl**, **authUsername**, **authPassword**: Various credentials and connection details, most of which are currently set to null or empty.
         - **uniqueKey**: A unique identifier for the video stream, specified as "uniqueKey."
         - **videoId**: Identifier for the specific video, noted as "videoId."
         - **accountId**: Identifier for the user account associated with the video, labeled "accountId."
         - **channelId**: Identifier for the video channel, given as "channelId."
         - **sessionId**: Identifier for the current session, marked as "sessionId."
         - **streamId**: Identifier for the stream, noted as "streamId."
         - **ipAddress**: The IP address is currently set to null.
         - **country**: Country of origin, here listed as "United States."
         - **state**: State, specified as "California."
         - **title**: Title of the video, which is "Fortune's Basketball Challenge."
         - **description**: A brief description of the video content, describing it as "Basketball game featuring amazing plays and challenges."
         - **tags**: Tags associated with the video for search and categorization, given as "basketball,game,challenge."

     - **stream**: Contains information about the live stream.
       - **streamId**: ID for the stream, noted as "streamId."
       - **streamName**: Name of the stream, provided as a generated string.
       - **uniqueKey**, **videoId**, **accountId**, **channelId**, **sessionId**: Repeated identifiers similar to the options above.
       - **videoStatus**: Status of the video stream, set to "notready."
       - **providerName**: Specifies the streaming provider, indicated as "cloudflare."
       - **providerUniqueId**, **providerPlaybackUrl**, **providerStreamId**, **providerStreamKey**, **providerStreamUrl**: Additional identifiers and URLs related to the cloudflare provider. 
       - **providerStreamData**: Contains detailed information about the stream, including URL connections for RTMPS, SRT, and WebRTC, as well as meta information and recording options.
       - **success**: Indicates whether the operation was successful, set to true.
       - **errors**, **messages**: Lists any errors or messages, both currently empty.
       - **createdDate**, **createdTime**, **updatedDate**, **updatedTime**, **deletedDate**, **deletedTime**: Timestamps for when the stream was created and updated. 

     - **details**: Provides additional details about the video.
       - Includes identifiers (accountId, sessionId, channelId, videoId), title, description, tags, stream type, category, scheduling data, interaction elements (like voting), and audio/video equipment used.
       - Additional attributes like `primaryCameraName`, `primaryMicrophoneName`, `streamLocatorName`, `platformVideoIds`, `platformEventIds`, and timestamps are included for thorough metadata management.

Overall, this endpoint is designed to update the details and configurations related to a live video stream within the "Kick Live" platform, encompassing provider information, stream settings, and detailed video metadata.

request.description:
### Description of Each Data in the "Video - Connect - Delete - Kick Live" Endpoint

**Endpoint Overview**:
This endpoint is designed to delete a video connection associated with the platform provider "kicklive". 

#### Request Details:
- **Method**: `POST`  
  This indicates the action of submitting data to the server to perform a delete operation.

- **URL**: `http://localhost:3000/api/video/connect/delete`  
  The endpoint for making the request to delete the video connection.

#### Headers:
- **Content-Type**: `application/json`  
  Specifies that the body of the request is in JSON format.

#### Body:
1. **options**: This object contains configuration options for the API request.
   - **providerName**: Name of the video streaming provider. Here, it is set to "kicklive".
   - **providerId**: Identifier for the provider; currently an empty string.
   - **apiKey**: API key for authentication; it is set as null, indicating it is not required or provided.
   - **apiSecret**: Secret key for the API, also set as null.
   - **apiClientId**: Client ID for the API; set as null.
   - **authToken**: Token for authentication; set as null.
   - **server**: Server information is not specified (null).
   - **rtmpUrl**: Real-Time Messaging Protocol URL; currently not specified (null).
   - **streamKey**: Identifier for streaming; set as null.
   - **channelUrl**: URL of the channel; specified as null.
   - **authUsername**: Username for authentication; currently null.
   - **authPassword**: Password for authentication; currently null.
   - **uniqueKey**: A unique identifier for the video connection.
   - **videoId**: Identifier for the video to be deleted.
   - **accountId**: Identifier for the user account associated with the video.
   - **channelId**: Identifier for the channel hosting the video.
   - **sessionId**: Identifier for the session during which the video was streamed.
   - **streamId**: Identifier for the stream associated with the video.
   - **ipAddress**: The IP address of the requester; currently not specified (null).
   - **country**: The country where the stream is associated; set to "United States".
   - **state**: The state where the stream is associated; set to "California".
   - **title**: The title of the video, which is "Fortune's Basketball Challenge".
   - **description**: A brief description of the video content, i.e., "Basketball game featuring amazing plays and challenges."
   - **tags**: Keywords associated with the video, here specified as "basketball, game, challenge".

2. **stream**: This object contains details regarding the specific stream.
   - **streamId**: Identifier for the stream.
   - **streamName**: Name of the stream, e.g., "live-video-stream-7164b12d-1708817130231".
   - **uniqueKey**: Repeats the unique identifier for the video.
   - **videoId**: Reiterates the identifier for the video.
   - **accountId**: Reiterates the account ID associated with the video.
   - **channelId**: Reiterates the channel ID.
   - **sessionId**: Reiterates the session ID.
   - **videoStatus**: Current status of the video, here it indicates "notready".
   - **providerName**: Indicates the provider's name as "cloudflare".
   - **providerUniqueId**: Unique identifier for the provider.
   - **providerPlaybackUrl**: URL for playback which is empty.
   - **providerStreamId**: Identifier for the provider stream.
   - **providerStreamKey**: Key used for the provider stream.
   - **providerStreamUrl**: URL for the provider stream.
   - **providerStreamData**: Contains detailed provider data including:
     - Streaming-related URLs and keys for various protocols like RTMPS and SRT.
     - Metadata related to the stream including creation and modification times.
     - Detailed settings including recording options and default creator.
   - **success**: Indicates whether the request was successful; true in this case.
   - **errors**: An empty array signifying no errors occurred during the request.
   - **messages**: An empty array signifying no additional messages were returned.

3. **createdDate**: Date when the stream was created.
4. **createdTime**: Time when the stream was created.
5. **updatedDate**: Date when the stream was last updated.
6. **updatedTime**: Time of the last update to the stream.
7. **deletedDate**: Date when the stream was deleted; currently set as null.
8. **deletedTime**: Time when the stream was deleted; currently set as null.

4. **details**: This object contains comprehensive details about the video stream.
   - **accountId**: Identifier for the account owning the video.
   - **sessionId**: Identifier for the streaming session.
   - **channelId**: Identifier for the channel.
   - **videoId**: Identifier for the video.
   - **title**: Title of the video, "Fortune's Basketball Challenge".
   - **description**: Description of the video content.
   - **tags**: Tags associated with the video.
   - **streamType**: Type of the stream (Live).
   - **searchType**: Indicates the nature of content, categorized as "Game".
   - **started**: Boolean indicating if the stream has started; true.
   - **startedOn**: Timestamp of when the stream started.
   - **paused**: Boolean indicating if the stream is paused; false.
   - **pausedOn**: Timestamp of when the stream was paused.
   - **stopped**: Boolean indicating if the stream is stopped; false.
   - **stoppedOn**: Timestamp of when the stream was stopped; currently null.
   - **streamId**: Identifier for the stream.
   - **channel**: Name of the channel hosting the video.
   - **category**: Broad category under which the stream falls, i.e., "Board".
   - **categoryId**: Identifier for the category.
   - **subCategory**: More specific category; here it is "Outdoor Party".
   - **subCategoryId**: Identifier for the sub-category.
   - **scheduleDate**: Date the video is scheduled for.
   - **scheduleTime**: Time the video is scheduled for.
   - **streamHours**: Duration of the stream in hours.
   - **coverPhotoUrl**: URL for the cover photo of the stream.
   - **providerPlaybackUrl**: URL for playback provided by the provider; currently empty.
   - **voteTokenQuantity**: Number of voting tokens available for viewers.
   - **votingTimeReset**: Time re-set for voting.
   - **voteButtonQuantity**: Number of voting buttons available.
   - **voteButtonText1**: Text for the first voting button.
   - **voteButtonText2**: Text for the second voting button.
   - **isRewardsEnabled**: Boolean indicating if rewards are enabled; false.
   - **isTournamentEnabled**: Boolean indicating if the tournament feature is enabled; true.
   - **tournamentButtonText1**: Text for the first tournament button.
   - **tournamentButtonText2**: Text for the second tournament button.
   - **streamLocatorName**: Name used for locating the stream.
   - **streamAssetName**: Name for the assets associated with the stream.
   - **platformVideoIds**: Object containing identifiers for various social media platforms, all set to false indicating no ID is assigned.
   - **platformEventIds**: Object containing identifiers for various event IDs across platforms, also set to false.
   - **primaryCameraName**: Name of the primary camera used for streaming.
   - **primaryMicrophoneName**: Name of the primary microphone used for audio input.
   - **primarySpeakerName**: Name of the primary speaker used for audio output.
   - **additionalCameras**: Array containing additional camera and microphone combinations.
   - **createdDate**: Date the stream details were created.
   - **createdTime**: Time the stream details were created.
   - **updatedDate**: Date when the stream details were last updated.
   - **updatedTime**: Time of the last update. 

This detailed description provides a comprehensive overview of the data contained within this request, ensuring that users understand how to interact with the endpoint effectively.

request.description:
### Video - Connect - Create - Linkedin Live API Endpoint Description

#### Request
- **Method**: POST  
  This API endpoint uses the POST method to create a new video connection for LinkedIn Live streaming.

- **URL**: `http://localhost:3000/api/video/connect/create`  
  This is the local URL for the API call to create the video connection.

- **Headers**:  
  - **Content-Type**: `application/json`  
    Specifies that the request body format will be JSON.

#### Body
The body of the request contains two main sections: `options` and `stream`.

##### Options
1. **providerName**: `linkedinlive`  
   The name of the provider for the streaming service, in this case, LinkedIn Live.

2. **providerId**: (empty string)  
   An optional identifier for the provider.

3. **apiKey**: (null)  
   The API key for authentication; currently not specified.

4. **apiSecret**: (null)  
   The API secret for added security; currently not provided.

5. **apiClientId**: (null)  
   The client ID for the API; not provided.

6. **authToken**: (null)  
   Token used for authentication; currently not provided.

7. **server**: (null)  
   Server information, not specified.

8. **rtmpUrl**: (null)  
   The RTMP URL for streaming; not specified.

9. **streamKey**: (null)  
   The key for streaming; currently not provided.

10. **channelUrl**: (null)  
    The URL for the channel; not specified.

11. **authUsername**: (null)  
    Authentication username; not specified.

12. **authPassword**: (null)  
    Authentication password; not provided.

13. **uniqueKey**: `uniqueKey`  
    A unique identifier for the stream.

14. **videoId**: `videoId`  
    Identifier for the video being streamed.

15. **accountId**: `accountId`  
    Identifier for the account associated with the stream.

16. **channelId**: `channelId`  
    Identifier for the channel where the stream is hosted.

17. **sessionId**: `sessionId`  
    Identifier for the streaming session.

18. **streamId**: `streamId`  
    Identifier for the specific stream.

19. **ipAddress**: (null)  
    IP address of the streaming source, not specified.

20. **country**: `United States`  
    The country where the streaming is initiated.

21. **state**: `California`  
    The state where the streaming is initiated.

22. **title**: `Fortune's Basketball Challenge`  
    The title of the video being streamed.

23. **description**: `Basketball game featuring amazing plays and challenges.`  
    A brief overview of what the video is about.

24. **tags**: `basketball,game,challenge`  
    Tags associated with the video for better categorization.

##### Stream
1. **streamId**: `streamId`  
   Identifies the specific stream.

2. **streamName**: `live-video-stream-7164b12d-1708817130231`  
   The name of the video stream.

3. **uniqueKey**: `uniqueKey`  
   A unique identifier for the stream, similar to the one in options.

4. **videoId**: `videoId`  
   The identifier linking to the video content.

5. **accountId**: `accountId`  
   The identifier for the associated account.

6. **channelId**: `channelId`  
   Identifies the channel of the stream.

7. **sessionId**: `sessionId`  
   Links to the specific streaming session.

8. **videoStatus**: `notready`  
   Indicates that the video is not yet ready to stream.

9. **providerName**: `cloudflare`  
   Identifies Cloudflare as the streaming provider.

10. **providerUniqueId**: `c3b3f93b0a7594f3db917d5f9a671351`  
    A unique identifier for the provider.

11. **providerPlaybackUrl**: (empty string)  
    URL for playback, not specified.

12. **providerStreamId**: `c3b3f93b0a7594f3db917d5f9a671351`  
    The unique identifier for the stream from the provider.

13. **providerStreamKey**: `e0bb5fa14f7059bccfcef40d5dbe2283kc3b3f93b0a7594f3db917d5f9a671351`  
    The stream key provided by the streaming service.

14. **providerStreamUrl**: `srt://live.cloudflare.com:778`  
    The URL used for the stream.

15. **providerStreamData**:  
    Contains detailed connection data and protocols used by the provider such as RTMP, SRT, and WebRTC.

16. **success**: `true`  
    Indicates whether the operation was successful.

17. **errors**: (empty array)  
    Lists any errors from the operation; none present.

18. **messages**: (empty array)  
    Additional messages or notifications; none present.

19. **createdDate**: `2024-02-24`  
    The date when the stream was created.

20. **createdTime**: `23:25:30`  
    The time at which the stream was created.

21. **updatedDate**: `2024-02-25`  
    The date of the last update to the stream.

22. **updatedTime**: `01:14:26`  
    The time of the last stream update.

23. **deletedDate**: (null)  
    Indicates if the stream has been deleted; no deletion recorded.

24. **deletedTime**: (null)  
    Time when the stream was deleted; none recorded. 

##### Details
1. **accountId**: `accountId`  
   Identifier for the account related to the stream.

2. **sessionId**: `sessionId`  
   The specific session for the stream.

3. **channelId**: `channelId`  
   Channel identifier linked to the stream.

4. **videoId**: `videoId`  
   Unique identifier for the video being streamed.

5. **title**: `Fortune's Basketball Challenge`  
   Title of the streamed content.

6. **description**: `Basketball game featuring amazing plays and challenges.`  
   Description detailing the content of the video.

7. **tags**: `basketball,game,challenge`  
   Tags for categorizing the video.

8. **streamType**: `Live`  
   Specifies that the stream is a live broadcast.

9. **searchType**: `Game`  
   Indicates the type of content being streamed.

10. **started**: `true`  
    Indicates if the stream has started.

11. **startedOn**: `2024-02-24T22:41:42.483Z`  
    Timestamp of when the stream started.

12. **paused**: `false`  
    Indicates if the stream is currently paused.

13. **pausedOn**: `2024-02-24T22:41:42.483Z`  
    Timestamp when the stream was paused; not paused currently.

14. **stopped**: `false`  
    Indicates if the stream has been stopped.

15. **stoppedOn**: (null)  
    Timestamp for when the stream was stopped; none present.

16. **streamId**: `streamId`  
    Identifies the specific stream.

17. **channel**: `Fortune's Basketball Channel`  
    The name of the channel broadcasting the stream.

18. **category**: `Board`  
    General category under which the stream falls.

19. **categoryId**: `categoryId`  
    Identifier for the category.

20. **subCategory**: `Outdoor Party`  
    More specific categorization for the stream.

21. **subCategoryId**: `subCategoryId`  
    Identifier for the subcategory.

22. **scheduleDate**: `2024-02-01`  
    The date the stream is scheduled for.

23. **scheduleTime**: `18:00:00`  
    The time the stream is scheduled to start.

24. **streamHours**: `1`  
    Total duration in hours planned for the live stream.

25. **coverPhotoUrl**: `basketball-cover-url.jpg`  
    URL to the cover photo for the stream.

26. **providerPlaybackUrl**: (empty string)  
    URL for playback from the provider; not specified.

27. **voteTokenQuantity**: `100`  
    Number of tokens available for voting during the stream.

28. **votingTimeReset**: `5`  
    Specifies the time reset duration for voting.

29. **voteButtonQuantity**: `4`  
    Number of vote buttons available for viewer interaction.

30. **voteButtonText1**: `Layup`  
    Text for the first voting button.

31. **voteButtonText2**: `Dunk`  
    Text for the second voting button.

32. **isRewardsEnabled**: `false`  
    Indicates whether rewards are enabled for the stream; currently not.

33. **isTournamentEnabled**: `true`  
    Indicates whether tournament features are enabled.

34. **tournamentButtonText1**: `Hit`  
    Text for the first tournament button.

35. **tournamentButtonText2**: `Miss`  
    Text for the second tournament button.

36. **streamLocatorName**: `basketball-locator-name`  
    Name used for locating the stream.

37. **streamAssetName**: `basketball-asset-name`  
    Name used for the streaming asset.

38. **platformVideoIds**: (object with IDs for various platforms)  
    Stores identifiers for output on different video platforms; currently all set to false.

39. **platformEventIds**: (object with IDs for various platform events)  
    Stores identifiers for events across various platforms; currently all set to false.

40. **primaryCameraName**: `Sony 4K Ultra HD WebCam`  
    Name of the primary camera used for streaming.

41. **primaryMicrophoneName**: `WirelessAudioTek Device`  
    The primary microphone used to capture audio.

42. **primarySpeakerName**: `Bose-Mega-Speaker 2.0`  
    The primary speaker hardware used for the stream.

43. **additionalCameras**: (array of additional camera and microphone combinations)  
    Lists additional cameras and microphones used in the stream setup.

44. **createdDate**: `2024-02-18`  
    Date when the streaming setup was created.

45. **createdTime**: `14:54:25`  
    Time when the streaming setup was created.

46. **updatedDate**: `2024-02-24`  
    The date when the stream information was last updated.

47. **updatedTime**: `23:29:19`  
    Time when the stream info was last updated.

48. **deletedDate**: (null)  
    Date when the stream might have been deleted; none recorded.

49. **deletedTime**: (null)  
    Time when the stream might have been deleted; none recorded.

request.description:
### Endpoint Description: `Video - Connect - Update - Linkedin Live`

#### Request Method
- **Method**: PUT
    - This is a HTTP PUT request, typically used for updating existing resources on the server.

#### Request URL
- **URL**: `http://localhost:3000/api/video/connect/update`
    - The endpoint to which the request is sent for updating video connection details.

#### Request Headers
- **Headers**: 
    - `Content-Type`: application/json
        - Indicates that the request body format is JSON.

#### Request Body Structure
The body of the request is a JSON object with two main keys: `options` and `stream`, which contain various data points for updating the video connection.

1. **Options**
   - `providerName`: The name of the video streaming provider (e.g., "linkedinlive").
   - `providerId`: A unique identifier for the provider (currently empty).
   - `apiKey`: The API key for authentication with the provider (currently null).
   - `apiSecret`: The secret for additional authentication (currently null).
   - `apiClientId`: A unique identifier for the client (currently null).
   - `authToken`: Token for authentication purposes (currently null).
   - `server`: The server address being used (currently null).
   - `rtmpUrl`: The URL for the RTMP stream (currently null).
   - `streamKey`: The key used to identify the stream (currently null).
   - `channelUrl`: The URL for the associated channel (currently null).
   - `authUsername`: Username for authentication (currently null).
   - `authPassword`: Password for authentication (currently null).
   - `uniqueKey`: A unique key for the video stream.
   - `videoId`: An identifier for the video related to the stream.
   - `accountId`: Identifier for the account linked to the video.
   - `channelId`: Identifier for the channel involved.
   - `sessionId`: Session identifier for the streaming session.
   - `streamId`: Identifier for the specific stream.
   - `ipAddress`: The IP address from which the request is made (currently null).
   - `country`: Country from which the stream originates (defaulting to "United States").
   - `state`: State from which the stream originates (defaulting to "California").
   - `title`: The title of the video ("Fortune's Basketball Challenge").
   - `description`: A description of the video content (e.g., "Basketball game featuring amazing plays and challenges.").
   - `tags`: Comma-separated tags associated with the video (e.g., "basketball,game,challenge").

2. **Stream**
   - `streamId`: Identifier for the stream.
   - `streamName`: The name assigned to the stream.
   - `uniqueKey`: Unique key associated with this stream session.
   - `videoId`: Identifier for the corresponding video.
   - `accountId`: Identifier for the associated account.
   - `channelId`: Identifier for the channel linked to the stream.
   - `sessionId`: Identifier for the streaming session.
   - `videoStatus`: Current status of the video (default is "notready").
   - `providerName`: Name of the streaming provider (e.g., "cloudflare").
   - `providerUniqueId`: Unique identifier for the streaming provider.
   - `providerPlaybackUrl`: URL for playback on the provider's platform (currently empty).
   - `providerStreamId`: Identifier for the stream on the provider's system.
   - `providerStreamKey`: Key used to identify the stream with the provider.
   - `providerStreamUrl`: URL for the provider stream service.
   - `providerStreamData`: A nested object containing further data about the provider stream:
       - `result`: An object detailing the connection results including unique IDs and streaming URLs.
       - `created`: Timestamp of when the stream was created.
       - `modified`: Timestamp of the last modification made to the stream.
       - `meta`: Contains additional information about the stream, including account and video details.
       - `defaultCreator`: Creator's identifier.
       - `status`: Current status (should not be null).
       - `recording`: Indicates if the stream will be recorded (mode, required signed URLs, allowed origins).
       - `deleteRecordingAfterDays`: Specifies if and after how many days to delete the recording (currently null).
   - `success`: Indicates if the request was successful (true/false).
   - `errors`: List of any errors that occurred during the request (currently empty).
   - `messages`: Array for additional messages related to the request (currently empty).
   - `createdDate`: Date when the stream was created.
   - `createdTime`: Time when the stream was created.
   - `updatedDate`: Date when the stream was last updated.
   - `updatedTime`: Time of the last update.
   - `deletedDate`: Date of deletion if applicable (currently null).
   - `deletedTime`: Time of deletion if applicable (currently null).

3. **Details**
   - Contains comprehensive details of the video and streaming session:
   - `accountId`: Identifier for the account related to the video.
   - `sessionId`: The session identifier for the current session.
   - `channelId`: Identifier for the channel the video is associated with.
   - `videoId`: Identifier for the video.
   - `title`: The title of the stream.
   - `description`: The description of the content displayed in the stream.
   - `tags`: Tags associated with the stream.
   - `streamType`: Type of stream (e.g., Live).
   - `searchType`: Type of search associated with the stream (e.g., Game).
   - `started`: Indicates whether the stream has started (true/false).
   - `startedOn`: Timestamp marking when the stream started.
   - `paused`: Indicates if the stream is currently paused (true/false).
   - `pausedOn`: Timestamp reporting when the stream was paused.
   - `stopped`: Indicates if the stream is currently stopped (true/false).
   - `stoppedOn`: Timestamp marking when the stream was stopped (currently null).
   - `streamId`: Identifier for this stream.
   - `channel`: The name of the channel hosting the stream.
   - `category`: The main category of the content (e.g., Board).
   - `categoryId`: Identifier for the category.
   - `subCategory`: Subcategory of the content (e.g., Outdoor Party).
   - `subCategoryId`: Identifier for the subcategory.
   - `scheduleDate`: Scheduled date for the stream.
   - `scheduleTime`: Scheduled time for the stream.
   - `streamHours`: Duration of the stream.
   - `coverPhotoUrl`: URL for the cover photo associated with the stream.
   - `providerPlaybackUrl`: URL for playback on the provider's platform (currently empty).
   - `voteTokenQuantity`: The amount of vote tokens available.
   - `votingTimeReset`: The time to reset voting (in minutes).
   - `voteButtonQuantity`: Quantity of voting buttons displayed (e.g., 4).
   - `voteButtonText1`: Text for the first vote button (e.g., "Layup").
   - `voteButtonText2`: Text for the second vote button (e.g., "Dunk").
   - `isRewardsEnabled`: Indicates if rewards are enabled for the stream (true/false).
   - `isTournamentEnabled`: Indicates if tournaments are enabled for the stream (true/false).
   - `tournamentButtonText1`: Text for the first tournament button (e.g., "Hit").
   - `tournamentButtonText2`: Text for the second tournament button (e.g., "Miss").
   - `streamLocatorName`: Name of the stream locator.
   - `streamAssetName`: Name of the stream asset.
   - `platformVideoIds`: An object mapping whether video IDs exist across various platforms (all currently false).
   - `platformEventIds`: An object mapping whether event IDs exist across various platforms (all currently false).
   - `primaryCameraName`: Name of the primary camera used.
   - `primaryMicrophoneName`: Name of the primary microphone used.
   - `primarySpeakerName`: Name of the primary speaker used.
   - `additionalCameras`: Array listing additional cameras and microphones used.
   - `createdDate`: Date when the details section was created.
   - `createdTime`: Time when the details section was created.
   - `updatedDate`: Date of the last update made to the details section.
   - `updatedTime`: Time of the last update (as per the details section).
   - `deletedDate`: Date of deletion if applicable (currently null).
   - `deletedTime`: Time of deletion if applicable (currently null).

request.description:
### Endpoint Description: Video - Connect - Delete - LinkedIn Live

**Request Method:** POST  
**Request URL:** `http://localhost:3000/api/video/connect/delete`  
**Headers:**  
- **Content-Type:** Specifies that the data being sent in the body is in JSON format.

**Request Body:**
1. **options:**  
   - **providerName:** Indicates the name of the streaming service provider (e.g., "linkedinlive").
   - **providerId:** Identifier for the provider; can be left blank if not applicable.
   - **apiKey:** API key for authentication; can be null if not needed.
   - **apiSecret:** API secret for security; can be null if not needed.
   - **apiClientId:** Client ID for the API; can be null if not defined.
   - **authToken:** Token for authorization; optional field which can be null.
   - **server:** Server information; optional field which can be null.
   - **rtmpUrl:** URL for Real-Time Messaging Protocol; optional field which can be null.
   - **streamKey:** Key for the stream; optional field which can be null.
   - **channelUrl:** URL of the channel; optional field which can be null.
   - **authUsername:** Username for authentication; optional field which can be null.
   - **authPassword:** Password for authentication; optional field which can be null.
   - **uniqueKey:** A unique identifier for the video stream.
   - **videoId:** Identifier for the video.
   - **accountId:** Identifier for the account associated with the video.
   - **channelId:** Identifier for the channel related to the video.
   - **sessionId:** Identifier for the session during which the video was created.
   - **streamId:** Identifier for the specific stream.
   - **ipAddress:** IP address of the user, optional and can be null.
   - **country:** Country where the stream is being managed; defaults to "United States."
   - **state:** State related to the account; defaults to "California."
   - **title:** Title of the video stream (e.g., "Fortune's Basketball Challenge").
   - **description:** A brief description of the video content.
   - **tags:** Tags categorizing the video (e.g., "basketball, game, challenge").

2. **stream:**  
   - **streamId:** Identifier for the stream associated with the video.
   - **streamName:** Name of the stream, often includes a set format or identifier.
   - **uniqueKey:** Same unique identifier for consistency.
   - **videoId:** Identifier for the related video.
   - **accountId:** Same account ID for consistency.
   - **channelId:** Same channel ID for consistency.
   - **sessionId:** Same session ID for consistency.
   - **videoStatus:** Current status of the video (e.g., "notready").
   - **providerName:** The name of the streaming provider (e.g., "cloudflare").
   - **providerUniqueId:** Unique identifier given by the provider.
   - **providerPlaybackUrl:** URL for playback provided by the streaming service; optional.
   - **providerStreamId:** Unique identifier for the stream as recognized by the provider.
   - **providerStreamKey:** Key used to authenticate the stream with the provider.
   - **providerStreamUrl:** URL for the stream data.
   - **providerStreamData:** Contains the data returned by the provider after a stream is created, including:
     - Various URLs for streaming and playback via different protocols.
     - Metadata about the stream's creation and modification.
   - **success:** Boolean indicating the success of the operation.
   - **errors:** Array for any errors that occurred during the operation; empty if none.
   - **messages:** Array for any messages returned during the operation; empty if none.
   - **createdDate:** Date the stream was created.
   - **createdTime:** Time the stream was created.
   - **updatedDate:** Date the stream was last updated.
   - **updatedTime:** Time the stream was last updated.
   - **deletedDate:** Date the stream was deleted, if applicable; null if not deleted.
   - **deletedTime:** Time the stream was deleted, if applicable; null if not deleted.

3. **details:**  
   - **accountId:** Account identifier consistent with other data.
   - **sessionId:** Session identifier consistent with other data.
   - **channelId:** Channel identifier consistent with other data.
   - **videoId:** Video identifier consistent with other data.
   - **title:** Title of the video; same as above.
   - **description:** Description of the video; same as above.
   - **tags:** Tags related to the video; same as above.
   - **streamType:** Indicates the type of stream (e.g., "Live").
   - **searchType:** Type used for searching within the system.
   - **started:** Boolean indicating if the stream has started.
   - **startedOn:** Timestamp marking when the stream started.
   - **paused:** Boolean indicating if the stream is currently paused.
   - **pausedOn:** Timestamp marking when the stream was paused.
   - **stopped:** Boolean indicating if the stream has stopped.
   - **stoppedOn:** Timestamp for when the stream stopped, if applicable.
   - **streamId:** Stream ID consistent with other sections.
   - **channel:** Name of the channel broadcasting the video.
   - **category:** Category under which the video is classified (e.g., "Board").
   - **categoryId:** Identifier for the video's category.
   - **subCategory:** Sub-category classification for additional context.
   - **subCategoryId:** Identifier for the sub-category.
   - **scheduleDate:** Date when the stream is scheduled for.
   - **scheduleTime:** Time when the stream is scheduled for.
   - **streamHours:** Duration of the stream in hours.
   - **coverPhotoUrl:** URL for the cover photo of the stream.
   - **providerPlaybackUrl:** URL for playback from the provider; optional.
   - **voteTokenQuantity:** Number of tokens available for voting.
   - **votingTimeReset:** Time reset setting for voting.
   - **voteButtonQuantity:** Number of voting buttons available.
   - **voteButtonText1:** Text displayed on the first voting button.
   - **voteButtonText2:** Text displayed on the second voting button.
   - **isRewardsEnabled:** Boolean indicating if rewards are enabled for the stream.
   - **isTournamentEnabled:** Boolean indicating if a tournament feature is enabled.
   - **tournamentButtonText1:** Text for tournament voting button one.
   - **tournamentButtonText2:** Text for tournament voting button two.
   - **streamLocatorName:** Name used to locate the stream.
   - **streamAssetName:** Asset name related to the stream.
   - **platformVideoIds:** Object containing identifiers for different platforms (e.g., YouTube, Twitch, etc.); all values are false, indicating no identifiers are set.
   - **platformEventIds:** Object containing event ids for various platforms; all values are false, indicating no event IDs are set.
   - **primaryCameraName:** Name of the primary camera used for streaming.
   - **primaryMicrophoneName:** Name of the primary microphone used for capturing audio.
   - **primarySpeakerName:** Name of the primary speaker used for audio output.
   - **additionalCameras:** Array of additional cameras and microphones used, if any.
   - **createdDate:** Date when the details were created.
   - **createdTime:** Time when the details were created.
   - **updatedDate:** Date when the details were last updated.
   - **updatedTime:** Time when the details were last updated.
   - **deletedDate:** Date when the entry was deleted, if applicable; null if not deleted.
   - **deletedTime:** Time when the entry was deleted, if applicable; null if not deleted.

request.description:
### Description of Endpoint Data

**Name:**  
- **Video - Connect - Create - Live Edu**  
This represents a specific operation to create a live video connection via the Live Edu platform.

**Request Method:**  
- **POST**  
This indicates that the endpoint is used to submit data to create a new resource.

**Request URL:**  
- **http://localhost:3000/api/video/connect/create**  
This is the URL endpoint where the request is sent. It's hosted on a local server for API interactions.

**Request Headers:**
- **Content-Type**:  
  - **Value**: `application/json`  
  This header specifies that the data being sent is in JSON format.

**Request Body:**
- **Body Mode**:  
  - **Raw**  
  This indicates that the body of the request contains raw data, specifically in JSON format.

- **Data Fields**:
    - **options**:
      - **providerName**:  
        - **Value**: `liveedu`  
        The name of the provider for the service, in this case, it's Live Edu.
      
      - **providerId**:  
        - **Value**: `""`  
        This field is for a unique identifier for the provider and is currently empty.
      
      - **apiKey**, **apiSecret**, **apiClientId**, **authToken**, **server**, **rtmpUrl**, **streamKey**, **channelUrl**, **authUsername**, **authPassword**:  
        - **Value**: `null`  
        These fields are typically used for authentication and identifying the service but are not currently supplied.
      
      - **uniqueKey**:  
        - **Value**: `uniqueKey`  
        A unique key to identify this specific video connection.
      
      - **videoId**, **accountId**, **channelId**, **sessionId**, **streamId**:  
        - **Value**: `videoId`, `accountId`, `channelId`, `sessionId`, `streamId`  
        Identifiers for the video, account, channel, session, and stream, respectively.
      
      - **ipAddress**:  
        - **Value**: `null`  
        The IP address is not provided.
      
      - **country**, **state**:  
        - **Values**: `United States`, `California`  
        The geographical information related to the video stream.
      
      - **title**:  
        - **Value**: `Fortune's Basketball Challenge`  
        The title of the video stream.
      
      - **description**:  
        - **Value**: `Basketball game featuring amazing plays and challenges.`  
        A brief overview of what the video is about.
      
      - **tags**:  
        - **Value**: `basketball,game,challenge`  
        Keywords associated with the video for categorization.

    - **stream**:
      - **streamId**:  
        - **Value**: `streamId`  
        Unique identifier for the stream.
      
      - **streamName**:  
        - **Value**: `live-video-stream-7164b12d-1708817130231`  
        The name of the live video stream.
      
      - **videoStatus**:  
        - **Value**: `notready`  
        Indicates the current status of the video; in this case, it is not ready for viewing.
      
      - **providerName**:  
        - **Value**: `cloudflare`  
        The name of the provider for the streaming service.
      
      - **providerUniqueId**:  
        - **Value**: `c3b3f93b0a7594f3db917d5f9a671351`  
        A unique identifier from the content delivery network provider.
      
      - **providerPlaybackUrl**: 
        - **Value**: `""`  
        Currently empty, this would typically point to where the content can be played back.
      
      - **providerStreamId**, **providerStreamKey**, **providerStreamUrl**:  
        Contain identifiers specific to the streaming provider used for broadcasting.
      
      - **providerStreamData**:
        - Contains multiple fields detailing the streaming capabilities such as URLs for RTMP and SRT, creation information, and metadata about the stream itself.
      
      - **success**:  
        - **Value**: `true`  
        Indicates that the request was successful.
      
      - **errors** and **messages**:  
        - **Value**: `[]`  
        Empty arrays indicating there are no errors or informational messages.

    - **createdDate**, **createdTime**, **updatedDate**, **updatedTime**:  
      - Dates and times when the stream was created and last updated.

**Details**:
- Contains meta-information about the video being created, including identifiers and status, along with additional details like the title, description, tags, stream type, and scheduling information. It also has setup information for audio and visual equipment used for the stream, like cameras and microphones, along with their respective names.

This detailed description provides clarity on each parameter being sent in the request body for the creation of a live video stream using the Live Edu service.

request.description:
### Endpoint: Video - Connect - Update - Live Edu

#### Request Method
- **PUT**: This method is used to update existing resources on the server.

#### Request URL
- **http://localhost:3000/api/video/connect/update**: This is the endpoint where the update request is sent.

#### Headers
- **Content-Type**: This indicates the type of data being sent. In this case, it is `application/json`, meaning that the request body contains JSON formatted data.

#### Request Body

**Options**
- **providerName**: The name of the service provider, set to "liveedu".
- **providerId**: A unique identifier for the service provider; currently left empty.
- **apiKey**: The API key for authentication; set to null.
- **apiSecret**: The API secret for authentication; set to null.
- **apiClientId**: The client ID used for authentication; set to null.
- **authToken**: Token used for authentication; set to null.
- **server**: The server address; currently null.
- **rtmpUrl**: URL for Real-Time Messaging Protocol; currently null.
- **streamKey**: Key used to identify the stream; currently null.
- **channelUrl**: The URL of the stream channel; currently null.
- **authUsername**: Username for authentication; currently null.
- **authPassword**: Password for authentication; currently null.
- **uniqueKey**: A unique key identifier for the stream.
- **videoId**: Identifier for the video associated with the stream.
- **accountId**: Identifier for the account that owns the stream.
- **channelId**: Identifier for the channel associated with the stream.
- **sessionId**: Identifier for the streaming session.
- **streamId**: Identifier for the specific stream.
- **ipAddress**: The IP address from where the stream originates; currently null.
- **country**: The country of the streaming; set as "United States".
- **state**: The state of the streaming; set as "California".
- **title**: The title of the stream, set to â€œFortune's Basketball Challengeâ€.
- **description**: A brief description of the stream, mentioning it features amazing plays and challenges in basketball.
- **tags**: Keywords associated with the stream, separated by commas; in this case, "basketball, game, challenge".

**Stream**
- **streamId**: Identifier for the stream.
- **streamName**: The name of the stream, which consists of a unique identifier.
- **uniqueKey**: A unique key for the stream.
- **videoId**: Identifier for the video.
- **accountId**: Identifier for the account.
- **channelId**: Identifier for the channel.
- **sessionId**: Identifier for the streaming session.
- **videoStatus**: Status of the video, marked as "notready".
- **providerName**: The name of the service provider, set to "cloudflare".
- **providerUniqueId**: A unique identifier for the provider.
- **providerPlaybackUrl**: URL for playback, currently empty.
- **providerStreamId**: Unique identifier for the provider's stream.
- **providerStreamKey**: The key used for the provider's stream.
- **providerStreamUrl**: URL for the providerâ€™s stream, set to an SRT URL.
- **providerStreamData**: 
  - **result**: Object containing streaming data:
    - **uid**: Unique identifier for the stream.
    - **rtmps**: Information related to RTMPS streaming, such as URL and streamKey.
    - **rtmpsPlayback**: Similar to RTMPS but for playback.
    - **srt**: Information related to SRT, including URL, streamId, and passphrase.
    - **srtPlayback**: Similar to SRT but for playback.
    - **webRTC**: URL for WebRTC publishing.
    - **webRTCPlayback**: URL for WebRTC playback.
    - **created**: Timestamp of when the stream was created.
    - **modified**: Timestamp of the last modification to the stream.
    - **meta**: Metadata related to the stream, including account ID, description, title, stream ID, and video input device.
    - **defaultCreator**: The default creator of the stream.
    - **status**: Current status of the stream.
    - **recording**: 
      - **mode**: The mode of recording.
      - **requireSignedURLs**: Whether signed URLs are required for access.
      - **allowedOrigins**: Origins that are allowed; currently null.
    - **deleteRecordingAfterDays**: Specifies after how many days the recording will be deleted, currently null.
- **success**: Indicates if the update request was successful.
- **errors**: Array of errors that occurred during the update, currently empty.
- **messages**: Array of messages related to the update, currently empty.
- **createdDate**: Date when the stream was created.
- **createdTime**: Time when the stream was created.
- **updatedDate**: Date when the stream was last updated.
- **updatedTime**: Time when the stream was last updated.
- **deletedDate**: Date when the stream was deleted, currently null.
- **deletedTime**: Time when the stream was deleted, currently null.

**Details**
- **accountId**: Identifier for the account.
- **sessionId**: Identifier for the streaming session.
- **channelId**: Identifier for the channel.
- **videoId**: Identifier for the video.
- **title**: The stream title.
- **description**: A brief description of the stream.
- **tags**: Associated tags for the stream.
- **streamType**: Type of the stream (Live).
- **searchType**: Type of content being streamed, in this case, "Game".
- **started**: Boolean indicating if the stream has started.
- **startedOn**: Timestamp for when the stream started.
- **paused**: Boolean indicating if the stream is paused.
- **pausedOn**: Timestamp for when the stream was paused.
- **stopped**: Boolean indicating if the stream has stopped.
- **stoppedOn**: Timestamp for when the stream stopped, currently null.
- **streamId**: Identifier for the stream.
- **channel**: Name of the channel broadcasting the stream.
- **category**: General category under which the stream falls (Board).
- **categoryId**: Identifier for the category.
- **subCategory**: Specific subtype of the category (Outdoor Party).
- **subCategoryId**: Identifier for the subcategory.
- **scheduleDate**: Date the stream is scheduled for.
- **scheduleTime**: Time the stream is scheduled for.
- **streamHours**: Duration of the stream in hours.
- **coverPhotoUrl**: URL for the cover photo of the stream.
- **providerPlaybackUrl**: URL for playback, currently empty.
- **voteTokenQuantity**: Number of voting tokens available.
- **votingTimeReset**: Time reset for voting, in minutes.
- **voteButtonQuantity**: Number of voting buttons available for user interaction.
- **voteButtonText1**: Text for the first voting button.
- **voteButtonText2**: Text for the second voting button.
- **isRewardsEnabled**: Boolean indicating if rewards are enabled for the stream.
- **isTournamentEnabled**: Boolean indicating if tournaments are enabled for the stream.
- **tournamentButtonText1**: Text for the first tournament button.
- **tournamentButtonText2**: Text for the second tournament button.
- **streamLocatorName**: Name associated with the stream locator.
- **streamAssetName**: Name associated with the stream asset.
- **platformVideoIds**: Object containing identifiers for various platforms for the stream; all currently set to false, indicating no associated ID.
- **platformEventIds**: Object containing identifiers for events across various platforms; all currently set to false.
- **primaryCameraName**: Name of the primary camera used for the stream.
- **primaryMicrophoneName**: Name of the primary microphone used for the stream.
- **primarySpeakerName**: Name of the primary speaker used for the stream.
- **additionalCameras**: Array of objects representing additional cameras and microphones used; includes multiple entries.
- **createdDate**: Date when the details were created.
- **createdTime**: Time when the details were created.
- **updatedDate**: Date when the details were last updated.
- **updatedTime**: Time when the details were last updated.
- **deletedDate**: Date when the details were deleted, currently null.
- **deletedTime**: Time when the details were deleted, currently null.

request.description:
### Video - Connect - Delete - Live Edu

This endpoint is used to delete a live video connection from the Live Edu platform.

#### Request Information
- **Method**: POST
- **URL**: `http://localhost:3000/api/video/connect/delete`
- **Headers**:
  - **Content-Type**: Indicates that the request body format is JSON.

#### Request Body
The request body contains two main sections: `options` and `stream`.

##### Options
- **providerName**: The name of the video service provider, in this case, "liveedu".
- **providerId**: An identifier for the provider; currently blank.
- **apiKey**: The API key for authentication; currently set to null.
- **apiSecret**: The API secret for secure access; currently set to null.
- **apiClientId**: An ID for the client using the API; currently set to null.
- **authToken**: A token used for authorization; currently set to null.
- **server**: The server address; currently set to null.
- **rtmpUrl**: The RTMP URL for streaming; currently set to null.
- **streamKey**: The key used to stream; currently set to null.
- **channelUrl**: The URL for the video channel; currently set to null.
- **authUsername**: Username for authenticated sessions; currently set to null.
- **authPassword**: Password for authenticated sessions; currently set to null.
- **uniqueKey**: A unique identifier for the video stream.
- **videoId**: The ID of the video being referenced.
- **accountId**: The account identifier for the user.
- **channelId**: The ID for the channel where the video is hosted.
- **sessionId**: The ID of the current session.
- **streamId**: The ID of the streaming process.
- **ipAddress**: The IP address of the user; currently set to null.
- **country**: The country from which the request is made, e.g., "United States".
- **state**: The state within the country, e.g., "California".
- **title**: The title of the live event or stream.
- **description**: A brief description of the live event.
- **tags**: Keywords related to the event, separated by commas.

##### Stream
This section contains detailed information about the current stream.
- **streamId**: The unique identifier for the stream.
- **streamName**: A descriptive name for the live video stream.
- **uniqueKey**: The same unique identifier used in the options section.
- **videoId**: The same video ID used in the options section.
- **accountId**: The same account ID used in the options section.
- **channelId**: The same channel ID used in the options section.
- **sessionId**: The same session ID used in the options section.
- **videoStatus**: Current status of the video, such as "notready".
- **providerName**: Name of the provider, e.g., "cloudflare".
- **providerUniqueId**: A unique identifier specific to the provider.
- **providerPlaybackUrl**: URL for playback; currently set to an empty string.
- **providerStreamId**: The stream ID as known to the provider.
- **providerStreamKey**: The key used for streaming to the provider.
- **providerStreamUrl**: The URL for streaming to the provider.
- **providerStreamData**: Additional data relevant to the provider including details about stream URLs and credentials.
- **success**: Indicates whether the request was successful (true/false).
- **errors**: List of errors encountered; currently empty.
- **messages**: Any messages returned by the server; currently empty.
- **createdDate**: Date when the stream was created.
- **createdTime**: Time when the stream was created.
- **updatedDate**: Date when the stream details were updated.
- **updatedTime**: Time when the stream details were updated.
- **deletedDate**: Date when the stream was deleted; currently set to null.
- **deletedTime**: Time when the stream was deleted; currently set to null.

##### Details
This section provides comprehensive information regarding the video stream.
- **accountId**: Same as above, representing the user account.
- **sessionId**: Same as above, representing the current user session.
- **channelId**: Same as above, representing the channel.
- **videoId**: Same as above, representing the video.
- **title**: The title of the video stream.
- **description**: A description of the video content.
- **tags**: Relevant keywords for the video.
- **streamType**: Type of stream, e.g., "Live".
- **searchType**: Type of content, e.g., "Game".
- **started**: Indicates if the stream has started (true/false).
- **startedOn**: Timestamp when the stream started.
- **paused**: Indicates if the stream is currently paused (true/false).
- **pausedOn**: Timestamp when the stream was last paused.
- **stopped**: Indicates if the stream has stopped (true/false).
- **stoppedOn**: Timestamp when the stream was stopped; currently set to null.
- **streamId**: Unique identifier for the stream.
- **channel**: Name of the channel broadcasting.
- **category**: Main category of the video content, e.g., "Board".
- **categoryId**: ID of the category.
- **subCategory**: A more specific category, e.g., "Outdoor Party".
- **subCategoryId**: ID for the sub-category.
- **scheduleDate**: Date when the stream is scheduled to take place.
- **scheduleTime**: Time when the stream is scheduled.
- **streamHours**: Duration of the stream in hours.
- **coverPhotoUrl**: URL for the cover photo associated with the video.
- **providerPlaybackUrl**: URL for playback provided by the provider; currently set to an empty string.
- **voteTokenQuantity**: Amount of tokens available for voting.
- **votingTimeReset**: Duration for which voting remains active.
- **voteButtonQuantity**: Number of voting options available.
- **voteButtonText1**: Label for the first vote button.
- **voteButtonText2**: Label for the second vote button.
- **isRewardsEnabled**: Indicates if rewards are enabled (true/false).
- **isTournamentEnabled**: Indicates if a tournament is enabled (true/false).
- **tournamentButtonText1**: Label for the first tournament button.
- **tournamentButtonText2**: Label for the second tournament button.
- **streamLocatorName**: Identifier for the stream locator.
- **streamAssetName**: Asset name for the stream.
- **platformVideoIds**: Contains identifiers for various platforms where the video may be posted; all set to false, indicating no IDs.
- **platformEventIds**: Contains event IDs for various social platforms; all set to false, indicating no IDs.
- **primaryCameraName**: Name of the main camera used for streaming.
- **primaryMicrophoneName**: Name of the main microphone used for streaming.
- **primarySpeakerName**: Name of the primary speaker used during streaming.
- **additionalCameras**: List of additional cameras and microphones used for streaming.
- **createdDate**: Date when the details were created.
- **createdTime**: Time when the details were created.
- **updatedDate**: Date when the details were last updated.
- **updatedTime**: Time when the details were last updated.
- **deletedDate**: Date when the details were deleted; currently set to null.
- **deletedTime**: Time when the details were deleted; currently set to null.

request.description:
### Video - Connect - Create - MixCloud

This endpoint is used for creating a connection for streaming video content specifically to MixCloud. Below is the detailed description of each data point in the request body.

#### Options

- **providerName**: Indicates the name of the streaming provider (in this case, MixCloud).
- **providerId**: A unique identifier for the provider, typically left blank if not needed.
- **apiKey**: The API key required for authentication; can be null if not applicable.
- **apiSecret**: The API secret for additional security; also can be null.
- **apiClientId**: Unique client identifier for API usage; set to null if not used.
- **authToken**: Token used to authenticate requests; left as null when not needed.
- **server**: Denotes the server URL or IP (null if not specified).
- **rtmpUrl**: URL for Real-Time Messaging Protocol; can be null if not used.
- **streamKey**: Key used to link the stream to the service; null if not provided.
- **channelUrl**: URL to the channel where the video will stream; can be left null.
- **authUsername**: Username for authentication; typically null.
- **authPassword**: Password for the authentication process; usually null.
- **uniqueKey**: A specific key to create a unique stream; this value will be custom.
- **videoId**: Identifier for the specific video being streamed.
- **accountId**: The account identifier associated with the provider.
- **channelId**: Identifier for the specific channel streaming the video.
- **sessionId**: Identifier for the current streaming session.
- **streamId**: Identifier for the stream being created.
- **ipAddress**: Client's IP address; can be null if not specified.
- **country**: The country from which the stream is originating (e.g., "United States").
- **state**: The state from which the stream is initiated (e.g., "California").
- **title**: Title of the video stream (e.g., "Fortune's Basketball Challenge").
- **description**: A brief description of the video content (e.g., "Basketball game featuring amazing plays and challenges.").
- **tags**: Keywords related to the video for searchability (e.g., "basketball,game,challenge").

#### Stream

- **streamId**: Identifier for the stream being created.
- **streamName**: A unique name for the stream (e.g., "live-video-stream-7164b12d-1708817130231").
- **uniqueKey**: Key to uniquely identify the stream, consistent with the options.
- **videoId**: Identifier for the video associated with the stream.
- **accountId**: The account ID associated with the stream.
- **channelId**: Identifier for the channel that will stream the video.
- **sessionId**: Unique ID for the streaming session.
- **videoStatus**: Status of the video (e.g., "notready").
- **providerName**: Name of the video service provider (e.g., "cloudflare").
- **providerUniqueId**: Unique ID given by the provider (e.g., "c3b3f93b0a7594f3db917d5f9a671351").
- **providerPlaybackUrl**: Playback URL provided by the stream service; typically null if not applicable.
- **providerStreamId**: Unique identifier associated by the provider to the live stream.
- **providerStreamKey**: Stream key associated with provider services for streaming.
- **providerStreamUrl**: URL where the stream data is sent.
- **providerStreamData**: Object containing detailed information about the stream, including URL endpoints for RTMPS, SRT, and WebRTC protocols, as well as metadata including creation and modification dates.
- **success**: Boolean flag indicating whether the connection was successful.
- **errors**: Array of any errors encountered during the stream creation process, typically empty if successful.
- **messages**: Array containing informational messages, usually empty if no messages were generated.

#### Created and Updated Metadata

- **createdDate**: Date when the stream was created.
- **createdTime**: Time when the stream was initiated.
- **updatedDate**: Date when the stream details were last updated.
- **updatedTime**: Time of the last update.
- **deletedDate**: Date when the stream was deleted, if applicable; null if not deleted.
- **deletedTime**: Time when the stream was deleted, if applicable; null if not deleted.

#### Details

- **accountId**: Repeated account identifier for the stream connection.
- **sessionId**: Repeated session identifier for the stream.
- **channelId**: Repeated channel identifier where the stream is broadcast.
- **videoId**: Repeated identifier for the video being streamed.
- **title**: Repeated title of the stream.
- **description**: Repeated description of the streamed video.
- **tags**: Repeated tags associated with the content.
- **streamType**: Indicates the type of stream (e.g., "Live").
- **searchType**: Type of search category under which the stream falls (e.g., "Game").
- **started**: Boolean indicating if the stream has started.
- **startedOn**: Timestamp of when the stream started.
- **paused**: Boolean indicating if the stream is currently paused.
- **pausedOn**: Timestamp of when the stream was paused.
- **stopped**: Boolean indicating if the stream has been stopped.
- **stoppedOn**: Timestamp of when the stream was stopped, null if not stopped.
- **streamId**: Repeated stream identifier.
- **channel**: Name of the channel broadcasting the video.
- **category**: The main category of the stream (e.g., "Board").
- **categoryId**: Identifier linked to the main category.
- **subCategory**: Specific sub-category of the stream (e.g., "Outdoor Party").
- **subCategoryId**: Identifier for the sub-category.
- **scheduleDate**: Date when the stream is scheduled to take place.
- **scheduleTime**: Time when the stream is scheduled to start.
- **streamHours**: Duration of the stream in hours.
- **coverPhotoUrl**: URL for the cover photo of the stream.
- **providerPlaybackUrl**: URL used for playback provided by the streaming service.
- **voteTokenQuantity**: Number of tokens available for voting during the stream.
- **votingTimeReset**: Duration after which the voting time resets.
- **voteButtonQuantity**: Number of voting buttons displayed to participants.
- **voteButtonText1**: Text label for the first voting button.
- **voteButtonText2**: Text label for the second voting button.
- **isRewardsEnabled**: Boolean indicating if rewards are enabled for viewers.
- **isTournamentEnabled**: Boolean indicating if a tournament feature is active.
- **tournamentButtonText1**: Text for the first tournament-related button.
- **tournamentButtonText2**: Text for the second tournament-related button.
- **streamLocatorName**: Name used to locate the stream.
- **streamAssetName**: Name given to the stream asset.
- **platformVideoIds**: Object containing IDs of the video on various platforms, all set to false if not applicable.
- **platformEventIds**: Object containing event IDs for various platforms, all set to false if not applicable.
- **primaryCameraName**: Name of the primary camera being used for the stream.
- **primaryMicrophoneName**: Name of the primary microphone used for audio input.
- **primarySpeakerName**: Name of the primary speaker used for sound output.
- **additionalCameras**: Array of additional cameras and microphones available for use.
- **createdDate**: Date when the recording details were created.
- **createdTime**: Time when the details were first recorded.
- **updatedDate**: Date of the last update to the details.
- **updatedTime**: Time of the last update to the details.
- **deletedDate**: Date the details were deleted if applicable; null otherwise.
- **deletedTime**: Time when the details were deleted if applicable; null otherwise.

This comprehensive layout of data will facilitate users in understanding and effectively using this API endpoint.
