request.description:
### Endpoint Description: Video - Connect - Delete - NimoTV

**Request Method:** 
- **POST**: Use this method to issue requests intended to create or delete resources.

**Request URL:**
- **http://localhost:3000/api/video/connect/delete**: The location of the API endpoint to delete a video connection on the server running locally.

#### Headers:
- **Content-Type**: Specifies the media type of the resource. Here, it is set to `application/json`, indicating that the request body will be formatted as JSON.

#### Request Body:
The request body is structured into two main parts: `options` and `stream`.

**Options:**
- **providerName**: Identifier for the streaming service provider, set to `"nimotv"`.
- **providerId**: Identifier for the specific provider instance, currently empty.
- **apiKey**: The API key for authenticating requests, currently set as `null`.
- **apiSecret**: The API secret for additional security, currently `null`.
- **apiClientId**: Client identifier for the API, currently `null`.
- **authToken**: Authorization token for the session, currently `null`.
- **server**: Server details, currently `null`.
- **rtmpUrl**: Real-Time Messaging Protocol URL for streaming, currently `null`.
- **streamKey**: Key used to identify the stream, currently `null`.
- **channelUrl**: URL for the specific channel, currently `null`.
- **authUsername**: Username for authentication, currently `null`.
- **authPassword**: Password for authentication, currently `null`.
- **uniqueKey**: A unique identifier for this stream or request, provided as `"uniqueKey"`.
- **videoId**: Identifier for the video being connected or deleted, provided as `"videoId"`.
- **accountId**: Identifier for the account associated with the video, provided as `"accountId"`.
- **channelId**: Identifier for the channel associated with the video, provided as `"channelId"`.
- **sessionId**: Identifier for the session during which the video was streamed, provided as `"sessionId"`.
- **streamId**: Identifier for the stream session, provided as `"streamId"`.
- **ipAddress**: IP address from which the request is made, currently `null`.
- **country**: Country of the stream, set to `"United States"`.
- **state**: State of the stream, set to `"California"`.
- **title**: Title of the video, provided as `"Fortune's Basketball Challenge"`.
- **description**: Detailed description of the video content, provided as `"Basketball game featuring amazing plays and challenges."`.
- **tags**: Keywords or tags associated with the video, provided as `"basketball,game,challenge"`.

**Stream:**
- **streamId**: ID for the current stream, provided as `"streamId"`.
- **streamName**: Name of the video stream session, given as `"live-video-stream-7164b12d-1708817130231"`.
- **uniqueKey**: Same unique identifier as in options, provided as `"uniqueKey"`.
- **videoId**: The same video ID as listed in options, provided as `"videoId"`.
- **accountId**: Same account ID as in options, provided as `"accountId"`.
- **channelId**: Same channel ID as in options, provided as `"channelId"`.
- **sessionId**: Same session ID as in options, provided as `"sessionId"`.
- **videoStatus**: Status of the video, indicated as `"notready"`.
- **providerName**: Name of the provider for this stream, set to `"cloudflare"`.
- **providerUniqueId**: Unique identifier from the provider, provided as `"c3b3f93b0a7594f3db917d5f9a671351"`.
- **providerPlaybackUrl**: URL for playback, currently empty.
- **providerStreamId**: Provider-specific stream identifier, provided as `"c3b3f93b0a7594f3db917d5f9a671351"`.
- **providerStreamKey**: Stream key for authentication with the provider, provided as `"e0bb5fa14f7059bccfcef40d5dbe2283kc3b3f93b0a7594f3db917d5f9a671351"`.
- **providerStreamUrl**: URL for the stream, provided as `"srt://live.cloudflare.com:778"`.
- **providerStreamData**: Contains additional relevant stream data and identifiers, including RTMP and SRT URLs, and various metadata regarding the stream's creation and modification.
- **success**: Indicates whether the operation was successful, set to `true`.
- **errors**: List of any errors encountered during the operation, currently empty.
- **messages**: Additional messages regarding the operation, currently empty.
- **createdDate**: Date when the stream was created, set to `"2024-02-24"`.
- **createdTime**: Time when the stream was created, provided as `"23:25:30"`.
- **updatedDate**: Date when the stream was last updated, set to `"2024-02-25"`.
- **updatedTime**: Time when the stream was last updated, provided as `"01:14:26"`.
- **deletedDate**: Date when the stream was deleted, currently `null`.
- **deletedTime**: Time when the stream was deleted, currently `null`.

**Details:**
- **accountId**: Same as above, provided as `"accountId"`.
- **sessionId**: Same as above, provided as `"sessionId"`.
- **channelId**: Same as above, provided as `"channelId"`.
- **videoId**: Same as above, provided as `"videoId"`.
- **title**: Same title as above, provided as `"Fortune's Basketball Challenge"`.
- **description**: Same description as above, provided as `"Basketball game featuring amazing plays and challenges."`.
- **tags**: Same tags as above, provided as `"basketball,game,challenge"`.
- **streamType**: Type of stream, stated as `"Live"`.
- **searchType**: Classification for search queries, specified as `"Game"`.
- **started**: Indicates if the stream has started, set to `true`.
- **startedOn**: Timestamp of when the stream started, provided as `"2024-02-24T22:41:42.483Z"`.
- **paused**: Indicates if the stream is currently paused, set to `false`.
- **pausedOn**: Timestamp of when the stream was paused, provided as `"2024-02-24T22:41:42.483Z"`.
- **stopped**: Indicates if the stream has been stopped, set to `false`.
- **stoppedOn**: Timestamp of when the stream was stopped, currently `null`.
- **streamId**: Same stream ID as above, provided as `"streamId"`.
- **channel**: Name of the channel, provided as `"Fortune's Basketball Channel"`.
- **category**: Broad category to which the stream belongs, specified as `"Board"`.
- **categoryId**: Identifier for the category, provided as `"categoryId"`.
- **subCategory**: More specific category for the stream, provided as `"Outdoor Party"`.
- **subCategoryId**: Identifier for the sub-category, provided as `"subCategoryId"`.
- **scheduleDate**: Date that the stream is scheduled for, provided as `"2024-02-01"`.
- **scheduleTime**: Time that the stream is scheduled for, provided as `"18:00:00"`.
- **streamHours**: Duration of the stream in hours, set to `1`.
- **coverPhotoUrl**: URL for the cover photo of the stream, provided as `"basketball-cover-url.jpg"`.
- **providerPlaybackUrl**: URL for playback from the provider, currently empty.
- **voteTokenQuantity**: Number of tokens available for voting, set to `100`.
- **votingTimeReset**: The time period in which votes can reset, provided as `"5"`.
- **voteButtonQuantity**: Number of voting buttons available, set to `4`.
- **voteButtonText1**: Text label for the first voting button, provided as `"Layup"`.
- **voteButtonText2**: Text label for the second voting button, provided as `"Dunk"`.
- **isRewardsEnabled**: Indicates if rewards are enabled for the stream, set to `false`.
- **isTournamentEnabled**: Indicates if a tournament feature is enabled, set to `true`.
- **tournamentButtonText1**: Text for the first tournament button, provided as `"Hit"`.
- **tournamentButtonText2**: Text for the second tournament button, provided as `"Miss"`.
- **streamLocatorName**: Name used for locating the stream, provided as `"basketball-locator-name"`.
- **streamAssetName**: Name of the stream asset, provided as `"basketball-asset-name"`.
- **platformVideoIds**: Contains identifiers for various platforms to which the video could be distributed, with all currently set to `false`.
- **platformEventIds**: Contains identifiers for any linked events on various platforms, all currently `false`.
- **primaryCameraName**: Name of the primary camera used, given as `"Sony 4K Ultra HD WebCam"`.
- **primaryMicrophoneName**: Name of the primary microphone used, provided as `"WirelessAudioTek Device"`.
- **primarySpeakerName**: Name of the primary speaker used, provided as `"Bose-Mega-Speaker 2.0"`.
- **additionalCameras**: Array containing names of additional cameras and microphones, each represented as an object with properties `camera` and `microphone`.
- **createdDate**: Date when the video details were created, set at `"2024-02-18"`.
- **createdTime**: Time when the video details were created, provided as `"14:54:25"`.
- **updatedDate**: Date when the video details were last updated, set at `"2024-02-24"`.
- **updatedTime**: Time when the video details were last updated, provided as `"23:29:19"`.
- **deletedDate**: Date when the video details were deleted, currently `null`.
- **deletedTime**: Time when the video details were deleted, currently `null`.

request.description:
### Description of Endpoint Data

#### Request
- **method**: Specifies the HTTP method being used for the request, which in this case is POST.
- **url**: The endpoint to which the request is sent, indicating where the resource creation is being requested, here it is `http://localhost:3000/api/video/connect/create`.
- **headers**: Contains metadata for the request. Here, `Content-Type` is set to `application/json`, which tells the server that the body of the request contains JSON data.

#### Body
The body contains two main sections: `options` and `stream`.

##### Options
- **providerName**: Specifies the name of the service provider for the live video connection, here "nonolive".
- **providerId**: An identifier for the provider, currently left blank.
- **apiKey**: The key for API access, which is currently set to null.
- **apiSecret**: The secret key for API access, currently set to null.
- **apiClientId**: The client ID for API, currently null.
- **authToken**: The token for authorizing API requests, set to null.
- **server**: Indicates the server to be used, set to null.
- **rtmpUrl**: The RTMP (Real-Time Messaging Protocol) URL for streaming, currently null.
- **streamKey**: The key for the live stream, currently null.
- **channelUrl**: URL for the channel, currently null.
- **authUsername**: Username for authentication, currently null.
- **authPassword**: Password for authentication, currently null.
- **uniqueKey**: A unique identifier for the stream.
- **videoId**: An identifier for the video being streamed.
- **accountId**: The account associated with the stream.
- **channelId**: The ID of the channel broadcasting the video.
- **sessionId**: Unique ID associated with the streaming session.
- **streamId**: Unique ID associated with the stream.
- **ipAddress**: The IP address, currently null.
- **country**: The country of the broadcast, specified as "United States".
- **state**: The state of the broadcast, specified as "California".
- **title**: The title of the live stream, here it is "Fortune's Basketball Challenge".
- **description**: A description of the stream, detailing that it features amazing plays and challenges in basketball.
- **tags**: Tags associated with the video for better searchability, here it's "basketball,game,challenge".

##### Stream
- **streamId**: Unique identifier for the stream.
- **streamName**: The name of the stream.
- **uniqueKey**: A unique key for identifying the stream.
- **videoId**: Identifier for the video associated with the stream.
- **accountId**: Account identifier tied to the stream.
- **channelId**: Channel identifier tied to the stream.
- **sessionId**: Session identifier for the stream.
- **videoStatus**: Status of the video, currently set to "notready".
- **providerName**: Name of the streaming service provider, here it is "cloudflare".
- **providerUniqueId**: Unique identifier specific to the provider.
- **providerPlaybackUrl**: URL for playback on the provider's platform, currently blank.
- **providerStreamId**: Unique identifier for the stream as perceived by the provider.
- **providerStreamKey**: Key necessary for accessing the stream on the provider's platform.
- **providerStreamUrl**: URL to access the stream on the provider's platform.
- **providerStreamData**: Additional data provided by the stream provider, including:
  - **result**: Various URLs and keys for RTMP, SRT, and WebRTC protocols.
  - **created**: Timestamp indicating when the stream was created.
  - **modified**: Timestamp indicating when the stream was last modified.
  - **meta**: Metadata including account ID, audio and video input names, description, and cover photo URL.
  - **defaultCreator**: Identifier for the default creator of the stream.
  - **recording**: Information related to recording settings.
  - **deleteRecordingAfterDays**: The time in days to keep recordings, currently null.
  
##### Dates
- **createdDate**: Date of creation for the stream in the format YYYY-MM-DD.
- **createdTime**: Time of creation for the stream.
- **updatedDate**: Date of the last update for the stream.
- **updatedTime**: Time of the last update for the stream.
- **deletedDate**: Date of deletion, currently null.
- **deletedTime**: Time of deletion, currently null.

#### Details
Provides extra information about the stream:
- **accountId**, **sessionId**, **channelId**, **videoId**: Reiterates identifiers associated with the stream.
- **title**, **description**, **tags**: Reiterates the title, description, and tags of the stream.
- **streamType**: Indicates that the stream is a "Live" type.
- **searchType**: Type of content for searching, specified as "Game".
- **started**: Indicates if the stream has started, currently set to true.
- **startedOn**: Timestamp indicating when the stream started.
- **paused**: Indicates if the stream is paused, currently set to false.
- **pausedOn**: Timestamp indicating when the stream was paused, here it is equal to started.
- **stopped**: Indicates if the stream has stopped, currently false.
- **stoppedOn**: Timestamp for when the stream stopped, currently null.
- **streamId**, **channel**: Information about the stream and channel name.
- **category**, **categoryId**, **subCategory**, **subCategoryId**: Information regarding the category and sub-category of the stream.
- **scheduleDate**: The scheduled date for the stream to begin.
- **scheduleTime**: The scheduled time for the stream to begin.
- **streamHours**: Duration for which the stream will run.
- **coverPhotoUrl**: URL for the cover photo of the stream.
- **providerPlaybackUrl**: URL for playback, currently blank.
- **voteTokenQuantity**, **votingTimeReset**, **voteButtonQuantity**: Information about voting options available for viewers.
- **voteButtonText1**, **voteButtonText2**: Text for the voting buttons.
- **isRewardsEnabled**: Indicates if rewards are enabled, currently set to false.
- **isTournamentEnabled**: Indicates if tournaments are enabled, currently set to true.
- **tournamentButtonText1**, **tournamentButtonText2**: Button texts for tournament participation.
- **streamLocatorName**: Name of the stream locator.
- **streamAssetName**: Name of the stream asset.
- **platformVideoIds**: Object holding video IDs for various platforms, all set to false indicating no IDs currently.
- **platformEventIds**: Object holding event IDs for various platforms, all set to false indicating no associated events.
- **primaryCameraName**, **primaryMicrophoneName**, **primarySpeakerName**: Names of the primary devices used for the stream.
- **additionalCameras**: List of additional cameras and microphones used, if any.
- **createdDate**, **createdTime**, **updatedDate**, **updatedTime**: Dates and times of creation and last updates for the details section.
- **deletedDate**, **deletedTime**: Dates and times of deletion, currently null.

request.description:
### Detailed Description of Endpoint Data

#### Request Method
- **PUT**: This method is used to update existing data on the specified resource.

#### Request URL
- **http://localhost:3000/api/video/connect/update**: This is the endpoint's URL where the update request is sent. It indicates that the request targets the video connection update functionality within a local server.

#### Headers
- **Content-Type: application/json**: This header specifies the media type of the resource being sent to the server, indicating that the payload format is JSON.

#### Request Body
- **Options**: A nested object that holds various parameters related to the video streaming connection.
  - **providerName**: The name of the streaming service provider; in this case, it is set to "nonolive".
  - **providerId**: Identifier for the provider, which is currently left blank.
  - **apiKey**: The API key used for authenticating requests, set to null here.
  - **apiSecret**: The secret key for API access, currently null.
  - **apiClientId**: Identifier for the client application, set to null here.
  - **authToken**: Authentication token for securing the connection, set to null.
  - **server**: The server's address for the connection, currently null.
  - **rtmpUrl**: Real-Time Messaging Protocol URL, set to null.
  - **streamKey**: Unique key associated with the stream, currently null.
  - **channelUrl**: URL for the channel, set to null.
  - **authUsername**: Username for authentication, currently null.
  - **authPassword**: Password for authentication, set to null.
  - **uniqueKey**: A unique key to identify the video stream.
  - **videoId**: Identifier for the video being streamed.
  - **accountId**: Identifier for the user's account.
  - **channelId**: Identifier for the channel being used.
  - **sessionId**: Identifier for the current session.
  - **streamId**: Identifier for the stream.
  - **ipAddress**: IP address of the user, currently null.
  - **country**: Country where the stream is being accessed from, set to "United States".
  - **state**: The state where the stream is being accessed from, set to "California".
  - **title**: The title of the video, in this case, "Fortune's Basketball Challenge".
  - **description**: A brief description of the video content, noting the exciting basketball plays and challenges.
  - **tags**: A string of related tags to categorize the video content, including "basketball", "game", "challenge".

- **Stream**: A nested object containing details about the stream configuration and status.
  - **streamId**: Identifier for the stream.
  - **streamName**: The name of the stream, a unique identifier string.
  - **uniqueKey**: A key to uniquely identify this stream instance.
  - **videoId**: Identifier for the corresponding video.
  - **accountId**: Identifier for the user's account.
  - **channelId**: Identifier for the channel.
  - **sessionId**: Identifier for the current session.
  - **videoStatus**: Status of the video, which is "notready".
  - **providerName**: The streaming provider's name, set to "cloudflare".
  - **providerUniqueId**: Unique identifier associated with the provider.
  - **providerPlaybackUrl**: URL for playback from the provider, currently empty.
  - **providerStreamId**: Unique stream identifier for the provider.
  - **providerStreamKey**: The key used to initiate the video stream.
  - **providerStreamUrl**: URL for the provider's streaming service.
  - **providerStreamData**: An object containing streaming data including URLs and keys for RTMP, SRT, and WebRTC formats. It also provides metadata about the stream including timestamps for creation and modification, and details about the stream's visual and audio inputs.
  - **success**: Indicates whether the operation was successful, defaulting to true.
  - **errors**: An array that will contain any errors encountered during the operation; currently empty.
  - **messages**: An array reserved for passing any informational messages; currently empty.
  - **createdDate**: Date the stream was created.
  - **createdTime**: Time the stream was created.
  - **updatedDate**: Date the stream was last updated.
  - **updatedTime**: Time the stream was last updated.
  - **deletedDate**: Date the stream was deleted, currently null.
  - **deletedTime**: Time the stream was deleted, currently null.

- **Details**: An object with detailed information about the video stream.
  - **accountId**: Identifier for the userâ€™s account.
  - **sessionId**: Identifier for the current session.
  - **channelId**: Identifier for the channel.
  - **videoId**: Identifier for the specific video.
  - **title**: Title of the video, reiterating "Fortune's Basketball Challenge".
  - **description**: Description of the video content.
  - **tags**: Related tags for the video.
  - **streamType**: Type of stream, indicating "Live".
  - **searchType**: Type of search, set to "Game".
  - **started**: Indicates if the stream has started, currently true.
  - **startedOn**: Timestamp for when the stream started.
  - **paused**: Indicates if the stream is paused, currently false.
  - **pausedOn**: Timestamp for when the stream was paused.
  - **stopped**: Indicates if the stream has been stopped, currently false.
  - **stoppedOn**: Timestamp for when the stream was stopped, currently null.
  - **streamId**: Identifier associated with the stream.
  - **channel**: The name of the channel associated with the stream.
  - **category**: Category of the stream, set to "Board".
  - **categoryId**: Identifier for the category.
  - **subCategory**: A more specific category for the stream, noted as "Outdoor Party".
  - **subCategoryId**: Identifier for the subcategory.
  - **scheduleDate**: Date the stream is scheduled for, set to "2024-02-01".
  - **scheduleTime**: Time scheduled for the stream to start.
  - **streamHours**: Duration of the stream, indicated as 1 hour.
  - **coverPhotoUrl**: URL of the cover photo associated with the stream.
  - **providerPlaybackUrl**: Playback URL from the provider, currently empty.
  - **voteTokenQuantity**: Quantity of tokens available for voting, set at 100.
  - **votingTimeReset**: Duration for resetting voting time, noted as 5.
  - **voteButtonQuantity**: Number of voting buttons available, set to 4.
  - **voteButtonText1** / **voteButtonText2**: Text labels for voting buttons.
  - **isRewardsEnabled**: Indicates if the rewards feature is enabled, currently false.
  - **isTournamentEnabled**: Indicates if the tournament feature is enabled, currently true.
  - **tournamentButtonText1** / **tournamentButtonText2**: Text labels for tournament buttons.
  - **streamLocatorName**: Name used for locating the stream.
  - **streamAssetName**: Name associated with the stream's assets.
  - **platformVideoIds**: An object with URLs for potential outputs to various platforms; all fields currently set to false, suggesting no connections made.
  - **platformEventIds**: An object with potential event identifiers for various platforms; all fields currently set to false.
  - **primaryCameraName**, **primaryMicrophoneName**, **primarySpeakerName**: Details of the main devices used for the stream.
  - **additionalCameras**: An array of objects detailing additional cameras and microphones used in the setup.
  - **createdDate**: Date of creation for this streamâ€™s details.
  - **createdTime**: Time of creation for this stream's details.
  - **updatedDate**: Last updated date for this stream's details.
  - **updatedTime**: Last updated time for this stream's details.
  - **deletedDate**: Date the details were deleted, currently null.
  - **deletedTime**: Time the details were deleted, currently null.

request.description:
### API Endpoint Description: Video - Connect - Delete - Nono Live

This endpoint is used to delete a video stream connection for a specific provider, in this case known as "Nono Live". The request is executed using the HTTP POST method.

#### Request Details

- **Method**: `POST`
  - This indicates that data will be sent to the server to perform the deletion operation.

- **URL**: `http://localhost:3000/api/video/connect/delete`
  - This is the endpoint where the request is sent. It points to the local server running on port 3000.

- **Headers**:
  - **Content-Type**: `application/json`
    - This header specifies that the type of content being sent is JSON formatted data.

#### Body Parameters

The body of the request is structured in JSON format and contains the following key sections:

1. **Options**:
   - `providerName`: Name of the video provider, here set to "nonolive".
   - `providerId`: Identifier for the provider, currently left empty.
   - `apiKey`, `apiSecret`, `apiClientId`, `authToken`, `server`, `rtmpUrl`, `streamKey`, `channelUrl`, `authUsername`, `authPassword`: Various authentication and configuration fields which are primarily set to null or empty, indicating optional data that may not be required for this deletion process.
   - `uniqueKey`: A unique identifier for the video connection.
   - `videoId`: ID for the video you want to delete.
   - `accountId`: Identifier for the user account associated with the video.
   - `channelId`: Identifier for the channel hosting the video.
   - `sessionId`: Identifier for the session associated with the video stream.
   - `streamId`: Identifier for the specific stream.
   - `ipAddress`: The IP address associated with the request, currently set to null.
   - `country`: The country where the action is executed, specified as "United States".
   - `state`: The state related to the action, provided as "California".
   - `title`: Title of the video, in this case, "Fortune's Basketball Challenge".
   - `description`: A brief description of the video content; "Basketball game featuring amazing plays and challenges."
   - `tags`: Keywords associated with the video for search; here it includes "basketball, game, challenge".

2. **Stream**:
   - `streamId`: Identifier for the stream in question.
   - `streamName`: Unique name for the stream.
   - `uniqueKey`, `videoId`, `accountId`, `channelId`, `sessionId`: All identifiers related to the specific stream and video.
   - `videoStatus`: The current status of the video, set as "notready".
   - `providerName`: Provider name associated with the stream, here itâ€™s "cloudflare".
   - `providerUniqueId`, `providerPlaybackUrl`, `providerStreamId`, `providerStreamKey`, `providerStreamUrl`: Identifiers and URLs relevant to the provider, confirming it is integrated with Cloudflare.
   - `providerStreamData`: Contains further details about the stream including real-time messaging protocol (RTMP) URLs and WebRTC URLs, as well as metadata regarding the stream.
   - `createdDate`, `createdTime`, `updatedDate`, `updatedTime`: Timestamps indicating when the stream was created and last updated.
   - `deletedDate`, `deletedTime`: Indicators for deletion times, currently set as null.

3. **Details**:
   - `accountId`, `sessionId`, `channelId`, `videoId`: Repeated identifiers confirming connection to the video.
   - `title`, `description`: Confirm the metadata of the video.
   - `tags`: Keywords related to the video, included for search and categorization.
   - `streamType`: Type of stream, noted as "Live".
   - `searchType`: Indicates the categorization of the content, in this case, labeled as "Game".
   - `started`, `startedOn`, `paused`, `pausedOn`, `stopped`, `stoppedOn`: Status flags indicating the state of the video stream.
   - `streamId`: Identifier for the stream.
   - `channel`: Name of the channel ("Fortune's Basketball Channel").
   - `category`, `categoryId`, `subCategory`, `subCategoryId`: Classification of the video content.
   - `scheduleDate`, `scheduleTime`, `streamHours`: Metadata related to scheduling and stream duration.
   - `coverPhotoUrl`: URL for the cover photo of the video stream.
   - `providerPlaybackUrl`: URL for playback, currently set empty.
   - `voteTokenQuantity`, `votingTimeReset`, `voteButtonQuantity`, `voteButtonText1`, `voteButtonText2`: Data regarding voting mechanisms related to the video.
   - `isRewardsEnabled`, `isTournamentEnabled`, `tournamentButtonText1`, `tournamentButtonText2`: Boolean flags indicating whether features like rewards and tournaments are enabled.
   - `streamLocatorName`, `streamAssetName`: Names for the video locator and asset used during the stream.
   - `platformVideoIds`, `platformEventIds`: Containers for identifiers related to various social media and video platforms, currently showing no specific IDs.
   - `primaryCameraName`, `primaryMicrophoneName`, `primarySpeakerName`: Identifying names for the primary audio and video devices used in the stream.
   - `additionalCameras`: Array of additional camera and microphone names used during the stream setup.
   - `createdDate`, `createdTime`, `updatedDate`, `updatedTime`: Timestamps for the creation and last update of the video details.
   - `deletedDate`, `deletedTime`: Checking the deletion status, currently set to null. 

This summary provides insight into each element required for deleting a video connection and highlights the relevant details that users need to be aware of when using this API endpoint.

request.description:
### Video - Connect - Create - Periscope Live Endpoint Description

This endpoint creates a new video stream connected to Periscope Live. Below are details for each part of the request body.

#### Options Object
- **providerName**: Specifies the service provider, here it is "periscopelive".
- **providerId**: An identifier for the provider, usually left blank for now.
- **apiKey**: The API key required for authentication; currently set to null.
- **apiSecret**: The secret associated with the API key; currently set to null.
- **apiClientId**: An optional client identifier for the API; currently set to null.
- **authToken**: A token for authentication purposes; currently set to null.
- **server**: The server address; currently set to null.
- **rtmpUrl**: URL for Real-Time Messaging Protocol (RTMP); currently set to null.
- **streamKey**: A unique key used for streaming; currently set to null.
- **channelUrl**: The URL for the channel; currently set to null.
- **authUsername**: Username for authentication; currently set to null.
- **authPassword**: Password for authentication; currently set to null.
- **uniqueKey**: A unique identifier for the request.
- **videoId**: Unique identifier for the video.
- **accountId**: Identifier for the account.
- **channelId**: Identifier for the channel.
- **sessionId**: Identifier for the session.
- **streamId**: Identifier for the stream.
- **ipAddress**: The IP address of the user; currently set to null.
- **country**: Country where the event is being streamed, here it is "United States".
- **state**: State within the country, here it is "California".
- **title**: Title of the video stream, set as "Fortune's Basketball Challenge".
- **description**: Description of the video stream, providing context such as "Basketball game featuring amazing plays and challenges."
- **tags**: Tags related to the video for categorization, provided as "basketball, game, challenge".

#### Stream Object
- **streamId**: Identifier for this specific stream.
- **streamName**: Name assigned to the live video stream; a generated identifier.
- **uniqueKey**: Duplicate of the unique key from the options.
- **videoId**: Duplicate of the video ID from the options.
- **accountId**: Duplicate of the account ID from the options.
- **channelId**: Duplicate of the channel ID from the options.
- **sessionId**: Duplicate of the session ID from the options.
- **videoStatus**: Indicates the status of the video; default is "notready".
- **providerName**: The name of the streaming provider, in this case, "cloudflare".
- **providerUniqueId**: A unique identifier from the streaming provider.
- **providerPlaybackUrl**: The URL for playback provided by the streaming service, currently empty.
- **providerStreamId**: A unique identifier assigned by the provider.
- **providerStreamKey**: The stream key used by the provider for access.
- **providerStreamUrl**: The URL for the provider's streaming connection.
- **providerStreamData**: Contains detailed configurations from the provider regarding streaming settings, URLs, and credentials.
- **success**: A boolean indicating whether the stream was created successfully.
- **errors**: Array to hold any error messages; currently empty.
- **messages**: Array for any informational messages; currently empty.
- **createdDate**: Date when the stream was created.
- **createdTime**: Time when the stream was created.
- **updatedDate**: Date when the stream was last updated.
- **updatedTime**: Time when the stream was last updated.
- **deletedDate**: Date when the stream was deleted, currently null.
- **deletedTime**: Time when the stream was deleted, currently null.

#### Details Object
- **accountId**: Identifier for the account; duplicates from other sections.
- **sessionId**: Identifier for the session; duplicates from other sections.
- **channelId**: Identifier for the channel; duplicates from other sections.
- **videoId**: Identifier for the video; duplicates from other sections.
- **title**: Title of the livestream; duplicates from other sections.
- **description**: Description of the livestream; duplicates from other sections.
- **tags**: Tags related to the video; duplicates from other sections.
- **streamType**: Type of stream, specified as "Live".
- **searchType**: Type of search applicable; here it is "Game".
- **started**: Boolean indicating if the stream has started, currently set to true.
- **startedOn**: Timestamp of when the stream started.
- **paused**: Boolean indicating if the stream is paused.
- **pausedOn**: Timestamp of when the stream was paused.
- **stopped**: Boolean indicating if the stream has stopped.
- **stoppedOn**: Timestamp of when the stream stopped; currently null.
- **streamId**: Identifier for the stream; duplicates from other sections.
- **channel**: Name of the channel, here it is "Fortune's Basketball Channel".
- **category**: General category for the stream, specified as "Board".
- **categoryId**: Identifier for the category, specifying "categoryId".
- **subCategory**: Sub-category of the stream, specified as "Outdoor Party".
- **subCategoryId**: Identifier for the sub-category, specifying "subCategoryId".
- **scheduleDate**: Date when the stream is scheduled, set to "2024-02-01".
- **scheduleTime**: Scheduled time for the stream.
- **streamHours**: Duration of the stream in hours; set to 1.
- **coverPhotoUrl**: URL for the cover photo associated with the stream.
- **providerPlaybackUrl**: Playback URL provided by the streaming service; currently empty.
- **voteTokenQuantity**: Number of tokens available for voting; set to 100.
- **votingTimeReset**: Duration in seconds before the voting time resets; set to "5".
- **voteButtonQuantity**: Number of voting options available; set to 4.
- **voteButtonText1**: Text for the first voting button; "Layup".
- **voteButtonText2**: Text for the second voting button; "Dunk".
- **isRewardsEnabled**: Indicates whether rewards are enabled; currently set to false.
- **isTournamentEnabled**: Indicates whether tournaments are enabled; currently set to true.
- **tournamentButtonText1**: Text for the first tournament button; "Hit".
- **tournamentButtonText2**: Text for the second tournament button; "Miss".
- **streamLocatorName**: A unique name for locating the stream; here it is "basketball-locator-name".
- **streamAssetName**: Name for the stream asset; here it is "basketball-asset-name".
- **platformVideoIds**: Object holding identifiers for various platforms; all set to false at this time.
- **platformEventIds**: Object holding identifiers for platform events; all set to false at this time.
- **primaryCameraName**: Displays the name of the primary camera used for streaming.
- **primaryMicrophoneName**: Displays the name of the primary microphone used.
- **primarySpeakerName**: Displays the name of the primary speaker used.
- **additionalCameras**: Array of objects, each detailing additional cameras and their microphones used.
- **createdDate**: Timestamp of when the details were created.
- **createdTime**: Time when the details were created.
- **updatedDate**: Timestamp of the last update for the details.
- **updatedTime**: Time of the last update for the details.
- **deletedDate**: Timestamp of deletion; currently null.
- **deletedTime**: Time of deletion; currently null.

request.description:
### Description of Data in Endpoint: Video - Connect - Update - Periscope Live

#### General Information
- **name**: The name of the API endpoint. This indicates that it is used to update the connection for a video being streamed live via Periscope.

#### Request Details
- **method**: The HTTP method used for the request. In this case, it is a `PUT` request, which is typically used to update existing resources.
- **url**: The endpoint URL where the request is sent. It is set to `http://localhost:3000/api/video/connect/update`, indicating that this is accessed on a local server.
- **headers**: This includes HTTP headers for the request.
  - **Content-Type**: Specifies the media type of the resource. It is set to `application/json`, indicating that the body content is in JSON format.

#### Request Body
The request body is structured into two main parts: `options` and `stream`.

##### Options Object
- **providerName**: Identifies the provider for the video stream, in this case, "periscopelive".
- **providerId**: An identifier for the provider, left as an empty string.
- **apiKey**: Authentication key for the API, currently set to `null`.
- **apiSecret**: A secret key for the API, currently set to `null`.
- **apiClientId**: Identifier for the API client, currently set to `null`.
- **authToken**: Token for authentication, currently set to `null`.
- **server**: The server related information for the connection, currently set to `null`.
- **rtmpUrl**: The Real-Time Messaging Protocol URL for the stream, currently set to `null`.
- **streamKey**: Key for streaming the video, currently set to `null`.
- **channelUrl**: URL for the video channel, currently set to `null`.
- **authUsername**: Username for authentication, currently set to `null`.
- **authPassword**: Password for authentication, currently set to `null`.
- **uniqueKey**: A unique identifier for the video stream, specified as "uniqueKey".
- **videoId**: Identifier for the video, specified as "videoId".
- **accountId**: Identifier for the user account, specified as "accountId".
- **channelId**: Identifier for the video channel, specified as "channelId".
- **sessionId**: Identifier for the session, specified as "sessionId".
- **streamId**: Identifier for the stream, specified as "streamId".
- **ipAddress**: The IP address of the request, currently set to `null`.
- **country**: The country of the stream provider, specified as "United States".
- **state**: The state of the stream provider, specified as "California".
- **title**: Title of the stream, specified as "Fortune's Basketball Challenge".
- **description**: Description of the stream, specified as "Basketball game featuring amazing plays and challenges."
- **tags**: Tags associated with the stream, specified as "basketball,game,challenge".

##### Stream Object
- **streamId**: Agreement identifier for the stream, specified as "streamId".
- **streamName**: The designated name for the live stream.
- **uniqueKey**: A unique identifier for the stream, specified as "uniqueKey".
- **videoId**: Identifier for the video, specified as "videoId".
- **accountId**: Identifier for the user account, specified as "accountId".
- **channelId**: Identifier for the video channel, specified as "channelId".
- **sessionId**: Identifier for the session, specified as "sessionId".
- **videoStatus**: Current status of the video, set as "notready".
- **providerName**: The name of the service provider, specified as "cloudflare".
- **providerUniqueId**: Unique identifier assigned by the provider.
- **providerPlaybackUrl**: URL for playback from the provider, currently set to an empty string.
- **providerStreamId**: Unique identifier provided by the live streaming service.
- **providerStreamKey**: Key for accessing the stream provided by the provider.
- **providerStreamUrl**: URL for the provided stream.
- **providerStreamData**: Contains streaming data results.
  - Inside this, it includes various streaming URLs, authentication data, timestamps for creation and modification, and metadata related to the stream.
- **success**: Indicates whether the request was successful, set to `true`.
- **errors**: Array for any errors that may have occurred, currently empty.
- **messages**: Array for any additional messages, also currently empty.
- **createdDate**: The date when the stream was created, specified.
- **createdTime**: The time when the stream was created, specified.
- **updatedDate**: The date when the stream was last updated, specified.
- **updatedTime**: The time when the stream was last updated, specified.
- **deletedDate**: Shows the deletion date if applicable, currently `null`.
- **deletedTime**: Shows the deletion time if applicable, currently `null`.

##### Details Object
This section provides further context about the video stream.
- **accountId**: Identifier for the user account.
- **sessionId**: Identifier for the session.
- **channelId**: Identifier for the video channel.
- **videoId**: Identifier for the video.
- **title**: Title of the stream.
- **description**: Description of the stream.
- **tags**: Tags associated with the stream.
- **streamType**: Indicates the type of stream, set to "Live".
- **searchType**: Defines the search type, designated as "Game".
- **started**: A boolean indicating if the stream has started, currently `true`.
- **startedOn**: Timestamp indicating when the stream started.
- **paused**: A boolean indicating if the stream is paused, set to `false`.
- **pausedOn**: Timestamp for when the stream was paused.
- **stopped**: A boolean indicating if the stream is stopped, currently `false`.
- **stoppedOn**: Timestamp for when the stream was stopped, currently `null`.
- **streamId**: The unique identifier for the stream.
- **channel**: Name of the video channel.
- **category**: Category of the stream content, listed as "Board".
- **categoryId**: Identifier related to the category.
- **subCategory**: Sub-category of the stream, specified as "Outdoor Party".
- **subCategoryId**: Identifier related to the sub-category.
- **scheduleDate**: Scheduled date for the stream.
- **scheduleTime**: Scheduled time for the stream.
- **streamHours**: Duration of the stream in hours.
- **coverPhotoUrl**: URL for the cover photo associated with the stream.
- **providerPlaybackUrl**: URL for playback from the provider, currently set to an empty string.
- **voteTokenQuantity**: Number of tokens available for voting.
- **votingTimeReset**: Resets the voting after a defined time, specified as "5".
- **voteButtonQuantity**: Number of voting buttons available, set to 4.
- **voteButtonText1**: Text for the first voting button.
- **voteButtonText2**: Text for the second voting button.
- **isRewardsEnabled**: Indicates if rewards are enabled, currently `false`.
- **isTournamentEnabled**: Indicates if tournament features are enabled, currently `true`.
- **tournamentButtonText1**: Text for the first tournament button.
- **tournamentButtonText2**: Text for the second tournament button.
- **streamLocatorName**: A name for the stream locator.
- **streamAssetName**: Name for assets related to the stream.
- **platformVideoIds**: Object containing identifiers for the video across various platforms.
- **platformEventIds**: Object containing various event IDs related to different platforms.
- **primaryCameraName**: Name of the primary camera used for streaming.
- **primaryMicrophoneName**: Name of the primary microphone used for gathering sound.
- **primarySpeakerName**: Name of the primary speaker used for audio output.
- **additionalCameras**: Array detailing additional cameras along with their microphones.
- **createdDate**: The date when details were created.
- **createdTime**: The time when details were created.
- **updatedDate**: The date when details were last updated.
- **updatedTime**: The time when details were last updated.
- **deletedDate**: Deletion date if applicable, currently `null`.
- **deletedTime**: Deletion time if applicable, currently `null`.

This detailed description provides clarity on each field in the API request for users working with the Video - Connect - Update - Periscope Live endpoint.

request.description:
### Endpoint Description: Video - Connect - Delete - Periscope Live

This endpoint is used to delete a video connection for a live stream on the Periscope platform.

#### Request Method
- **Method**: POST
  - This endpoint requires a POST request to initiate the deletion process.

#### Request URL
- **URL**: `http://localhost:3000/api/video/connect/delete`
  - This is the local server endpoint where the deletion request should be sent.

#### Request Headers
- **Content-Type**: `application/json`
  - This header indicates that the request body is in JSON format.

#### Request Body
The body of the request is structured as follows:

##### Options
- **providerName**: `periscopelive`
  - Specifies the name of the streaming provider being used.
  
- **providerId**: `""`
  - An identifier for the streaming provider; left empty in this request.
  
- **apiKey**: `null`
  - API key for authentication; not provided.
  
- **apiSecret**: `null`
  - Secret for API authentication; not provided.
  
- **apiClientId**: `null`
  - Client ID for API access; not provided.
  
- **authToken**: `null`
  - Token for user authentication; not provided.
  
- **server**: `null`
  - Server information; not provided.
  
- **rtmpUrl**: `null`
  - RTMP URL for streaming; not provided.
  
- **streamKey**: `null`
  - Key necessary for the stream; not provided.
  
- **channelUrl**: `null`
  - URL for the channel; not provided.
  
- **authUsername**: `null`
  - Username for authentication; not provided.
  
- **authPassword**: `null`
  - Password for authentication; not provided.
  
- **uniqueKey**: `uniqueKey`
  - A unique identifier for the stream.
  
- **videoId**: `videoId`
  - Identifier for the specific video to be deleted.
  
- **accountId**: `accountId`
  - Identifier for the user account.
  
- **channelId**: `channelId`
  - Identifier for the channel involved in the stream.
  
- **sessionId**: `sessionId`
  - Unique identifier for the current session.
  
- **streamId**: `streamId`
  - Identifier for the stream to be managed.
  
- **ipAddress**: `null`
  - IP address of the requestor; not provided.
  
- **country**: `United States`
  - Country associated with the stream.
  
- **state**: `California`
  - State associated with the stream.
  
- **title**: `Fortune's Basketball Challenge`
  - Title of the live stream.
  
- **description**: `Basketball game featuring amazing plays and challenges.`
  - Description providing details about the live stream.
  
- **tags**: `basketball,game,challenge`
  - Tags associated with the stream for categorization.

##### Stream Details
- **streamId**: `streamId`
  - Unique identifier for the stream event.
  
- **streamName**: `live-video-stream-7164b12d-1708817130231`
  - Name assigned to the live stream.
  
- **videoStatus**: `notready`
  - Current status of the video.
  
- **providerName**: `cloudflare`
  - Name of the provider broadcasting the stream.
  
- **providerUniqueId**: `c3b3f93b0a7594f3db917d5f9a671351`
  - Unique ID assigned by the provider.
  
- **providerPlaybackUrl**: `""`
  - Playback URL from the provider; currently empty.
  
- **providerStreamKey**: `e0bb5fa14f7059bccfcef40d5dbe2283kc3b3f93b0a7594f3db917d5f9a671351`
  - Stream key associated with the provider for live streaming.
  
- **providerStreamUrl**: `srt://live.cloudflare.com:778`
  - URL for streaming data.
  
- **createdDate**: `2024-02-24`
  - Date when the stream was created.
  
- **updatedDate**: `2024-02-25`
  - Date when the stream details were last updated.

##### Additional Metadata
- **success**: `true`
  - Indicates whether the API call was successful.
  
- **errors**: `[]`
  - Array to contain any errors during the operation; currently empty.
  
- **messages**: `[]`
  - Array to hold any messages generated during the operation; currently empty.

##### Video Details
- **title**: `Fortune's Basketball Challenge`
  - Title of the video content.
  
- **description**: `Basketball game featuring amazing plays and challenges.`
  - Detailed description of the video being deleted.
  
- **tags**: `basketball,game,challenge`
  - Related tags for easy search and categorization.
  
- **streamType**: `Live`
  - Type of stream indicating it is live.
  
- **createdDate**: `2024-02-18`
  - Date when the video entry was created.
  
- **updatedDate**: `2024-02-24`
  - Date of the last update on the video entry.

##### Device Information
- **primaryCameraName**: `Sony 4K Ultra HD WebCam`
  - Name of the main camera used for the stream.
  
- **primaryMicrophoneName**: `WirelessAudioTek Device`
  - Name of the primary microphone used during the stream.
  
- **primarySpeakerName**: `Bose-Mega-Speaker 2.0`
  - Name of the primary speaker device utilized.

- **additionalCameras**: `[...]`
  - Array listing additional camera and microphone setups used during the live stream.

This detailed information will assist in understanding the structure and purpose of the API request for deleting a live stream connection on the specified platform.

request.description:
### Endpoint Description: Video - Connect - Create - PicartoTV

#### Request Information
- **Method**: POST
  - This endpoint uses the POST method to send data to the server.
  
- **URL**: 
  - `http://localhost:3000/api/video/connect/create`
  - This is the endpoint where the request is directed.

- **Headers**:
  - **Content-Type**: application/json
    - This header indicates that the body of the request is formatted as JSON.

#### Request Body
The body of the request contains two main sections: `options` and `stream`. 

##### Options
- **providerName**: "picartotv"
  - The name of the service provider where the video will be streamed.

- **providerId**: ""
  - An optional identifier for the provider, which can be left empty if not applicable.

- **apiKey**: null
  - The API key used to authenticate with the provider. It can be null if not required.

- **apiSecret**: null
  - The API secret used for secure operations, which can also be null if not required.

- **apiClientId**: null
  - An optional identifier for the API client, which can be null.

- **authToken**: null
  - An authentication token for secure access, which may be null if not needed.

- **server**: null
  - The server address, which can be null if not specified.

- **rtmpUrl**: null
  - The RTMP URL for streaming, which can be left null if not applicable.

- **streamKey**: null
  - The stream key that identifies the stream, which can be null.

- **channelUrl**: null
  - The URL for the channel being used, which can also be empty.

- **authUsername**: null
  - Optional username for authorization which may not be needed.

- **authPassword**: null
  - Optional password for authorization; null if not required.

- **uniqueKey**: "uniqueKey"
  - A unique identifier for the stream.

- **videoId**: "videoId"
  - Identifier for the video being streamed.

- **accountId**: "accountId"
  - Identifier for the user's account.

- **channelId**: "channelId"
  - Identifier for the selected channel.

- **sessionId**: "sessionId"
  - The identifier for the current session.

- **streamId**: "streamId"
  - Identifier for the stream being created.

- **ipAddress**: null
  - The IP address from which the request is made; can be null.

- **country**: "United States"
  - The country where the streaming is taking place.

- **state**: "California"
  - The state in which the service is being utilized.

- **title**: "Fortune's Basketball Challenge"
  - Title of the video that is being streamed.

- **description**: "Basketball game featuring amazing plays and challenges."
  - A brief description of the content being streamed.

- **tags**: "basketball,game,challenge"
  - Tags associated with the video for easier categorization and searchability.

##### Stream
- **streamId**: "streamId"
  - Identifier for the stream.

- **streamName**: "live-video-stream-7164b12d-1708817130231"
  - Name assigned to the live stream.

- **uniqueKey**: "uniqueKey"
  - A unique key for the live stream connection.

- **videoId**: "videoId"
  - Identifier for the video associated with the stream.

- **accountId**: "accountId"
  - Reference to the userâ€™s account.

- **channelId**: "channelId"
  - Identifier for the channel related to the stream.

- **sessionId**: "sessionId"
  - Identifier for the current session.

- **videoStatus**: "notready"
  - Indicates the current status of the video.

- **providerName**: "cloudflare"
  - Name of the streaming service provider.

- **providerUniqueId**: "c3b3f93b0a7594f3db917d5f9a671351"
  - A unique identifier assigned by the provider.

- **providerPlaybackUrl**: ""
  - The URL for playback provided by the streaming service.

- **providerStreamId**: "c3b3f93b0a7594f3db917d5f9a671351"
  - Identifier for the stream as assigned by the provider.

- **providerStreamKey**: "e0bb5fa14f7059bccfcef40d5dbe2283kc3b3f93b0a7594f3db917d5f9a671351"
  - The stream key generated by the provider.

- **providerStreamUrl**: "srt://live.cloudflare.com:778"
  - The URL through which the stream is sent.

- **providerStreamData**:
  - **result**: Contains various stream data including:
    - **uid**: Unique identifier for this session.
    - **rtmps**: Contains the URL and stream key for RTMP streaming.
    - **rtmpsPlayback**: Contains the playback URL and stream key.
    - **srt**: Contains the SRT streaming URL and stream identifier.
    - **srtPlayback**: Contains the SRT playback URL and identifier.
    - **webRTC**: The URL for WebRTC publishing.
    - **webRTCPlayback**: The URL for WebRTC playback.

- **created**: "2024-02-24T23:25:30.935251Z"
  - The timestamp of when the stream was created.

- **modified**: "2024-02-24T23:25:30.935251Z"
  - The timestamp of the last modification made to the stream.

- **meta**: Contains metadata related to the stream, including:
  - **accountId**: Identifier for the userâ€™s account.
  - **audioInputName**: Name of the audio input device.
  - **channelId**: Identifier for the channel.
  - **coverPhotoUrl**: URL for the cover photo of the stream.
  - **description**: Description of the video content.
  - **streamId**: Unique identifier for the stream.
  - **title**: Title of the video content.
  - **videoId**: Identifier for the video.
  - **videoInputName**: Name of the video input device.

- **defaultCreator**: "7164b12d"
  - Identifier for the creator associated with this stream.

- **status**: null
  - Current status of the stream, which can be set to null until updated.

- **recording**: Contains details about recording settings:
  - **mode**: "automatic", indicating recording mode.
  - **requireSignedURLs**: false, specifies if signed URLs are needed for access.
  - **allowedOrigins**: null, indicating no specific origins are restricted.

- **deleteRecordingAfterDays**: null
  - Information on whether recordings should be deleted after a certain number of days.

- **success**: true
  - Indicates that the request was successful.

- **errors**: []
  - Any errors that occurred during the request. Empty if none occurred.

- **messages**: []
  - Additional messages related to the request. Empty if none.

- **createdDate**: "2024-02-24"
  - The date when the stream was created.

- **createdTime**: "23:25:30"
  - The time when the stream was created.

- **updatedDate**: "2024-02-25"
  - The date when the stream was last updated.

- **updatedTime**: "01:14:26"
  - The time of the last update for the stream.

- **deletedDate**: null
  - If the stream has been deleted, this field would contain that date; otherwise, it remains null.

- **deletedTime**: null
  - If the stream has been deleted, this field would contain that time; otherwise, it remains null.

##### Details
- **accountId**: "accountId"
  - Identifier for the user's account associated with the stream.

- **sessionId**: "sessionId"
  - Unique identifier for the current streaming session.

- **channelId**: "channelId"
  - Identifier for the channel where the stream is being held.

- **videoId**: "videoId"
  - Identifier for the video content.

- **title**: "Fortune's Basketball Challenge"
  - Title of the stream.

- **description**: "Basketball game featuring amazing plays and challenges."
  - Description of the streamed content.

- **tags**: "basketball,game,challenge"
  - Keywords associated with the stream for easy searchability.

- **streamType**: "Live"
  - Indicates the type of the stream, which is live in this case.

- **searchType**: "Game"
  - Type of content for search purposes.

- **started**: true
  - Indicates whether the stream has started.

- **startedOn**: "2024-02-24T22:41:42.483Z"
  - Timestamp of when the stream started.

- **paused**: false
  - Indicates whether the stream is currently paused.

- **pausedOn**: "2024-02-24T22:41:42.483Z"
  - Timestamp of when the stream was paused.

- **stopped**: false
  - Indicates whether the stream has been stopped.

- **stoppedOn**: null
  - Timestamp of when the stream was stopped, if applicable; otherwise, it remains null.

- **streamId**: "streamId"
  - Unique identifier for the live stream.

- **channel**: "Fortune's Basketball Channel"
  - Name of the channel broadcasting the stream.

- **category**: "Board"
  - Category of the content being streamed.

- **categoryId**: "categoryId"
  - Identifier for the stream's category.

- **subCategory**: "Outdoor Party"
  - Sub-category associated with the stream.

- **subCategoryId**: "subCategoryId"
  - Identifier for the stream's sub-category.

- **scheduleDate**: "2024-02-01"
  - Scheduled date of the stream.

- **scheduleTime**: "18:00:00"
  - Scheduled time for the stream.

- **streamHours**: 1
  - Duration of the stream in hours.

- **coverPhotoUrl**: "basketball-cover-url.jpg"
  - URL for the stream's cover photo.

- **providerPlaybackUrl**: ""
  - URL provided by the service for playback, which can be null.

- **voteTokenQuantity**: 100
  - Number of vote tokens available for voting during the stream.

- **votingTimeReset**: "5"
  - Duration in minutes after which the voting resets.

- **voteButtonQuantity**: 4
  - Number of voting buttons available during the streaming.

- **voteButtonText1**: "Layup"
  - Text for the first voting button.

- **voteButtonText2**: "Dunk"
  - Text for the second voting button.

- **isRewardsEnabled**: false
  - Indicates whether rewards are enabled during the stream.

- **isTournamentEnabled**: true
  - Indicates if there's a tournament feature enabled.

- **tournamentButtonText1**: "Hit"
  - Text for the first button in the tournament feature.

- **tournamentButtonText2**: "Miss"
  - Text for the second button in the tournament feature.

- **streamLocatorName**: "basketball-locator-name"
  - Name given to the stream locator.

- **streamAssetName**: "basketball-asset-name"
  - Name assigned to the stream's asset.

- **platformVideoIds**: Contains identifiers for various platforms for the video output:
  - Series of identifiers marked false if not set up for their respective platforms.

- **platformEventIds**: Contains identifiers for various platforms for events:
  - Series of identifiers marked false if not set up for their respective platforms.

- **primaryCameraName**: "Sony 4K Ultra HD WebCam"
  - Name of the primary camera being used.

- **primaryMicrophoneName**: "WirelessAudioTek Device"
  - Name of the primary microphone being used.

- **primarySpeakerName**: "Bose-Mega-Speaker 2.0"
  - Name of the primary speaker being used.

- **additionalCameras**: An array containing additional camera and microphone setups.

- **createdDate**: "2024-02-18"
  - The date when the video entry was created.

- **createdTime**: "14:54:25"
  - The time when the video entry was created.

- **updatedDate**: "2024-02-24"
  - The date when the video entry was last updated.

- **updatedTime**: "23:29:19"
  - The time of the last update to the video entry.

- **deletedDate**: null
  - If the entry has been deleted, this field would indicate when.

- **deletedTime**: null
  - If the entry has been deleted, this field would indicate the time of deletion.

request.description:
{
  "description": {
    "name": "Video - Connect - Update - PicartoTV",
    "request": {
      "method": "PUT",
      "url": "http://localhost:3000/api/video/connect/update",
      "headers": [
        {
          "key": "Content-Type",
          "value": "application/json"
        }
      ],
      "body": {
        "mode": "raw",
        "raw": "This raw JSON body contains several key sections detailing the video update options and streaming information. The options section includes details necessary for connecting to the PicartoTV platform, while the stream section provides specific streaming related data."
      }
    },
    "options": {
      "providerName": "The name of the video streaming provider, in this case, PicartoTV.",

request.description:
### Endpoint Description: Video - Connect - Delete - PicartoTV

#### Request Method: 
- **POST**: This endpoint uses the POST method to send data to the server to request the deletion of a video stream.

#### Request URL: 
- **http://localhost:3000/api/video/connect/delete**: This is the URL where the request is sent to delete a video stream connection.

#### Request Headers:
- **Content-Type**: Specifies the media type of the resource. In this case, it is set to `application/json`, indicating that the body of the request contains JSON.

#### Request Body:
The request body contains two main sections: `options` and `stream`.

1. **Options**:
   - **providerName**: The name of the provider for the video stream, set to "picartotv".
   - **providerId**: Identifier for the video provider; currently empty.
   - **apiKey**: API key used for authentication; currently set to null.
   - **apiSecret**: API secret used for authentication; currently set to null.
   - **apiClientId**: Unique client ID for API requests; currently null.
   - **authToken**: Token for authorized requests; currently null.
   - **server**: Address of the server handling the request; currently null.
   - **rtmpUrl**: URL for RTMP streaming; currently null.
   - **streamKey**: Key for the streaming session; currently null.
   - **channelUrl**: URL for the video channel; currently null.
   - **authUsername**: Username for authentication; currently null.
   - **authPassword**: Password for authentication; currently null.
   - **uniqueKey**: A unique identifier for the stream; filled with placeholder "uniqueKey".
   - **videoId**: Identifier for the video being deleted; filled with placeholder "videoId".
   - **accountId**: ID of the userâ€™s account; filled with "accountId".
   - **channelId**: Identifier for the video channel; filled with "channelId".
   - **sessionId**: Identifier for the current session; filled with "sessionId".
   - **streamId**: Identifier for the stream; filled with "streamId".
   - **ipAddress**: The user's IP address; currently null.
   - **country**: Country of the user; set to "United States".
   - **state**: State of the user; set to "California".
   - **title**: Title of the video stream; set to "Fortune's Basketball Challenge".
   - **description**: Description of the video content; "Basketball game featuring amazing plays and challenges."
   - **tags**: Comma-separated list of tags related to the video; set to "basketball, game, challenge".

2. **Stream**:
   - **streamId**: Identifier for the stream; filled with "streamId".
   - **streamName**: Name of the stream; filled with a unique string "live-video-stream-7164b12d-1708817130231".
   - **uniqueKey**: Unique key for the stream; filled with "uniqueKey".
   - **videoId**: Identifier for the corresponding video; filled with "videoId".
   - **accountId**: ID of the account associated with the stream; filled with "accountId".
   - **channelId**: Channel identifier; filled with "channelId".
   - **sessionId**: Current session identifier; filled with "sessionId".
   - **videoStatus**: Current status of the video; set to "notready".
   - **providerName**: Service provider for the stream; set to "cloudflare".
   - **providerUniqueId**: Unique identifier for the provider; filled with a specific ID.
   - **providerPlaybackUrl**: URL for playback from the provider; currently empty.
   - **providerStreamId**: Identifier for the provider's stream; filled with a specific ID.
   - **providerStreamKey**: Stream key used by the provider; filled with a key.
   - **providerStreamUrl**: URL for the video's stream; filled with "srt://live.cloudflare.com:778".
   - **providerStreamData**: Contains a nested structure with data about the stream's availability and configurations such as RTMPS and SRT URLs, timestamps for creation, and metadata such as the account details and stream configurations.
   - **success**: Boolean indicating whether the request was successful; set to true.
   - **errors**: Array for any errors encountered during the request; currently empty.
   - **messages**: Array for any messages related to the request; currently empty.
   - **createdDate** & **createdTime**: Timestamps for when the stream was created.
   - **updatedDate** & **updatedTime**: Timestamps for the last update to the stream.
   - **deletedDate** & **deletedTime**: Timestamps for deletion; currently null.

3. **Details**:
   - **accountId**: Identifier for the user's account; filled with "accountId".
   - **sessionId**: Identifier for the session; filled with "sessionId".
   - **channelId**: Identifier for the channel; filled with "channelId".
   - **videoId**: Identifier for the video; filled with "videoId".
   - **title**: Title of the video stream; repeated as "Fortune's Basketball Challenge".
   - **description**: Description of the video content; repeated.
   - **tags**: Tags related to the video; repeated.
   - **streamType**: Type of stream; set to "Live".
   - **searchType**: Type used for searching; set to "Game".
   - **started**: Indicates if the stream has started; set to true.
   - **startedOn**: Timestamp for when the stream started.
   - **paused**: Indicates if the stream is paused; set to false.
   - **pausedOn**: Timestamp for when the stream was paused.
   - **stopped**: Indicates if the stream is stopped; set to false.
   - **stoppedOn**: Timestamp for when the stream was stopped; currently null.
   - **streamId**: Identifier for the stream; filled with "streamId".
   - **channel**: Name of the channel; set to "Fortune's Basketball Channel".
   - **category**: Category of the video; set to "Board".
   - **categoryId**: Identifier for the category; filled with "categoryId".
   - **subCategory**: Subcategory of the video; set to "Outdoor Party".
   - **subCategoryId**: Identifier for the subcategory; filled with "subCategoryId".
   - **scheduleDate**: Date when the stream is scheduled to occur.
   - **scheduleTime**: Time when the stream is scheduled.
   - **streamHours**: Duration of the stream in hours; set to 1.
   - **coverPhotoUrl**: URL for the cover photo of the stream.
   - **providerPlaybackUrl**: Playback URL from the provider; currently empty.
   - **voteTokenQuantity**: Number of voting tokens available; set to 100.
   - **votingTimeReset**: Duration in seconds before voting time resets; set to 5.
   - **voteButtonQuantity**: Number of vote buttons available; set to 4.
   - **voteButtonText1**: Text label for the first vote button; set to "Layup".
   - **voteButtonText2**: Text label for the second vote button; set to "Dunk".
   - **isRewardsEnabled**: Indicates if rewards are enabled; set to false.
   - **isTournamentEnabled**: Indicates if tournaments are enabled; set to true.
   - **tournamentButtonText1**: Text label for the first tournament button; set to "Hit".
   - **tournamentButtonText2**: Text label for the second tournament button; set to "Miss".
   - **streamLocatorName**: Name of the stream locator; set to "basketball-locator-name".
   - **streamAssetName**: Name of the stream asset; set to "basketball-asset-name".
   - **platformVideoIds**: Object containing platform-specific video IDs; all fields currently set to false.
   - **platformEventIds**: Object containing platform-specific event IDs; all fields currently set to false.
   - **primaryCameraName**: Name of the main camera used; set to "Sony 4K Ultra HD WebCam".
   - **primaryMicrophoneName**: Name of the main microphone used; set to "WirelessAudioTek Device".
   - **primarySpeakerName**: Name of the main speaker used; set to "Bose-Mega-Speaker 2.0".
   - **additionalCameras**: Array of additional cameras and associated microphones.
   - **createdDate** & **createdTime**: Timestamps for when the details were created.
   - **updatedDate** & **updatedTime**: Timestamps for when the details were last updated.
   - **deletedDate** & **deletedTime**: Timestamps for deletion; currently null.

request.description:
### Endpoint: Video - Connect - Create - Restream Live

**Request Method:**  
- **POST**: This indicates that the client is sending data to the server to create a new resource.

**Request URL:**  
- **http://localhost:3000/api/video/connect/create**: This is the URL where the request will be sent, targeting the local server's video connection creation endpoint.

**Headers:**  
- **Content-Type**: Specifies the type of data being sent in the request body. In this case, it's set to "application/json", indicating that the request body contains JSON data.

**Request Body:**  
- **options**: Contains various settings and parameters for the video connection:
  - **providerName**: The name of the video streaming provider, set to "restreamlive".
  - **providerId**: An identifier for the provider which is currently not specified.
  - **apiKey**: A key used for API authentication; set to null, meaning no key is provided.
  - **apiSecret**: Secret for API access; currently null.
  - **apiClientId**: An ID for the API client; set to null.
  - **authToken**: Token used for authentication; null denotes no token is provided.
  - **server**: The server address; currently not specified.
  - **rtmpUrl**: URL for Real-Time Messaging Protocol; set to null.
  - **streamKey**: Key for streaming to the service; currently null.
  - **channelUrl**: URL for the streaming channel; null indicates not specified.
  - **authUsername**: Username for authentication if required; set to null.
  - **authPassword**: Password for authentication if required; null denotes not specified.
  - **uniqueKey**: A unique identifier for this specific stream.
  - **videoId**: ID associated with the video.
  - **accountId**: ID for the userâ€™s account.
  - **channelId**: ID for the channel being used.
  - **sessionId**: ID for the current session.
  - **streamId**: ID for the stream that is being created.
  - **ipAddress**: The IP address for the user; currently set to null.
  - **country**: The country of the streaming, set to "United States".
  - **state**: The state of the server or service, specified as "California".
  - **title**: Title of the video stream, "Fortune's Basketball Challenge".
  - **description**: Description of the content, "Basketball game featuring amazing plays and challenges."
  - **tags**: Tags related to the content, "basketball,game,challenge".

- **stream**: Contains detailed information about the stream itself:
  - **streamId**: ID for this specific stream.
  - **streamName**: A generated name for the live stream, unique to this session.
  - **uniqueKey**: Key unique to the stream.
  - **videoId**: ID related to the video content.
  - **accountId**: Userâ€™s account identifier.
  - **channelId**: Identifier for the channel.
  - **sessionId**: Current session identifier.
  - **videoStatus**: Status of the video stream, set to "notready".
  - **providerName**: The name of the streaming provider, in this case, "cloudflare".
  - **providerUniqueId**: Unique identifier from the provider.
  - **providerPlaybackUrl**: URL for playback, currently not specified.
  - **providerStreamId**: Identifier for the stream on the provider's end.
  - **providerStreamKey**: Key needed to access the stream.
  - **providerStreamUrl**: URL to access the live stream.
  - **providerStreamData**: Contains additional data returned from the provider, including:
    - **uid**: Unique identifier for the stream.
    - **rtmps**: Details regarding secure real-time messaging protocol including URL and stream key.
    - **rtmpsPlayback**: Contains playback URL and stream key for secure transmission.
    - **srt**: Details for secure reliable transport including URL and stream ID.
    - **srtPlayback**: Playback details for secure transport.
    - **webRTC**: URL for real-time communication publishing.
    - **webRTCPlayback**: Playback URL for real-time communication.
    - **created**: Timestamp for when the stream was created.
    - **modified**: Timestamp for when the stream details were last modified.
    - **meta**: Additional metadata about the stream including account, channel, and video details.
    - **defaultCreator**: Identifier for the creator of the stream.
    - **status**: Current status of the stream.
    - **recording**: Details about recording mode and requirements.
    - **deleteRecordingAfterDays**: Specifies after how many days to delete the recording if applicable.

- **createdDate**: Date when the stream was created.
- **createdTime**: Time when the stream was created.
- **updatedDate**: Date when the stream details were last updated.
- **updatedTime**: Time when the stream details were updated.
- **deletedDate**: The date when the stream was deleted, which is currently null.
- **deletedTime**: The time when the stream was deleted, currently null.

- **details**: Summary of the streaming details, including:
  - **accountId**: Identifier for the userâ€™s account.
  - **sessionId**: ID for the current streaming session.
  - **channelId**: ID for the streaming channel.
  - **videoId**: ID associated with the video content.
  - **title**: Title of the stream.
  - **description**: Description of the stream content.
  - **tags**: Tags describing the content of the stream.
  - **streamType**: Type of stream, in this case, "Live".
  - **searchType**: The category used for searching, which is "Game".
  - **started**: Boolean indicating whether the stream has started.
  - **startedOn**: Timestamp for when the stream started.
  - **paused**: Boolean indicating if the stream is paused.
  - **pausedOn**: Timestamp for when the stream was paused.
  - **stopped**: Boolean indicating if the stream has been stopped.
  - **stoppedOn**: Timestamp for when the stream was stopped, currently null.
  - **streamId**: Identifier for the stream.
  - **channel**: Name of the channel being streamed.
  - **category**: General category of the stream, "Board".
  - **categoryId**: Identifier for the category.
  - **subCategory**: More specific categorization, "Outdoor Party".
  - **subCategoryId**: Identifier for the sub-category.
  - **scheduleDate**: Date when the stream is scheduled.
  - **scheduleTime**: Time when the stream is scheduled.
  - **streamHours**: Duration in hours for the stream.
  - **coverPhotoUrl**: URL for the cover photo of the stream.
  - **providerPlaybackUrl**: Playback URL from the provider, currently null.
  - **voteTokenQuantity**: Number of tokens available for voting.
  - **votingTimeReset**: Duration before the voting time resets.
  - **voteButtonQuantity**: Number of available voting buttons.
  - **voteButtonText1**: Text for the first voting option.
  - **voteButtonText2**: Text for the second voting option.
  - **isRewardsEnabled**: Indicates if rewards are enabled for this stream.
  - **isTournamentEnabled**: Indicates if the tournament feature is available.
  - **tournamentButtonText1**: Text for the first tournament option.
  - **tournamentButtonText2**: Text for the second tournament option.
  - **streamLocatorName**: Name used for locating the stream.
  - **streamAssetName**: Name for the asset associated with the stream.
  - **platformVideoIds**: Object containing various platform-specific video IDs, all currently set to false, indicating those platforms are not configured.
  - **platformEventIds**: Object containing various platform-specific event IDs, also set false.
  - **primaryCameraName**: Name of the primary camera used for the stream.
  - **primaryMicrophoneName**: Name of the primary microphone used for the stream.
  - **primarySpeakerName**: Name of the primary speaker used for the event.
  - **additionalCameras**: Array of objects representing additional cameras and microphones used.
  - **createdDate**: Date when the details were created.
  - **createdTime**: Time when the details were created.
  - **updatedDate**: Date when the details were last updated.
  - **updatedTime**: Time when the details were last updated.
  - **deletedDate**: Date when the details were deleted, currently null.
  - **deletedTime**: Time when the details were deleted, currently null.
