request.description:
### Endpoint: Video - Connect - Update - Restream Live

#### Request Method
- **PUT**: The HTTP method used for this request, indicating that the request is meant to update existing resources.

#### URL
- **http://localhost:3000/api/video/connect/update**: The endpoint URL where the request is sent to update video connection details.

#### Headers
- **Content-Type**: 
  - **Value**: `"application/json"`: This header specifies that the content type of the request body is JSON.

#### Body
The request body is structured into two main parts: `options` and `stream`, followed by `details`. 

##### Options
Contains configuration and parameters related to the video stream connecting options.

- **providerName**: 
  - Describes the name of the streaming provider being used as "restreamlive."
  
- **providerId**: 
  - A unique identifier for the provider. In this case, it is blank.
  
- **apiKey**: 
  - Used for authentication with the streaming provider; currently set to null.
  
- **apiSecret**: 
  - Another authentication token for secure communications; currently set to null.
  
- **apiClientId**: 
  - Identifier for the API client; currently null.
  
- **authToken**: 
  - Token for authorization; currently null.
  
- **server**: 
  - Specifies server information to connect to; currently null.
  
- **rtmpUrl**: 
  - This is the Real-Time Messaging Protocol URL; currently null.
  
- **streamKey**: 
  - The key required to identify the stream; currently null.
  
- **channelUrl**: 
  - The URL for the streaming channel; currently null.
  
- **authUsername**: 
  - Username for authentication; currently null.
  
- **authPassword**: 
  - Password for authentication; currently null.
  
- **uniqueKey**: 
  - A key that uniquely identifies this video stream.
  
- **videoId**: 
  - Identifier for the specific video being streamed.
  
- **accountId**: 
  - Identifier for the user's account on the streaming platform.
  
- **channelId**: 
  - Identifier for the specific channel where the video is streamed.
  
- **sessionId**: 
  - Identifier for the current streaming session.
  
- **streamId**: 
  - Identifier for the stream instance.
  
- **ipAddress**: 
  - The IP address from which the request originates; currently null.
  
- **country**: 
  - Set to "United States," indicating the country of the video stream.
  
- **state**: 
  - Set to "California," indicating the state of the video stream.
  
- **title**: 
  - The title of the video stream, "Fortune's Basketball Challenge".
  
- **description**: 
  - A brief description of the stream, detailing it as "Basketball game featuring amazing plays and challenges."
  
- **tags**: 
  - Comma-separated keywords related to the stream, here "basketball, game, challenge".

##### Stream
Provides real-time data about the video stream being updated.

- **streamId**: 
  - Unique identifier for the stream.
  
- **streamName**: 
  - The name assigned to the stream, "live-video-stream-7164b12d-1708817130231".
  
- **uniqueKey**: 
  - Key uniquely identifying this specific stream.
  
- **videoId**: 
  - Identifier for the associated video.
  
- **accountId**: 
  - Identifier for the related account.
  
- **channelId**: 
  - Identifier for the channel hosting the stream.
  
- **sessionId**: 
  - Identifier for the particular session of streaming.
  
- **videoStatus**: 
  - Indicates the current status of the video, set to "notready" at the moment.
  
- **providerName**: 
  - Specifies "cloudflare" as the service provider for the stream.
  
- **providerUniqueId**: 
  - Unique ID assigned to the provider, "c3b3f93b0a7594f3db917d5f9a671351".
  
- **providerPlaybackUrl**: 
  - URL for playback offered by the provider; currently blank.
  
- **providerStreamId**: 
  - Unique identifier for the stream assigned by the provider.
  
- **providerStreamKey**: 
  - Key provided by the provider for stream identification.
  
- **providerStreamUrl**: 
  - URL for streaming, pertaining to "srt://live.cloudflare.com:778".
  
- **providerStreamData**: 
  - Contains further details about the stream.
  - **result**: Nested object that provides various streaming protocols and parameters such as RTMPS, SRT, and WebRTC details.
  - **created**: Timestamp noting when the stream was created.
  - **modified**: Timestamp indicating when the stream details were last updated.
  - **meta**: Contains metadata regarding the stream like account ID, audio input device, cover photo URL, stream ID, title, video ID, and video input device.
  - **defaultCreator**: Identifier for the creator of the stream.
  - **status**: Status of the stream, currently null.
  - **recording**: Details about the recording mode and requirements.
  - **deleteRecordingAfterDays**: Indicates if the recording is to be deleted after a number of days; currently null.

- **success**: 
  - Indicates whether the update operation was successful, currently set to true.
  
- **errors**: 
  - Array to capture any errors; currently empty.
  
- **messages**: 
  - Array for additional messages; currently empty.

- **createdDate**: 
  - Date when the stream was created, set to "2024-02-24".
  
- **createdTime**: 
  - Time when the stream was created.
  
- **updatedDate**: 
  - Date when the stream details were last updated.
  
- **updatedTime**: 
  - Time when the stream details were updated.
  
- **deletedDate**: 
  - Date when the stream was deleted, currently null.
  
- **deletedTime**: 
  - Time of deletion, currently null.

##### Details
Provides a comprehensive overview of the video stream status and related attributes.

- **accountId**: 
  - Identifier for the user account associated with the stream.
  
- **sessionId**: 
  - Identifier for the streaming session.
  
- **channelId**: 
  - Identifier for the specific channel hosting the stream.
  
- **videoId**: 
  - Identifier for the video linked with the stream.
  
- **title**: 
  - The title of the stream.
  
- **description**: 
  - Description of what the stream entails.
  
- **tags**: 
  - Keywords associated with the stream.
  
- **streamType**: 
  - Type of stream, which is set to "Live".
  
- **searchType**: 
  - Setting that indicates the type of search for the video, set to "Game".
  
- **started**: 
  - Boolean flag indicating whether the stream has started, set to true.
  
- **startedOn**: 
  - Timestamp when the stream started.
  
- **paused**: 
  - Boolean flag indicating whether the stream is paused, currently set to false.
  
- **pausedOn**: 
  - Timestamp when the stream was paused, currently reflects the start time.
  
- **stopped**: 
  - Indicates if the stream is stopped, set to false.
  
- **stoppedOn**: 
  - Timestamp for when the stream was stopped, currently null.
  
- **streamId**: 
  - Unique identifier for the ongoing stream.
  
- **channel**: 
  - The name of the channel where the stream takes place.
  
- **category**: 
  - General category for the content of the stream.
  
- **categoryId**: 
  - Identifier for the category.
  
- **subCategory**: 
  - More specific categorization of the content.
  
- **subCategoryId**: 
  - Identifier for the sub-category.
  
- **scheduleDate**: 
  - Date when the stream is scheduled to occur.
  
- **scheduleTime**: 
  - Time at which the stream is scheduled to start.
  
- **streamHours**: 
  - Duration of the stream in hours.
  
- **coverPhotoUrl**: 
  - URL for the cover photo associated with the stream.
  
- **providerPlaybackUrl**: 
  - Playback URL from the provider; currently blank.
  
- **voteTokenQuantity**: 
  - Number of voting tokens available.
  
- **votingTimeReset**: 
  - Duration after which voting times reset.
  
- **voteButtonQuantity**: 
  - Number of voting buttons available.
  
- **voteButtonText1**: 
  - Text for the first voting button.
  
- **voteButtonText2**: 
  - Text for the second voting button.
  
- **isRewardsEnabled**: 
  - Indicates if the rewards feature is enabled for the stream, currently false.
  
- **isTournamentEnabled**: 
  - Indicates whether the tournament feature is enabled; currently set to true.
  
- **tournamentButtonText1**: 
  - Text for the first tournament button.
  
- **tournamentButtonText2**: 
  - Text for the second tournament button.
  
- **streamLocatorName**: 
  - Locator name for this specific stream.
  
- **streamAssetName**: 
  - Asset name associated with the stream.
  
- **platformVideoIds**: 
  - Object storing video IDs for various platforms; all set to false indicating none are associated.
  
- **platformEventIds**: 
  - Object tracking event IDs across different platforms; all set to false indicating none are associated.
  
- **primaryCameraName**: 
  - Name of the primary camera in use for the stream.
  
- **primaryMicrophoneName**: 
  - Name of the primary microphone used for the stream.
  
- **primarySpeakerName**: 
  - Name of the primary speaker used during the stream.
  
- **additionalCameras**: 
  - Array of additional cameras and microphones used, with identifiers for each.
  
- **createdDate**: 
  - Date when the stream details were originally created.
  
- **createdTime**: 
  - Time when the stream details were originally created.
  
- **updatedDate**: 
  - Date when the stream details were last updated.
  
- **updatedTime**: 
  - Time when the stream details were last updated.
  
- **deletedDate**: 
  - Date of stream deletion; currently null.
  
- **deletedTime**: 
  - Time of stream deletion; currently null.

request.description:
### Endpoint Description: Video - Connect - Delete - Restream Live

#### Request Details:
- **Method**: Specifies the type of request being sent to the server, which is a POST request in this case.
- **URL**: The location where the request is sent, which is `http://localhost:3000/api/video/connect/delete`. This indicates a local server endpoint that handles video connection deletions.
- **Headers**:  
  - **Content-Type**: Indicates that the data sent in the request body is in JSON format.

#### Request Body:
The following JSON structure outlines the body of the request:

- **options**: Contains various parameters related to the video connection:
  - **providerName**: Specifies the streaming service provider, set to "restreamlive" for this request.
  - **providerId**: An optional identifier for the streaming provider.
  - **apiKey**: Credentials used for API access; here it's set to null.
  - **apiSecret**: Secret key for authentication with the provider; here it's set to null.
  - **apiClientId**: Client identifier for the API, also set to null.
  - **authToken**: Token for authenticating with the provider, set to null.
  - **server**: The server designation; currently null.
  - **rtmpUrl**: URL for the RTMP stream; currently null.
  - **streamKey**: Key associated with the stream; currently null.
  - **channelUrl**: URL for the associated channel; currently null.
  - **authUsername**: Username for authentication, set to null.
  - **authPassword**: Password for authentication, set to null.
  - **uniqueKey**: A string used to identify the stream uniquely, given as "uniqueKey".
  - **videoId**: Identifier for the video involved, represented as "videoId".
  - **accountId**: Identifier for the account related to the video, represented as "accountId".
  - **channelId**: Identifier for the channel, represented as "channelId".
  - **sessionId**: Identifier for the session, represented as "sessionId".
  - **streamId**: Identifier for the stream, represented as "streamId".
  - **ipAddress**: IP address of the user; currently null.
  - **country**: Country where the stream is initiated, set to "United States".
  - **state**: State where the stream is initiated, set to "California".
  - **title**: Title of the streamed video, set to "Fortune's Basketball Challenge".
  - **description**: Description for the video content, which is "Basketball game featuring amazing plays and challenges."
  - **tags**: Tags associated with the video for categorization, listed as "basketball,game,challenge".

- **stream**: Contains details about the specific stream:
  - **streamId**: Identifier for the stream, represented here as "streamId".
  - **streamName**: The name assigned to the stream instance.
  - **uniqueKey**: A unique identifier for the stream.
  - **videoId**: Links back to the video identifier.
  - **accountId**: Links back to the associated account identifier.
  - **channelId**: Links back to the channel identifier.
  - **sessionId**: Links back to the session identifier.
  - **videoStatus**: Status of the video, which in this case is "notready".
  - **providerName**: Indicates the streaming provider, "cloudflare".
  - **providerUniqueId**: A unique identifier for the provider session.
  - **providerPlaybackUrl**: URL for playback via the provider; currently empty.
  - **providerStreamId**: Unique ID associated with the provider's stream.
  - **providerStreamKey**: Key for the stream at the provider, provided here.
  - **providerStreamUrl**: URL for connecting to the provider's stream.
  - **providerStreamData**: Contains detailed information about the provider's stream, including:
    - **result**: A nested object with specific identifiers and stream configuration details.
    - **created**: Timestamp for when the stream was created.
    - **modified**: Timestamp for the last modification of the stream.
    - **meta**: Metadata associated with the video, including title, description, stream ID, and identifiers.
    - **defaultCreator**: Default creator associated with the stream.
    - **recording**: Information related to the recording settings.
    - **deleteRecordingAfterDays**: Configuration for deleting recordings after a certain period; currently null.
  - **success**: Indicates whether the request was successful, set to true.
  - **errors**: An array capturing any errors encountered, currently empty to suggest no issues occurred.
  - **messages**: Any additional messages related to the request, currently empty.

- **createdDate**: The date the stream was created, given as "2024-02-24".
- **createdTime**: The time the stream was created, listed as "23:25:30".
- **updatedDate**: Last date the stream details were updated, provided as "2024-02-25".
- **updatedTime**: Last time the stream details were updated, listed as "01:14:26".
- **deletedDate**: The date the video or stream was deleted; currently null.
- **deletedTime**: The time the video or stream was deleted; also currently null.

- **details**: A collection of additional information regarding the video and stream:
  - **accountId**: Rephrases the account identifier, represented as "accountId".
  - **sessionId**: Reiterates the session identifier.
  - **channelId**: Reiterates the channel identifier.
  - **videoId**: Reiterates the video identifier.
  - **title**: Title of the video stream, "Fortune's Basketball Challenge".
  - **description**: Description of the video content.
  - **tags**: Video tags used for categorization.
  - **streamType**: Type of stream, set as "Live".
  - **searchType**: Search category, specified as "Game".
  - **started**: Indicates whether the stream has started, marked as true.
  - **startedOn**: Timestamp for when the stream started.
  - **paused**: Indicates whether the stream is currently paused, set to false.
  - **pausedOn**: Timestamp indicating when the stream was paused, reflects the starting time.
  - **stopped**: Indicates if the stream has stopped; set to false.
  - **stoppedOn**: Timestamp for when the stream stopped, currently null as it hasnâ€™t stopped.
  - **streamId**: Identifier for the stream.
  - **channel**: Name of the channel, specified as "Fortune's Basketball Channel".
  - **category**: General category of the video stream, specified as "Board".
  - **categoryId**: Identifier for the category.
  - **subCategory**: Further breakdown of the category, specified as "Outdoor Party".
  - **subCategoryId**: Identifier for the sub-category.
  - **scheduleDate**: Date the stream was scheduled, set to "2024-02-01".
  - **scheduleTime**: Time the stream was scheduled to start, set to "18:00:00".
  - **streamHours**: Duration of the stream in hours, recorded as 1 hour.
  - **coverPhotoUrl**: URL for the cover photo of the stream.
  - **providerPlaybackUrl**: Playback URL for the provider, set currently as empty.
  - **voteTokenQuantity**: Quantity of tokens available for voting during the stream, set to 100.
  - **votingTimeReset**: Time duration for when the voting resets, set to "5".
  - **voteButtonQuantity**: Number of vote buttons available, set to 4.
  - **voteButtonText1**: Text for the first vote button, "Layup".
  - **voteButtonText2**: Text for the second vote button, "Dunk".
  - **isRewardsEnabled**: Indicates whether rewards are enabled, set to false.
  - **isTournamentEnabled**: Indicates whether tournament features are enabled, set to true.
  - **tournamentButtonText1**: Text for the first tournament button, "Hit".
  - **tournamentButtonText2**: Text for the second tournament button, "Miss".
  - **streamLocatorName**: Name for locating the stream, specified as "basketball-locator-name".
  - **streamAssetName**: Name for the assets used in the stream, specified as "basketball-asset-name".
  - **platformVideoIds**: Object for storing output IDs for various platforms, all currently set to false, suggesting no video IDs have been generated for other platforms.
  - **platformEventIds**: Object for storing event IDs for different platforms, all set to false, indicating no event IDs are associated at this point.
  - **primaryCameraName**: Name of the primary camera used for the stream, specified as "Sony 4K Ultra HD WebCam".
  - **primaryMicrophoneName**: Name of the primary microphone used, specified as "WirelessAudioTek Device".
  - **primarySpeakerName**: Name of the primary speaker used, specified as "Bose-Mega-Speaker 2.0".
  - **additionalCameras**: An array containing objects with the names of additional cameras and their associated microphones.
  - **createdDate**: Date when the detailed account was created.
  - **createdTime**: Time when the detailed account was created.
  - **updatedDate**: Date when the detailed account was last updated.
  - **updatedTime**: Time when the detailed account was last updated.
  - **deletedDate**: Date of deletion for this video account, currently null.
  - **deletedTime**: Time of deletion for this video account, currently null.

request.description:
### Endpoint: Video - Connect - Create - Rumble Live

**Request Method:** POST  
**Request URL:** http://localhost:3000/api/video/connect/create  

#### Headers
- **Content-Type**: Specifies the media type of the resource. In this case, it is set to "application/json" to indicate that the request body will be in JSON format.

#### Request Body

**1. Options**
- **providerName**: Name of the streaming provider being used. Here, it is "rumblelive".
- **providerId**: Unique identifier for the provider. Currently not specified.
- **apiKey**: Key for authenticating with the API. Set to null, meaning it is not provided.
- **apiSecret**: Secret key for additional authentication. Currently not provided.
- **apiClientId**: Identifier for the API client. Not specified.
- **authToken**: Token for authentication purposes. Not provided.
- **server**: Server information related to the streaming. Not provided.
- **rtmpUrl**: The RTMP URL used for streaming. Not specified.
- **streamKey**: Key that uniquely identifies the stream. Not provided.
- **channelUrl**: URL specific to the streaming channel. Not provided.
- **authUsername**: Username for authentication. Not specified.
- **authPassword**: Password for authentication. Not provided.
- **uniqueKey**: Custom key used to identify the session uniquely.
- **videoId**: Identifier for the video being streamed.
- **accountId**: Unique identifier for the user account.
- **channelId**: Identifier for the channel where the video is streamed.
- **sessionId**: Unique identifier for the current streaming session.
- **streamId**: Identifier for the stream.
- **ipAddress**: IP address of the user. Currently not specified.
- **country**: Country where the stream is initiated. Here, it is set to "United States".
- **state**: State where the user is located. In this case, it is "California".
- **title**: Title of the video stream. Example given is "Fortune's Basketball Challenge".
- **description**: Brief description of the video content, e.g., "Basketball game featuring amazing plays and challenges."
- **tags**: Comma-separated tags that categorize the video, such as "basketball,game,challenge".

**2. Stream**
- **streamId**: Identifier for the current stream.
- **streamName**: Unique name given to the stream, e.g., "live-video-stream-7164b12d-1708817130231".
- **videoStatus**: Status of the video stream, such as "notready".
- **providerName**: Name of the streaming provider, which is "cloudflare" in this case.
- **providerUniqueId**: Unique ID assigned by the provider for the stream.
- **providerStreamId**: ID for the stream generated by the provider.
- **providerStreamKey**: Key required for accessing the stream on the provider's service.
- **providerStreamUrl**: URL for the stream provided by the streaming service.

**3. Provider Stream Data**
- Provides metadata about the stream, including:
  - **uid**: Unique identifier for the stream.
  - **rtmps**: RTMPS URL and stream key for secure streaming.
  - **srt**: Secure Reliable Transport details including URL and passphrase.
  - **webRTC**: URL for WebRTC publishing.
  - **created**: Timestamp indicating when the stream was created.
  - **modified**: Timestamp of the last update to the stream.
  - **meta**: Metadata like account ID, audio input name, cover photo URL, description, title, video ID, etc.
  - **status**: Current status of the stream.
  - **recording**: Details related to stream recording options.
  - **deleteRecordingAfterDays**: Indicates if recordings should be deleted after a set number of days.

**4. Details**
- Contains specifics about the stream:
  - **accountId**, **sessionId**, **channelId**, **videoId**: Identifiers for various entities related to the user and content.
  - **title**: Title of the event or stream.
  - **description**: Description of the stream.
  - **tags**: Tags associated with the stream.
  - **streamType**: Type of stream, e.g., "Live".
  - **searchType**: Category of content, such as "Game".
  - **started**: Boolean indicating whether the stream has started.
  - **startedOn**: Timestamp of when the stream started.
  - **paused**: Boolean indicating if the stream is currently paused.
  - **stopped**: Boolean indicating if the stream has been stopped.
  - Various IDs and names related to the stream's category and platforms involved.
  - **tournamentButtonText**: Text associated with tournament options available during the stream.
  - **primaryCameraName**, **primaryMicrophoneName**, **primarySpeakerName**: Names of the hardware used during the streaming.
  - **additionalCameras**: Array of additional cameras and their respective microphones used.
  - Timestamps for creation and updates.

This endpoint provides the infrastructure necessary for initializing a live video stream with various options for configuration, metadata, and stream management.

request.description:
### Endpoint Summary: Video - Connect - Update - Rumble Live

This endpoint allows users to update the connection settings for a live video stream on the platform named "Rumble Live". The request is sent using the PUT method to the specified URL.

#### Request Details

- **Method**: PUT
  - This method is used to update the existing resource with the new data provided in the request body.

- **URL**: `http://localhost:3000/api/video/connect/update`
  - This is the local server endpoint where the update request is sent.

- **Headers**:
  - **Content-Type**: `application/json`
    - This header indicates that the format of the data being sent in the request body is JSON.

#### Request Body Structure

The body of the request consists of two main sections: **options** and **stream**. Each section contains various parameters that provide details about the video stream and its settings.

1. **Options**
   - **providerName**: The name of the video provider (e.g., "rumblelive").
   - **providerId**: Identifier for the video provider (currently empty).
   - **apiKey**: The API key for authentication (currently null).
   - **apiSecret**: The API secret for added security (currently null).
   - **apiClientId**: Client ID for API interactions (currently null).
   - **authToken**: Authentication token for secure access (currently null).
   - **server**: Server details for connection (currently null).
   - **rtmpUrl**: URL for Real-Time Messaging Protocol (currently null).
   - **streamKey**: Key for the live stream connection (currently null).
   - **channelUrl**: URL of the channel (currently null).
   - **authUsername**: Username for authentication (currently null).
   - **authPassword**: Password for authentication (currently null).
   - **uniqueKey**: A unique identifier for the stream.
   - **videoId**: Identifier for the video being streamed.
   - **accountId**: Identifier for the user's account.
   - **channelId**: Identifier for the specific channel.
   - **sessionId**: Identifier for the live session.
   - **streamId**: Identifier for the current stream.
   - **ipAddress**: IP address from which the stream is being initiated (currently null).
   - **country**: Country of origin for the stream (default is "United States").
   - **state**: State of origin for the stream (default is "California").
   - **title**: Title of the live stream (e.g., "Fortune's Basketball Challenge").
   - **description**: Description of the live stream content.
   - **tags**: Comma-separated tags related to the stream content (e.g., "basketball,game,challenge").

2. **Stream**
   - **streamId**: Identifier for the stream.
   - **streamName**: Name of the stream.
   - **uniqueKey**: A unique identifier for the stream.
   - **videoId**: Identifier for the video.
   - **accountId**: Identifier for the user's account.
   - **channelId**: Identifier for the channel.
   - **sessionId**: Identifier for the current session.
   - **videoStatus**: Status of the video (e.g., "notready").
   - **providerName**: Name of the video provider (e.g., "cloudflare").
   - **providerUniqueId**: Unique identifier for the video provider's system.
   - **providerPlaybackUrl**: URL for playback through the provider (currently empty).
   - **providerStreamId**: Unique identifier for the stream on the provider's platform.
   - **providerStreamKey**: Key required for accessing the stream on the provider's platform.
   - **providerStreamUrl**: URL for accessing the stream.
   - **providerStreamData**: Contains granular details needed for stream setup, including URLs for streaming and playback, metadata, and passed settings.
   - **success**: Boolean value indicating if the operation was successful.
   - **errors**: Array detailing any errors that occurred during the process.
   - **messages**: Array of messages returned by the operation.

3. **Details**
   - **accountId**: Identifier for the user's account.
   - **sessionId**: Identifier for the current session.
   - **channelId**: Identifier for the specific channel.
   - **videoId**: Identifier for the video being streamed.
   - **title**: Title of the live stream.
   - **description**: Description of the live stream content.
   - **tags**: Tags related to the stream.
   - **streamType**: Type of stream (e.g., "Live").
   - **searchType**: Type used for searching (e.g., "Game").
   - **started**: Boolean indicating if the stream has started.
   - **startedOn**: Timestamp of when the stream started.
   - **paused**: Boolean indicating if the stream is paused.
   - **pausedOn**: Timestamp of when the stream was paused.
   - **stopped**: Boolean indicating if the stream has stopped.
   - **stoppedOn**: Timestamp of when the stream stopped (if applicable).
   - **streamId**: Identifier for the stream.
   - **channel**: Name of the channel hosting the stream.
   - **category**: Category of the stream content (e.g., "Board").
   - **categoryId**: Identifier for the category.
   - **subCategory**: Subcategory of the stream content (e.g., "Outdoor Party").
   - **subCategoryId**: Identifier for the subcategory.
   - **scheduleDate**: The date the stream is scheduled for.
   - **scheduleTime**: The time the stream is scheduled to start.
   - **streamHours**: Duration of the stream in hours.
   - **coverPhotoUrl**: URL for the cover photo of the stream.
   - **providerPlaybackUrl**: URL for playback through the provider (currently empty).
   - **voteTokenQuantity**: Number of tokens permitted for voting.
   - **votingTimeReset**: Reset duration for voting.
   - **voteButtonQuantity**: Number of available vote buttons.
   - **voteButtonText1**: Text for the first voting option.
   - **voteButtonText2**: Text for the second voting option.
   - **isRewardsEnabled**: Boolean indicating if rewards feature is enabled.
   - **isTournamentEnabled**: Boolean indicating if the tournament feature is enabled.
   - **tournamentButtonText1**: Text for the first tournament button.
   - **tournamentButtonText2**: Text for the second tournament button.
   - **streamLocatorName**: Name for locating the stream.
   - **streamAssetName**: Name for asset used in the stream.
   - **platformVideoIds**: Object containing identifiers for sharing on various platforms (all currently false).
   - **platformEventIds**: Object containing event identifiers on various platforms (all currently false).
   - **primaryCameraName**: Name of the main camera used for the stream.
   - **primaryMicrophoneName**: Name of the main microphone used for audio.
   - **primarySpeakerName**: Name of the main speakers used for the stream.
   - **additionalCameras**: List of additional cameras with corresponding microphones.
   - **createdDate**: The date when the stream data was created.
   - **createdTime**: The time when the stream data was created.
   - **updatedDate**: The date when the stream data was last updated.
   - **updatedTime**: The time when the stream data was last updated.
   - **deletedDate**: The date when the stream data was marked as deleted (if applicable).
   - **deletedTime**: The time when the stream data was marked as deleted (if applicable).

request.description:
## API Endpoint: Video - Connect - Delete - Rumble Live

### Request Method
- **Method**: POST
- **URL**: `http://localhost:3000/api/video/connect/delete`

### Headers
- **Content-Type**: Specifies the media type of the resource being sent, in this case, `application/json`.

### Body
#### options
- **providerName**: The name of the video provider being used. In this case, it's set to "rumblelive".
- **providerId**: Identifier for the video provider. Currently empty.
- **apiKey**: The API key for authentication with the video provider. Currently set to `null`.
- **apiSecret**: The API secret for additional authentication with the video provider. Currently set to `null`.
- **apiClientId**: Client identifier for the API, currently set to `null`.
- **authToken**: The token used for authorization. Currently set to `null`.
- **server**: Server information, if needed. Currently set to `null`.
- **rtmpUrl**: The RTMP URL for streaming, currently set to `null`.
- **streamKey**: Key used to stream the video, currently set to `null`.
- **channelUrl**: URL of the video channel, currently set to `null`.
- **authUsername**: Username for authentication purposes. Currently set to `null`.
- **authPassword**: Password for authentication purposes. Currently set to `null`.

- **videoId**: Unique identifier for the video.
- **accountId**: Unique identifier for the user account associated with the video.
- **channelId**: Identifier for the channel associated with the video.
- **sessionId**: Unique identifier for the session in which the video is streamed.
- **streamId**: Identifier for the stream.
- **ipAddress**: IP address from which the request is made. Currently set to `null`.
- **country**: The country associated with the video; set to "United States".
- **state**: The state associated with the video; set to "California".
- **title**: The title of the video, "Fortune's Basketball Challenge".
- **description**: A brief description of the video content, "Basketball game featuring amazing plays and challenges."
- **tags**: Tags associated with the video for easy categorization, including "basketball", "game", "challenge".

#### stream
- **streamId**: The unique identifier for the stream.
- **streamName**: The name assigned to the stream.
- **uniqueKey**: A unique identifier for the stream.
- **videoId**: Identifier for the associated video.
- **accountId**: Identifier for the account owning the stream.
- **channelId**: Identifier for the channel associated with the stream.

- **videoStatus**: Current status of the video; set as "notready".
- **providerName**: The name of the provider that processes the stream, here it is "cloudflare".
- **providerUniqueId**: Unique identifier from the provider.
- **providerPlaybackUrl**: URL for playback, currently empty.
- **providerStreamId**: Identifier for the stream from the provider.
- **providerStreamKey**: Key used for streaming from the provider.
- **providerStreamUrl**: URL for the stream.
- **providerStreamData**: Contains additional details from the provider regarding streaming, including various streaming options and unique identifiers.
- **success**: Indicates if the operation was successful. Set to `true`.
- **errors**: List of any errors encountered during the process; currently empty.

request.description:
### Description of Endpoint Data: Video - Connect - Create - Steam

This endpoint is used to create a new video stream session on the platform, specifically for the provider 'steam'. Below is a detailed explanation of each data field included in the request body.

#### Options
- **providerName**: Specifies the streaming service provider's name indicating that this stream will be connected to Steam.
- **providerId**: An optional identifier for the provider, which is currently left blank.
- **apiKey**: Key that may be used for API access, currently null.
- **apiSecret**: Secret key for securing API access, currently null.
- **apiClientId**: ID that uniquely identifies the API client, currently null.
- **authToken**: Token for authentication purposes, currently null.
- **server**: Specifies the server to be used for the stream, currently null.
- **rtmpUrl**: URL for RTMP (Real-Time Messaging Protocol) streaming, currently null.
- **streamKey**: Unique key required for streaming, currently null.
- **channelUrl**: URL of the channel where the stream will be hosted, currently null.
- **authUsername**: Username for authentication, currently null.
- **authPassword**: Password for authentication, currently null.
- **uniqueKey**: A unique identifier for this stream session.
- **videoId**: Identifier for the specific video being streamed.
- **accountId**: The account identifier associated with the streaming service.
- **channelId**: The identifier for the channel that will be used for streaming.
- **sessionId**: Unique session identifier for managing the stream.
- **streamId**: Unique identifier for the stream itself.
- **ipAddress**: The IP address from which the stream originates, currently null.
- **country**: The country where the stream is being created, set to "United States".
- **state**: The state where the stream is being created, set to "California".
- **title**: The title of the stream, set to "Fortune's Basketball Challenge".
- **description**: A brief description of the stream content, featuring "Basketball game featuring amazing plays and challenges."
- **tags**: Associated keywords or tags for the stream, set to "basketball,game,challenge".

#### Stream
- **streamId**: Identifier for the ongoing stream.
- **streamName**: The name of the stream in a specific format.
- **uniqueKey**: A repeat of the unique identifier for the session.
- **videoId**: Identifier for the video that is currently streamed.
- **accountId**: The account identifier associated with the streaming.
- **channelId**: Identifier for the channel used for the stream.
- **sessionId**: Unique identifier for the current streaming session.
- **videoStatus**: Indicates the current status of the video, set to "notready".
- **providerName**: Name of the streaming provider, here it is "cloudflare".
- **providerUniqueId**: Unique identifier for the streaming provider.
- **providerPlaybackUrl**: URL for playback from the provider, currently empty.
- **providerStreamId**: Unique identifier for the stream from the provider.
- **providerStreamKey**: Key needed for accessing the provider's streaming service.
- **providerStreamUrl**: URL endpoint for the provider's stream access.
- **providerStreamData**: Detailed object containing streaming connection details, including URLs, Stream IDs, and created/modified timestamps.

##### Success / Errors / Messages
- **success**: Indicates if the operation was successful, set to true.
- **errors**: This array will list any errors that occurred during the process, currently empty.
- **messages**: This array can contain messages related to the process, currently also empty.

#### Created and Updated Dates
- **createdDate**: Date when the stream was created.
- **createdTime**: Time of creation for the stream.
- **updatedDate**: Date when the stream details were last updated.
- **updatedTime**: Time of the last update for the stream.
- **deletedDate**: Field for the date of deletion if applicable, currently null.
- **deletedTime**: Field for the time of deletion if applicable, currently null.

#### Details
- **accountId**: The account identifier across data points.
- **sessionId**: The session identifier that ties various data together.
- **channelId**: Identifier for the channel involved.
- **videoId**: Unique ID for the video.
- **title**: Title of the stream, repeating earlier information.
- **description**: Description of the stream, reiterating the purpose.
- **tags**: Tags associated with the stream.
- **streamType**: Type of stream, set to "Live".
- **searchType**: Type of activity associated with searching, set to "Game".
- **started**: Indicates if the stream has started, set to true.
- **startedOn**: Timestamp for when the stream started.
- **paused**: Indicates if the stream is currently paused; set to false.
- **pausedOn**: Timestamp for when the stream was paused; it reflects the last started timestamp as well.
- **stopped**: Indicates if the stream has stopped, currently false.
- **stoppedOn**: Placeholder for when the stream was stopped if it happens, currently null.
- **streamId**: Identifier for the current stream, repeating previous reference.
- **channel**: Name of the channel streaming content.
- **category**: General category for the stream, listed as "Board".
- **categoryId**: Identifier for the category.
- **subCategory**: A more specific category, designated as "Outdoor Party".
- **subCategoryId**: Identifier for the subcategory.
- **scheduleDate**: Date when the stream is scheduled.
- **scheduleTime**: Time scheduled for the stream.
- **streamHours**: Duration of the stream in hours; set to 1.
- **coverPhotoUrl**: URL for the cover image associated with the stream.
- **providerPlaybackUrl**: URL for playback, also currently empty.
- **voteTokenQuantity**: Amount of tokens available for voting, set to 100.
- **votingTimeReset**: Reset time for voting, set to 5 (assumed minutes).
- **voteButtonQuantity**: Number of voting buttons, set to 4.
- **voteButtonText1** / **voteButtonText2**: Text labels for vote buttons, offering options "Layup" and "Dunk".
- **isRewardsEnabled**: Indicates if a reward system is active, currently false.
- **isTournamentEnabled**: Indicates if tournament features are available, set to true.
- **tournamentButtonText1** / **tournamentButtonText2**: Text labels for tournament voting options, offered as "Hit" and "Miss".
- **streamLocatorName**: Custom name for locating the stream.
- **streamAssetName**: Custom name for the asset related to the stream.
- **platformVideoIds**: Object holding identifiers for various social media platforms, all currently set to false.
- **platformEventIds**: Object holding identifiers for events across social media platforms, all currently set to false.
- **primaryCameraName**: Name of the primary camera being used for the stream.
- **primaryMicrophoneName**: Name of the primary microphone being used for audio.
- **primarySpeakerName**: Name of the primary speaker connected for audio.
- **additionalCameras**: Array holding additional camera and microphone pairings if applicable.
- **createdDate**: Date reflecting when the detail entry was created.
- **createdTime**: Time of the initial creation.
- **updatedDate**: Date reflecting when details were last updated.
- **updatedTime**: Time of last update.
- **deletedDate**: Placeholder for deletion date, currently null.
- **deletedTime**: Placeholder for deletion time, currently null.

request.description:
### API Endpoint Description: Video - Connect - Update - Steam

This API endpoint is used to update video stream information specifically for videos connected via the Steam provider.

#### Request Method
- **PUT**: This method is used to send data to the server to update existing resources.

#### URL
- **http://localhost:3000/api/video/connect/update**: This is the endpoint where the request is sent. It is hosted locally on port 3000.

#### Request Headers
- **Content-Type**: Set to `application/json`, indicating that the request body contains JSON data.

#### Request Body
The request body consists of two main sections: `options` and `stream`, both of which contain various fields related to the video stream.

##### Options
- **providerName**: The name of the service provider, in this case, it is "steam".
- **providerId**: An identifier for the provider, which is currently empty.
- **apiKey**: The API key used for authentication, currently set to null.
- **apiSecret**: The API secret for added security, currently set to null.
- **apiClientId**: The client ID for the API, currently set to null.
- **authToken**: A token for authorization, currently set to null.
- **server**: The server designation, currently set to null.
- **rtmpUrl**: The RTMP URL for streaming, currently set to null.
- **streamKey**: A unique key for the stream, currently set to null.
- **channelUrl**: The URL of the channel, currently set to null.
- **authUsername**: The username for authentication, currently set to null.
- **authPassword**: The password for authentication, currently set to null.
- **uniqueKey**: A unique identifier for this stream instance.
- **videoId**: The identifier for the video being streamed.
- **accountId**: The ID associated with the user account.
- **channelId**: The ID for the channel where the stream is hosted.
- **sessionId**: The ID for the streaming session.
- **streamId**: The ID assigned to the stream.
- **ipAddress**: The IP address of the user, currently set to null.
- **country**: The country where the stream is being hosted (default is "United States").
- **state**: The state where the stream is being hosted (default is "California").
- **title**: The title of the video stream (e.g., "Fortune's Basketball Challenge").
- **description**: A brief overview or description of the video content (e.g., "Basketball game featuring amazing plays and challenges.").
- **tags**: Comma-separated tags for the video to aid discoverability (e.g., "basketball,game,challenge").

##### Stream
- **streamId**: The ID assigned to this stream instance.
- **streamName**: A unique name derived for the live video stream.
- **uniqueKey**: Reiterates the unique identifier for this stream instance.
- **videoId**: The unique identifier for the video associated with this stream.
- **accountId**: The user account ID.
- **channelId**: The channel ID.
- **sessionId**: The streaming session ID.
- **videoStatus**: Status of the video, initially set to "notready".
- **providerName**: The name of the streaming provider (set to "cloudflare").
- **providerUniqueId**: A specific ID from the provider for tracking.
- **providerPlaybackUrl**: URL provided for playback, currently set to null.
- **providerStreamId**: Unique ID for the stream from the provider.
- **providerStreamKey**: Key to access the stream from the provider.
- **providerStreamUrl**: The URL for the stream as per the provider's service.
- **providerStreamData**: Contains various data related to the streaming setup, such as URLs for playback, stream keys, created and modified timestamps, and various metadata.
- **success**: A boolean indicating whether the update was successful.
- **errors**: An array that holds any errors encountered during the update, currently empty.
- **messages**: An array that holds additional status messages relating to the update, currently empty.
- **createdDate**: The date when the stream was created.
- **createdTime**: The time when the stream was created.
- **updatedDate**: The date when the stream information was last updated.
- **updatedTime**: The time when the stream information was updated.
- **deletedDate**: Date when the stream was marked for deletion, currently null.
- **deletedTime**: Time when the stream was marked for deletion, currently null.

##### Details
- **accountId**, **sessionId**, **channelId**, **videoId**: Reiterated identifiers for tracking purposes.
- **title**: The name of the stream (e.g., "Fortune's Basketball Challenge").
- **description**: The description for the stream content.
- **tags**: Tags associated with the stream.
- **streamType**: Type of stream, set as "Live".
- **searchType**: Type of search for categorizing the stream, set to "Game".
- **started**: Boolean indicating if the stream has started.
- **startedOn**: Timestamp of when the stream started.
- **paused**: Boolean indicating if the stream is paused.
- **pausedOn**: Timestamp of when the stream was paused.
- **stopped**: Boolean indicating if the stream has stopped.
- **stoppedOn**: Timestamp of when the stream was stopped, currently null.
- **streamId**: The ID for the stream.
- **channel**: The name of the channel hosting the stream.
- **category**: The main category for the video (e.g., "Board").
- **categoryId**: Identifier for the main category.
- **subCategory**: The subcategory for easier classification (e.g., "Outdoor Party").
- **subCategoryId**: Identifier for the subcategory.
- **scheduleDate**: The date when the stream is scheduled.
- **scheduleTime**: The time when the stream is scheduled.
- **streamHours**: Duration of the stream in hours.
- **coverPhotoUrl**: URL of the cover photo for the stream.
- **providerPlaybackUrl**: Playback URL from the provider, currently set to null.
- **voteTokenQuantity**: Number of tokens allotted for voting.
- **votingTimeReset**: Duration in minutes that voting resets.
- **voteButtonQuantity**: Number of voting buttons.
- **voteButtonText1**, **voteButtonText2**: Text displayed on the voting buttons.
- **isRewardsEnabled**: Boolean indicating if rewards are active.
- **isTournamentEnabled**: Boolean indicating if tournaments are active.
- **tournamentButtonText1**, **tournamentButtonText2**: Text for tournament buttons.
- **streamLocatorName**: Name used for the locator associated with the stream.
- **streamAssetName**: Name of the assets for the stream.
- **platformVideoIds**: Object containing various video IDs related to multiple platforms, all currently set to false.
- **platformEventIds**: Holds event IDs related to various platforms, also currently set to false.
- **primaryCameraName**: Name of the primary camera being used for the stream.
- **primaryMicrophoneName**: Name of the primary microphone being used.
- **primarySpeakerName**: Name of the primary speaker used.
- **additionalCameras**: Array of additional camera and microphone setups used during streaming.
- **createdDate**: The date when the details were created.
- **createdTime**: The time when the details were created.
- **updatedDate**: The date when the details were last updated.
- **updatedTime**: The time when the details were last updated.
- **deletedDate**: Date when the details were marked for deletion, currently null.
- **deletedTime**: Time when the details were marked for deletion, currently null.

request.description:
### Endpoint Description: Video - Connect - Delete - Steam

**Request Method:**  
- **POST**: This endpoint uses the POST method to send data to the server for processing.

**Request URL:**  
- **http://localhost:3000/api/video/connect/delete**: This is the URL where the request is sent. It indicates that the operation involves connecting and deleting a video related to a stream.

**Request Headers:**  
- **Content-Type**: Specifies the media type of the resource being sent. Here, it is set to `application/json`, indicating that the body of the request is in JSON format.

**Request Body:**  
The body of the request consists of two main sections: **options** and **stream**.

#### **Options Section:**
- **providerName**: The name of the service provider; in this case, it is set as "steam."
- **providerId**: Identifier for the service provider, left empty here.
- **apiKey**: The API key for accessing the provider.
- **apiSecret**: The API secret associated with the provider.
- **apiClientId**: Client identifier used for connecting with the API.
- **authToken**: Token used for authorization, currently not provided.
- **server**: Server address, not specified in the request.
- **rtmpUrl**: URL for Real-Time Messaging Protocol, left empty.
- **streamKey**: Key for streaming, not provided.
- **channelUrl**: URL for the channel associated with the stream, currently null.
- **authUsername**: Username for authentication, left as null.
- **authPassword**: Password for authentication, currently not provided.
- **uniqueKey**: A unique identifier for the video or stream.
- **videoId**: Identifier for the specific video.
- **accountId**: Identifier for the user account associated with the video.
- **channelId**: Identifier for the video channel.
- **sessionId**: Identifier for the streaming session.
- **streamId**: Identifier for the stream.
- **ipAddress**: The IP address from which the request originates, currently null.
- **country**: The country where the stream is associated, set to "United States."
- **state**: The state within the country, specified as "California."
- **title**: The title of the video, which is "Fortune's Basketball Challenge."
- **description**: A brief description of the video content, which highlights it as a basketball game featuring amazing plays.
- **tags**: Tags associated with the video for categorization, set as "basketball, game, challenge."

#### **Stream Section:**
- **streamId**: The identifier for the stream.
- **streamName**: The name given to the live video stream, includes a unique identifier.
- **uniqueKey**: Same unique identifier mentioned in the options section.
- **videoId**: Replicates the video ID from the options section.
- **accountId**: Repeats the account identifier.
- **channelId**: Repeats the channel identifier.
- **sessionId**: Repeats the session identifier.
- **videoStatus**: Indicates the current status of the video; here it is "notready."
- **providerName**: The name of the streaming provider, set as "cloudflare."
- **providerUniqueId**: A unique identifier for the provider stream.
- **providerPlaybackUrl**: URL for playback through the provider, currently left empty.
- **providerStreamId**: Unique stream identifier for the provider.
- **providerStreamKey**: Key used for streaming, provided for this session.
- **providerStreamUrl**: URL for the streaming service, specifies where the stream is delivered.
- **providerStreamData**: Contains details about the streaming service such as RTMP URLs, SRT configurations, WebRTC URLs, and metadata regarding the stream.
- **success**: Boolean field indicating whether the operation was successful, here it is true.
- **errors**: List of any errors encountered during the request; here it is empty, indicating no errors occurred.
- **messages**: Any messages related to the request, currently not utilized.

#### **Created and Updated Dates and Times:**
- **createdDate**: Date when the stream was created, listed as "2024-02-24."
- **createdTime**: Time of creation, noted as "23:25:30."
- **updatedDate**: Date when the stream was last updated, shown as "2024-02-25."
- **updatedTime**: Time of the last update, recorded as "01:14:26."
- **deletedDate**: Date when the stream was deleted, currently null, meaning it has not been deleted.
- **deletedTime**: Time of deletion, which is also null.

#### **Details Section:**
- **accountId**: Repeats the account identifier from previous sections.
- **sessionId**: Repeats the session identifier.
- **channelId**: Repeats the channel identifier.
- **videoId**: Repeats the video ID.
- **title**: Repeats the title of the stream.
- **description**: Repeats the description of the stream.
- **tags**: Repeats the tags associated with the stream.
- **streamType**: Indicates the type of the stream; here it is "Live."
- **searchType**: Describes how the stream can be searched; here it is categorized as "Game."
- **started**: Boolean indicating whether the stream has started, set to true.
- **startedOn**: Timestamp indicating when the stream started.
- **paused**: Indicates whether the stream is currently paused; here it is false.
- **pausedOn**: Time when the stream was paused, currently noted as the same time it started, indicating it is not paused.
- **stopped**: Indicates whether the stream has been stopped, currently false.
- **stoppedOn**: Time when the stream was stopped, currently null since it is still active.
- **streamId**: Repeats the stream identifier.
- **channel**: Name of the channel associated with the stream, here it is "Fortune's Basketball Channel."
- **category**: Category of the stream, listed as "Board."
- **categoryId**: Identifier for the category of the stream.
- **subCategory**: Further classification of the stream, noted as "Outdoor Party."
- **subCategoryId**: Identifier for the subcategory.
- **scheduleDate**: Planned date for the event, listed as "2024-02-01."
- **scheduleTime**: Planned start time for the event, specified as "18:00:00."
- **streamHours**: Duration of the stream in hours; here it shows as 1 hour.
- **coverPhotoUrl**: URL to the cover photo of the stream.
- **providerPlaybackUrl**: URL for playback provided by the provider, currently left empty.
- **voteTokenQuantity**: Number of tokens available for voting during the stream, noted as 100.
- **votingTimeReset**: Time reset for voting, noted as "5" minutes.
- **voteButtonQuantity**: Number of voting buttons available, set to 4.
- **voteButtonText1**: Text for the first voting button, listed as "Layup."
- **voteButtonText2**: Text for the second voting button, listed as "Dunk."
- **isRewardsEnabled**: Indicates whether rewards are enabled during the stream; here it is false.
- **isTournamentEnabled**: Indicates whether a tournament feature is enabled, set to true.
- **tournamentButtonText1**: Text for the first tournament button, listed as "Hit."
- **tournamentButtonText2**: Text for the second tournament button, listed as "Miss."
- **streamLocatorName**: Name used for locating the stream, set as "basketball-locator-name."
- **streamAssetName**: Name of the asset associated with the stream, noted as "basketball-asset-name."
- **platformVideoIds**: A collection of identifiers for various social media platforms, all currently set to false, indicating no outputs are configured to these platforms.
- **platformEventIds**: A collection of identifiers for events on various platforms, all currently set to false, indicating no events are configured.
- **primaryCameraName**: Name of the primary camera used for streaming, specified as "Sony 4K Ultra HD WebCam".
- **primaryMicrophoneName**: Name of the primary microphone used, specified as "WirelessAudioTek Device".
- **primarySpeakerName**: Name of the primary speaker used, mentioned as "Bose-Mega-Speaker 2.0".
- **additionalCameras**: An array containing additional camera and microphone setups, detailing their configurations.
- **createdDate**: Repeats the date when the details were created.
- **createdTime**: Repeats the time when the details were created.
- **updatedDate**: Repeats the last date on which the details were updated.
- **updatedTime**: Repeats the last time on which the details were updated.
- **deletedDate**: Repeats the deletion date; currently null.
- **deletedTime**: Repeats the deletion time; currently null.

request.description:
### Endpoint Description: Video - Connect - Create - Telegram Live

**Request Method:**  
- **POST**: This request method is used to send data to the specified URL for creating a new video stream connection. 

**Request URL:**  
- **http://localhost:3000/api/video/connect/create**: This is the endpoint where the request is made to create a new video stream connection. It runs on a local server at port 3000.

**Headers:**  
- **Content-Type**: Specifies the media type of the resource. In this case, it is set to `application/json`, indicating that the request body contains JSON data.

**Request Body:**  
- This section contains two main objects: `options` and `stream`.

#### Options Object:  
- **providerName**: Name of the video service provider. Set to `telegramlive`, indicating the use of Telegram for live streaming.
- **providerId**: Identifier for the video provider (currently left blank).
- **apiKey**: API key for authentication (currently null).
- **apiSecret**: API secret for secure access (currently null).
- **apiClientId**: Client ID for API access (currently null).
- **authToken**: Token for authentication (currently null).
- **server**: Server address for connection (currently null).
- **rtmpUrl**: Real-Time Messaging Protocol URL for video streaming (currently null).
- **streamKey**: Key used to authenticate the streaming session (currently null).
- **channelUrl**: URL of the streaming channel (currently null).
- **authUsername**: Username required for authentication (currently null).
- **authPassword**: Password required for authentication (currently null).
- **uniqueKey**: Unique identifier for this stream.
- **videoId**: Identifier for the video.
- **accountId**: Identifier for the account associated with the video.
- **channelId**: Identifier for the channel where the stream will be published.
- **sessionId**: Identifier for the streaming session.
- **streamId**: Identifier for the stream.
- **ipAddress**: IP address from which the request is made (currently null).
- **country**: Country associated with the stream, defaulting to "United States".
- **state**: State associated with the stream, defaulting to "California".
- **title**: Title of the video stream, set as "Fortune's Basketball Challenge".
- **description**: Brief description of the stream content, which includes "Basketball game featuring amazing plays and challenges."
- **tags**: Keywords associated with the video, listed as "basketball,game,challenge".

#### Stream Object:  
- **streamId**: Identifier for the stream.
- **streamName**: A generated name for the stream.
- **uniqueKey**: Same unique identifier as in options, for consistency.
- **videoId**: Same video identifier as in options for consistency.
- **accountId**: Same account identifier as in options for consistency.
- **channelId**: Same channel identifier as in options for consistency.
- **sessionId**: Same session identifier as in options for consistency.
- **videoStatus**: Status of the video, initially set to "notready".
- **providerName**: Name of the cloud provider used, here set to "cloudflare".
- **providerUniqueId**: Unique identifier assigned by the provider.
- **providerPlaybackUrl**: URL for playback of the stream (currently empty).
- **providerStreamId**: Unique identifier for the stream provided by Cloudflare.
- **providerStreamKey**: Key associated with the stream for authentication purposes.
- **providerStreamUrl**: URL for accessing the stream.
- **providerStreamData**: Additional data related to the stream, including information for various protocols like RTMPS, SRT, and WebRTC, which includes:
  - URLs and keys for live streaming and playback using various media transport protocols.
  - Metadata such as creation and modification timestamps and account information.
- **success**: Indicates whether the request was successful, set to `true`.
- **errors**: Array for any errors that occurred during the request (currently empty).
- **messages**: Array for any messages associated with the request (currently empty).
  
**Created and Updated Timestamps:**  
- **createdDate**: Date when the stream was created.
- **createdTime**: Time when the stream was created.
- **updatedDate**: Date when the stream details were last updated.
- **updatedTime**: Time when the stream details were last updated.
  
**Details Object:**  
- **accountId**: Identifier for the associated account.
- **sessionId**: Identifier for the streaming session.
- **channelId**: Identifier for the channel.
- **videoId**: Video identifier.
- **title**: Title of the stream.
- **description**: Description of the stream content.
- **tags**: Keywords associated with the stream.
- **streamType**: Type of the stream, specified as "Live".
- **searchType**: Specifies the search category of the stream; set as "Game".
- **started**: Indicates if the stream has started, set to `true`.
- **startedOn**: Timestamp of when the stream started.
- **paused**: Indicates if the stream is currently paused.
- **pausedOn**: Timestamp of when the stream was paused.
- **stopped**: Indicates if the stream is currently stopped.
- **stoppedOn**: Timestamp of when the stream was stopped (currently null).
- **streamId**: Identifier for the stream.
- **channel**: Name of the stream channel.
- **category**: Broad category of the stream's content, specified as "Board".
- **categoryId**: Identifier for the category.
- **subCategory**: More specific classification of the stream, listed as "Outdoor Party".
- **subCategoryId**: Identifier for the sub-category.
- **scheduleDate**: Date when the stream is scheduled.
- **scheduleTime**: Time when the stream is scheduled to start.
- **streamHours**: Duration of the stream in hours.
- **coverPhotoUrl**: URL for the cover photo of the stream.
- **providerPlaybackUrl**: URL for playback through the provider (currently empty).
- **voteTokenQuantity**: Number of tokens available for voting during the stream.
- **votingTimeReset**: Specifies the duration for resetting voting time.
- **voteButtonQuantity**: Number of voting buttons available.
- **voteButtonText1 & voteButtonText2**: Text labels for the voting buttons.
- **isRewardsEnabled**: Indicates if rewards for viewers are enabled (set to false).
- **isTournamentEnabled**: Indicates if tournament features are enabled (set to true).
- **tournamentButtonText1 & tournamentButtonText2**: Text labels for tournament button options.
- **streamLocatorName**: Name for the locator of the stream.
- **streamAssetName**: Name assigned to the stream's assets.
- **platformVideoIds**: Describes the integration status with various video sharing platforms (all currently set to false).
- **platformEventIds**: Lists event IDs for various platforms (all currently set to false).
- **primaryCameraName**: Name of the primary camera used for the stream.
- **primaryMicrophoneName**: Name of the primary microphone used for audio.
- **primarySpeakerName**: Name of the primary speaker used for output.
- **additionalCameras**: Array containing information about any additional cameras and associated microphones.
- **createdDate**: Date when the details were created.
- **createdTime**: Time when the details were created.
- **updatedDate**: Date when the details were last updated.
- **updatedTime**: Time when the details were last updated.

This detailed structure provides clear insights into the parameters for creating a live video connection through the Telegram provider.

request.description:
### Video - Connect - Update - Telegram Live

**Request Method:**  
- PUT  

**Request URL:**  
- `http://localhost:3000/api/video/connect/update`  

**Headers:**  
- **Content-Type:** Specifies the media type of the resource. In this case, it is `application/json`, meaning the request body will be in JSON format.  

**Request Body:**

1. **options:** This object contains various configuration options and metadata necessary for connecting and streaming video.
   - **providerName:** Name of the streaming provider. Here it is set to `telegramlive`.
   - **providerId:** Unique identifier for the provider, currently left empty.
   - **apiKey:** Key for API authentication, currently set to null.
   - **apiSecret:** Secret key for API authentication, currently set to null.
   - **apiClientId:** Client ID for API requests, currently set to null.
   - **authToken:** Token for authentication, currently set to null.
   - **server:** Server address to connect to, currently set to null.
   - **rtmpUrl:** URL for Real-Time Messaging Protocol, currently set to null.
   - **streamKey:** Key required for streaming, currently set to null.
   - **channelUrl:** URL of the channel, currently set to null.
   - **authUsername:** Username for authentication, currently set to null.
   - **authPassword:** Password for authentication, currently set to null.
   - **uniqueKey:** A unique identifier for the stream.
   - **videoId:** Identifier for the video being connected to.
   - **accountId:** Identifier for the user account.
   - **channelId:** Identifier for the channel.
   - **sessionId:** Unique identifier for the session.
   - **streamId:** Identifier for the stream.
   - **ipAddress:** IP address of the user or service, currently set to null.
   - **country:** The country of the user, set to "United States".
   - **state:** The state of the user, set to "California".
   - **title:** Title of the stream, set to "Fortune's Basketball Challenge".
   - **description:** Description of the stream, providing context, set to "Basketball game featuring amazing plays and challenges.".
   - **tags:** Tags related to the content, set to "basketball,game,challenge".

2. **stream:** This object contains information specific to the stream itself.
   - **streamId:** Identifier for the stream.
   - **streamName:** Name given to the stream, in this case, "live-video-stream-7164b12d-1708817130231".
   - **uniqueKey:** A key that uniquely identifies the stream.
   - **videoId:** Identifier for the video being streamed.
   - **accountId:** Identifier for the user account related to the stream.
   - **channelId:** Identifier for the channel related to the stream.
   - **sessionId:** Unique identifier for the streaming session.
   - **videoStatus:** Current status of the video, initialized to "notready".
   - **providerName:** Name of the service provider used for streaming, set to "cloudflare".
   - **providerUniqueId:** A unique identifier from the provider.
   - **providerPlaybackUrl:** URL for playback from the provider, currently empty.
   - **providerStreamId:** Unique identifier for the stream as determined by the provider.
   - **providerStreamKey:** Key used to stream content on the providerâ€™s platform.
   - **providerStreamUrl:** The URL used for streaming, where the content is sent.
   - **providerStreamData:** Details returned from the provider, including URLs and Stream IDs for different streaming protocols (RTMP, SRT, WebRTC) as well as metadata on stream status.
   - **success:** Indicates whether the request was successful.
   - **errors:** Array of any errors encountered during processing, currently empty.
   - **messages:** Array of messages related to the request, currently empty.
   - **createdDate:** Date when the stream was created.
   - **createdTime:** Time when the stream was created.
   - **updatedDate:** Date when the stream information was last updated.
   - **updatedTime:** Time when the stream information was last updated.
   - **deletedDate:** Date when the stream was deleted, currently null.
   - **deletedTime:** Time when the stream was deleted, currently null.

3. **details:** Additional information regarding the stream.
   - **accountId:** Identifier for the user account associated with the stream.
   - **sessionId:** Unique identifier for the streaming session.
   - **channelId:** Identifier for the channel.
   - **videoId:** Identifier for the video.
   - **title:** Title of the stream.
   - **description:** Description of the stream's content.
   - **tags:** Relevant tags associated with the content.
   - **streamType:** Type of the stream, in this case, "Live".
   - **searchType:** Type of content searchable, set to "Game".
   - **started:** Boolean indicating if the stream has started.
   - **startedOn:** Timestamp indicating when the stream started.
   - **paused:** Boolean indicating if the stream is currently paused.
   - **pausedOn:** Timestamp indicating when the stream was paused, if applicable.
   - **stopped:** Boolean indicating if the stream has been stopped.
   - **stoppedOn:** Timestamp indicating when the stream was stopped, if applicable.
   - **streamId:** Identifier related to the specific stream.
   - **channel:** Name of the channel streaming the content.
   - **category:** General category of the content, set to "Board".
   - **categoryId:** Identifier for the category.
   - **subCategory:** More specific categorization, set to "Outdoor Party".
   - **subCategoryId:** Identifier for the subcategory.
   - **scheduleDate:** Date on which the stream is scheduled to take place.
   - **scheduleTime:** Time at which the stream is scheduled to begin.
   - **streamHours:** Duration of the stream in hours.
   - **coverPhotoUrl:** URL for the cover photo of the stream.
   - **providerPlaybackUrl:** URL for playback from the provider, currently empty.
   - **voteTokenQuantity:** Amount of tokens available for voting.
   - **votingTimeReset:** Time in seconds to reset the voting.
   - **voteButtonQuantity:** Number of voting buttons available.
   - **voteButtonText1:** Text for the first voting button.
   - **voteButtonText2:** Text for the second voting button.
   - **isRewardsEnabled:** Boolean indicating if rewards for viewers is enabled.
   - **isTournamentEnabled:** Boolean indicating if a tournament structure is enabled.
   - **tournamentButtonText1:** Text for the first tournament button.
   - **tournamentButtonText2:** Text for the second tournament button.
   - **streamLocatorName:** Name assigned to the stream locator.
   - **streamAssetName:** Name assigned to the stream asset.
   - **platformVideoIds:** Object containing output IDs for various platforms (YouTube, Twitch, Instagram, etc.), currently all set to false.
   - **platformEventIds:** Object containing event IDs for various platforms (Facebook, LinkedIn, YouTube, etc.), currently all set to false.
   - **primaryCameraName:** Name of the primary camera being used.
   - **primaryMicrophoneName:** Name of the primary microphone being used.
   - **primarySpeakerName:** Name of the primary speaker being used.
   - **additionalCameras:** Array of additional camera and microphone pairs being utilized during the stream.
   - **createdDate:** Creation date of the stream details.
   - **createdTime:** Time when the details were created.
   - **updatedDate:** Date when the details were last updated.
   - **updatedTime:** Time when the details were last updated.
   - **deletedDate:** Date when the details were deleted, currently null.
   - **deletedTime:** Time when the details were deleted, currently null.

body.raw:
{
