request.description:
### Endpoint Description: Video - Connect - Delete - Telegram Live

**Endpoint Name:** Video - Connect - Delete - Telegram Live  
**HTTP Method:** POST  
**URL:** `http://localhost:3000/api/video/connect/delete`  
**Headers:**
- **Content-Type:** Indicates the media type of the resource. Here it is set to `application/json` to inform the server that the request body contains JSON data.

**Request Body:**
The body of the request contains two main sections: `options` and `stream`, along with an additional `details` section.

#### Options Field:
- **providerName:** Identifies the service provider being used. In this case, it is set to "telegramlive".
- **providerId:** Unique identifier for the provider. This is left blank and can be filled according to the specific setup.
- **apiKey:** API key for authentication with the service provider. Currently, it is set to null, which indicates it is not provided.
- **apiSecret:** Secret key for API authentication, currently not provided.
- **apiClientId:** Client ID for accessing the API, currently not provided.
- **authToken:** Token used for authenticating requests. Currently set to null.
- **server:** Server information that the connection is established with. This is currently null.
- **rtmpUrl:** URL used to send the stream to the provider, currently null.
- **streamKey:** A key associated with the stream, currently null.
- **channelUrl:** URL of the channel being used, currently null.
- **authUsername:** Username for authentication, currently null.
- **authPassword:** Password for authentication, currently null.
- **uniqueKey:** A unique key for the stream or connection, filled with "uniqueKey".
- **videoId:** Identifier for the video, filled with "videoId".
- **accountId:** Identifier for the account, filled with "accountId".
- **channelId:** Identifier for the channel, filled with "channelId".
- **sessionId:** Identifier for the session, filled with "sessionId".
- **streamId:** Identifier for the stream, filled with "streamId".
- **ipAddress:** IP address associated with the request, currently null.
- **country:** Country associated with the stream or connection, currently set to "United States".
- **state:** State associated with the stream or connection, currently set to "California".
- **title:** Title of the video, filled with "Fortune's Basketball Challenge".
- **description:** Brief description of the video content, filled with "Basketball game featuring amazing plays and challenges."
- **tags:** Tags relating to the video, indicating its content. Here it contains "basketball,game,challenge".

#### Stream Field:
- **streamId:** Identifier for the stream, filled with "streamId".
- **streamName:** Name of the stream, set to a generated string "live-video-stream-7164b12d-1708817130231".
- **uniqueKey:** A key that uniquely identifies the stream, again set to "uniqueKey".
- **videoId:** Identifier for the video, also "videoId".
- **accountId:** Identifier for the user account, also "accountId".
- **channelId:** Identifier for the channel, also "channelId".
- **sessionId:** Identifier for the session, also "sessionId".
- **videoStatus:** Current status of the video, marked as "notready".
- **providerName:** Name of the provider, here it is "cloudflare".
- **providerUniqueId:** Unique identifier from the provider, set to a unique string.
- **providerPlaybackUrl:** URL for playback from the provider, currently empty.
- **providerStreamId:** Stream identifier provided by the service, set to string.
- **providerStreamKey:** Key for authentication with the provider, currently a generated string.
- **providerStreamUrl:** URL used to connect for streaming, contains a specific URL string.
- **providerStreamData:** Detailed data returned from the provider containing various streaming protocols (rtmps, srt, webRTC) along with their URLs for publishing and playback. Includes metadata like account ID, channel ID, and timestamps for creation and modification, among others.
- **success:** Boolean flag indicating if the operation was successful, set to true.
- **errors:** An array for any errors that might have occurred, currently empty.
- **messages:** An array for any messages returned, currently empty.
- **createdDate:** The date when the stream was created, filled with "2024-02-24".
- **createdTime:** The time when the stream was created, filled with "23:25:30".
- **updatedDate:** The date when the stream was last updated, filled with "2024-02-25".
- **updatedTime:** The time when the stream was last updated, filled with "01:14:26".
- **deletedDate:** The date when the stream was deleted, currently null.
- **deletedTime:** The time when the stream was deleted, currently null.

#### Details Field:
- **accountId:** Identifier for the account, filled with "accountId".
- **sessionId:** Identifier for the session, filled with "sessionId".
- **channelId:** Identifier for the channel, filled with "channelId".
- **videoId:** Identifier for the video, filled with "videoId".
- **title:** Title of the video, filled with "Fortune's Basketball Challenge".
- **description:** Description of the video, filled with "Basketball game featuring amazing plays and challenges."
- **tags:** Tags associated with the video content, filled with "basketball,game,challenge".
- **streamType:** Type of stream, noted as "Live".
- **searchType:** Type of content for search purposes, set to "Game".
- **started:** Boolean to indicate if the stream has started, set to true.
- **startedOn:** Timestamp indicating when the stream started, filled with "2024-02-24T22:41:42.483Z".
- **paused:** Boolean indicating if the stream is currently paused, set to false.
- **pausedOn:** Timestamp for when the stream was paused, filled with the same date and time as the start.
- **stopped:** Boolean indicating if the stream has stopped, currently set to false.
- **stoppedOn:** Timestamp for when the stream stopped, currently null.
- **streamId:** Identifier for the stream, filled with "streamId".
- **channel:** Name of the channel, filled with "Fortune's Basketball Channel".
- **category:** Category of the content, set to "Board".
- **categoryId:** Identifier for the category, set to "categoryId".
- **subCategory:** Sub-category of the content, set to "Outdoor Party".
- **subCategoryId:** Identifier for the sub-category, set to "subCategoryId".
- **scheduleDate:** Date when the stream is scheduled, filled with "2024-02-01".
- **scheduleTime:** Time when the stream is scheduled, filled with "18:00:00".
- **streamHours:** Duration of the stream in hours, set to 1.
- **coverPhotoUrl:** URL of the cover photo for the stream, filled with "basketball-cover-url.jpg".
- **providerPlaybackUrl:** URL for playback from the provider, currently empty.
- **voteTokenQuantity:** The number of tokens available for voting, set to 100.
- **votingTimeReset:** Time reset for voting, set to "5".
- **voteButtonQuantity:** The number of buttons available for voting, set to 4.
- **voteButtonText1:** Text for the first voting button, set to "Layup".
- **voteButtonText2:** Text for the second voting button, set to "Dunk".
- **isRewardsEnabled:** Boolean indicating if rewards are enabled, currently set to false.
- **isTournamentEnabled:** Boolean indicating if tournaments are enabled, currently set to true.
- **tournamentButtonText1:** Text for the first tournament button, set to "Hit".
- **tournamentButtonText2:** Text for the second tournament button, set to "Miss".
- **streamLocatorName:** Name used for the stream locator, set to "basketball-locator-name".
- **streamAssetName:** Name associated with the stream asset, set to "basketball-asset-name".
- **platformVideoIds:** Object containing flags for linking to various social media platforms where the video can be broadcasted, all currently set to false.
- **platformEventIds:** Object containing flags for linking to various social events on platforms, all currently set to false.
- **primaryCameraName:** Name of the primary camera being used, "Sony 4K Ultra HD WebCam".
- **primaryMicrophoneName:** Name of the primary microphone being used, "WirelessAudioTek Device".
- **primarySpeakerName:** Name of the primary speaker being used, "Bose-Mega-Speaker 2.0".
- **additionalCameras:** An array of additional camera and microphone setups being used.
- **createdDate:** Date when the details were created, filled with "2024-02-18".
- **createdTime:** Time when the details were created, filled with "14:54:25".
- **updatedDate:** Date when the details were last updated, filled with "2024-02-24".
- **updatedTime:** Time when the details were last updated, filled with "23:29:19".
- **deletedDate:** Date when the details were deleted, currently null.
- **deletedTime:** Time when the details were deleted, currently null.

request.description:
### Endpoint Description for "Video - Connect - Create - TikTok Live"

**Request Method:**  
- **POST**: This endpoint uses the POST method to create a new video connection on the TikTok Live platform.

**URL:**  
- **http://localhost:3000/api/video/connect/create**: This is the local URL where the API request is sent to create a video connection.

**Headers:**  
- **Content-Type**: This header specifies that the request body format is JSON.

**Request Body Overview:**  
The request body is a JSON object that includes `options`, `stream`, and `details`.

#### Options: 
- **providerName**: Specifies the provider handling the video connection. For this endpoint, it is set to "tiktoklive".
- **providerId**: The unique identifier for the provider. This field is currently left blank.
- **apiKey**: The API key for authentication, which is set to null.
- **apiSecret**: A secret key for additional security, currently set to null.
- **apiClientId**: An identifier for the API client, set to null.
- **authToken**: Token used for authentication, currently null.
- **server**: This could specify a server URL but is presently null.
- **rtmpUrl**: URL for RTMP streaming, currently null.
- **streamKey**: Key for the streaming process; this is also null.
- **channelUrl**: URL for the channel, currently null.
- **authUsername**: Username for authentication, set to null.
- **authPassword**: Password for authentication, currently null.
- **uniqueKey**: A unique identifier for the video stream; in this case, it's set to "uniqueKey".
- **videoId**: The identifier for the video, marked as "videoId".
- **accountId**: The account associated with the video, labeled "accountId".
- **channelId**: Identifier for the channel, described as "channelId".
- **sessionId**: The identifier for the session, noted as "sessionId".
- **streamId**: Unique identifier for the stream, labeled "streamId".
- **ipAddress**: The IP address for the connection, currently null.
- **country**: The country of the stream, set to "United States".
- **state**: The state of the stream's location, which is "California".
- **title**: Title of the video, here "Fortune's Basketball Challenge".
- **description**: A brief description of the video contentâ€”â€œBasketball game featuring amazing plays and challenges.â€
- **tags**: Tags relevant to the video, marked as "basketball,game,challenge".

#### Stream:
- **streamId**: Identifier for the stream, noted as "streamId".
- **streamName**: The generated name for the live stream.
- **uniqueKey**: Matches the unique key provided in options.
- **videoId**: Identifier for the video; matches the videoId from options.
- **accountId**: Matches the accountId specified in options.
- **channelId**: Identifier for the channel; matches from options.
- **sessionId**: Identifier for the session; consistent with options.
- **videoStatus**: The status of the video during the stream, marked as "notready".
- **providerName**: Name of the service provider, set to "cloudflare".
- **providerUniqueId**: Unique ID assigned by the provider.
- **providerPlaybackUrl**: URL for playback, currently blank.
- **providerStreamId**: Provider-specific ID for streaming.
- **providerStreamKey**: A key associated with the provider's stream.
- **providerStreamUrl**: The URL for streaming through the provider.
- **providerStreamData**: Object containing specific data returned from the provider regarding the stream, including:
  - Streams and playback URLs (including RTMP, SRT, and WebRTC),
  - Metadata about creation and modification,
  - Audio and video input names as well as storage and recording options.
- **success**: Indicates whether the request was successful or not, set to true.
- **errors**: Array for any errors returned, currently empty.
- **messages**: Contains additional messages from the response; also empty.
- **createdDate**: Date when the stream was created.
- **createdTime**: Time when the stream was created.
- **updatedDate**: Date of the last update.
- **updatedTime**: Time of the last update.
- **deletedDate**: Date of deletion if applicable, currently null.
- **deletedTime**: Time of deletion if applicable, currently null.

#### Details:
- **accountId**: Identifier for the account, consistent with previous entries.
- **sessionId**: Identifier for the stream session.
- **channelId**: Identifier for the channel involved in the stream.
- **videoId**: Identifier for the video being streamed.
- **title**: Title of the stream, matching the earlier provided title.
- **description**: Description of the stream content.
- **tags**: Tags associated with the stream content.
- **streamType**: Type of the stream, which is "Live".
- **searchType**: Type of search query, here it is "Game".
- **started**: Flag indicating if the stream has started, set to true.
- **startedOn**: Timestamp indicating when the stream started.
- **paused**: Indicates if the stream is currently paused, set to false.
- **pausedOn**: Timestamp when the stream was paused.
- **stopped**: Indicates if the stream has been stopped, currently false.
- **stoppedOn**: Timestamp for when the stream was stopped, currently null.
- **streamId**: Identifier for the stream.
- **channel**: Name of the channel for the stream.
- **category**: Category under which the stream falls, noted as "Board".
- **categoryId**: Identifier for the category.
- **subCategory**: More specific category under which the stream falls, noted as "Outdoor Party".
- **subCategoryId**: Identifier for the sub-category.
- **scheduleDate**: Date when the stream is scheduled.
- **scheduleTime**: Time when the stream is scheduled.
- **streamHours**: Duration of the stream in hours.
- **coverPhotoUrl**: URL for the cover photo of the stream.
- **providerPlaybackUrl**: Placeholder for the playback URL from the provider.
- **voteTokenQuantity**: The quantity of voting tokens available, set to 100.
- **votingTimeReset**: Duration for when the voting resets, set to "5".
- **voteButtonQuantity**: Number of vote buttons, here it is 4.
- **voteButtonText1**: Text for the first vote option, "Layup".
- **voteButtonText2**: Text for the second vote option, "Dunk".
- **isRewardsEnabled**: Indicates if a rewards system is enabled for the stream, set to false.
- **isTournamentEnabled**: Indicates if a tournament feature is enabled, set to true.
- **tournamentButtonText1**: Text for the first tournament button, "Hit".
- **tournamentButtonText2**: Text for the second tournament button, "Miss".
- **streamLocatorName**: Name for locating the stream.
- **streamAssetName**: Name of the stream asset.
- **platformVideoIds**: Object that holds identifiers for different video platforms; all fields currently set to false.
- **platformEventIds**: Object that holds event identifiers for various social platforms; all fields currently set to false.
- **primaryCameraName**: Name of the primary camera used for the stream.
- **primaryMicrophoneName**: Name of the primary microphone used.
- **primarySpeakerName**: Name of the primary speaker used.
- **additionalCameras**: Array listing additional cameras and their corresponding microphones.
- **createdDate**: Date when the stream details were created.
- **createdTime**: Time when the stream details were created.
- **updatedDate**: Date of the latest update to the stream details.
- **updatedTime**: Time of the latest update to the stream details.
- **deletedDate**: Date of deletion if applicable, currently null.
- **deletedTime**: Time of deletion if applicable, currently null.

This endpoint encompasses the full details for creating and managing a live video stream on TikTok Live, complete with options, stream specifics, and detailed information regarding the stream's status and associated platform interactions.

request.description:
### Description of Data in the Video - Connect - Update - TikTok Live Endpoint

- **name**: This specifies the name of the API request, which is "Video - Connect - Update - TikTok Live".

- **request**: This object contains information about the API request.

  - **method**: This indicates the HTTP method used for the request, which is "PUT".
  
  - **url**: This shows the endpoint URL the request is sent to, which is `http://localhost:3000/api/video/connect/update`.
  
  - **headers**: This is an array of headers that will be sent with the request.
    
    - **key**: "Content-Type" indicates the media type of the resource.
    
    - **value**: "application/json" indicates that the request body is in JSON format.
  
  - **body**: This object contains the main data being sent in the request.
  
    - **mode**: This indicates that the body is in "raw" format.
    
    - **raw**: This is a string containing JSON data that represents the details for connecting to the video stream.
    
      - **options**: This nested object includes several options for the connection.
      
        - **providerName**: Indicates the name of the provider, which is "tiktoklive".
        
        - **providerId**: A placeholder for the identifier of the provider.
        
        - **apiKey** through **authPassword**: Various authentication and connection details containing credentials and server information. These fields might often be null or empty, indicating no specific value is currently set.
        
        - **uniqueKey**: A unique identifier for the connection.
        
        - **videoId**: The identifier for the video being streamed.
        
        - **accountId**: The identifier for the userâ€™s account.
        
        - **channelId**: The identifier for the channel where the video will be streamed.
        
        - **sessionId**: Identifier for the current streaming session.
        
        - **streamId**: Identifier for the stream.
        
        - **ipAddress**: The IP address of the device making the request, which can be null.
        
        - **country**: The country of the request origin, set to "United States".
        
        - **state**: The state of the request origin, set to "California".
        
        - **title**: The title of the stream, which is "Fortune's Basketball Challenge".
        
        - **description**: A brief description of the stream, detailing it as a basketball game featuring challenges.
        
        - **tags**: Keywords related to the video, listed as "basketball,game,challenge".

      - **stream**: This nested object contains details about the stream itself.
      
        - **streamId**: A unique identifier for the stream.
        
        - **streamName**: The name of the stream, which includes a unique identifier as part of it.
        
        - **uniqueKey**: The same unique key as before.
        
        - **videoId**, **accountId**, **channelId**, **sessionId**: Repeat identifiers necessary for linking the stream with the video, account, channel, and session.
        
        - **videoStatus**: Represents the current status of the video. In this case, it is "not ready".
        
        - **providerName**: Indicates which service provider is handling the stream, which is "cloudflare".
        
        - **providerUniqueId**: A unique identifier specific to the provider.
        
        - **providerPlaybackUrl**: A URL for playing back the stream, currently empty.
        
        - **providerStreamId**: Another identifier for the stream provided by Cloudflare.
        
        - **providerStreamKey**: The stream key needed to publish the stream on the provider's service.
        
        - **providerStreamUrl**: The URL endpoint for streaming.
        
        - **providerStreamData**: An object containing various data related to the stream provided by the platform.
        
          - **result**: Contains details such as the stream ID, URLs for RTMP and SRT protocols, and a mac address for the stream.
          
          - **created** and **modified**: Timestamps showing when the stream was created and last modified.
          
          - **meta**: Metadata about the stream, including account details and input device information.
          
          - **defaultCreator**: Represents the default creator ID for the stream.
          
          - **status**: Indicates current status, currently set to null.
          
          - **recording**: Shows recording settings, including whether it requires signed URLs and allowed origins.
          
          - **deleteRecordingAfterDays**: Indicates if there is any deletion policy for recordings, currently set to null.
        
        - **success**: Indicates whether the operation was successful, set to true.
        
        - **errors**: An array to capture any errors that may have occurred during the operation, currently empty.
        
        - **messages**: An array to include any messages related to the operation, currently empty.
        
        - **createdDate**: The date when the stream was created.
        
        - **createdTime**: The time when the stream was created.
        
        - **updatedDate**: The last date when the stream was updated.
        
        - **updatedTime**: The last time when the stream was updated.
        
        - **deletedDate**: If this stream has been deleted, this would indicate the date. Currently null.
        
        - **deletedTime**: If this stream has been deleted, this would indicate the time. Currently null.

      - **details**: Contains detailed information about the video stream settings and metadata.
      
        - **accountId**, **sessionId**, **channelId**, **videoId**: Repeated identifiers necessary for associating the stream with associated entities.
        
        - **title**: Title of the stream as previously defined.
        
        - **description**: Description of the stream, as previously defined.
        
        - **tags**: Repeat of keywords related to the video.
        
        - **streamType**: Describes the type of stream, which is "Live".
        
        - **searchType**: Indicates how the video might be categorized in searches, which is "Game".
        
        - **started**: A boolean indicating if the stream has started, currently true.
        
        - **startedOn**: Timestamp indicating when the stream started.
        
        - **paused**: A boolean indicating if the stream is currently paused, set to false.
        
        - **pausedOn**: Timestamp indicating the last time the stream was paused.
        
        - **stopped**: A boolean indicating if the stream has been stopped, set to false.
        
        - **stoppedOn**: Indicates when the stream was stopped, currently null.
        
        - **streamId**: Repeat of the stream identifier.
        
        - **channel**: Name of the channel where the streaming is occurring.
        
        - **category**: General category of the stream, which is "Board".
        
        - **categoryId**: Represents the unique identifier for the category.
        
        - **subCategory**: More specific category detailing the type of stream, which is "Outdoor Party".
        
        - **subCategoryId**: Unique identifier for the sub-category.
        
        - **scheduleDate**: Date when the stream is scheduled to occur.
        
        - **scheduleTime**: Time when the stream is scheduled.
        
        - **streamHours**: Duration of the stream in hours.
        
        - **coverPhotoUrl**: URL for the cover photo related to the stream.
        
        - **providerPlaybackUrl**: The URL to access the playback details from the provider, currently empty.
        
        - **voteTokenQuantity**: Number of tokens available for voting, set to 100.
        
        - **votingTimeReset**: Time in minutes indicating when voting resets, which is 5 minutes.
        
        - **voteButtonQuantity**: Number of buttons available for voting, currently set to 4.
        
        - **voteButtonText1** and **voteButtonText2**: The labels for the voting buttons.
        
        - **isRewardsEnabled**: Indicates if rewards are enabled for the stream, set to false.
        
        - **isTournamentEnabled**: Indicates if a tournament feature is enabled, set to true.
        
        - **tournamentButtonText1** and **tournamentButtonText2**: Text for buttons related to tournament actions.
        
        - **streamLocatorName**: Name used for locating the stream.
        
        - **streamAssetName**: Name of the asset used in the stream.
        
        - **platformVideoIds**: This object includes IDs for various platforms, currently all set to false indicating no connection to those platforms.
        
        - **platformEventIds**: Similar to platformVideoIds, this object includes event IDs for various platforms, also all set to false.
        
        - **primaryCameraName**: Name of the primary camera used for the stream, which is "Sony 4K Ultra HD WebCam".
        
        - **primaryMicrophoneName**: Name of the primary microphone used, "WirelessAudioTek Device".
        
        - **primarySpeakerName**: Name of the primary speaker used, "Bose-Mega-Speaker 2.0".
        
        - **additionalCameras**: An array detailing any additional cameras and microphones used.
        
        - **createdDate**: The date when the details were created.
        
        - **createdTime**: Time when the details were created.
        
        - **updatedDate**: The last date the details were updated.
        
        - **updatedTime**: The last time the details were updated.
        
        - **deletedDate**: Date of deletion, if applicable, currently null.
        
        - **deletedTime**: Time of deletion, if applicable, currently null.

request.description:
### Video - Connect - Delete - TikTok Live

#### Request Information
- **Method**: The request uses the POST method, which is commonly used for sending data to a server.
- **URL**: The endpoint for the API is specified as `http://localhost:3000/api/video/connect/delete`, indicating that this is a local server instance.

#### Headers
- **Content-Type**: Specifies that the data being sent in the request body is in JSON format.

#### Request Body
The body of the request contains two main sections: `options` and `stream`.

##### Options
- **providerName**: Defines the service provider for the video stream, set to "tiktoklive".
- **providerId**: This field is left blank and would typically store a unique identifier for the provider.
- **apiKey**: This is null, suggesting that no API key is required or provided for authentication.
- **apiSecret**: This is also null, indicating there is no API secret provided.
- **apiClientId**: Left null, indicating a client ID is not used for this request.
- **authToken**: This is null, implying that authentication is not needed in this context.
- **server**: This field is null, potentially used to specify a server if required.
- **rtmpUrl**: This is null and would typically contain the RTMP (Real-Time Messaging Protocol) URL.
- **streamKey**: This is null, usually needed to authenticate the stream.
- **channelUrl**: This is null, where a specific channel URL would be provided if applicable.
- **authUsername**: Left null, suggesting there is no username needed for authentication.
- **authPassword**: This is null, meaning no password is needed for authentication.
- **uniqueKey**: A unique identifier for this specific stream or connection.
- **videoId**: Indicates the ID of the video being targeted for the action.
- **accountId**: Represents the ID of the user account associated with the stream.
- **channelId**: Indicates the ID of the channel where the stream is hosted.
- **sessionId**: This stands for the ID of the user session during the stream.
- **streamId**: Represents the ID of the specific stream.
- **ipAddress**: This is null, where the IP address could be specified if needed.
- **country**: The country associated with this request, set to the "United States".
- **state**: Represents the state of the account or stream, specified as "California".
- **title**: The title of the video stream, which in this case is "Fortune's Basketball Challenge".
- **description**: A description of the video content, stating it features a basketball game with amazing plays and challenges.
- **tags**: A comma-separated list of tags related to the video, helping in categorization and searchability.

##### Stream
- **streamId**: Identifier for the stream, linking to the options provided.
- **streamName**: A unique name for the live stream that includes a timestamp and identifier.
- **uniqueKey**: Same as in options; this confirms the unique identifier.
- **videoId, accountId, channelId, sessionId**: These fields provide identifiers similar to those defined in the options section.
- **videoStatus**: The current status of the video, stated as "not ready".
- **providerName**: The name of the video provider, set to "cloudflare".
- **providerUniqueId**: A unique identifier used by the provider for tracking.
- **providerPlaybackUrl**: URL for playback, left blank indicating no specific playback URL is set.
- **providerStreamId**: Identifier used by the provider for this stream.
- **providerStreamKey**: A key used for authenticating the stream with the provider.
- **providerStreamUrl**: URL for the stream, listed as a specific endpoint.
- **providerStreamData**: Nested data containing more technical details of the stream:
  - **result**: Contains various technical parameters for streaming, such as:
    - **uid**: Unique identifier for the stream.
    - **rtmps**: URLs for RTMPS protocol streams and corresponding keys.
    - **srt**: URLs for SRT protocol and associated passphrases.
    - **webRTC**: URLs for WebRTC streaming and playback.
    - **created** and **modified**: Timestamps for when the stream was created and last modified.
    - **meta**: Includes additional information about the video and stream.
    - **defaultCreator**: The ID of the creator or user who initiated this stream.
    - **status**: Current status of the stream, returned as null here.
    - **recording**: Object indicating recording settings for the stream.
    - **deleteRecordingAfterDays**: Specifies whether the recording will auto-delete after a certain number of days, currently is null.

##### General Details
- **createdDate** & **updatedDate**: Timestamps for when the stream was created and last updated.
- **deletedDate** & **deletedTime**: Fields to specify if the stream has been deleted, currently null.

##### Additional Streaming Details
- **accountId, sessionId, channelId, videoId**: Identifiers similar to earlier sections.
- **title, description, tags**: These fields are repeated from the options, ensuring clarity and consistency.
- **streamType**: Indicates the nature of the stream, specified as "Live".
- **searchType**: The type used for search functionality, set to "Game".
- **started, paused, stopped**: Boolean flags indicating the current state of the stream.
- **streamId**: Identifier for this stream.
- **channel, category, subCategory**: Categorization fields for easier identification of content type.
- **scheduleDate, scheduleTime**: Information about when the stream is scheduled to start.
- **streamHours**: Duration planned for the stream.
- **coverPhotoUrl**: URL for the cover photo image associated with the stream.
- **providerPlaybackUrl**: Playback URL related to the stream, left blank.
- **voteTokenQuantity** & **votingTimeReset**: Parameters related to user voting mechanics in the stream.
- **isRewardsEnabled** & **isTournamentEnabled**: Flags indicating if rewards or tournaments are active features for this stream.
- **streamLocatorName, streamAssetName**: Names associated with locating and identifying the assets for the stream.
- **platformVideoIds**: Contains fields for integration with various social platforms, all currently set to false or disabled.
- **primaryCameraName, primaryMicrophoneName, primarySpeakerName**: Indicates the primary devices used for video and audio capture.
- **additionalCameras**: Array listing additional cameras and microphones configured.
- **createdDate, updatedDate**: Timestamps for tracking creation and updates to this particular set of details.
- **deletedDate, deletedTime**: Indicate when the content was deleted, currently null.

This detailed breakdown helps users understand how to properly configure and utilize the API to manage their video streaming needs effectively.

request.description:
### Detailed Description of API Endpoint Data

#### Name
- **Video - Connect - Create - Trovo Live:** This is the title of the API endpoint that indicates it is used for creating a live video connection on the Trovo platform.

#### Request Method
- **POST:** This indicates that the endpoint is designed to receive data to create a new resource (in this case, a live video).

#### URL
- **http://localhost:3000/api/video/connect/create:** The URL where the API is accessed locally to create a video connection.

#### Headers
- **Content-Type:** This specifies the media type of the resource. In this case, it is set to `application/json`, which indicates that the request body will be in JSON format.

#### Body
- **mode:** Indicates the mode of the request body; it is set to `raw`, meaning the raw string will be sent directly in the body.
- **raw:** The actual JSON data being sent in the request body.

##### Options
- **providerName:** The name of the video streaming provider, here it is set to "trovolive."
- **providerId:** An identifier for the provider, which is currently left blank.
- **apiKey, apiSecret, apiClientId, authToken, server, rtmpUrl, streamKey, channelUrl, authUsername, authPassword:** Various credentials and identifiers related to the streaming service, many of which are currently set to null or left blank.
- **uniqueKey:** A unique string that identifies the stream.
- **videoId:** An identifier for the video.
- **accountId:** This refers to the specific account under which the video is associated.
- **channelId:** An identifier for the channel where the live video will be streamed.
- **sessionId:** A unique identifier for the streaming session.
- **streamId:** An identifier for the specific stream.
- **ipAddress:** The IP address from which the request is made, currently set to null.
- **country:** The country where the live video is being created, set to "United States."
- **state:** The state, here it is "California."
- **title:** The title of the live video broadcast, which is "Fortune's Basketball Challenge."
- **description:** A brief description of the live event, noting exciting plays and challenges in basketball.
- **tags:** Tags related to the video content, provided as a comma-separated string such as "basketball,game,challenge."

##### Stream
- **streamId:** An identifier for the stream.
- **streamName:** A generated name for the live video stream.
- **uniqueKey:** Repeats the unique key for cross-reference.
- **videoId, accountId, channelId, sessionId:** Repeated identifiers that link this stream to the respective video and accounts.
- **videoStatus:** Status of the video, marked as "notready."
- **providerName:** This indicates the cloud provider handling the video stream, labeled as "cloudflare."
- **providerUniqueId:** A unique identifier specific to this provider instance.
- **providerPlaybackUrl:** URL for playback, currently empty.
- **providerStreamId:** An identifier for the stream within the provider.
- **providerStreamKey:** The key required to authenticate this stream with the provider.
- **providerStreamUrl:** The URL where the stream is sent.
- **providerStreamData:** Additional information related to the stream, including socket URLs and keys for different protocols.
- **success:** Indicates whether the request was successful or not (true in this case).
- **errors:** An array to capture any errors that occurred during the request (empty here).
- **messages:** An array that contains any messages related to the request (empty here).
- **createdDate, createdTime, updatedDate, updatedTime, deletedDate, deletedTime:** Timestamps indicating when the stream was created, last updated, or deleted (if applicable).

##### Details
- **accountId, sessionId, channelId, videoId:** Repeated identifiers that link the stream to relevant data.
- **title, description, tags:** Repeated title, description, and tags for clarity.
- **streamType:** Type of the stream (indicated as "Live").
- **searchType:** Classification for search, set as "Game."
- **started, paused, stopped:** Boolean flags indicating the status of the stream (started = true, paused = false, stopped = false).
- **startedOn, pausedOn, stoppedOn:** Timestamps indicating when the stream was started, paused, or stopped.
- **streamId:** The identifier for this specific stream.
- **channel:** The display name of the channel where the stream occurs.
- **category, categoryId, subCategory, subCategoryId:** Classifications for the content of the stream and their respective IDs.
- **scheduleDate, scheduleTime:** Define when the stream is scheduled to start.
- **streamHours:** Duration of the live stream in hours.
- **coverPhotoUrl:** URL for the cover photo representing the stream.
- **providerPlaybackUrl:** Redundant playback URL; currently empty.
- **voteTokenQuantity:** Number of tokens available for voting.
- **votingTimeReset:** Time period before resetting votes.
- **voteButtonQuantity:** Number of voting options available.
- **voteButtonText1, voteButtonText2:** The displayed text for voting buttons.
- **isRewardsEnabled:** Indicates if rewards are enabled (set to false).
- **isTournamentEnabled:** Indicates if a tournament feature is enabled (set to true).
- **tournamentButtonText1, tournamentButtonText2:** Labels for the tournament voting buttons.
- **streamLocatorName, streamAssetName:** Names related to the stream's location and asset.
- **platformVideoIds:** A collection of platform-specific video IDs, all set to false (no IDs assigned).
- **platformEventIds:** Similar to video IDs, but for events on various platforms; also all set to false.
- **primaryCameraName, primaryMicrophoneName, primarySpeakerName:** Specifications for the main video and audio devices used.
- **additionalCameras:** An array detailing additional cameras used alongside their associated microphones.
- **createdDate, createdTime, updatedDate, updatedTime, deletedDate, deletedTime:** Timestamps for creating, updating, or deleting the stream.

request.description:
### Endpoint: Video - Connect - Update - Trovo Live

**Request Method**: PUT  
**URL**: `http://localhost:3000/api/video/connect/update`  
**Headers**: 
- **Content-Type**: Specifies that the request body format is JSON.

#### Body Parameters:

##### Options
- **providerName**: The name of the video provider, in this case, it is set to "trovolive".
- **providerId**: An identifier for the provider, currently not specified.
- **apiKey**: Key needed to authenticate with the provider's API; currently null.
- **apiSecret**: Secret key for secure authentication; currently null.
- **apiClientId**: Client identifier for the API; currently null.
- **authToken**: Token for authentication purposes; currently null.
- **server**: Information about the server, currently not provided.
- **rtmpUrl**: URL for RTMP streaming, currently not set.
- **streamKey**: Key to access the stream, currently not divided.
- **channelUrl**: URL for the channel, not specified.
- **authUsername**: Username for authentication, currently null.
- **authPassword**: Password for authentication, currently null.
- **uniqueKey**: A unique identifier for the stream.
- **videoId**: Identifier for the video.
- **accountId**: Identifier for the user's account.
- **channelId**: Identifier for the channel.
- **sessionId**: Identifier for the current session.
- **streamId**: Identifier for the stream.
- **ipAddress**: IP address of the user; currently set to null.
- **country**: The country of the user; set to "United States".
- **state**: The state of the user; set to "California".
- **title**: Title of the video, "Fortune's Basketball Challenge".
- **description**: A brief description of the video content.
- **tags**: Associated tags for the video, such as "basketball", "game", and "challenge".

##### Stream Details
- **streamId**: Identifier for the stream.
- **streamName**: A unique name for the stream.
- **uniqueKey**: A unique key associated with the stream.
- **videoId**: Identifier for the video.
- **accountId**: Identifier for the user's account.
- **channelId**: Identifier for the channel.
- **sessionId**: Identifier for the current session.
- **videoStatus**: The current status of the video; indicated as "notready".
- **providerName**: Name of the video provider, e.g., "cloudflare".
- **providerUniqueId**: Unique identifier assigned by the provider.
- **providerPlaybackUrl**: URL for playback from the provider; currently empty.
- **providerStreamId**: Unique identifier used for streaming, assigned by the provider.
- **providerStreamKey**: Key for connecting to the provider's stream.
- **providerStreamUrl**: Base URL for the provider's streaming service.
- **providerStreamData**: Detailed data returned from the provider's API, including various URLs for streaming options and metadata about the stream.
- **success**: Boolean indicating if the update operation was successful.
- **errors**: Array to capture any error messages, currently empty.
- **messages**: Array for any messages related to the operation, currently empty.
- **createdDate**: Date when the stream was created.
- **createdTime**: Time when the stream was created.
- **updatedDate**: Date when the stream was last updated.
- **updatedTime**: Time when the stream was last updated.
- **deletedDate**: Date when the stream was deleted, currently null.
- **deletedTime**: Time when the stream was deleted, currently null.

##### Details
- **accountId**: Identifier for the account.
- **sessionId**: Identifier for the current session.
- **channelId**: Identifier for the channel.
- **videoId**: Identifier for the video.
- **title**: Title of the streaming event.
- **description**: Description of the streaming event.
- **tags**: Tags associated with the stream.
- **streamType**: Type of stream, specified as "Live".
- **searchType**: Indicates the search type, marked as "Game".
- **started**: Boolean indicating if the stream has started.
- **startedOn**: Timestamp of when the stream started.
- **paused**: Boolean indicating if the stream is paused.
- **pausedOn**: Timestamp of when the stream was paused.
- **stopped**: Boolean indicating if the stream has stopped.
- **stoppedOn**: Timestamp of when the stream stopped; currently null.
- **streamId**: Identifier for the stream.
- **channel**: Name of the channel broadcasting the stream.
- **category**: Category of the video, marked as "Board".
- **categoryId**: Identifier for the category.
- **subCategory**: Sub-category of the stream content, listed as "Outdoor Party".
- **subCategoryId**: Identifier for the sub-category.
- **scheduleDate**: Date when the stream is scheduled; currently shows a date.
- **scheduleTime**: Scheduled time for the stream.
- **streamHours**: Number of hours the stream is planned to run.
- **coverPhotoUrl**: URL for the cover photo of the stream.
- **providerPlaybackUrl**: Playback URL from the provider; currently empty.
- **voteTokenQuantity**: Quantity of voting tokens available for viewers.
- **votingTimeReset**: Duration for resetting voting time.
- **voteButtonQuantity**: Number of voting buttons available.
- **voteButtonText1**: Text for the first voting button.
- **voteButtonText2**: Text for the second voting button.
- **isRewardsEnabled**: Boolean indicating if rewards are enabled for viewers.
- **isTournamentEnabled**: Boolean indicating if a tournament feature is enabled.
- **tournamentButtonText1**: Text for the first tournament button.
- **tournamentButtonText2**: Text for the second tournament button.
- **streamLocatorName**: Name used for locating the stream.
- **streamAssetName**: Asset name associated with the stream.
- **platformVideoIds**: Object containing identifiers for the video on various platforms, all currently set to false.
- **platformEventIds**: Object containing event identifiers across platforms; all currently false.
- **primaryCameraName**: Name of the primary camera being used for the stream.
- **primaryMicrophoneName**: Name of the primary microphone being used for audio.
- **primarySpeakerName**: Name of the primary speaker's audio output.
- **additionalCameras**: Array listing additional camera and microphone configurations.
- **createdDate**: Date when the details were created.
- **createdTime**: Time when the details were created.
- **updatedDate**: Date when the details were last updated.
- **updatedTime**: Time when the details were last updated.
- **deletedDate**: Date when the details were deleted, currently null.
- **deletedTime**: Time when the details were deleted, currently null.

request.description:
### Video - Connect - Delete - Trovo Live

**Request Information:**
- **Method:** POST  
   This indicates that the action to be performed is to send data to the server to create or update a resource.
  
- **URL:** `http://localhost:3000/api/video/connect/delete`  
   This is the endpoint where the API request is sent. The endpoint is configured to handle video connection deletions specifically for Trovo Live.

- **Headers:**
  - **Content-Type:** `application/json`  
    This header tells the server that the request body is in JSON format.

**Request Body Description:**

1. **options:**
   - **providerName:** `trovolive`  
     The name of the video service provider from which the connection will be deleted.
   - **providerId:** `""` (empty)  
     This field is meant for the unique identifier of the provider; currently left empty.
   - **apiKey:** `null`  
     The API key for authentication is not provided.
   - **apiSecret:** `null`  
     The API secret for authentication is not provided.
   - **apiClientId:** `null`  
     The client ID necessary for making requests is not provided.
   - **authToken:** `null`  
     An authentication token is not provided.
   - **server:** `null`  
     No server information is specified.
   - **rtmpUrl:** `null`  
     The RTMP (Real-Time Messaging Protocol) URL is not provided.
   - **streamKey:** `null`  
     The key for streaming is not specified.
   - **channelUrl:** `null`  
     The URL for the associated channel is not provided.
   - **authUsername:** `null`  
     The username for authentication is not provided.
   - **authPassword:** `null`  
     The password for authentication is not provided.
   - **uniqueKey:** `uniqueKey`  
     A unique identifier for the video stream to be deleted.
   - **videoId:** `videoId`  
     The unique identifier of the video to be deleted.
   - **accountId:** `accountId`  
     The unique identifier for the user account.
   - **channelId:** `channelId`  
     The unique identifier for the channel.
   - **sessionId:** `sessionId`  
     The unique identifier for the current session.
   - **streamId:** `streamId`  
     The unique identifier for the streaming session.
   - **ipAddress:** `null`  
     The IP address from which the request originates is not provided.
   - **country:** `United States`  
     The country associated with the data.
   - **state:** `California`  
     The state associated with the data.
   - **title:** `Fortune's Basketball Challenge`  
     Title of the video stream.
   - **description:** `Basketball game featuring amazing plays and challenges.`  
     A brief description of what the video stream features.
   - **tags:** `basketball,game,challenge`  
     Keywords associated with the video stream for indexing and search purposes.

2. **stream:**
   - **streamId:** `streamId`  
     Unique identifier for the current video stream.
   - **streamName:** `live-video-stream-7164b12d-1708817130231`  
     The name assigned to the live video stream.
   - **uniqueKey:** `uniqueKey`  
     A unique identifier correlating to the stream.
   - **videoId:** `videoId`  
     The unique video identifier.
   - **accountId:** `accountId`  
     The account's unique identifier involved in the streaming.
   - **channelId:** `channelId`  
     Identifier for the channel associated with the video.
   - **sessionId:** `sessionId`  
     The identifier for the session.
   - **videoStatus:** `notready`  
     The current readiness state of the video, indicating it isnâ€™t ready for viewing.
   - **providerName:** `cloudflare`  
     Indicates that the video service is being provided by Cloudflare.
   - **providerUniqueId:** `c3b3f93b0a7594f3db917d5f9a671351`  
     Unique identifier assigned to the provider for tracking.
   - **providerPlaybackUrl:** `""` (empty)  
     The URL for playback provided by the service is not specified.
   - **providerStreamId:** `c3b3f93b0a7594f3db917d5f9a671351`  
     Unique identifier for the provider's stream.
   - **providerStreamKey:** `e0bb5fa14f7059bccfcef40d5dbe2283kc3b3f93b0a7594f3db917d5f9a671351`  
     The unique key used for the stream from the provider's side.
   - **providerStreamUrl:** `srt://live.cloudflare.com:778`  
     URL endpoint for streaming from the provider.
   - **providerStreamData:**  
     Contains additional information about the stream including URLs and keys for different protocols (rtmps, srt, webRTC), timestamps for creation and modification, and metadata like the account and stream details.
   - **success:** `true`  
     Indicates that the request was successful.
   - **errors:** `[]`  
     An empty array signifying there are no errors from the operation.
   - **messages:** `[]`  
     An empty array indicating no messages were returned.

3. **createdDate:** `2024-02-24`  
   The date the stream was created.

4. **createdTime:** `23:25:30`  
   The time the stream was created.

5. **updatedDate:** `2024-02-25`  
   The date the stream details were last updated.

6. **updatedTime:** `01:14:26`  
   The time the stream details were last updated.

7. **deletedDate:** `null`  
   Indicates that the stream has not been deleted.

8. **deletedTime:** `null`  
   Indicates that there is no deletion time specified.

9. **details:**  
   Contains specific information on the video stream, including account and channel identifiers, title, description, and timestamps for different stream states (like started, paused, etc.), along with additional attributes regarding the stream and its configuration.

Each field in this detailed structure serves a specific purpose and is critical for managing video streams and their associations in this particular application.

request.description:
### Endpoint: Create New Video for Twitch

#### Request Details
- **Method**: POST
- **URL**: `http://localhost:3000/api/video/connect/create`

#### Headers
- **Content-Type**: Specifies the media type of the resource. Here it is set to `application/json` indicating that the request body contains JSON data.

#### Request Body
The request body contains two main sections: `options` and `stream`.

##### Options
- **providerName**: The name of the video streaming provider, which in this case is `twitch`.
- **providerId**: An identifier for the video provider, which is not specified (empty).
- **apiKey**: An API key for authentication, currently set to null.
- **apiSecret**: A secret key for API authentication, currently set to null.
- **apiClientId**: A client ID used in API calls, currently set to null.
- **authToken**: Token used for authentication purposes, currently set to null.
- **server**: Server information for the provider, currently set to null.
- **rtmpUrl**: URL for RTMP (Real-Time Messaging Protocol) streaming, currently set to null.
- **streamKey**: A unique key used to identify the stream, currently set to null.
- **channelUrl**: URL for the channel associated with the stream, currently set to null.
- **authUsername**: Username for authentication, currently set to null.
- **authPassword**: Password for authentication, currently set to null.
- **uniqueKey**: A unique identifier for the stream/session, to be provided.
- **videoId**: Identifier for the specific video being streamed.
- **accountId**: Identifier for the userâ€™s account.
- **channelId**: Identifier for the streaming channel.
- **sessionId**: Identifier for the current streaming session.
- **streamId**: Identifier for the stream.
- **ipAddress**: User's IP address, currently set to null.
- **country**: The country of the user, set to "United States".
- **state**: The state of the user, set to "California".
- **title**: The title of the video stream, "Fortune's Basketball Challenge".
- **description**: A brief overview of the video content, describing it as a "Basketball game featuring amazing plays and challenges."
- **tags**: Keywords associated with the video, indicated as "basketball, game, challenge".

##### Stream
- **streamId**: The identifier for the stream.
- **streamName**: The unique name of the stream, formatted as "live-video-stream-XXXX".
- **uniqueKey**: The same unique key used in options.
- **videoId**: Identifier for the specific video.
- **accountId**: Identifier for the userâ€™s account linked to the stream.
- **channelId**: Identifier for the channel hosting the stream.
- **sessionId**: Identifier for the current session.
- **videoStatus**: The status of the video, set to "notready" indicating it isn't prepared for streaming yet.
- **providerName**: The provider being used for the stream, in this case, "cloudflare".
- **providerUniqueId**: Unique identifier for the specific stream on the provider's infrastructure.
- **providerPlaybackUrl**: URL for playback through the provider, currently empty.
- **providerStreamId**: Unique identifier for the streamed content on the provider's end.
- **providerStreamKey**: Unique key needed to access the stream.
- **providerStreamUrl**: URL for streaming from the provider.
- **providerStreamData**: Contains various data related to the stream including URLs for different streaming protocols and metadata.
  - **created**: Timestamp of when the stream was created.
  - **modified**: Timestamp of the last modification to the stream.
  - **meta**: Additional metadata associated with the stream including:
    - Account ID
    - Audio and Video input names
    - Title and description of the stream
    - Stream ID and Video ID
    - Cover photo URL
  - **defaultCreator**: The identifier of the creator of the content.
  - **status**: Current status of the stream (not specified here).
  - **recording**: Information regarding the recording settings such as mode and signing requirements.
  - **deleteRecordingAfterDays**: Specifies how many days after recording the stream should be deleted, if applicable.

##### Success Indicator
- **success**: A boolean indicating whether the request was successful, which is true in this case.
  
##### Errors and Messages
- **errors**: An array to list any errors encountered, currently empty.
- **messages**: An array to contain any messages related to the request, currently empty.

##### Timestamps
- **createdDate**: The date when the stream was created.
- **createdTime**: The exact time when the stream was created.
- **updatedDate**: Date indicating when the stream was last updated.
- **updatedTime**: Time indicating when the stream was last updated.
- **deletedDate**: Date indicating when the stream was deleted, currently null.
- **deletedTime**: Time indicating when the stream was deleted, currently null.

##### Details
The `details` object encapsulates various aspects related to the video stream including:
- Identifiers for account, session, channel, and video.
- Title, description, and tags for the stream.
- Stream type categorized as "Live" and search type as "Game".
- Flags indicating the stream state such as started, paused, and stopped along with their timestamps.
- Channel and category information for classification.
- Dates and times for creation and updates.
- Cover photo URL and voting options pertaining to interaction with viewers.
- Details about cameras and audio devices being utilized for the stream.
- Platform-specific identifiers and event IDs for managing content across various systems.

This documentation provides a comprehensive overview of the parameters and structure used in the Video Connect Create API endpoint for Twitch.

request.description:
### Endpoint Description: Video - Connect - Update - Twitch

**Request Method**: PUT  
**Request URL**: http://localhost:3000/api/video/connect/update  

#### Headers
- **Content-Type**: Specifies that the format of the data being sent is JSON.

#### Body
The body of the request contains two main sections: `options` and `stream`.

##### Options
- **providerName**: The name of the video service provider, in this case, it's "twitch".
- **providerId**: Identifier for the specific provider account (currently empty).
- **apiKey**: The API key used for authentication (currently null).
- **apiSecret**: The API secret used for authentication (currently null).
- **apiClientId**: Client ID for the API (currently null).
- **authToken**: Authentication token for secure access (currently null).
- **server**: The server address (currently null).
- **rtmpUrl**: Real-Time Messaging Protocol URL (currently null).
- **streamKey**: Key used to authenticate the stream (currently null).
- **channelUrl**: The URL for the streaming channel (currently null).
- **authUsername**: Username for authentication (currently null).
- **authPassword**: Password for authentication (currently null).
- **uniqueKey**: A unique identifier for the video stream.
- **videoId**: Identifier for the video being streamed.
- **accountId**: Identifier for the user account related to the video.
- **channelId**: Identifier for the streaming channel.
- **sessionId**: Identifier for the current streaming session.
- **streamId**: Identifier for the specific stream being referenced.
- **ipAddress**: IP Address of the user (currently null).
- **country**: The country associated with the stream, e.g., "United States".
- **state**: State associated with the stream, e.g., "California".
- **title**: The title of the video, in this case, "Fortune's Basketball Challenge".
- **description**: A brief description of the video content, specifically about basketball gameplay.
- **tags**: Relevant tags related to the video, which include "basketball", "game", and "challenge".

##### Stream
- **streamId**: Identifier for the stream.
- **streamName**: Name given to the stream, for example, "live-video-stream-7164b12d-1708817130231".
- **uniqueKey**: A unique key identifying this specific stream.
- **videoId**: Identifier for the video associated with this stream.
- **accountId**: Identifier for the account associated with the stream.
- **channelId**: Identifier for the channel this stream belongs to.
- **sessionId**: Identifier for the session of this stream.
- **videoStatus**: Current status of the video, e.g., "notready".
- **providerName**: Name of the streaming provider, e.g., "cloudflare".
- **providerUniqueId**: A unique identifier from the provider.
- **providerPlaybackUrl**: URL for playback from the provider (currently empty).
- **providerStreamId**: Identifier provided by the streaming provider.
- **providerStreamKey**: Key for accessing the stream from the provider.
- **providerStreamUrl**: URL for the stream provided by the provider.
- **providerStreamData**: Contains data regarding the stream, such as URLs and keys for various streaming protocols (RTMP, SRT, WebRTC), along with metadata like creation and modification dates and various identifiers.
- **success**: Indicates whether the update was successful (true/false).
- **errors**: Array for any errors encountered during the update (currently empty).
- **messages**: Array for messages related to the update process (currently empty).
- **createdDate**: Date when the stream was created.
- **createdTime**: Time when the stream was created.
- **updatedDate**: Date when the stream was last updated.
- **updatedTime**: Time when the stream was last updated.
- **deletedDate**: Date when the stream was deleted (currently null).
- **deletedTime**: Time when the stream was deleted (currently null).

##### Details
- **accountId**: Identifier for the user account.
- **sessionId**: Identifier for the session.
- **channelId**: Identifier for the channel.
- **videoId**: Identifier for the video content.
- **title**: The title of the stream/video.
- **description**: Description of the content being streamed.
- **tags**: Tags that describe the content.
- **streamType**: Type of the stream (e.g., Live).
- **searchType**: Type of search categorization (e.g., Game).
- **started**: Boolean indicating if the stream has started.
- **startedOn**: Timestamp of when the stream started.
- **paused**: Boolean indicating if the stream is paused.
- **pausedOn**: Timestamp of when the stream was paused.
- **stopped**: Boolean indicating if the stream is stopped.
- **stoppedOn**: Timestamp of when the stream was stopped (currently null).
- **streamId**: Identifier for the stream.
- **channel**: Name of the channel, e.g., "Fortune's Basketball Channel".
- **category**: Category of the content, e.g., "Board".
- **categoryId**: Identifier for the category.
- **subCategory**: Subcategory of the content, e.g., "Outdoor Party".
- **subCategoryId**: Identifier for the subcategory.
- **scheduleDate**: Scheduled date for the stream.
- **scheduleTime**: Scheduled time for the stream.
- **streamHours**: Duration in hours for the stream.
- **coverPhotoUrl**: URL for the cover photo associated with the stream.
- **providerPlaybackUrl**: URL for playback provided by the provider (currently empty).
- **voteTokenQuantity**: The number of tokens available for voting.
- **votingTimeReset**: Time duration for resetting voting (in seconds).
- **voteButtonQuantity**: Number of voting buttons available.
- **voteButtonText1**: Text for the first voting button.
- **voteButtonText2**: Text for the second voting button.
- **isRewardsEnabled**: Boolean indicating if rewards are enabled.
- **isTournamentEnabled**: Boolean indicating if tournaments are enabled.
- **tournamentButtonText1**: Text for the first tournament button.
- **tournamentButtonText2**: Text for the second tournament button.
- **streamLocatorName**: Name of the locator for the stream.
- **streamAssetName**: Name of the asset associated with the stream.
- **platformVideoIds**: Object containing potential video IDs from various platforms (currently all false indicating there are no IDs).
- **platformEventIds**: Object containing possible event IDs for popular platforms (currently all false indicating no associated events).
- **primaryCameraName**: The name of the primary camera used for streaming.
- **primaryMicrophoneName**: The name of the primary microphone used.
- **primarySpeakerName**: The name of the primary speaker used.
- **additionalCameras**: List of additional cameras and microphones used, detailing their identifiers.
- **createdDate**: Date of creation for the stream details.
- **createdTime**: Time of creation for the stream details.
- **updatedDate**: Date when the stream details were last updated.
- **updatedTime**: Time when the stream details were last updated.
- **deletedDate**: Date when the stream details were deleted (currently null).
- **deletedTime**: Time when the stream details were deleted (currently null). 

This SDK provides a comprehensive way to update stream details for content being provided via Twitch. Each field must be populated correctly to ensure successful integration and operation.

request.description:
### Endpoint: Video - Connect - Delete - Twitch

#### Request Method
- **POST**: This indicates that the endpoint is designed to accept data for creating a new resource or performing an action on existing resources.

#### Request URL
- **http://localhost:3000/api/video/connect/delete**: The target URL where the request is being sent. This is a local endpoint, typically for development purposes.

#### Headers
- **Content-Type**: Specifies the media type of the resource. Here, it's set to **application/json**, indicating JSON format is used for the request body.

#### Request Body
The request body contains two main sections: `options` and `stream`.

##### Options
- **providerName**: The name of the video streaming provider, in this case, it's set to "twitch".
- **providerId**: A unique identifier for the provider, which is not specified here (empty string).
- **apiKey**: Key used to authenticate with the providerâ€™s API, currently set to null.
- **apiSecret**: Secret for the providerâ€™s API, currently null.
- **apiClientId**: Client ID for accessing the providerâ€™s API, currently null.
- **authToken**: Token for authentication, currently null.
- **server**: Specific server information, currently null.
- **rtmpUrl**: URL for Real-Time Messaging Protocol (RTMP), currently null.
- **streamKey**: A key used to identify the stream, currently null.
- **channelUrl**: URL for the streaming channel, currently null.
- **authUsername**: Username for authentication, currently null.
- **authPassword**: Password for authentication, currently null.
- **uniqueKey**: A unique identifier for this request, value provided as "uniqueKey".
- **videoId**: Identifier for the specific video, provided as "videoId".
- **accountId**: Identifier for the user's account, provided as "accountId".
- **channelId**: Identifier for the channel, provided as "channelId".
- **sessionId**: Identifier for the current session, provided as "sessionId".
- **streamId**: Identifier for the stream, provided as "streamId".
- **ipAddress**: IP address of the user, currently null.
- **country**: Country of the user, provided as "United States".
- **state**: State of the user, provided as "California".
- **title**: Title of the video, provided as "Fortune's Basketball Challenge".
- **description**: Description of the video content, provided as "Basketball game featuring amazing plays and challenges."
- **tags**: Comma-separated tags related to the video content, provided as "basketball, game, challenge".

##### Stream
- **streamId**: Identifier for the stream, provided as "streamId".
- **streamName**: Name of the stream, provided as "live-video-stream-7164b12d-1708817130231".
- **uniqueKey**: A unique identifier for the stream, same as above.
- **videoId**: The identifier for the video, same as above.
- **accountId**: The identifier for the account, same as above.
- **channelId**: The identifier for the channel, same as above.
- **sessionId**: The identifier for the session, same as above.
- **videoStatus**: Current status of the video, provided as "notready".
- **providerName**: Name of the provider associated with the stream, set to "cloudflare".
- **providerUniqueId**: Unique identifier for the provider, provided as "c3b3f93b0a7594f3db917d5f9a671351".
- **providerPlaybackUrl**: URL for playback of the stream, currently empty.
- **providerStreamId**: Stream ID from the provider, provided as "c3b3f93b0a7594f3db917d5f9a671351".
- **providerStreamKey**: Key to access the provider's stream, provided.
- **providerStreamUrl**: URL to access the stream via provider, indicated as "srt://live.cloudflare.com:778".
- **providerStreamData**: Object containing detailed information related to the stream, such as:
  - **result**: Object containing result details including unique IDs for various protocols and timestamps showing when the data was created and modified.
  - **created**: Date and time when the stream data was created.
  - **modified**: Date and time when the stream data was last modified.
  - **meta**: Additional metadata including details about the video, account, audio and video inputs, and cover photo.
  - **defaultCreator**: Identifier for the default creator of the stream.
  - **recording**: Specifies recording settings.
  - **deleteRecordingAfterDays**: Indicates if and when recordings should be deleted.

- **success**: Indicates whether the request action was successful, set to true.
- **errors**: Array to hold any errors that occurred during the request, currently empty.
- **messages**: Array to hold informational messages, currently empty.

##### Dates
- **createdDate**: The date when the stream was created (2024-02-24).
- **createdTime**: The time when the stream was created (23:25:30).
- **updatedDate**: The date when the stream was last updated (2024-02-25).
- **updatedTime**: The time when the stream was last updated (01:14:26).
- **deletedDate**: Indicates when the stream was deleted, currently null.
- **deletedTime**: Time when the stream was deleted, currently null.

##### Details
- **accountId**: Confirmed user account ID related to the stream.
- **sessionId**: Current session ID.
- **channelId**: Channel identifier.
- **videoId**: Video identifier.
- **title**: Title of the video.
- **description**: Description of the video.
- **tags**: Tags related to the video.
- **streamType**: Type of stream; here it's "Live".
- **searchType**: Type of search being conducted; listed as "Game".
- **started**: Indicates if the stream has started, currently true.
- **startedOn**: Timestamp when the stream started.
- **paused**: Indicates if the stream is paused, currently false.
- **pausedOn**: Timestamp when the stream was paused.
- **stopped**: Indicates if the stream has stopped, currently false.
- **stoppedOn**: Timestamp indicating when the stream was stopped, currently null.
- **streamId**: Stream identifier again.
- **channel**: Name of the channel conducting the stream.
- **category**: Main category for the stream, listed as "Board".
- **categoryId**: Identifier for the main category, currently placeholder.
- **subCategory**: Subcategory for the stream, indicated as "Outdoor Party".
- **subCategoryId**: Identifier for the subcategory.
- **scheduleDate**: Scheduled date for the stream (2024-02-01).
- **scheduleTime**: Scheduled time for the stream (18:00:00).
- **streamHours**: Duration of the stream, set to 1 hour.
- **coverPhotoUrl**: URL for the cover photo associated with the stream.
- **providerPlaybackUrl**: URL for playback through the provider.
- **voteTokenQuantity**: Amount of tokens allotted for voting, set to 100.
- **votingTimeReset**: Time reset period for voting, set to 5.
- **voteButtonQuantity**: Number of vote buttons available, set to 4.
- **voteButtonText1**: Text for the first vote button, set to "Layup".
- **voteButtonText2**: Text for the second vote button, set to "Dunk".
- **isRewardsEnabled**: Indicates if rewards are enabled, currently false.
- **isTournamentEnabled**: Indicates if tournaments are enabled, currently true.
- **tournamentButtonText1**: Text for first tournament button, set to "Hit".
- **tournamentButtonText2**: Text for second tournament button, set to "Miss".
- **streamLocatorName**: Name for the stream locator.
- **streamAssetName**: Name for the stream asset.
- **platformVideoIds**: Object holding various platform video IDs, all set to false.
- **platformEventIds**: Object holding various platform event IDs, all set to false.
- **primaryCameraName**: Name of the primary camera used for streaming.
- **primaryMicrophoneName**: Name of the primary microphone used.
- **primarySpeakerName**: Name of the primary speaker used.
- **additionalCameras**: Array holding names of additional cameras and their corresponding microphones.
- **createdDate**: Date when details were created.
- **createdTime**: Time when details were created.
- **updatedDate**: Date when details were last updated.
- **updatedTime**: Time when details were last updated.
- **deletedDate**: Date when details were deleted, currently null.
- **deletedTime**: Time when details were deleted, currently null. 

### Summary
This endpoint is designed for managing the deletion of a video connection in the Twitch platform context. Users need to provide various identifiers related to their account, channel, and video, along with detailed metadata for proper handling of the video stream and recording preferences.
