request.description:
### Endpoint: Video - Connect - Create - Twitter Live

#### Request Information
- **Method**: POST
  - This indicates that the request is meant to create a new resource on the server.
  
- **URL**: `http://localhost:3000/api/video/connect/create`
  - This is the endpoint to which the POST request is made.

- **Headers**:
  - **Content-Type**: `application/json`
    - This header indicates that the request body is formatted in JSON.

#### Request Body
The request body contains two main sections: `options` and `stream`, along with `details`. Below are descriptions for each field in these sections.

##### Options
- **providerName**: `twitterlive`
  - Indicates the video streaming provider being used.
  
- **providerId**: (empty string)
  - An identifier for the video provider. Not specified here.
  
- **apiKey**: `null`
  - Key for API access; currently not provided.
  
- **apiSecret**: `null`
  - Secret key associated with the API; currently not provided.
  
- **apiClientId**: `null`
  - Client ID for API access; currently not provided.
  
- **authToken**: `null`
  - Token used for authenticating the request; currently not provided.
  
- **server**: `null`
  - Indicates the server being used; currently not specified.
  
- **rtmpUrl**: `null`
  - RTMP URL for streaming; currently not provided.
  
- **streamKey**: `null`
  - Key required for streaming; currently not provided.
  
- **channelUrl**: `null`
  - URL for accessing the streaming channel; currently not specified.
  
- **authUsername**: `null`
  - Username for authentication; currently not provided.
  
- **authPassword**: `null`
  - Password for authentication; currently not provided.

- **uniqueKey**: `uniqueKey`
  - A unique identifier for the stream.

- **videoId**: `videoId`
  - Unique identifier for the video being streamed.

- **accountId**: `accountId`
  - Identifier for the userâ€™s account.

- **channelId**: `channelId`
  - Identifier for the channel where the stream is broadcast.

- **sessionId**: `sessionId`
  - Identifier for the streaming session.

- **streamId**: `streamId`
  - Unique identifier for the stream.

- **ipAddress**: `null`
  - The IP address of the user; currently not specified.

- **country**: `United States`
  - The country where the stream is being created.

- **state**: `California`
  - The state where the stream is being created.

- **title**: `Fortune's Basketball Challenge`
  - Title of the live stream.

- **description**: `Basketball game featuring amazing plays and challenges.`
  - Description of what the stream is about.

- **tags**: `basketball,game,challenge`
  - Tags associated with the stream for categorization.

##### Stream
- **streamId**: `streamId`
  - Unique identifier for the stream.

- **streamName**: `live-video-stream-7164b12d-1708817130231`
  - The name given to the stream.

- **uniqueKey**: `uniqueKey`
  - Unique identifier for this stream.

- **videoId**: `videoId`
  - Unique identifier for the video.

- **accountId**: `accountId`
  - Identifier for the userâ€™s account.

- **channelId**: `channelId`
  - Identifier for the channel being used.

- **sessionId**: `sessionId`
  - Identifier for the session.

- **videoStatus**: `notready`
  - Indicates the current status of the video.

- **providerName**: `cloudflare`
  - The streaming provider.

- **providerUniqueId**: `c3b3f93b0a7594f3db917d5f9a671351`
  - Unique ID assigned by the provider.

- **providerPlaybackUrl**: (empty string)
  - URL for playback from the provider; currently not specified.

- **providerStreamId**: `c3b3f93b0a7594f3db917d5f9a671351`
  - Stream ID given by the provider.

- **providerStreamKey**: `e0bb5fa14f7059bccfcef40d5dbe2283kc3b3f93b0a7594f3db917d5f9a671351`
  - Stream key provided by the streaming service.

- **providerStreamUrl**: `srt://live.cloudflare.com:778`
  - URL for the streaming service.

- **providerStreamData**: Contains various streaming configuration data:
  - **result**: An object containing details about the stream.
    - **uid**: Unique identifier from the provider.
    - **rtmps**: Contains RTMP streaming URLs and keys.
    - **srt**: Contains SRT streaming URLs and information.
    - **webRTC**: Contains WebRTC URLs for publishing and playing back streams.
    - **created**: Timestamp for when the stream was created.
    - **modified**: Timestamp for when the stream was last modified.
    - **meta**: Additional metadata for the stream such as account ID, audio input name, cover photo URL, etc.
    - **defaultCreator**: Default creator identifier.

- **success**: `true`
  - Indicates that the request was successful.

- **errors**: `[]`
  - Empty array indicating no errors occurred during the request.

- **messages**: `[]`
  - Empty array indicating no messages were generated during the request.

##### Details
- **accountId**: `accountId`
  - Identifier for the user's account.

- **sessionId**: `sessionId`
  - Identifier for the current streaming session.

- **channelId**: `channelId`
  - Identifier for the channel where the stream is broadcast.

- **videoId**: `videoId`
  - Identifier for the video being streamed.

- **title**: `Fortune's Basketball Challenge`
  - Title of the live stream.

- **description**: `Basketball game featuring amazing plays and challenges.`
  - A brief overview of the live stream.

- **tags**: `basketball,game,challenge`
  - Tags to categorize the stream.

- **streamType**: `Live`
  - Indicates that this is a live stream.

- **searchType**: `Game`
  - Indicates that the stream relates to games.

- **started**: `true`
  - Indicates that the stream has started.

- **startedOn**: `2024-02-24T22:41:42.483Z`
  - Timestamp showing when the stream started.

- **paused**: `false`
  - Indicates whether the stream is paused.

- **pausedOn**: `2024-02-24T22:41:42.483Z`
  - Timestamp showing when the stream was paused (if applicable).

- **stopped**: `false`
  - Indicates whether the stream has been stopped.

- **stoppedOn**: `null`
  - Timestamp showing when the stream was stopped (if applicable).

- **streamId**: `streamId`
  - Unique identifier for the stream.

- **channel**: `Fortune's Basketball Channel`
  - The name of the channel where the stream is hosted.

- **category**: `Board`
  - Category associated with the stream.

- **categoryId**: `categoryId`
  - Identifier for the category.

- **subCategory**: `Outdoor Party`
  - Sub-category associated with the stream.

- **subCategoryId**: `subCategoryId`
  - Identifier for the sub-category.

- **scheduleDate**: `2024-02-01`
  - Date when the stream is scheduled.

- **scheduleTime**: `18:00:00`
  - Time when the stream is scheduled to start.

- **streamHours**: `1`
  - Duration for which the stream is planned.

- **coverPhotoUrl**: `basketball-cover-url.jpg`
  - URL for the cover photo of the stream.

- **providerPlaybackUrl**: (empty string)
  - Indicates URL for playback from the provider; not specified.

- **voteTokenQuantity**: `100`
  - Number of tokens available for voting during the live stream.

- **votingTimeReset**: `5`
  - Time (in minutes) after which voting resets.

- **voteButtonQuantity**: `4`
  - Number of voting buttons available during the stream.

- **voteButtonText1**: `Layup`
  - Text for the first voting button.

- **voteButtonText2**: `Dunk`
  - Text for the second voting button.

- **isRewardsEnabled**: `false`
  - Indicates whether rewards are enabled for voting.

- **isTournamentEnabled**: `true`
  - Indicates whether a tournament feature is enabled.

- **tournamentButtonText1**: `Hit`
  - Text for the first tournament button.

- **tournamentButtonText2**: `Miss`
  - Text for the second tournament button.

- **streamLocatorName**: `basketball-locator-name`
  - Name for locating the stream.

- **streamAssetName**: `basketball-asset-name`
  - Name of the asset for the stream.

- **platformVideoIds**: Object containing platform-specific video IDs:
  - Each platform ID is currently set to `false`, indicating no video IDs are available for platforms like YouTube, Twitch, Instagram, etc.

- **platformEventIds**: Object containing platform-specific event IDs set to `false`, indicating no associated events for various platforms.

- **primaryCameraName**: `Sony 4K Ultra HD WebCam`
  - Name of the primary camera used for streaming.

- **primaryMicrophoneName**: `WirelessAudioTek Device`
  - Name of the primary microphone used for audio capture.

- **primarySpeakerName**: `Bose-Mega-Speaker 2.0`
  - Name of the primary speaker used for audio output.

- **additionalCameras**: List of additional cameras with their respective microphones.

- **createdDate**: `2024-02-18`
  - Date when the details were created.

- **createdTime**: `14:54:25`
  - Time when the details were created.

- **updatedDate**: `2024-02-24`
  - Date when the details were last updated.

- **updatedTime**: `23:29:19`
  - Time when the details were last updated.

- **deletedDate**: `null`
  - Indicates that the stream has not been deleted.

- **deletedTime**: `null`
  - Timestamp indicating there has been no deletion time.

request.description:
### Description of Data in the Endpoint

#### Request
- **Method**: Specifies the HTTP method used for the request. In this case, it is a PUT request, which is typically used to update existing data on the server.
  
- **URL**: The endpoint that the request is targeting, which is `http://localhost:3000/api/video/connect/update`.

- **Headers**: 
  - **Content-Type**: Indicates the media type of the resource. Here, it is set to `application/json`, signifying that the request body will contain JSON data.

- **Body**: This is the main part of the request containing the data to update. It consists of:
  
  - **Options**: 
    - **providerName**: The name of the video streaming provider; in this case, it is set to "twitterlive."
    - **providerId**: An identifier for the provider; here it is left empty.
    - **apiKey**, **apiSecret**, **apiClientId**, **authToken**, **server**, **rtmpUrl**, **streamKey**, **channelUrl**, **authUsername**, **authPassword**: These values are for authentication and configuration, currently set as null, indicating they are not provided.
    - **uniqueKey**: A unique identifier for the video stream.
    - **videoId**: The ID of the video being updated.
    - **accountId**: The ID of the account responsible for the video.
    - **channelId**: The ID of the channel where the video is streamed.
    - **sessionId**: The session identifier for the stream.
    - **streamId**: The ID of the stream.
    - **ipAddress**: The IP address from which the stream is initiated, currently null.
    - **country**: The country where the stream is hosted, set as "United States."
    - **state**: The state where the stream is hosted, set as "California."
    - **title**: The title of the video stream, "Fortune's Basketball Challenge."
    - **description**: A brief description of the video, "Basketball game featuring amazing plays and challenges."
    - **tags**: Keywords associated with the video, which in this case, are "basketball,game,challenge."

  - **Stream**: Provides details about the video stream itself.
    - **streamId**: An identifier for the stream.
    - **streamName**: A generated name for the stream.
    - **videoId**, **accountId**, **channelId**, **sessionId**: Identifiers for the video and associated accounts and channels.
    - **videoStatus**: Current status of the video, set as "notready."
    - **providerName**: The name of the streaming provider, which is "cloudflare" here.
    - **providerUniqueId**, **providerPlaybackUrl**, **providerStreamId**, **providerStreamKey**, **providerStreamUrl**: These are specific to the provider and include unique identifiers and URLs for the stream.
    
    - **providerStreamData**: Contains additional streaming details, including URLs and keys for RTMP and SRT protocols, account information, descriptions, titles, creation dates, modification dates, and metadata like audio and video input names.

    - **success**: A boolean indicating if the stream update was successful.

    - **errors**: An array for any errors encountered during the update; currently empty.

    - **messages**: An array for messages related to the update; also currently empty.

    - **createdDate**, **createdTime**, **updatedDate**, **updatedTime**, **deletedDate**, **deletedTime**: Timestamps reflecting the creation and modification of the video stream.

  - **Details**: Comprehensive information about the video stream including:
    - **accountId**, **sessionId**, **channelId**, **videoId**: Identifiers for the account and video.
    - **title**, **description**, **tags**: Metadata about the video.
    - **streamType**: Indicates the type of streaming, marked as "Live."
    - **searchType**: Indicates the category related to search, marked as "Game."
    - **started**, **paused**, **stopped**: Boolean flags indicating the current state of the stream.
    - **streamId**, **channel**, **category**, **subCategory**: Identifiers and descriptors for the stream.
    - **scheduleDate**, **scheduleTime**: The intended schedule for the stream.
    - **streamHours**: Duration of the stream in hours.
    - **coverPhotoUrl**: URL for the stream's cover photo.
    - **providerPlaybackUrl**: Link for playback, currently empty.
    - **voteTokenQuantity**: Number of tokens available for voting.
    - **votingTimeReset**, **voteButtonQuantity**, **voteButtonText1**, **voteButtonText2**: Parameters related to voting on the stream.
    - **isRewardsEnabled**, **isTournamentEnabled**: Flags indicating if rewards or tournaments are enabled for the stream.
    - **tournamentButtonText1**, **tournamentButtonText2**: Text for buttons related to tournaments.
    - **streamLocatorName**, **streamAssetName**: Identifiers for locating the stream and its associated asset.
    
    - **platformVideoIds**: Object with boolean values indicating if an ID is available for various social media platforms.
    
    - **platformEventIds**: Similar to platformVideoIds but for event identifiers on various platforms.
    
    - **primaryCameraName**, **primaryMicrophoneName**, **primarySpeakerName**: Names of the primary input devices used for the stream.
    
    - **additionalCameras**: An array listing other cameras and microphones that may be used during the stream.
    
    - **createdDate**, **createdTime**, **updatedDate**, **updatedTime**, **deletedDate**, **deletedTime**: Timestamps indicating when the stream details were created and updated.

This endpoint allows users to update the details of a live video stream on a platform, providing comprehensive information about both the stream and its associated resources.

request.description:
### Endpoint Description: Video - Connect - Delete - Twitter Live

This endpoint is used to delete a video connection for a Twitter live stream.

#### Request Details:
- **Method**: POST
  - This indicates that the request will create or modify resources on the server.
  
- **URL**: http://localhost:3000/api/video/connect/delete
  - This is the endpoint to which the request is sent for deleting the video connection.
  
#### Headers:
- **Content-Type**: application/json
  - This indicates that the request body is formatted in JSON.

#### Request Body:
This section outlines the structure and required data for the delete operation:

1. **options**: An object containing various settings for the connection.
   - **providerName**: The name of the provider (e.g., "twitterlive").
   - **providerId**: Identifier for the provider, usually empty for deletion.
   - **apiKey**: Optional API key for authentication; should be null for deletion.
   - **apiSecret**: Optional secret key; should be null for deletion.
   - **apiClientId**: Optional client ID; should be null for deletion.
   - **authToken**: Token for authentication; should be null for deletion.
   - **server**: Server address; usually not needed for deletion.
   - **rtmpUrl**: RTMP URL for streaming; usually null for deletion.
   - **streamKey**: Key used for streaming; usually null for deletion.
   - **channelUrl**: URL for the channel; usually null for deletion.
   - **authUsername**: Username for authentication; should be null for deletion.
   - **authPassword**: Password for authentication; should be null for deletion.
   - **uniqueKey**: A unique identifier for the video connection.
   - **videoId**: Identifier for the video being deleted.
   - **accountId**: Identifier for the user account.
   - **channelId**: Identifier for the specific channel.
   - **sessionId**: Identifier for the live session.
   - **streamId**: Identifies the stream being deleted.
   - **ipAddress**: IP address of the user initiating the request; usually null.
   - **country**: Country where the user is located (e.g., "United States").
   - **state**: State of the user (e.g., "California").
   - **title**: Title of the video (e.g., "Fortune's Basketball Challenge").
   - **description**: Description of the video content (e.g., "Basketball game featuring amazing plays and challenges.").
   - **tags**: Comma-separated tags for the video (e.g., "basketball,game,challenge").

2. **stream**: Contains details about the stream related to the video.
   - **streamId**: Identifier for the specific stream.
   - **streamName**: Name of the stream (e.g., "live-video-stream-7164b12d-1708817130231").
   - **uniqueKey**: Unique key for the stream.
   - **videoId**: Identifier for the video.
   - **accountId**: Account identifier.
   - **channelId**: Channel identifier.
   - **sessionId**: Session identifier.
   - **videoStatus**: Current status of the video, indicates if itâ€™s ready or not (e.g., "notready").
   - **providerName**: Name of the provider handling the stream.
   - **providerUniqueId**: Unique identifier for the provider.
   - **providerPlaybackUrl**: URL to play back the video if available.
   - **providerStreamId**: Unique ID for the stream provided by the service.
   - **providerStreamKey**: Stream key used for streaming.
   - **providerStreamUrl**: URL for the stream.
   - **providerStreamData**: Detailed data related to the streaming provider:
     - Contains keys for RTMP, SRT, WebRTC, and others, along with their respective URLs and stream keys.
   - **success**: Boolean indicating the success of the request.
   - **errors**: List of any errors encountered during the process.
   - **messages**: Additional messages related to the operation.
   - **createdDate**: Date when the stream was created.
   - **createdTime**: Time when the stream was created.
   - **updatedDate**: Date when the stream was last updated.
   - **updatedTime**: Time when the stream was last updated.
   - **deletedDate**: Date of deletion, if applicable.
   - **deletedTime**: Time of deletion, if applicable.

3. **details**: Information regarding the video session.
   - **accountId**: Identifier for the user account.
   - **sessionId**: Identifier for the live session.
   - **channelId**: Identifier for the channel.
   - **videoId**: Identifier for the video.
   - **title**: Title of the video.
   - **description**: Description of the video.
   - **tags**: Tags associated with the video.
   - **streamType**: Type of the stream (e.g., "Live").
   - **searchType**: Type of content being streamed (e.g., "Game").
   - **started**: Boolean indicating if the stream has started.
   - **startedOn**: Timestamp of when the stream started.
   - **paused**: Boolean indicating if the stream is paused.
   - **pausedOn**: Timestamp of when the stream was paused.
   - **stopped**: Boolean indicating if the stream is stopped.
   - **stoppedOn**: Timestamp of when the stream was stopped.
   - **streamId**: Identifier for the stream.
   - **channel**: Name of the channel where the stream is hosted.
   - **category**: The main category of the streamed content.
   - **categoryId**: The identifier for the content category.
   - **subCategory**: Subcategory for more specific classification.
   - **subCategoryId**: Identifier for the subcategory.
   - **scheduleDate**: Date on which the stream is scheduled.
   - **scheduleTime**: Time at which the stream is scheduled to start.
   - **streamHours**: Duration of the stream in hours.
   - **coverPhotoUrl**: URL for the cover photo associated with the stream.
   - **providerPlaybackUrl**: Playback URL from the provider, if applicable.
   - **voteTokenQuantity**: Quantity of vote tokens available for the stream.
   - **votingTimeReset**: Time in minutes for resetting the voting period.
   - **voteButtonQuantity**: Number of buttons available for voting.
   - **voteButtonText1**: Text for the first voting button.
   - **voteButtonText2**: Text for the second voting button.
   - **isRewardsEnabled**: Boolean indicating if rewards are enabled for the stream.
   - **isTournamentEnabled**: Boolean indicating if a tournament feature is active.
   - **tournamentButtonText1**: Text for the first tournament button.
   - **tournamentButtonText2**: Text for the second tournament button.
   - **streamLocatorName**: Name for locating the stream.
   - **streamAssetName**: Name of the stream asset.
   - **platformVideoIds**: Object containing specific platform IDs for the video across various services.
   - **platformEventIds**: Object containing event IDs for social platforms.
   - **primaryCameraName**: Name of the main camera used for streaming.
   - **primaryMicrophoneName**: Name of the main microphone used.
   - **primarySpeakerName**: Name of the primary speaker used.
   - **additionalCameras**: List of additional cameras and microphones used in the stream.
   - **createdDate**: Date the session details were created.
   - **createdTime**: Time the session details were created.
   - **updatedDate**: Date the session details were last updated.
   - **updatedTime**: Time the session details were last updated.
   - **deletedDate**: Date of deletion, if applicable.
   - **deletedTime**: Time of deletion, if applicable.

This detail provides clarity on what information is sent to the server in order to delete a video connection for a live stream on Twitter.

request.description:
### Endpoint Description: Video - Connect - Create - Vaughn Live

#### Request Overview
- **Method**: POST  
  This endpoint is used to create a new live video connection.
  
- **URL**: `http://localhost:3000/api/video/connect/create`  
  The endpoint for sending the request to create a live video stream.

#### Headers
- **Content-Type**: `application/json`  
  Specifies that the body of the request is in JSON format.

#### Request Body
The body of the request contains two main objects: `options`, and `stream`, along with `details`.

### Options Object
Contains configuration options for the video stream.

- **providerName**: `vaughnlive`  
  Name of the streaming provider being used.

- **providerId**: `""`  
  Unique identifier for the provider (not specified).

- **apiKey**: `null`  
  API key for authentication (not provided).

- **apiSecret**: `null`  
  API secret for authentication (not provided).

- **apiClientId**: `null`  
  Client ID for API (not specified).

- **authToken**: `null`  
  Authentication token for secure access (not provided).

- **server**: `null`  
  Server information (not specified).

- **rtmpUrl**: `null`  
  RTMP URL for streaming (not provided).

- **streamKey**: `null`  
  Streaming key to authorize the stream (not specified).

- **channelUrl**: `null`  
  URL for the channel where the video will be streamed (not provided).

- **authUsername**: `null`  
  Username for authentication (not specified).

- **authPassword**: `null`  
  Password for authentication (not provided).

- **uniqueKey**: `uniqueKey`  
  Unique identifier for the video stream.

- **videoId**: `videoId`  
  Identifier for the video being streamed.

- **accountId**: `accountId`  
  Identifier for the user's account.

- **channelId**: `channelId`  
  Identifier for the streaming channel.

- **sessionId**: `sessionId`  
  Identifier for the current streaming session.

- **streamId**: `streamId`  
  Identifier for the stream.

- **ipAddress**: `null`  
  IP address from which the request is made (not provided).

- **country**: `United States`  
  The country of the streamer.

- **state**: `California`  
  The state of the streamer.

- **title**: `Fortune's Basketball Challenge`  
  Title of the video stream.

- **description**: `Basketball game featuring amazing plays and challenges.`  
  A brief description of the video content.

- **tags**: `basketball,game,challenge`  
  Keywords associated with the video for easier search.

### Stream Object
Contains details about the stream that is being created.

- **streamId**: `streamId`  
  Identifier for the stream.

- **streamName**: `live-video-stream-7164b12d-1708817130231`  
  The name given to the live stream.

- **uniqueKey**: `uniqueKey`  
  Unique identifier for this stream instance.

- **videoId**: `videoId`  
  Identifier for the video.

- **accountId**: `accountId`  
  Account identifier for the streamer.

- **channelId**: `channelId`  
  Channel identifier associated with the stream.

- **sessionId**: `sessionId`  
  Identifier for the streaming session.

- **videoStatus**: `notready`  
  Current status of the video stream.

- **providerName**: `cloudflare`  
  Name of the streaming provider.

- **providerUniqueId**: `c3b3f93b0a7594f3db917d5f9a671351`  
  Unique identifier for the provider's service.

- **providerPlaybackUrl**: `""`  
  Playback URL for accessing the video stream (not specified).

- **providerStreamId**: `c3b3f93b0a7594f3db917d5f9a671351`  
  Unique identifier for the stream from the provider.

- **providerStreamKey**: `e0bb5fa14f7059bccfcef40d5dbe2283kc3b3f93b0a7594f3db917d5f9a671351`  
  Key to authorize the stream with the provider.

- **providerStreamUrl**: `srt://live.cloudflare.com:778`  
  URL used for the stream connection.

- **providerStreamData**:  
  Contains detailed data returned by the provider, including RTMP and SRT URLs.

- **success**: `true`  
  Indicates the request was successfully processed.

- **errors**: `[]`  
  List of any errors encountered during the request (none in this case).

- **messages**: `[]`  
  Additional messages related to the request (none in this case).

- **createdDate**: `2024-02-24`  
  Date when the stream was created.

- **createdTime**: `23:25:30`  
  Time when the stream was created.

- **updatedDate**: `2024-02-25`  
  Date when the stream details were last updated.

- **updatedTime**: `01:14:26`  
  Time when the stream details were last updated.

- **deletedDate**: `null`  
  Date indicating if the stream was deleted (not deleted).

- **deletedTime**: `null`  
  Time indicating if the stream was deleted (not deleted).

### Details Object
Provides more detailed information about the video stream.

- **accountId**: `accountId`  
  Identifier for the userâ€™s account.

- **sessionId**: `sessionId`  
  Identifier for the current session.

- **channelId**: `channelId`  
  Identifier for the channel.

- **videoId**: `videoId`  
  Identifier for the video.

- **title**: `Fortune's Basketball Challenge`  
  Title of the stream.

- **description**: `Basketball game featuring amazing plays and challenges.`  
  Description of the video content.

- **tags**: `basketball,game,challenge`  
  Tags related to the stream for search optimization.

- **streamType**: `Live`  
  Indicates that this is a live stream.

- **searchType**: `Game`  
  Type of content for search classification.

- **started**: `true`  
  Indicates the stream has started.

- **startedOn**: `2024-02-24T22:41:42.483Z`  
  Timestamp of when the stream started.

- **paused**: `false`  
  Indicates the stream is currently not paused.

- **pausedOn**: `2024-02-24T22:41:42.483Z`  
  Timestamp for when the stream was paused (not applicable here).

- **stopped**: `false`  
  Indicates the stream has not been stopped.

- **stoppedOn**: `null`  
  Timestamp for when the stream was stopped (not applicable here).

- **streamId**: `streamId`  
  Identifier for the stream.

- **channel**: `Fortune's Basketball Channel`  
  Name of the channel broadcasting the stream.

- **category**: `Board`  
  Category of the video content.

- **categoryId**: `categoryId`  
  Identifier for the content category.

- **subCategory**: `Outdoor Party`  
  Sub-category of the content.

- **subCategoryId**: `subCategoryId`  
  Identifier for the sub-category.

- **scheduleDate**: `2024-02-01`  
  Date the stream is scheduled for (if applicable).

- **scheduleTime**: `18:00:00`  
  Time the stream is scheduled for (if applicable).

- **streamHours**: `1`  
  Expected duration of the stream in hours.

- **coverPhotoUrl**: `basketball-cover-url.jpg`  
  URL for the stream's cover photo.

- **providerPlaybackUrl**: `""`  
  URL for playback provided by the streaming service (not specified).

- **voteTokenQuantity**: `100`  
  Number of tokens available for voting during the stream.

- **votingTimeReset**: `5`  
  Time in minutes to reset voting.

- **voteButtonQuantity**: `4`  
  Number of button options available for votes.

- **voteButtonText1**: `Layup`  
  Text for the first voting button.

- **voteButtonText2**: `Dunk`  
  Text for the second voting button.

- **isRewardsEnabled**: `false`  
  Indicates if rewards are enabled for participants.

- **isTournamentEnabled**: `true`  
  Indicates if a tournament feature is enabled for this event.

- **tournamentButtonText1**: `Hit`  
  Text for the first button in the tournament feature.

- **tournamentButtonText2**: `Miss`  
  Text for the second button in the tournament feature.

- **streamLocatorName**: `basketball-locator-name`  
  Name used for locating the stream.

- **streamAssetName**: `basketball-asset-name`  
  Name of the asset for the stream.

- **platformVideoIds**:  
  Contains identifiers for the video across various platforms (all set to false in this case).

- **platformEventIds**:  
  Contains identifiers for events on various platforms (all set to false in this case).

- **primaryCameraName**: `Sony 4K Ultra HD WebCam`  
  Name of the primary camera being used for the stream.

- **primaryMicrophoneName**: `WirelessAudioTek Device`  
  Name of the primary microphone being used.

- **primarySpeakerName**: `Bose-Mega-Speaker 2.0`  
  Name of the primary speaker being used.

- **additionalCameras**:  
  Array containing additional camera and microphone setups.

- **createdDate**: `2024-02-18`  
  Date when the stream details were first created.

- **createdTime**: `14:54:25`  
  Time when the stream details were first created.

- **updatedDate**: `2024-02-24`  
  Date when the stream details were last updated.

- **updatedTime**: `23:29:19`  
  Time when the stream details were last updated.

- **deletedDate**: `null`  
  Date indicating if the stream was deleted (not deleted).

- **deletedTime**: `null`  
  Time indicating if the stream was deleted (not deleted).

request.description:
### Description of Endpoint Data

**Request**
- **Method**: The HTTP method used for the request, which is PUT. This method updates existing resources on the server.
- **URL**: The endpoint to connect to for updating video details, `http://localhost:3000/api/video/connect/update`.
- **Headers**: 
  - **Content-Type**: Specifies the media type of the resource, which is `application/json`. This indicates that the request body is in JSON format.

**Body**
- The body of the request is structured in JSON format. It contains two main sections: `options`, `stream`, and `details`.

**Options**
- **providerName**: The name of the service providing the video stream, in this case, â€˜vaughnliveâ€™.
- **providerId**: An identifier for the provider. Currently left empty.
- **apiKey**: Key for API access. Currently set to null.
- **apiSecret**: Secret key for API access. Currently set to null.
- **apiClientId**: Identifier for the API client. Currently set to null.
- **authToken**: Authentication token for accessing the providerâ€™s resources. Currently set to null.
- **server**: The server being used. Currently set to null.
- **rtmpUrl**: RTMP URL for streaming. Currently set to null.
- **streamKey**: The key used for streaming. Currently set to null.
- **channelUrl**: URL of the video channel. Currently set to null.
- **authUsername**: Username for authentication purposes. Currently set to null.
- **authPassword**: Password for authentication purposes. Currently set to null.
- **uniqueKey**: A unique identifier for the video or stream.
- **videoId**: The identifier for the video being updated.
- **accountId**: Identifier for the userâ€™s account.
- **channelId**: Identifier for the streaming channel.
- **sessionId**: Identifier for the current streaming session.
- **streamId**: Identifier for the stream.
- **ipAddress**: IP address of the streaming source. Currently set to null.
- **country**: The country where the stream originates, set to "United States".
- **state**: The state where the stream originates, set to "California".
- **title**: The title of the video, which is â€œFortune's Basketball Challengeâ€.
- **description**: A brief description of the video content, detailing it as a basketball game featuring amazing plays and challenges.
- **tags**: Tags related to the video for categorization, set to â€œbasketball, game, challengeâ€.

**Stream**
- **streamId**: Identifier for the current stream instance.
- **streamName**: The name of the video stream.
- **uniqueKey**: A unique key for the stream, matching the one in the `options` section.
- **videoId**: The identifier for the corresponding video.
- **accountId**: Identifier for the userâ€™s account associated with the stream.
- **channelId**: Identifier for the streaming channel.
- **sessionId**: Identifier for the session in which streaming occurs.
- **videoStatus**: Status of the video stream, currently marked as â€˜notreadyâ€™.
- **providerName**: The name of the streaming provider.
- **providerUniqueId**: Unique identifier assigned by the provider to the stream.
- **providerPlaybackUrl**: URL to playback the stream, currently empty.
- **providerStreamId**: Identifier for the stream, assigned by the provider.
- **providerStreamKey**: Key to access the provider's stream.
- **providerStreamUrl**: URL used for streaming the video.
- **providerStreamData**: Contains nested details about the streaming data, including URLs for different protocols (RTMPS, SRT, WebRTC), creation and modification timestamps, and metadata about the stream.
- **success**: Indicates if the operation was successful (true or false).
- **errors**: Array to hold any error messages, currently empty.
- **messages**: Array for any informational messages, currently empty.
- **createdDate**: Date when the stream was created.
- **createdTime**: Time when the stream was created.
- **updatedDate**: Date when the stream was last updated.
- **updatedTime**: Time when the stream was last updated.
- **deletedDate**: Date when the stream was deleted, currently null.
- **deletedTime**: Time when the stream was deleted, currently null.

**Details**
- **accountId**: Same as above, identifies the userâ€™s account.
- **sessionId**: Same as above, identifies the session.
- **channelId**: Same as above, identifies the channel.
- **videoId**: Same as above, identifies the video.
- **title**: Same as above, title of the video.
- **description**: Same as above, describes the content of the video.
- **tags**: Same as above, tags associated with the video.
- **streamType**: Type of streaming, which is â€˜Liveâ€™.
- **searchType**: Category for searching the stream, labeled as â€˜Gameâ€™.
- **started**: Boolean indicating if the stream has started.
- **startedOn**: Timestamp of when the stream started.
- **paused**: Boolean indicating if the stream is paused.
- **pausedOn**: Timestamp of when the stream was paused.
- **stopped**: Boolean indicating if the stream has stopped.
- **stoppedOn**: Timestamp of when the stream was stopped, currently null.
- **streamId**: Same as above for the stream.
- **channel**: Name of the channel hosting the stream.
- **category**: The main category of the stream, labeled â€˜Boardâ€™.
- **categoryId**: Identifier for the main category.
- **subCategory**: Sub-category of the stream, labeled â€˜Outdoor Partyâ€™.
- **subCategoryId**: Identifier for the sub-category.
- **scheduleDate**: Date the stream is scheduled to take place.
- **scheduleTime**: Time the stream is scheduled to start.
- **streamHours**: Duration of the stream, measured in hours.
- **coverPhotoUrl**: URL to the cover photo representing the video.
- **providerPlaybackUrl**: URL for playback from the provider, currently empty.
- **voteTokenQuantity**: The number of tokens available for voting during the stream.
- **votingTimeReset**: Duration for which the voting resets.
- **voteButtonQuantity**: Number of voting buttons available during the stream.
- **voteButtonText1**: Text for the first voting button.
- **voteButtonText2**: Text for the second voting button.
- **isRewardsEnabled**: Boolean indicating if rewards are enabled for viewers.
- **isTournamentEnabled**: Boolean indicating if a tournament feature is enabled.
- **tournamentButtonText1**: Text for the first button in a tournament setting.
- **tournamentButtonText2**: Text for the second button in a tournament setting.
- **streamLocatorName**: Name for locating the stream.
- **streamAssetName**: Name for the asset associated with the stream.
- **platformVideoIds**: Object holding identifiers for various platforms where the video might be shared, all currently set to false indicating no IDs are provided.
- **platformEventIds**: Object holding event identifiers related to various platforms, all currently set to false.
- **primaryCameraName**: Name of the main camera used in the stream.
- **primaryMicrophoneName**: Name of the main microphone used in the stream.
- **primarySpeakerName**: Name of the main speaker used during the stream.
- **additionalCameras**: An array of additional cameras and microphones used.
- **createdDate**: Date when the details were created.
- **createdTime**: Time when the details were created.
- **updatedDate**: Date when the details were last updated.
- **updatedTime**: Time when the details were last updated.
- **deletedDate**: Date when details were deleted, currently null.
- **deletedTime**: Time when details were deleted, currently null.

request.description:
**Endpoint Description: Video - Connect - Delete - Vaughn Live**

**Request Details:**
- **Method:** POST  
  The HTTP method used for this request is POST, indicating that the request is intended to create or modify resources on the server.

- **URL:** http://localhost:3000/api/video/connect/delete  
  This is the endpoint where the request is sent, specifically for deleting a connection related to a video.

**Headers:**
- **Content-Type:** application/json  
  Indicates that the body of the request contains JSON data.

**Request Body:**
The request body is structured in two main parts: `options` and `stream`. Each of these parts includes several fields.

1. **Options:**
   - **providerName:** vaughnlive  
     The name of the video streaming provider being used.
   
   - **providerId:** (string)  
     An identifier for the provider, which appears to be empty in this request.
   
   - **apiKey:** null  
     This field is intended for the API key used to authenticate with the provider, currently not provided.
   
   - **apiSecret:** null  
     If applicable, this would hold the API secret for the provider; not provided here.
   
   - **apiClientId:** null  
     A client ID for API interactions; currently not supplied.
   
   - **authToken:** null  
     Holds an authentication token if needed, currently not provided.
   
   - **server:** null  
     The server information is not specified in this request.
   
   - **rtmpUrl:** null  
     The URL for RTMP stream; not included here.
   
   - **streamKey:** null  
     The key used for streaming, which is not provided in this case.
   
   - **channelUrl:** null  
     The URL of the channel; currently not defined.
   
   - **authUsername:** null  
     Username for authentication, not provided.
   
   - **authPassword:** null  
     Password for authentication is also not included.
   
   - **uniqueKey:** uniqueKey  
     A unique identifier for the video or stream, supplied here as "uniqueKey".
   
   - **videoId:** videoId  
     Represents the ID of the video being referenced.
   
   - **accountId:** accountId  
     Identifier for the account associated with the video.
   
   - **channelId:** channelId  
     Refers to the channel ID for this video stream.
   
   - **sessionId:** sessionId  
     Represents the active session ID related to the video.
   
   - **streamId:** streamId  
     Identifier for the specific stream.
   
   - **ipAddress:** null  
     The IP address related to the stream, currently unspecified.
   
   - **country:** United States  
     Location information, indicating the country of the stream.
   
   - **state:** California  
     More specific location data, indicating the state of the stream.
   
   - **title:** Fortune's Basketball Challenge  
     Title of the video being referenced.
   
   - **description:** Basketball game featuring amazing plays and challenges.  
     A brief description of the video content.
   
   - **tags:** basketball, game, challenge  
     Keywords associated with the video for better categorization.

2. **Stream:**
   - **streamId:** streamId  
     The unique identifier for the stream.
   
   - **streamName:** live-video-stream-7164b12d-1708817130231  
     The name assigned to the streaming event.
   
   - **uniqueKey:** uniqueKey  
     Repeating the unique identifier for the stream.
   
   - **videoId:** videoId  
     The ID of the video associated with this stream.
   
   - **accountId:** accountId  
     Account identifier again for reference.
   
   - **channelId:** channelId  
     Channel identifier related to this stream.
   
   - **sessionId:** sessionId  
     Session identifier for the ongoing activity.
   
   - **videoStatus:** notready  
     Current status of the video stream.
   
   - **providerName:** cloudflare  
     Indicates that Cloudflare is the provider for the streaming service.
   
   - **providerUniqueId:** c3b3f93b0a7594f3db917d5f9a671351  
     The unique ID assigned by the provider for this stream.
   
   - **providerPlaybackUrl:** (string)  
     URL for playback of the stream, currently not provided.
   
   - **providerStreamId:** c3b3f93b0a7594f3db917d5f9a671351  
     Unique ID for the stream within the providerâ€™s system.
   
   - **providerStreamKey:** e0bb5fa14f7059bccfcef40d5dbe2283kc3b3f93b0a7594f3db917d5f9a671351  
     The key used by the provider to access the stream.
   
   - **providerStreamUrl:** srt://live.cloudflare.com:778  
     URL for accessing the stream directly.
   
   - **providerStreamData:**  
     Contains nested information about the stream data, including various connection URLs, created and modified date and time, and details about the stream such as account ID, stream ID, title, description, and meta-information like the primary camera and microphone used.
   
   - **success:** true  
     Indicates the successful execution of the operation.
   
   - **errors:** []  
     Array reserved for any errors that may arise; currently empty, indicating no errors.
   
   - **messages:** []  
     Array for messages related to the operation; currently empty.

**Created and Updated Dates/Times:**
- **createdDate:** 2024-02-24  
  The date when the stream was created.
  
- **createdTime:** 23:25:30  
  The time when the stream was created.

- **updatedDate:** 2024-02-25  
  The date when the video or stream was last updated.

- **updatedTime:** 01:14:26  
  The time when the video or stream was last updated.

- **deletedDate:** null  
  Indicates that the stream has not been deleted.

- **deletedTime:** null  
  No deletion time is recorded, aligning with the deletedDate.

**Details:**
- Provides extensive information on the video, including identifiers, timestamps, title, description, tags, stream state information (started, paused, stopped), stream type and category, cover photo URL, voting settings if applicable, and platform IDs for output across various services. It also details microphone and camera usage for the stream along with the created and updated timestamps.

request.description:
### API Endpoint Description: Video - Connect - Create - Vimeo Live

#### Request Method:
- **Method**: POST
- **URL**: The endpoint for creating a live video connection. Accessible at `http://localhost:3000/api/video/connect/create`.

#### Request Headers:
- **Content-Type**: Specifies the media type of the resource being sent to the server. Here, it is set to `application/json`, indicating that the request body contains JSON data.

#### Request Body:
Here's a breakdown of the body of the request:

1. **options**: Contains various settings and parameters for the video connection.
   - **providerName**: Name of the streaming provider being used (e.g., "vimeolive").
   - **providerId**: Identifier for the provider (currently empty).
   - **apiKey**: Key used to authenticate against the API (currently null).
   - **apiSecret**: Secret key for further authentication (currently null).
   - **apiClientId**: Client ID for API access (currently null).
   - **authToken**: Token for authentication (currently null).
   - **server**: Server details for the streaming (currently null).
   - **rtmpUrl**: RTMP URL for streaming (currently null).
   - **streamKey**: Key used for streaming (currently null).
   - **channelUrl**: URL for the channel (currently null).
   - **authUsername**: Username for authentication (currently null).
   - **authPassword**: Password for authentication (currently null).
   - **uniqueKey**: A unique identifier for this particular stream (set to "uniqueKey").
   - **videoId**: Identifier for the video being streamed (set to "videoId").
   - **accountId**: Identifier for the user's account (set to "accountId").
   - **channelId**: Identifier for the channel being used (set to "channelId").
   - **sessionId**: Identifier for the current session (set to "sessionId").
   - **streamId**: Identifier for the stream (set to "streamId").
   - **ipAddress**: The IP address of the user (currently null).
   - **country**: The country where the stream is originating from (set to "United States").
   - **state**: The state where the stream is originating from (set to "California").
   - **title**: Title of the video (set to "Fortune's Basketball Challenge").
   - **description**: A brief description of the video (set to "Basketball game featuring amazing plays and challenges.").
   - **tags**: Tags associated with the video for categorization (set to "basketball,game,challenge").

2. **stream**: Details about the video stream being created.
   - **streamId**: Identifier for the current stream (set to "streamId").
   - **streamName**: The name of the live video stream (e.g., "live-video-stream-7164b12d-1708817130231").
   - **uniqueKey**: A unique identifier for the stream (set to "uniqueKey").
   - **videoId**: Identifier for the associated video (set to "videoId").

3. **details**: Contains more specific information about the video and its settings.

   - **streamId**: Identifier for the stream (set to "streamId").
   - **channel**: Name of the channel being used (set to "Fortune's Basketball Channel").
   - **category**: Category of the content (set to "Board").
   - **categoryId**: Identifier for the category (set to "categoryId").
   - **subCategory**: Sub-category for the content (set to "Outdoor Party").
   - **subCategoryId**: Identifier for the sub-category (set to "subCategoryId").

   - **platformEventIds**: Object storing event IDs for various social media/platform events (all currently set to false).

request.description:
### Endpoint: Video - Connect - Update - Vimeo Live

#### Request Method:
- **PUT**: This method is used to update existing resources on the server.

#### Request URL:
- **http://localhost:3000/api/video/connect/update**: This is the API endpoint to which the update request will be sent.

#### Request Headers:
- **Content-Type**: Indicates the media type of the resource being sent to the server. Here it is set as `application/json`, meaning that the request body contains JSON data.

#### Request Body:
The body of the request is structured into two main sections: **options** and **stream**.

##### Options:
- **providerName**: Specifies the name of the video service provider, here it's set to `vimeolive`.
- **providerId**: An identifier for the provider. Currently left empty.
- **apiKey**: The API key for authentication purposes. Currently set to `null`.
- **apiSecret**: The secret key associated with the API key. Currently set to `null`.
- **apiClientId**: ID of the client for API access. Currently set to `null`.
- **authToken**: Token used for authorization. Currently set to `null`.
- **server**: Specifies the server information. Currently set to `null`.
- **rtmpUrl**: URL for Real-Time Messaging Protocol connections. Currently set to `null`.
- **streamKey**: Key needed to stream content. Currently set to `null`.
- **channelUrl**: URL for the video channel. Currently set to `null`.
- **authUsername**: Username for authentication. Currently set to `null`.
- **authPassword**: Password for authentication. Currently set to `null`.
- **uniqueKey**: A unique identifier for the stream, set as `uniqueKey`.
- **videoId**: Identifier for the video being streamed, set as `videoId`.
- **accountId**: ID of the account associated with this stream, set as `accountId`.
- **channelId**: ID of the channel associated with the stream, set as `channelId`.
- **sessionId**: ID of the session for the stream, set as `sessionId`.
- **streamId**: ID of the specific stream, set as `streamId`.
- **ipAddress**: The IP address of the user initiating the session. Currently set to `null`.
- **country**: The country where the stream is being initiated, specified as `United States`.
- **state**: The state where the stream is being initiated, specified as `California`.
- **title**: The title of the video stream, given as `Fortune's Basketball Challenge`.
- **description**: A brief description of the video content, set as `Basketball game featuring amazing plays and challenges`.
- **tags**: Tags associated with the video for categorization, provided as `basketball,game,challenge`.

##### Stream:
- **streamId**: Corresponds to the ID of the current stream, set as `streamId`.
- **streamName**: The name assigned to the stream, given as `live-video-stream-7164b12d-1708817130231`.
- **uniqueKey**: Mirrors the unique key specified earlier, set as `uniqueKey`.
- **videoId**: Represents the ID of the video being streamed, also set as `videoId`.
- **accountId**: Mirrors the account ID specified earlier, also set as `accountId`.
- **channelId**: Mirrors the channel ID specified earlier, also set as `channelId`.
- **sessionId**: Mirrors the session ID specified earlier, also set as `sessionId`.
- **videoStatus**: Indicates the current status of the video, set as `notready`.
- **providerName**: Provider of the streaming service, set as `cloudflare`.
- **providerUniqueId**: Unique identifier from the provider, provided as `c3b3f93b0a7594f3db917d5f9a671351`.
- **providerPlaybackUrl**: URL for playback from the provider. Currently set to an empty string.
- **providerStreamId**: Unique ID for the stream from the provider, set as `c3b3f93b0a7594f3db917d5f9a671351`.
- **providerStreamKey**: Stream key required by the provider for streaming, set as `e0bb5fa14f7059bccfcef40d5dbe2283kc3b3f93b0a7594f3db917d5f9a671351`.
- **providerStreamUrl**: URL at which the stream can be accessed, provided as `srt://live.cloudflare.com:778`.
- **providerStreamData**: Complex object containing detailed connectivity data from the provider, including multiple streaming protocols (RTMP, SRT, WebRTC) and URLs associated with each.
- **createdDate**: Date when the stream was created, set as `2024-02-24`.
- **createdTime**: Time when the stream was created, set as `23:25:30`.
- **updatedDate**: Date when the stream was last updated, set as `2024-02-25`.
- **updatedTime**: Time when the stream was last updated, set as `01:14:26`.
- **deletedDate**: Date when the stream was deleted, currently set to `null`.
- **deletedTime**: Time when the stream was deleted, currently set to `null`.

##### Details:
- **accountId**: Mirrors the account ID specified earlier, also set as `accountId`.
- **sessionId**: Mirrors the session ID specified earlier, also set as `sessionId`.
- **channelId**: Mirrors the channel ID specified earlier, also set as `channelId`.
- **videoId**: Mirrors the video ID specified earlier, also set as `videoId`.
- **title**: Mirrors the title specified earlier, also set as `Fortune's Basketball Challenge`.
- **description**: Mirrors the description specified earlier, also set as `Basketball game featuring amazing plays and challenges`.
- **tags**: Mirrors the tags specified earlier, also set as `basketball,game,challenge`.
- **streamType**: Describes the type of stream, set as `Live`.
- **searchType**: Defines the type of content for searching, marked as `Game`.
- **started**: Boolean indicating whether the stream has started, set as `true`.
- **startedOn**: Timestamp marking when the stream started, set as `2024-02-24T22:41:42.483Z`.
- **paused**: Indicates whether the stream is currently paused, set as `false`.
- **pausedOn**: Timestamp when the stream was paused, set as `2024-02-24T22:41:42.483Z`.
- **stopped**: Indicates whether the stream has stopped, set as `false`.
- **stoppedOn**: Timestamp marking when the stream was stopped, currently set to `null`.
- **streamId**: Mirrors the stream ID specified earlier, also set as `streamId`.
- **channel**: Name of the associated channel for the stream, given as `Fortune's Basketball Channel`.
- **category**: Category under which the stream falls, specified as `Board`.
- **categoryId**: ID of the category, currently set to `categoryId`.
- **subCategory**: Subcategory of the stream, provided as `Outdoor Party`.
- **subCategoryId**: ID of the subcategory, currently set to `subCategoryId`.
- **scheduleDate**: The date when the stream is scheduled, set as `2024-02-01`.
- **scheduleTime**: The time when the stream is scheduled, set as `18:00:00`.
- **streamHours**: Duration of the stream set in hours, specified as `1`.
- **coverPhotoUrl**: URL for the cover photo of the stream, set as `basketball-cover-url.jpg`.
- **providerPlaybackUrl**: URL for playback provided by the provider, currently set to an empty string.
- **voteTokenQuantity**: Indicates the quantity of tokens available for voting, set to `100`.
- **votingTimeReset**: Time in seconds for resetting the voting period, set to `5`.
- **voteButtonQuantity**: Indicates the number of vote buttons available, set to `4`.
- **voteButtonText1**: Text for the first vote button, provided as `Layup`.
- **voteButtonText2**: Text for the second vote button, provided as `Dunk`.
- **isRewardsEnabled**: Indicates if rewards are enabled, set to `false`.
- **isTournamentEnabled**: Indicates if tournaments are enabled, set to `true`.
- **tournamentButtonText1**: Text for the first tournament button, provided as `Hit`.
- **tournamentButtonText2**: Text for the second tournament button, provided as `Miss`.
- **streamLocatorName**: Name given to the stream locator, set as `basketball-locator-name`.
- **streamAssetName**: Name assigned to the stream asset, given as `basketball-asset-name`.
- **platformVideoIds**: Object containing flags for various platform-specific video IDs, all currently set to `false`.
- **platformEventIds**: Object containing flags for various platform-specific event IDs, all currently set to `false`.
- **primaryCameraName**: Name of the primary camera used for streaming, given as `Sony 4K Ultra HD WebCam`.
- **primaryMicrophoneName**: Name of the primary microphone used for audio input, provided as `WirelessAudioTek Device`.
- **primarySpeakerName**: Name of the primary speaker used for audio output, provided as `Bose-Mega-Speaker 2.0`.
- **additionalCameras**: Array containing objects that record additional cameras used and their associated microphones.
- **createdDate**: Date when the details of the stream were created, set as `2024-02-18`.
- **createdTime**: Time when the details of the stream were created, set as `14:54:25`.
- **updatedDate**: Date when the details of the stream were last updated, set as `2024-02-24`.
- **updatedTime**: Time when the details of the stream were last updated, set as `23:29:19`.
- **deletedDate**: Date when the stream details were deleted, currently set to `null`.
- **deletedTime**: Time when the stream details were deleted, currently set to `null`. 

This detailed description provides insights into the structure and various components of the API request for connecting and updating a Vimeo Live video stream.

request.description:
### Detailed Description of Endpoint Data

**Endpoint Name:** Video - Connect - Delete - Vimeo Live  
This endpoint is designed to handle a POST request for deleting a video connection on the Vimeo Live platform.

---

#### Request Method:
- **Method:** POST  
  This indicates that the endpoint expects to receive data to create or modify resources.

#### Request URL:
- **URL:** `http://localhost:3000/api/video/connect/delete`  
  This is the endpoint where the API request needs to be sent. It hints at a local development server.

#### Headers:
- **Content-Type:** `application/json`  
  The server expects the request body to be formatted as JSON.

#### Request Body:
- **Body Mode:** Raw  
- **Raw Data:**  
  The request body contains two main sections: `options` and `stream`.

##### `options` Object:
- **providerName:** `"vimeolive"`  
  Specifies the service provider for the video stream, indicating that it is a Vimeo Live connection.

- **providerId:** `""`  
  This field is generally used to identify the provider uniquely but is empty.

- **apiKey:** `null`  
  This key is used for authentication with the provider, currently not set.

- **apiSecret:** `null`  
  Used alongside the API key for secure requests, also not set.

- **apiClientId:** `null`  
  This is typically used to identify the client for API requests, also not set.

- **authToken:** `null`  
  This token is for authorizing requests with the service provider, currently not provided.

- **server:** `null`  
  Refers to the server details that might be needed for the operation but is empty.

- **rtmpUrl:** `null`  
  This URL is for RTMP streaming but is currently not provided.

- **streamKey:** `null`  
  This key is necessary for streaming and is currently not available.

- **channelUrl:** `null`  
  This is the URL for accessing the channel but is not specified.

- **authUsername:** `null`  
  Username for authentication, currently not provided.

- **authPassword:** `null`  
  Password for authentication, currently not provided.

- **uniqueKey:** `"uniqueKey"`  
  A unique identifier for the video or stream.

- **videoId:** `"videoId"`  
  Identifier for the video that is being handled.

- **accountId:** `"accountId"`  
  Identifier for the userâ€™s account on the service.

- **channelId:** `"channelId"`  
  Identifier for the channel associated with the video.

- **sessionId:** `"sessionId"`  
  Identifier for the current streaming session.

- **streamId:** `"streamId"`  
  Identifier for the current stream of the video.

- **ipAddress:** `null`  
  Holds the IP address of the client but is currently empty.

- **country:** `"United States"`  
  Indicates the country where the stream is originating.

- **state:** `"California"`  
  State of the user or event location.

- **title:** `"Fortune's Basketball Challenge"`  
  Title of the video stream.

- **description:** `"Basketball game featuring amazing plays and challenges."`  
  A brief description of what the video stream entails.

- **tags:** `"basketball,game,challenge"`  
  Keywords associated with the video, useful for categorization and searching.

##### `stream` Object:
- **streamId:** `"streamId"`  
  Identifier for the stream instance.

- **streamName:** `"live-video-stream-7164b12d-1708817130231"`  
  Name of the live video stream.

- **videoStatus:** `"notready"`  
  Current status indicating that the video stream is not ready for playback.

- **providerName:** `"cloudflare"`  
  Indicates the content delivery network being used for the stream.

- **providerUniqueId:** `"c3b3f93b0a7594f3db917d5f9a671351"`  
  Unique ID assigned by the provider for the stream.

- **providerPlaybackUrl:** `""`  
  URL for playing back the stream, currently not available.

- **providerStreamId:** `"c3b3f93b0a7594f3db917d5f9a671351"`  
  Unique identifier for the provider's stream.

- **providerStreamKey:** `"e0bb5fa14f7059bccfcef40d5dbe2283kc3b3f93b0a7594f3db917d5f9a671351"`  
  Key used for authenticating the stream on the provider's platform.

- **providerStreamUrl:** `"srt://live.cloudflare.com:778"`  
  URL for the stream on the provider's network.

- **providerStreamData:**  
  Contains detailed information about the streaming setup, including addresses for RTMP and SRT protocols, created and modified timestamps, and metadata about the stream.

- **success:** `true`  
  Indicates whether the operation was successful.

- **errors:** `[]`  
  Array to catch any errors during the operation, currently empty.

- **messages:** `[]`  
  Array for any messages returned from the operation, currently empty.

##### Dates and Times:
- **createdDate:** `"2024-02-24"`  
  Date when the stream was created.

- **createdTime:** `"23:25:30"`  
  Time when the stream was created.

- **updatedDate:** `"2024-02-25"`  
  Date when the stream was last updated.

- **updatedTime:** `"01:14:26"`  
  Time when the stream was last updated.

- **deletedDate:** `null`  
  Date when the stream was deleted, currently not deleted.

- **deletedTime:** `null`  
  Time when the stream was deleted, currently not deleted.

---

#### `details` Object:
This section provides further information about the video stream.

- **accountId:** `"accountId"`  
  Identifier for the account associated with the stream.

- **sessionId:** `"sessionId"`  
  Identifier for the streaming session.

- **channelId:** `"channelId"`  
  Channel identifier for the stream.

- **videoId:** `"videoId"`  
  Identifier for the video content.

- **title:** `"Fortune's Basketball Challenge"`  
  Title of the stream.

- **description:** `"Basketball game featuring amazing plays and challenges."`  
  Description of the stream's content.

- **tags:** `"basketball,game,challenge"`  
  Tags associated with the stream for categorization.

- **streamType:** `"Live"`  
  Indicates the type of the stream.

- **searchType:** `"Game"`  
  Type used for searching the stream.

- **started:** `true`  
  Marks whether the stream has started.

- **startedOn:** `"2024-02-24T22:41:42.483Z"`  
  Timestamp indicating when the stream started.

- **paused:** `false`  
  Indicates that the stream is not paused.

- **pausedOn:** `"2024-02-24T22:41:42.483Z"`  
  Indicates the last pause time, which is the same as the start time.

- **stopped:** `false`  
  Indicates that the stream is currently not stopped.

- **stoppedOn:** `null`  
  A timestamp indicating when the stream was stopped, currently not applicable.

- **channel:** `"Fortune's Basketball Channel"`  
  Name of the channel where the stream is broadcasted.

- **category:** `"Board"`  
  General category of the content.

- **categoryId:** `"categoryId"`  
  Identifier for the category.

- **subCategory:** `"Outdoor Party"`  
  Further classification of the content.

- **subCategoryId:** `"subCategoryId"`  
  Identifier for the subcategory.

- **scheduleDate:** `"2024-02-01"`  
  Date the stream is scheduled.

- **scheduleTime:** `"18:00:00"`  
  Time the stream is scheduled to start.

- **streamHours:** `1`  
  Duration of the stream in hours.

- **coverPhotoUrl:** `"basketball-cover-url.jpg"`  
  URL for the cover image of the stream.

- **providerPlaybackUrl:** `""`  
  URL for playback provided by the streaming service, currently empty.

- **voteTokenQuantity:** `100`  
  Quantity of tokens available for votes during the stream.

- **votingTimeReset:** `"5"`  
  Duration (in minutes) to reset the voting time.

- **voteButtonQuantity:** `4`  
  Total number of voting options presented to users.

- **voteButtonText1:** `"Layup"`  
  Text for the first voting option.

- **voteButtonText2:** `"Dunk"`  
  Text for the second voting option.

- **isRewardsEnabled:** `false`  
  Indicates if rewards for participation are enabled.

- **isTournamentEnabled:** `true`  
  Indicates if tournament features are enabled.

- **tournamentButtonText1:** `"Hit"`  
  Text for the first button in tournament settings.

- **tournamentButtonText2:** `"Miss"`  
  Text for the second button in tournament settings.

- **streamLocatorName:** `"basketball-locator-name"`  
  Locator name for the stream.

- **streamAssetName:** `"basketball-asset-name"`  
  Asset name associated with the stream.

- **platformVideoIds:**  
  Collection of unique identifiers across various platforms, all currently set to `false`, indicating no IDs assigned.

- **platformEventIds:**  
  Collection of event IDs across various platforms, each set to `false`, indicating no events assigned.

- **primaryCameraName:** `"Sony 4K Ultra HD WebCam"`  
  The main camera used for the stream.

- **primaryMicrophoneName:** `"WirelessAudioTek Device"`  
  The primary microphone used for audio capture.

- **primarySpeakerName:** `"Bose-Mega-Speaker 2.0"`  
  The main speaker used for audio output.

- **additionalCameras:**  
  List of additional cameras and microphones configured, showcasing the setup.

- **createdDate:** `"2024-02-18"`  
  Date when the details were created.

- **createdTime:** `"14:54:25"`  
  Time when the details were created.

- **updatedDate:** `"2024-02-24"`  
  Date when the details were last updated.

- **updatedTime:** `"23:29:19"`  
  Time when the details were last updated.

- **deletedDate:** `null`  
- **deletedTime:** `null`  
  Both fields are empty as no deletion has occurred.

---

This detailed outline provides clarity on the expected structure of the request to the given endpoint and the associated data, thereby aiding users to correctly format their requests and understand the operational context for each piece of data.

request.description:
### Endpoint: Video - Connect - Create - YouTube Live

#### Request Method: 
- **POST**: This method is used to create a new resource on the server.

#### Request URL: 
- **http://localhost:3000/api/video/connect/create**: The endpoint where the request will be sent to create a YouTube Live video connection.

#### Headers: 
- **Content-Type**: Specifies the media type of the resource. Here it is set to `application/json`, indicating that the request body contains JSON data.

#### Request Body: 

##### Options:
- **providerName**: The name of the provider used to connect, which in this case is set to `"youtubelive"`.
- **providerId**: An identifier for the provider. It is left blank here but would typically be a unique identifier for the provider.
- **apiKey**: A key used to authenticate with the API. Currently set to `null`.
- **apiSecret**: The secret associated with the API key for authentication. Currently set to `null`.
- **apiClientId**: The client ID for the API. Currently set to `null`.
- **authToken**: A token used for authentication. Currently set to `null`.
- **server**: Specifies the server to be used. Currently set to `null`.
- **rtmpUrl**: The RTMP URL for streaming. Currently set to `null`.
- **streamKey**: The key used to authenticate streams. Currently set to `null`.
- **channelUrl**: URL of the channel where the stream will be broadcasted. Currently set to `null`.
- **authUsername**: Username used for authentication. Currently set to `null`.
- **authPassword**: Password used for authentication. Currently set to `null`.
- **uniqueKey**: A unique identifier for this video connection.
- **videoId**: An identifier for the video being streamed.
- **accountId**: The ID for the user account associated with this stream.
- **channelId**: ID for the channel where the video is being streamed.
- **sessionId**: ID for the current streaming session.
- **streamId**: ID for the stream being created.
- **ipAddress**: IP address of the device initiating the request. Currently set to `null`.
- **country**: The country from which the stream is initiated, set to `"United States"`.
- **state**: The state from which the stream is initiated, set to `"California"`.
- **title**: Title for the video stream, set to `"Fortune's Basketball Challenge"`.
- **description**: Description of the stream content, set to `"Basketball game featuring amazing plays and challenges."`.
- **tags**: Keywords associated with the stream, set to `"basketball,game,challenge"`.

##### Stream:
- **streamId**: ID for the created stream.
- **streamName**: Name of the stream, generated uniquely.
- **videoStatus**: Indicates the readiness status of the video, currently set to `"notready"`.
- **providerName**: Name of the provider for the stream, set to `"cloudflare"`.
- **providerUniqueId**: A unique identifier for the provider.
- **providerPlaybackUrl**: URL for playback, currently set to an empty string.
- **providerStreamId**: Unique stream ID assigned by the provider.
- **providerStreamKey**: Unique stream key assigned by the provider for authentication.
- **providerStreamUrl**: URL for the stream provided by the service.
- **providerStreamData**: Contains additional data like RTMP and SRT URLs, stream IDs, and creation/modification timestamps.
- **success**: Indicates whether the creation of the video connection was successful; currently set to `true`.
- **errors**: Array containing any errors encountered; currently empty.
- **messages**: Array containing any messages; currently empty.
- **createdDate**: Date when the stream was created.
- **createdTime**: Time when the stream was created.
- **updatedDate**: Date when the stream was last updated.
- **updatedTime**: Time when the stream was last updated.

##### Details:
- **accountId**: ID of the user account.
- **sessionId**: ID for the current session.
- **channelId**: ID of the channel.
- **videoId**: ID of the video being streamed.
- **title**: Stream title.
- **description**: Stream description.
- **tags**: Associated keywords for the stream.
- **streamType**: Type of stream; in this case, it indicates `Live`.
- **searchType**: Indicates how the stream will be categorized for searching, set to `Game`.
- **started**: Indicates whether the stream has started; currently set to `true`.
- **startedOn**: Timestamp for when the stream started.
- **paused**: Indicates whether the stream is currently paused; currently set to `false`.
- **pausedOn**: Timestamp for when the stream was paused, currently set to the same timestamp as started.
- **stopped**: Indicates whether the stream has been stopped; currently set to `false`.
- **stoppedOn**: Timestamp for when the stream was stopped, currently set to `null`.
- **streamId**: ID of the streaming session.
- **channel**: Name of the channel streaming the video.
- **category**: Main category of the stream; here it is `Board`.
- **categoryId**: ID for the category.
- **subCategory**: Sub-category of the stream; here it is `Outdoor Party`.
- **subCategoryId**: ID for the sub-category.
- **scheduleDate**: Date when the stream is scheduled.
- **scheduleTime**: Time when the stream is scheduled.
- **streamHours**: Duration of the stream in hours.
- **coverPhotoUrl**: URL for the cover photo of the stream.
- **providerPlaybackUrl**: URL for playback from the provider.
- **voteTokenQuantity**: Number of tokens available for voting.
- **votingTimeReset**: Time reset for voting.
- **voteButtonQuantity**: Number of vote buttons displayed.
- **voteButtonText1**: Text for the first vote button.
- **voteButtonText2**: Text for the second vote button.
- **isRewardsEnabled**: Indicates whether rewards are enabled; currently set to `false`.
- **isTournamentEnabled**: Indicates whether tournaments are enabled; currently set to `true`.
- **tournamentButtonText1**: Text for the first tournament button.
- **tournamentButtonText2**: Text for the second tournament button.
- **streamLocatorName**: Name associated with locating the stream.
- **streamAssetName**: Name associated with the streaming asset.
- **platformVideoIds**: Object containing various platform-specific IDs; all set to `false` indicating they are not populated.
- **platformEventIds**: Object containing various platform event IDs; all set to `false` indicating they are not populated.
- **primaryCameraName**: Name of the main camera used for streaming.
- **primaryMicrophoneName**: Name of the main microphone used for audio.
- **primarySpeakerName**: Name of the primary speaker used for sound output.
- **additionalCameras**: Array detailing additional cameras and microphones used.
- **createdDate**: Date when the details were created.
- **createdTime**: Time when the details were created.
- **updatedDate**: Date when the details were last updated.
- **updatedTime**: Time when the details were last updated.
